11131.content:
And where does that leave them in the world of ninja?

As it stands, girls can use chakra, but their chakra reserves manafest as fat. But boys can't use chakra at all, regardless of their size and weight.

Are they equals, but valued for their differing skills? Kunoichi would be the real powerhouses of the ninja world with their monopoly on chakra and therefore jutsus as well. But Shinobi would probably speciallize in infiltration and other stealth related feilds (because a powerful Kunoichi would be easily recognizable). (Speed is up in the air, while the Kunoichi would be "weighed down," their chakra would keep them easily mobile regardless of size, but not necessarily agile nor fast)

Or is the ninja world sexist? Kunoichi could easily be considered superior because of their chakra, allowing them to dominate the ninja world in terms of accomplishment and power if not necessarily in numbers. Meanwhile, Shinobi would, at best, be considered support for Kunoichi.
11131.title: Boys can't use chakra at all

111311.content:
Shinobi and kunoichi are on equal terms.

The kunoichi serve as the powerhouses, forming the backbone of the ninja world. Their ability to produce and manipulate chakra allows them to be devastating on the battle field. However, as kunoichi strive for as large chakra reserves as possible, their added weight and girth makes them just as large targets, less agile and unfit for stealth operations. So, while a properly train kunoichi could say wipe out half a block with the right jutsu, she would lack a subtle edge.

Shinobi are need for scouting, information gathering, tracking and most importantly, defending a kunoichi. Kunoichi are powerful but could be overwhelmed through sheer numbers or attacks from multiple angles. The shinobi's duty is to 'stem the tide' and keep the situations under control, allowing the kunoichi the leverage to use their chakra. However, as the shinobi lack chakra, they do not have the level of destructive capacity that kunoichi can boast. To make up for this, shinobi are trained for stamina. weapons usage, speed, hand-to-hand and inflitration.

Together, shinobi and kunoichi work together to cover one another's weaknesses. Truly skilled kunoichi or shinobi can handle enemies without the need of their opposite such as Kage of hidden villages.

However, the most common arrangement is for a shinobi and a kunoichi to be paired together and taught by an older, more experienced pair.
111311.title: Shinobi and Kunoichi are equals.

111312.content:
Ok. So girls are superior to the boys. As for where this leaves said boys can stem anywhere from support roles for Kunoichi to outright servitude.

At what time does the "rights" of a Kunoichi start to affect their Shinobi counterparts?

Maybe it starts a few days before graduation. Maybe the girls need to 'claim' the boy they want to act as their support or simply to show ownership over that one Shinobi.

Or it could start after a few years of active service in the ninja program.
111312.title: Shinobi are inferior to Kunoichi.

choices: Hinata Hyuga the girl with a secret crush on him
1113121.content:
Naruto was depressed. Today was suppose to have been one of the best and most anticipated days of an Academy student’s life. Today was suppose to be a day used to review what they had learned so they would be prepared for the Graduation Exam in a few days time. But, it wasn't. Or at least it hadn't been for him. He had been rather tired today due to him staying up so late practicing his clone justu. Because of that he had made the biggest mistake of his life... He had fallen asleep in class. Normally that wasn't such a bad thing as all he had to worry about was Iruka-sensei yelling at him or tossing a chalkboard eraser at him. Today however was the start of when Kunoichi-to-be were allowed to start laying claim to any 'one' male student in their graduating class. So when he had awoken he found a sealing collar around his neck, this showed that one of the girls in class had claimed him as their own.

In truth Naruto had nothing to worry about... if said Kunoichi failed her exam that is. If he failed and it was made known to said Kunoichi then he would basically be labeled as nothing more than a piece of property. That was something Naruto was greatly frightened about. At least as a claimed Shinobi he could go out on missions and act as battlefield support, as a failed Shinobi the best thing in life that he could look forward to was to be used and treated as nothing but a sperm donor to get his new Kunoichi mistress pregnant and helping bring about the next generation of possible ninja. In the end though, he would have little to no rights and would only have enough protection by law to be kept safe from severe abuse, neglect or death by his Kunoichi’s hand. Other than that, just about anything was considered fair game.

Naruto had hoped to be a ‘free’ Shinobi or an un-claimed Shinobi fighting to protect his home and trying to gain the respect of the village Kunoichi but, with his new collar on that route was no longer possible. Sighing he idly scratched at his collar wondering whose name was engraved in to it. When he had awoken from his unintentional nap he had simply found the collar around his neck and a note telling him to wait for her on top of the Hokage monument. Thinking on it he couldn't help but wish he had been born a girl. True he didn't want all the massive amounts of fat Kunoichi had and it was also true that being a boy would let him blend in a crowd of civilians better but, still... He hung his head and sighed again feeling sorry for himself. A tap to his shoulder startled him, making him jump slightly before turning towards the source. It was undoubtedly his Kunoichi and turning around confirmed it as he saw...
1113121.title: Life of a claimed Shinobi

choices: He freaks out and try's to run.
He's fine with it. Could have had someone worse.
11131211.content:
*Few hours earlier*
Hinata was very pleased with herself. Earlier today she had collared her secret crush, thus insuring they would be together. She was currently celebrating her success with a few cinnamon rolls. She felt slightly bad about having stolen his dream from him but, it was his own fault for falling asleep in class, that’s not even mentioning how cute and defenseless he had looked at the time. In truth she hadn't noticed what she was doing till after the sealing collar had locked firmly around his neck. She hoped she could make it up to him later but first she had to finish her little celebratory snack. Taking a small bite the chunky girl ‘mmm’ed in pleasure at the taste of her cinnamon sugared treat. Her mind conjured up the image of her beloved Naruto covered from head to toe in cinnamon sugar and she couldn’t help but blush at the implications of such a thought. Shaking her head she tried to remove the naughty thoughts from her head for a time before continuing to eat her snack, a small part of her hoping that such a scene would come to fruition. She idly smiled at the thought just as her taste buds were assaulted by the wonderful taste of her treat once more.

--------

*Present time*
This was the defining moment of their future. Naruto had just turned around and spotted her. How he reacted to seeing her as his Kunoichi would set the tone for their relationship. Whether they could be happy together and make their new lives work or if she would be forced to exert her authority over him and possible lock him up in a small room and being used as a simple stress relief would all come down to his reaction to seeing her as his Kunoichi/owner.
11131211.title: That defining moment

choices: They go have cinnamon rolls first, then go have ramen
They go have ramen first, then go have cinnamon rolls
111312112.content:
"H-Hinata?" Naruto asked in surprise. "You-You're the one who collared me?"

Hinata looked away and said, "I-I'm sorry Naruto... I-I know you had your dream... but-" She wasn't able to finish when Naruto fell on his back. "N-Naruto...!?"

Said boy let out sigh of relief. "Oh thank god... what a relief." He sat up and looked at her.

"Y-You're not upset that I collared you?" she asked in surprise. In all honesty, she thought he'd be mad at her.

Naruto then scratched the side of his face with his index finger. "Well... I am a little bit mad... but it's my own fault for not sleeping last night and falling asleep in class. Besides, you're one of the kinder females in our class." He smiles at her, making her blush. "I'm glad it was you, Hinata. But I do have to ask."

"Y-Yes Naruto. W-What is it?"

"Out of all the guys in our class, even if they were awake and got out in time, why pick me?"

She was blushing and tapping her index fingers together. "W-Well... It's because I... I have a crush on you... because of who you are and how strong willed you are... You actually inspire me to be a better person..."

Naruto wasn't prepared for that answer. "Y-You think that highly of me...?"

Hinata nodded, still blushing. "I-I just didn't want a-anyone to steel you away b-before I could tell you..." The next thing she knew, Naruto ran up to her and hugged her, and giving her a big grin.

"You're one of the first people to actually say those kinds of things to me," he tells her. "I'm so happy you actually see me as such. So from now on, I'll be by your side from now on."

This surprised Hinata. "Y-You will...? But what about your dream?"

"I can still do it," he tells her, "but I feel like I can do it with your help Hinata~" Just then, both of their stomachs growled. Both kids then laughed and giggled. "Guess all this excitement has made us both hungry."

"I guess so," Hinata agreed. "So where do you want to eat?"

"You're letting me pick?" Naruto asked. Hinata nodded. "Well then..."

11132.content:
Shinobi can use just a small amount of Chakra. While the Kunoichi have some of the most powerful techniques in the entire world, the Shinobi have a little bit of backbone in society as they are the ideal defense for some of the more immobile of Kunoichi.
Shinobi can do several of the things that a Kunoichi cannot do, such as stealth and defense, while Kunoichi are the exact opposite. Although the Shinobi chakra reserve is barely above average, the Kunoichi can use chakra transfer techniques to aid them in a dire situation. However, there are some techniques the Shinobi don’t need the Kunoichi for.
If someone has a naturally high chakra reserve, like the Senju’s and the Uzumaki’s, then they can be on par with a rookie Kunoichi. But a jinchuuriki, that is a whole different scale, what with the power of a tailed beast, a being of pure chakra, linked to the Shinobi. Some of the techniques a shinobi can use is the shadow clone jutsu, summoning jutsu, rasengan, senjutsu, weak nature transformations, Puppet usage, Eight Gates release, Super Beast drawings, and more.
There are forbidden ways to improve chakra reserves, like the curse marks. Another way that is somewhat not illegal, but considered amoral sometimes is body augmentations, such examples include the White Zetsu and even the first hokage, who was considered a god after his death. Another example of improved chakra reserves is the kekkei genkai, especially a dojutsu, allowing shinobi to be equal to a rookie Kunoichi.
There are some examples who don’t even need Kunoichi for battle. This includes the Inuzuka clan and their dogs, the Aburame clan and their insects, the Nara clan and their shadows, the Akimichi clan with naturally portly builds, and possibly others.
But there are those that can fight well without their opposites, and these are the Kage. But during the academy days, teams of two are made for the up and coming ninja of the world. Teams can have as many as a single member to 4 members. But, the teams aren’t usually made of just genin of a single village. Such examples in the past are young ANBU prodigies with random genin, genin from Sunagakure and Konohagakure. But a somewhat common tradition done is the merging of teams, mostly for missions only, due to the fact that the ninja teams are to be together...Forever.

Naruto waddled into his classroom, proudly tugging up his new sumo thong with the Hidden Leaf Village symbol displayed across the front. He had finally earned it after helping to retrieve a scroll last night and mastering his clone technique. The whole room looked at him standing there in the doorway as he waddled with a swagger up to his desk.

"Dang, how did he graduate?" asked Kiba as he sat up there in his dark grey sumo thong. The whole classroom had their own as this was the only official part of the school uniform for boys, and for girls it was simply that and a sumo strap across the chest.

Hinata was sitting next to him and blushed, which spread across her thick cheeks and even started to turn her round tummy red as well. "Good for you Naturo-kun," she said under her breath.

"Alright class," said the instructor Iruka as he waddled his four hundred pound frame into the class. "I'm very proud of all of you, you've come a long way, and today you'll finally have that hard work pay off. Because today you are officially Sumo Wrestlers, and as such you will now be assigned to four man teams, three students and one senior Sumo, who will help guide you from here on out."

Iruka went on listing the members of each team, until...

"Next up, Naruto," called out the instructor, "and..."

112331111.content:
Naruko was nervous.

She sat in class, waiting for her turn to be tested by her instructor Iruki. She was nervous, because despite being the largest girl in her class, she was the worst when it came to anything not having anything to do with direct combat, like tracking or laying down traps. This was due to the teachers negligence, because she was hated by a big majority of the village, reason being the Kyuubi being sealed into her stomach on the day she was born.

The only reason she was any good at combat compared to her peers was because of her higher weight and her naturally great stamina. Finally it was her turn as she was called into another room for testing.

In the room there was a scale, a mirror, a few training dummies and a measuring tape.

"Allright Naruko, first let's get your measurements and after that we get to the practical part of the exams. Don't worry, I know you can do it. " Iruki reassured her.

Naruko stripped down to her underwear, the only thing covering her bountiful body being a orange bra and orange panties.

First Naruko stepped onto the scale, watching herself in the mirror. First her pudgy feet, then her chubby calves, her knees, which were nearly hidden from sight by her thunder tighs, her wide hips, her big, basketball sized ass cheeks, her belly which hung a few inches below her crotch, split into two rolls, her love handles which formed a big muffin top, concealing her panties, her big, bouncy, F, borderline G-cup breasts, her soft arms which were as thick as a thin persons thighs and lastly her pudgy face with a double chin concealing part of her amply padded neck.

Then she looked down again and read the numbers the scale was showing.

Three, four, two. 342 pounds. She weighed in at three hundred and forty pounds. The minimum required weight for a Kunoichi was 200 pounds, so she easily passed that part of the test. In fact, if it was only the weight that was required to be promoted, she would already be a Chunin, the minimum weight for being one being 300 pounds. But sadly for Naruko she would have to get every single mark to pass and become genin.

After stepping of the scale, she waddled over to the training dummies. She at first didn't know what to do, but after a few moments Iruki instructed her to push one as hard as she could.

Naruko did so without question and used pressed with all her might. She wasn't surprised when the dummy broke, as she knew that her strength was directly proportional to her weight. The bigger she was, the stronger she would be.
Strangely, only she had this ability, almost like it was some kind of bloodline.

She passed this part of the test also, getting perfect grades for her exam, but because of her low marks in the rest of the year she was still placed dead last.

Iruki congratulated her and wished her good luck when she handed Naruko her new headband, which signified that she was a Kunoichi of the leaf.
112331111.title: Graduation

choices: Sayuri Uchiha and Choujo Akimichi under Kasumi Hatake
1123311111.content:
A week later Naruko was on her way to the Academy, thinking about her possible teammates.

There was Sayuri Uchiha, the Kunoichi of the year and the second biggest girl in her class. She was extremely belly heavy, having practically no bust or ass to speak of, but her gut was bigger than Naruko's, despite being 70 pounds lighter than her, weighing in at just under 270.

Then there was Sakura Haruno and Ino Yamanaka, both being fangirls of Sayuri, weighing in at 250.

Next were Kino Inuzuka and Shiko Nara weighing in at 240 pounds.

Shini Aburame and Hinata Hyuga were two of the lighter girls, only bringing 210 pounds onto the scale.

There was one exception to the 200 pound genin rule, this being the Akimichi clan. Choujo Akimichi was one of the only thin girls in the village, bringing only minimal amounts of fat with her and weighing a puny 130 pounds, nothing compared to heavyweights like Naruko or Sayuri. The entire Akimichi clan was teased constantly because of their thin bodies, causing Choujo to be extremely self conscious about her weight.

When Naruko got to her classroom she went to her usual seat and began thinking about future adventures.

She was brought back to reality when the door opened, Iruki
shutting the class down and reading out the teams.

"Team seven will be Naruko Uzumaki,
1123311111.title: Time skip to team placements

11233111111.content:
After three hours only Naruko, Sayuri and Choujo were still in the classroom, waiting for their sensei Kasumi. Naruko ate her third lunch, as she would have to gain a lot of weight to achieve her goal of becoming Hokage, Sayuri was staring outside of the window and Choujo was watching Naruko intensely. Suddenly heavy footsteps could be heard coming closer, causing Naruko to stop eating and look at the door with the other two.

When the door opened, all they saw was a big, round stomach, wide enough to nearly get its owner stuck in the doorframe. When the owner of this enormous stomach walked in, the rest of her body was revealed. Perky DD-cup breasts were resting on a belly bigger than Sayuri's, tree trunk legs supporting the enormous bulk of the woman's upper body, chubby hands caressing her belly. Her face was adorned by a pair of chubby cheeks and a double chin, a third one already being on the way.

"I'm Kasumi Hatake, meet me on the roof in 15 minutes." the now revealed Kasumi told them.

With that she left the room again, the three teenage girls following her, their eyes set on the juicy butt of the older woman. When they arrived on the roof Kasumi sat down on a bench which creaked under her weight and motioned for the girls to sit down on one opposite of her.

Choujo went to sit down in the middle, Naruko and Sayuri taking their seats on either side of her, causing the thin girl to be squished between them. Naruko liked the feeling of having her teammate so close, deciding that Choujo would sit between her and Sayuri from now on.

Kasumi began to speak: "Allright, let's introduce ourself. My name is Kasumi Hatake, Jounin, 506 pounds. I like stuff and I dislike some other things. My dreams, well I had one last night. Your turn, skinny."

Choujo went red at being called skinny, but remembered her mother telling her to not be angry about it. "I'm Choujo Akimichi, Genin, 130 pounds. I like my family and friends and I hate being called skinny. My dream for the future is proving that even a skinny Kunoichi can become powerful."

Next went Sayuri:"My name is Sayuri Uchiha, Genin, 271 pounds. I like tomatoes and I dislike, no I hate one woman. I don't have a dream for the future, no, I have an ambition. I will kill that woman, even if it is the last thing I do. "

At last it was Naruko's turn to introduce herself:" I'm Naruko Uzumaki, Genin, 347 pounds. I like any kind of food, especially Ramen. I dislike the time it takes to cook food, I only like to eat it. My dream for the future is to be Hokage and be the strongest Kunoichi who ever lived. "

"You three are an interesting bunch. We will meet at training ground 7 at 8 o'clock tomorrow to see if you are ready to become Genin. We will have a test to see if you are cut out to be the village's Kunoichi." Without bothering to answer any questions Kasumi left the roof top and the three girls were left standing there.
11233111111.title: Introductions

112331111111.content:
When Naruko went to the training ground the next day she was the last one to arrive, the other three females waiting for her.

"Now that we are all here, we can start your test. You will have to get these bells from me before lunch. If you are not able to get a bell, you will be sent back to the Academy. " Kasumi told them while holding up two bells." As you can see, there are only 2 bells for three of you. This means that one of you will have to go back to the Academy regardless what you do."

Naruko was becoming nervous and thought about possible ways to get a bell, but then something Iruki told her a few years ago came to mind. There are always three members in a genin cell, never two, so this must be a test about how willing everyone was to sacrifice themselves for the sake of the team.

"Begin! "

With that Naruko, Sayuri and Choujo vanished into the trees, where Naruko immediately began to search for her teammates. She found Choujo easily enough and was also able to persuade her to help her, and after a few minutes of looking she found Sayuri too, who was stuck in the ground up to her neck. Naruko and Choujo worked to get her out of the ground and when Sayuri was finally freed Naruko told her about her assumptions.

"Hn, I don't need the likes of you, I'm an Uchiha el-"SLAP!

Naruko had just bitch slapped Sayuri, looking absolutely furious:" Now listen to me and listen good, you are nothing but a selfish bitch who got everything she has handed to her on a silver platter! You claim to be alone, despite always having someone to talk to. The first few years of my live no one even noticed that I existed. You want to avenge your family, but you don't want help doing it. No one can do everything alone, no one can live without friends! We are a team now, so get out of that phase, because if you aren't able to become a socially acceptable person, then I will make sure you become one and belive me, you don't want that!"

Sayuri was clearly shocked, no one had ever talked to her like that. She was looking back at her life and realized what a spoiled brat she had become, never having to work for anything in her life. She vowed to become a better teammate, and maybe even a friend to Naruko and Choujo.

Now they made a plan. Naruko and Sayuri would distract Kasumi while Choujo would sneak in and steal the bells.

Naruko and Sayuri went into position, the two plump beauties watching their target intensely. When it was time to attack they stormed out of the treeline, engaging Kasumi in close quarters. While the obese Jonin was distracted by the two fat genin, Choujo managed to steal the bells without Kasumi noticing. When she called out that she had the bells, the older woman made the two girls stop fighting and then told them that only 2 may pass, as there are only two bells.

But Naruko simply went to Sayuri with one bell and said :" We will share this one, there are no rules against that, are there? "

"Are you sure?" Kasumi asked. All three nodded. "Then I must sadly inform you that you all... Pass. Missions start tomorrow."
112331111111.title: Test

1123311111111.content:

Long ago an other worldly being descended down from the Heavens and onto the realm of man, changing it forever.
The being stood taller than the mountains and possessed strength and beauty beyond mortal comprehension. This being came to be known as Kaguya Otsutsuki.
In awe of her power, humanity came to worship the titan as a goddess and surrendered to her will.
Kaguya would eventually sire two sons, one of which would grow to one day become konown as the sage of six paths ,founder of the shinobi world.

Kaguya ruled as a benevolent deity for many years. But in time however, her heart grew dark from corruption, believing herself as the ultimate good. Any who strayed from the path she laid out were delt with harshly.
Her sons, no longer willing to stand by and watch their mother's tyranny, stepped forth to oppose her. As titans themselves, they possessed divine powers comparable to their mother's which meant only they could stand up to her. Mountains crumbled, oceans boiled, the very sky and Heavens were torn asunder under the weight of their blows and reality itself was warped and bent before their might.
Realizing that they could not kill her, the brothers performed a Jutsu that ripped the lion's share of her power from her and transformed her into the very moon itself. The stolen power was then split into nine pieces and scattered to the far corners of the world. With their task complete, the brothers parted ways with one traveling to the moon to watch over their imprisoned mother and traveling the world to spread the teachings of ninshu in the hopes that it would act as a medium from which true understanding and unity between all of humanity could be forged.
The sage's efforts, admirable though they may have been, were for not as many discovered it could be used as a weapon.People came to learn that through ninjutsu Chakra could be used to harness the very forces of nature and even warp reality. Humans also came to learn that, as a side effect, chakra stores manifest themselves as extreme levels of muscular growth and physical mass. The end result was a world where strength is everything, the bigger and stronger you were the better position you were in to succeed. In this world, many train day in a day out to get as big as possible.
Some for the power it brings, some for the sake of their family's welfare , and others for the incredible pleasure that the growth gives to the recipient. Many strive for great gains in order to emulate the titans for many still worship them to this day.

Now, in this land of giants, new legends are about to be born

"Naruto was attacked again and played with, resulting in three broken right-side ribs," Tsunade replied, "I want to use this as justification to take him under my protection and raise him."

"Out of the question," Danzo said, "If any of our enemies found out who the boy's heritage is it would bring him in grave danger. You personally caring for him would raise too many questions." Tsunade gritted her teeth. That was always his excuse. And the other two always agreed with it.

After searching for a few minutes, he found her just leaving the hospital after her shift. Once there, he walked up to her, "Hey Sakura-chan."

Turning to see him, she smiled. "Hey Naruto, whats up? You seem to be in a good mood."

A giant grin on his face, he responded, "I am. I just finished a seal I have been working one that is going to give us a big advantage in the future."

1342122.content:
After Iruka had finished reading off squads he dismissed the class to deal with the giant Sakura.

Iruka jumped onto her knee and looked up at Sakuras face
"I can tell this isn't an expansion jutsu, but I'm not sure what else it could be, as hard as it is to believe you have just had a growth spurt Sakura." He explained

"But people don't grow this big, what am I gonna do? I won't be able to fit in my house or use the bathroom or anything" she said worryingly

Iruka laughed and said "It's nothing to worry about Sakura, I'll talk to the Hokage and see what he thinks, for now your free to go!"

Iruka jumped from her knee to the front of the class again
Sakura began to stand up but her head touched the ceiling before she moved very far
"Ugh...sensei? I don't think I can leave the room..." She said nervously

"The doors are quite wide, you might be able to slide out, do you think you could do that for me" Said Iruka

"I can try..." She replied
Sakura turned around and put her head through the doors with surprisingly little problems, but getting her body through proved to be more difficult, however, she pushed through, sliding outing by inch until it got to her butt, during her growth her behind had grown a bit larger too and in the process of sliding out it was now stuck
"Sensei I'm stuck!" She cried

"I can see, I guess there's no other way around this, if you can try to stand up, if you destroy some of the building don't worry" he said

With that Sakura pushed hard against the floor, the building creaked and eventually Sakuras behind pushed through the top of the building, standing to her full height Sakura could see she was taller than every building in the village.

"Wow, I really got big didn't I" she said to herself
She looked down and saw the building had mostly been destroyed, Iruka sensei was standing at her feet smiling
"Don't worry about the damage Sakura, just go home and get some rest"

"Okay, sorry!" Said Sakura as she walked away

"Sasuke!" She called
Sasuke stopped and let her catch up, she stood up to her full height and saw how tiny he was compared to her

Feeling stupid she let Sasuke walk away and continued home.

After a while she got to her house, looking around she couldn't see anyone and decided to stand up

"Finally home!" She said out loud
She paused as she realised her house now came up to her knees

She decided to stay at home, "evaluation is tomorrow maybe I'll be back to normal by then" she thought to herself
She got down on the floor to lay on her back dangling her legs over her house
Suddenly see felt herself growing again

She grew until her feet were able to touch the floor on the otherwise of her house!

After she felt the growing stop, she sat up and grabbed her shoes that she had kicked off earlier
They hadn't grown with her, her feet were over twice the size of her shoes now

She thought about how small Sasuke would be to her now

She fell back and kicked one of her feet out, forgetting about her house, it went straight through, destroying most of it
"Ah! Mom is gonna freak!"
She pulled her foot back out and bought some rubble with it
She looked in the hole she had made and saw her bed
She reached in and grabbed it between her thumb and index
"Wow, was I really this small once?"
It was like a small matchbox to her realising how small people were to her she got up and moved somewhere less inhabited, who knows what other damage she could cause.

1421.content:
It happened years ago following the night of the attack of the Nine-Tailed Fox. The symptoms were not immediately noticable but by the age of five it was clear that every male under the age of 10 had begun to shrink. It started out slowly with them only being a few inches shorter than the average height of children their age, but before long they had shrunk down to about three inches tall.

The village council moved quickly to reorganize the way ninja were trained in the village. While the boys may be small they were still capable of using chakra and jutsu at the same capacity as if they were normal sized. However, because of their size difference they were slotted to play a different type of role while serving their village as shinobi. To keep the village military functioning in the future each boy was paired with a female of the same class to be trained as partners.
Naruto, while still the vessel for the fox, was just like every other boy in the village. It was time once again to meet his partner for training, something he...
1421.title: Boys shrink

14211.content:
Leaving the relative safety of his home was always something that he found difficult, now however, he couldn’t wait to leave and meet his partner. Since the Kyuubi’s attack 12 years ago things in the village had changed greatly. Mostly in how his generations team setup went. The males of the village had found that in exchange for shrinking to such a small size, their bodies had become much more durable and resilient. Which in truth, was a good thing as many boys would have been killed by the time they reached the age of ten otherwise. Naruto was one such boy as he had been bullied for most of his short life. The things done to him had included; being stepped on, smeared into the ground under someone’s foot, being stomped on, crushed, beaten, burned, dropped from great heights (at least in his eyes), and he had even been threatened to be eaten alive by one of the more cruel kunoichi in-training. As said, he would have been dead if not for the strengthened body all males seemed to have now, thankfully, Naruto normally was able to walk away from most of his ‘incidents’ with only some broken bones and bruises.

Naruto was thankful that his partner didn’t seem to wish to hurt him or not willingly. She had sat on top of him more than once during his academy days but, she never seemed to be trying to hurt him. Everything that had happened to him at her hands had been a complete accident, or that’s what she said. Shaking the thoughts from his mind, Naruto was able to reach the meeting spot for his team in a record breaking 10 minutes. Pretty good considering how far he lived from here as well as his height difference.

He saw that the kunoichi of his team had already arrived. Due to the change in how things in leaf were done. Girls were encouraged to enter the ninja academy as a team now consisted of three kunoichi and their male partners. Some girls would find themselves with more than one male partner. It was chosen thru a series of chakra test. Why? Well no one real knew, or at least they never gave him a real answer. Looking towards the three girls he made a run towards his. They were Ino Yamanaka, Sakura Haruno and Hinata Hyuga. Naruto allowed himself a moment to look them over.

Ino was a fair-skinned girl of average height with green/blue eyes. Her most noticeable trait in her appearance is her long, platinum blonde hair, which is always seen in a high-ponytail that reaches down to her waist with bangs covering the right side of her face. She was often found wearing a pair of small silver hoop-earrings and purple, fairly revealing clothing. She wore a short purple vest like blouse with a raised collar, a skirt that was cut off on the sides and bandage on her stomach and legs. Purple and white elbow warmers could be seen around her arms, and her forehead protector was wrapped around her waist as a belt. Personality wise, she was constantly thinking about boys and her appearance, hence why she was always on some diet or another. She was very confident, kind in her own manner, and rather outspoken. She was certainly not afraid to speak her mind. Naruto had found that though she was relatively cheerful she tended to be rather bossy at times.

Sakura however was quite different in her appearance. First off she had bright pink hair, then there was the large green eyes, and fair skin. Sakura was often bullied due to her rather large forehead hence her nickname of "Billboard Brow", due to this she wore her bangs over her forehead in an attempt to cover it, though Ino encouraged her to wear her hair back. A red qipao dress or a body-hugging one-piece Chinese dress for women, with white circular designs, with or without short sleeves, with a zipper, tight dark green shorts, and a forehead protector which she used to accentuate her face, completed the look.

Unlike Ino, who could be loud and bossy, Sakura was naturally hot-headed and irritable, and because of that, she tended to hit people out of anger but, most of the time, she is relatively kind, cheerful, and rational, if a bit fan-girly at times.

Finally his eyes rested on the timid form of one Hinata Hyuga. Naruto would be hard pressed to not admit that Hinata was quite cute. Her dark blue hair, brushed back to a small tuff much like a swan’s tail and two long bangs framing her face, made him think of a clear night sky, and the white eyes of her clan held just a tinge of lavender making them seem gentle and kind rather than the cold impassive look most of her clan had. They made him think of the full moon, gently bathing the world in its pale light. These traits, plus the creamy white skin and shy look always upon her face, made her look like a porcelain china doll but, he knew that she was stronger than most thought. She was dressed in a baggy tan jacket with white fur tuffs at the ends and a yellow circle on the outside of her jackets arms with a red tear-like flame design. Her Konoha forehead protector hung around her neck. Her pants a dark blue and standard blue ninja sandals as well as white bandages on her right thigh with a kunai case and ninja pouch over her the left side of her bum, completed her look.

Hinata was shy, serene, and very polite girl. Hinata was referred to as the kindest and most soft spoken girl you would ever find in Konoha. Naruto knew that she disliked competing and fighting others, mostly out of the fact that she didn’t want to hurt someone. Sadly Hinata’s lack of self-confidence was her only big problem but, she made up for it by being a very hard worker. Over the years he had seen that Hinata was incredibly empathetic and was rather easy to gain the trust of, if you were sincere with her. He had noticed her desire to be acknowledged and how she generally, opts to think carefully before acting. For all of these traits Hinata had his respect.

Finally reaching the girls he is happy to see that his partner noticed him and was already in the process of picking him up. After being lifted closer to head level Naruto gave his partner a happy greeting. “Good morning, … “

Who is his partner?
14211.title: Small boy meets his team.

142111.content:
The day Hinata had learned Naruto was to be her partner had been a wonderful day. It had taken every ounce of restraint training she had to not grab the boy and start jumping for joy in the middle of the classroom. From the very day she'd met him, Hinata knew there was something special about him and over time had realized that she had developed a not so small crush on him. The fact that they had quite a few embarrassing moments during the academy years and still got along so well together only served to reinforce it further. And thou she would never admit to it without dam good reason, she had found some enjoyment during a few of those embarrassing moments. That however, was neither here nor there. So, seeing the blond boy of her dreams come running up to her, she quickly grabbed hold of him and brought him to face level, it wouldn't do to make him feel lesser then her.

“Good morning, Hinata!" Her excited blond partner greeted. "G-good morning Naruto." That was another thing that Hinata enjoyed. With her and Naruto spending some time together during the academy, Hinatas' stutter had slowly vanished. Now it only showed itself when surprised or slightly overwhelmed, and having Naruto near her for so long was still slightly overwhelming.

"Bout time you got here moron!" Hearing this Hinata couldn't help but frown. Kiba Inuzuka and his dog partner Akamaru made themselves known. Seeing as how Akamaru was bigger than Kiba he tended to ride his puppy around. Hinata didn't dislike the Inuzuka but, she really disapproved of how he could think insulting someone was a proper greeting. 'I'll punish him a little later.' Kiba was different from most of her class. Where most had found a partner rather easily, Kiba did not and had been simple placed on a 'random' team, under a 'random' kunoichi. Hinata was certain it was anything but, random and that she was chosen due to her being one of the few girls in class that could deal with him and didn't abuse her power over him. 'Doesn't mean I won't punish him later for his comments towards "MY" Naruto.'

A blush covered her cheeks at how she had just claimed Naruto as hers in her mind. She closed her eyes and brought a hand to her cheek as she imagined how life might turn out should they ever get to being romantic with each other. She was sadly shaken from her romantic fantasy by an elbow to the ribs, curtsey of one platinum blonde girl.

Sparing the blond a glance Hinata easily noticed the subtle gestures she was giving and couldn't help but, griminess at what she was implying. Quickly looking towards Naruto, who had jumped down to Kiba and started arguing with him, before she turned back to Ino. "Ino I can't do that! How could you even suggest it after what happened?" whispered the shy girl. "The dog-boy is getting on my last nerve Hinata and it's only morning. He was put under you even if he isn't classed as your partner, so do something about him will ya! Besides, it's not like those other boys were hurt, they all came out of you just fine." stated the irritated blond girl. "You know if I had had the choice I never would have done that." Hinata shot back. "Besides, look what happened. The teacher was fired and I was left going through two days of the worst case of bloating and indigestion I've ever had, so no thanks." "You can't say you didn't enjoy it even a little Hinata. Remember? Naruto worked so hard to make sure you would be alright and was fussing over you the whole time."

Hinata would admit that while being the center of Narutos attention had been wonderful, she hadn't been able to enjoy it much as she had been too busy making sure he never found out why she had been in such condition. "Come on Hinata. So the teacher made you swallow a jar full of small boys saying it was punishment for them and perfectly normal, only to find she was lying through her teeth and doing it to you simply for the kicks but, you can't let us suffer for it by letting the mutt run around with no restraint." as if to simply prove her point Hinata heard a shriek and saw Kiba on Akamaru being chased by Sakura who looked like she had just had her foot peed on.

Sighing Hinata realized that she would need to punish Kiba and Akamaru for that and really didn't feel like finding out if she could swallow the puppy just to punish Kiba. "There has to be a different way Ino." The blond was just about to say something but, was stopped by a puff of smoke as their current sensei appeared.

Who is it?
142111.title: Hinata Hyuga

choices: Seems Hinata forgot to let Naruto go. She brings him to her home.
Some other kind of trouble happens.
1421112.content:
The smoke didn't last very long and quickly parted to reveal a fairly tall and light-skinned young woman possessing a slender build. She had untamed, shoulder-length black hair and very unique crimson colored eyes. Unlike some women that wear large amounts of make-up this woman only used a bit of red lipstick and purple eye shadow to help accent her features. She wore a dress of something that seemed to resemble bandages with a pattern on it similar to those of rose thorns. Under this was what appeared to be a red mesh armor blouse with only the right sleeve being visible. There were bandages on her hands and upper thighs while the Konoha forehead protector rested firmly on her forehead. A pair of regular shinobi sandals completed her appearance. This woman was Kurenai Yūhi, Konoha's foremost genjustu user, sometimes called 'The Mistress of Illusions'.

Kurenai was quick to give a warm smile to her students. "Good morning girls." She acknowledged the various greetings her protégés gave before getting strait to the heart of the matter. "Now girls, I hope you three are ready for our training session cause if not I just might need to ask my friend Anko to pay us a visit." She watch in amusement as the three tried and failed to suppress a shiver at the idea of training with that woman. They had all been introduced to the sadistic snake charmer only a day or two ago. Kurenai still found it odd though that Hinata seemed the most able to get along with her out of the three. Banishing the thought from her mind she decided it was time to get started.

"Alright girls. Now as you may know due to the whole boys shrinking thing we've had to make changes to the ninja system that we use. As such this is the first time that a team like this has been formed. Normally you would have been separated into teams of three and then your jōnin sensei would give you a test that had a 66% fail rate." She stopped and looked at how the faces of her students had gone pale. She almost felt like grinning at how much fun she was going to have with teasing them from here on. "Calm down girls. Like I said that is what we use to do for 'normal' team selection. This however is anything but a normal team. As such this is team setup is being used as an experiment. If things go well then this will be the base from which we will perform all our team setups." And with that said their training began.

-------Hours later------

"Well I have to say that I am rather impressed with how well things went." And she was. Kurenai of course did notice flaws that would need correcting, the most pressing of all being Ino and Sakura's constant fighting and Kiba's alpha-of-the-pack mentality. Besides that, she had noticed some areas of improvement and ingenuity. The most surprising of all coming from Hinata and her partner Naruto. Apparently, Naruto was able to do the impossible and create a solid transformation. Most transformations where illusions that couldn't interact with their surroundings without breaking or dispelling. Naruto however had transformed into a variety of different things and had surprised her yet again when he used Shadow clones. She had read that he could perform the jutsu but, hadn't fully believed it until she saw the boy spamming out clones like it was as easy as breathing. And if that hadn't been enough, Naruto then started using the transformation jutsu in combination with his clones allowing him to transform into things that his size would normally restrict him from. It had been quite the sight, seeing Hinata swing around a full length katana like it was as light as a feather, only for the blade to suddenly change into a set of brass knuckles, then into, of all things, an umbrella. Those where just some of the things he did. With that boy working together with Hinata, she may have the most amazing team in years. 'That is of course if I can train them properly' she thought.

She dismissed her team, only telling them to return here at the same time tomorrow before seemingly shimmering out of sight. With their sensei gone the team slowly separated and made their ways home.
1421112.title: Kurenai Yūhi
