151112.content:
Naruto Uzumaki was a prankster, there was no denying that but, all of his jokes up until now had been harmless. This time he had a new idea for a prank and it was all the fault of that pervy sage. You see Jariya had let slip that Uzumakis’ were feared for their natural talent in seals, so Naruto decided to try and learn some things about the art of sealing. Problem with this was that sealing was an art that required patience, not something the blond boy had much of. So, what happened shouldn’t come as to much of a surprise. Naruto had made a seal that in his belief would, once activated, cover the victim in various make-ups and or embarrassing things. He bought an ink well and placed a generous some of his blood into the ink, then after mixing the blood and ink he flooded it with chakra before, starting to craft his seal. Now if only he had actually studied how seals work he wouldn’t be in the mess he got himself into. But you need to know what happened don’t you… so here is what happened.
----------------------------------
Placing the scroll on the shelf Naruto took a step back to admire the fruit of his hard work and study. The scroll wasn’t anything special, just a normal scroll with an added orange border and small swirl design in the center to help add some flare and caught someone’s attention. He was currently in the one place no one would ever expect to find him, the Library.

Giving a small snicker he stopped only long enough to hear the soft steps of a person approaching and quickly hid behind a bookshelf. He heard the voice of someone familiar, soft and gentle when they wondered out loud what the odd scroll that caught their attention contained. Naruto, instead of snickering about the prank about to go off, was too busy trying to remember who that voice belonged to. He pushed it to the back of his mind when he heard the loud poof of the scroll going off, and the started gasp of surprise. Jumping out to laugh at the misfortune of his victim, the joy quickly passed when he saw Hinata’s back to him. He watched in a moment of fascination as Hinata shakily flopped to the ground, resting herself on her folded legs.

Approaching to apologize, as he hadn’t wanted to catch the only kind girl in his life with an embarrassing prank, he quickly stopped when he caught sight of something he knew she didn’t have before. Moving to her side to get a better look, while trying to comfort the seemingly shocked and trembling girl. He put his hand on her shoulder only for her to ‘eep’ in surprise before turning her head to look at him. He saw many emotions in her wide lavender eyes. Shock, Fear, Disbelief, and confusion were only some of the more easily recognized ones.

“N-n-naru-uto?!? Wha-at j-just hap-pened?” the shy girl ask in a pleading manner. She was obviously scared of the answer he would give. Naruto for his part, gave Hinata a quick once over to see if anything other than the obvious had happened to the girl in front of him. Seeing nothing he moved his eyes to what he was, for some reason, hoping was just a genjustu. Hinata’s tan jacket had snapped open at the bottom, the zipper reconnecting just under where Hinata’s breast should be. Pushing that thought from his mind he continued to take in the shy girls change. The dark blue shirt and the mesh under shirt were both pulled out, stretching to cover the girls’ large circular middle. The shirts didn’t even reach her now out-y bellybutton, and only covered the top forth of her large belly. Her belly drew his attention, the skin was a creamy white and looked both soft to the touch and pulled tight, he noted that it lacked any kind of marks or pronounced blood vessels that would have been normally found on such a belly.

Staring at the pale-cream skin as it moved with Hinata’s breathing, Naruto found himself with an overwhelming urge to touch the large mass in front of him. Gingerly, he reached out and ran a finger over it, inciting an embarrassed moan from Hinata showing that she liked the touch. Taking confidence in her reaction, Naruto placed his whole hand gently upon the sphere of creamy-white and gently ran his hand across it, getting another low moan from the now red faced Hinata, for it. ‘Its’ warm’ he thought, ‘So warm, and soft, yet firm to the touch. And what is this odd warmth I feel in side myself??? Growing and spreading… It feels nice!’

Now that he had started he didn’t wish to stop. He wanted to remain here, to continue to run his hand over her soft skin, to hear her low moan of approval, to feel this warmth that crept though him, but he knew he needed to bring her to Tsunade and find out what happed. So with a small sigh he removed his hand, earning a small disappointed sounding moan from Hinata. He gave a small smile for some reason at how red her face was and the pleading look in her eyes to continue. Quickly looking away from those pleading eyes and pouting lips before he did something he knew he shouldn’t, but really wanted to do, he shoved the ‘dirty’ thoughts to the back of his mind. Standing he looked over the size of her belly and if he had to guess, he’d bet he could cram a small 5 month old inside of her, give or take…

He helped her up and steadied her on his body before starting the hopefully short trek to the Hokage’s office in silence. Thou he did note how Hinata seemed to cling to him as they walked, or waddled in her case, and would sometimes glance at him with this dreamy look on her face, while her hand would rub the pale belly she now sported. He promised to talk to her later about that.
151112.title: Naruto needs more sealing practice.

1511121.content:
Letting Naruto lead the way to wherever it was they were going Hinata's thoughts began to wonder, 'What happened, did Naruto do this,' forgetting the larger picture for a moment Hinata rested her hand on her engorged stomach. Rubbing the taut skin reminded the young ninja that as pleasurable as the feeling was something was seriously wrong and that she had to focus. ' He looks so serious, I wonder what he's thinking.' Looking to her companion Hinata knew he was worried for her, a blush appearing on her cheeks.

' Why did this happen and why did it have to happen to her,' Looking over at the the girl hanging on his arm. It was obvious she had a hard time walking because of her burdensome belly, forced to lean on him for support. 'What happened to her anyway she was supposed to be covered in makeup not fat,' seeing they had arrived at the Hokage Tower without incident Naruto was relieved but only for a moment. ' I just hope the she can help with this,'

Heading inside the duo run into ...
1511121.title: They get to the Hokage's office without inc...

choices: View the meeting between Tsunade and Jiraiya.
15111211.content:
Shizune was having an odd day. When she had first arrived at the tower she had expected to have too wake Lady Tsunade and then proceed to get her to do some of the paper work covering her desk. But, to her shock she found Tsunade wide awake and already hard at work. Next Shizune had gotten reports that someone had managed to get into the ANBU HQ and had covered the inside of every one of the masks with a thin layer of sneezing powder. She of course had a good idea of who did it but, with no way to prove it they couldn’t do anything.

However, the weirdest thing thus far had happened during her lunch break where Might Guy was once again challenging Kakashi to a contest. That in its self was normal the odd thing was that Jiraiya was there and had decided to declare the challenge that they would both do. All she knew was that Kakashi and Guy were now on the run from every angry female that had been at the best separate bath hot springs in Konoha.

Sighing to herself Shizune wondered if the new mixed bath hot springs that had opened up just a few miles out of the village would be safer than the ones inside. It was now mid-afternoon and Lady Tsunade was meeting Jiraiya so they could lay out the ground work of what the Toad sage would be teaching Naruto. Shizune paused in signing her next paper when she saw an unusual sight. Coming up the stairs was a girl that was being carried bridal style by a certain blond haired boy. She only rolled her eyes at seeing Naruto fall to the ground panting after gently setting the girl down on a nearby couch.

Shizune looked the girl over as she panicked and struggled to stand back up so she could help the panting blond off the floor. Everything about the girl screamed Hinata Hyuga but, their seemed to be something… off, about her. Shizune just couldn’t seem to place what. She was so deep in thought that she didn’t notice the girl walk/waddle up to her desk, some minutes later, and ask to see Lady Tsunade until Naruto joined her and almost yelled the request right in her face. After telling them to go sit back down and wait as well as using the intercoms flashing button method to inform Tsunade of needing her attention, Shizune simply waited till her mentor noticed the light flashing on her identical intercom. While waiting though, Shizune kept watch over the pair sitting on the couch.

She had finally noticed the rather large stomach the Hinata looking girl sported and kept a close eye on her. Shizune saw how the girl would glance at Naruto and blush every few moments or how she would let her hand start rubbing her stomach only to shudder and stop. Shizune had at first thought that the girl was in pain but, was proven wrong when the girl let out a low moan of pleasure when her hand gently brushed against her belly. Shizune also noticed how the girl got rather red in the face while looking over at Naruto with an odd gleam in her eye. The girl leaned against Naruto and rested her head on his shoulder. Obviously something was up as Naruto started to blush and sit strait and ridged, whether this was from how close the girl had gotten or from something she may have whispered to him Shizune didn’t know.

Her attention went back to the intercom when she heard the sound of her teachers’ voice on the other end. “Yes, Shizune?” “Naruto and… Hinata Hyuga are here to speak with you. Naruto says it’s urgent.” Shizune heard only silence from the other end as she awaited instruction from her friend and mentor. After a few minutes she was about to repeat the message but, stopped at hearing a reply. “Send them in, Shizune.”
15111211.title: Shizune's odd day.

151112111.content:
Tsunade and Jiraiya were in the middle of an argument about what to teach a certain blond-haired shinobi during his two and a half to three year training trip.

“I’m telling you Tsunade, Naruto needs to learn how to control the fox’s chakra.” The speaker was a tall man with waist-length, spiky white hair usually tied back into a pony tail, with two shoulder-length bangs that framed both sides of his face. He had red lines that ran down from his eyes to the bottom of his jaw and wore a horned forehead protector with the kanji for 'Oil'. The man wore a green short shirt kimono and matching pants; under which he wore mesh armor that showed out of the sleeves and legs of his outfit. His outfit was completed with hand guards, a simple black belt, traditional Japanese geta (wooden sandals), a red cloak with two simple yellow circles. This was Jiraiya, the Toad Sage.

“And I’m telling you Jiraiya that it is just too dangerous. What if he loses control or the Akatsuki find some way to suppress the fox’s power. Naruto would then be left defenseless or raging as some kind of pissed off animal. No, You Jiraiya, need to teach him other things first then he can work on gaining control of the fox in small doses.” Argued the busty blond.

She was a fairly tall, light-skinned woman with light golden-amber eyes and straight blonde hair. Her hair is waist-length with shoulder-length bangs framing both sides of her face while tied into two loose ponytails in back. She held a violet rhombus mark on her forehead. Her body was a slender yet noticeably curvaceous frame with a rather large bust of 106 centimeters in circumference. She wore a grass-green robe with the kanji for ‘gamble’ written in black on the back, inside a red circle. Underneath she had on a grey, kimono-style blouse with no sleeves, held closed by a broad, dark bluish-grey obi that matches her pants. Her blouse was closed quite low, revealing her sizeable cleavage. Wearing open-toed sandals with high heels and red polish on both her fingernails and toenails with a touch of a soft pink lipstick completed the look. This was Tsunade, the Fifth Hokage and first female kage of the lands.

Taking a few moments to calm themselves from their heated debate Tsunade noticed the blinking lens on her intercom. Motioning to Jiraiya to ‘hold on for a moment’ she pressed the button to connect the line to her assistant Shizune. “Yes, Shizune?” “Naruto and… Hinata Hyuga are here to speak with you. Naruto says it’s urgent.” That surprised her, Naruto didn’t normally just sit and wait to be let in but, he did know how to follow protocol when he felt it was needed. Giving a quick look to Jiraiya she saw him already moving to stand behind her, though slightly off to the side. Tsunade took that as a ‘go ahead’ and promptly told Shizune to let them in. Though she didn’t like how Shizune paused at Hinata’s name she figured there was a good reason for it, she just didn’t expect the one she got.
151112111.title: The meeting interrupted.

choices: Naruto left it at the library.
Naruto has the scroll. Or maybe he dropped it?
1511121111.content:
Walking in to the Hokage’s room with Hinata had to be the most nerve racking moment of his short life, that or it was the wait outside the room. Naruto couldn’t help but feel scared of how the ‘Old Lady’ as he called her, would react to seeing what he had done to Hinata. ‘What did I do to her anyway? She has been acting a little weird, even compared to what little I know of her.’ That thought almost made him stop moving. ‘What do I know about her? Other then she is odd, a girl, seems to always be sick, and that she’s kind, I don’t really know anything about her…’ Glancing towards the bloated girl as she waddled next to him, clinging to his arm while leaning on him for support. ‘I’ll have to change that. She is one of my friends; I can’t simply call her that and know nothing about her.’ Returning his eyes forward he nodded to himself as he mentally promised that if he lived through this that he would spend some time with her so he could learn more about her.

Looking into the room the pair saw Tsunade sitting behind her desk with Jiraiya standing behind and off to the side of her. Gulping, Naruto couldn’t help but, worry what the Perverted Hermit would do when he found out about him trying out a new seal without his knowing. ‘A seal that is the cause of all this.’ He reminded himself. He saw how their eyes glanced at Hinata, or her stomach only for their gaze to shot back at him, their eyes now holding a harder look to them as suspicion was clearly shown on their faces. Letting the door close behind them and now standing in front of Tsunade’s desk Naruto was about to open his mouth and speak before he was interrupted.

“Hinata, I don’t know what sort of genjustu you are using or have on you to cause such an odd change of appearance but, I’d appreciate it if you dropped it.” The busty blond women stated. Hinata merely shifted her footing nervously as she didn’t know how to explain what had happened to her. “Tsunade, something is… off, about this. Call me crazy but, I don’t think that is a genjustu.” Commented the sage. “All right, you’re crazy. Now that that is out of the way…” pointedly ignoring the twitch in Jiraiya’s eye. “Brat. What is it that is so important that you felt it was urgent enough to interrupt an important meeting for?” She didn’t bother to mention that it was about him or that they were both thankful for the distraction.

Taking a deep breath Naruto began to explain what had happened. Starting from how Jiraiya had let the fact that Uzumaki’s were known for their mastery of seal arts slip out, too him making the scroll and seal, down all the way to bringing Hinata to the tower. The fact that they were so quite afterwards did not bode well in his opinion. Naruto had taken a moment during the telling of his story to help Hinata to a small rectangular cushioned seat placed against the wall, as it had no sides on it to lean against. Personally, he had found the slightly confused look on her face rather cute, though she did seem thankful to be able to sit back down. Now Naruto was standing in the middle of the room with no one to hide behind should Tsunade try to kill him with her fist. Oddly, it was Jiraiya that spoke first.

“So, let me get this straight. You thought it a good idea to craft your own seal, without any formal training or otherwise in the art, then proceeded to leave it out with the whole point being for someone to find it and make it activate. And that,” pointing to Hinata whose face was covered with a light blush, “Is what happened as the outcome. Is that the gist of it Naruto?” Naruto couldn’t help but, shiver in fright as he nodded, the sages voice was calm but, devoid of any of his normal cheer. Jiraiya rubbed his chin with a small ‘hmm’ and started to casually walk between Naruto and Hinata. Looking towards the blushing girl as she tried pull the edge of her jacket down to cover more of her stomach, though this failed, the sage ‘hmm’ed again and looked back at Naruto. His next ‘hmm’ was followed by a chuckle with held no humor to it at all.

Naruto sank into himself as he readied himself for a tongue lashing, and boy did he get one as Jiraiya suddenly exploded in rage and anger mix with a great deal of disappointment. Hinata could only watch in horror and worry for Naruto’s safety as Jiraiya grabbed him by the collar of his jumpsuit and forced to look his teacher in the eye as Jiraiya laid out a can of ‘verbal whoop ass’ upon the clearly terrified boy. The man went on and on, going so far as to name some of the worst possible outcomes that could have happened, the outcomes ranged anywhere to Hinata’s death, both quick and horridly bloody, to the destruction of the village as a whole. Jiraiya then went on to listing everything that Naruto had done wrong when setting up to making the seal going all the way down to how he had put his chakra into the ink. It took some time but, the sage finally ran out of steam and let the boy down. He asked if Naruto had the scroll with him while Tsunade had already begun checking Hinata over.
1511121111.title: Escorting the Pregnant? Girl…

choices: The ANBU member returns with the scroll
15111211111.content:
“Well boy? Do you have the scroll or not?” Asked the Toad sage. Still shaking in fright of his teachers’ angry rant, as well as how he was still coming to terms with how badly his idea could have backfired, it took Naruto a few moments to remember where the scroll was. His eyes widened in fear as he remembered that he had simple left the scroll on the floor of the library. The shaking of his body increased as he spoke, “I-I left it in the Library. I was too busy panicking about what happened to Hinata.” Naruto cringed in fear at seeing Jiraiya’s eye twitch in response. He was grateful to see the man simply sigh at his response rather then start lecturing him again.

Naruto’s attention turned to Tsunade when he heard her call for an ANBU to recover the scroll. He didn’t even see the ANBU appear or vanish, only sign that they had been there was a small popping sound as the ninja shun-shined to the library. He watched how Tsunade suddenly stood and motioned for Jiraiya to follow, both of them walking to the end of the office near the windows. They were clearly talking but, for some reason he couldn’t hear them. Shaking it off for the moment Naruto walked towards a red-faced and heavily breathing Hinata and proceed to sit next to her. He shot her a questioning glance which only grew as she leaned into him and held him close. Worried he wrapped his arm around the large stomached girl and asked her if she was okay.
-----
After a few calming breathes Hinata slowly nodded leaving her face buried in blond boys jacket. She didn’t know what else to do. When she heard some of the things that Jiraiya had listed off that could have happened to her she had been terrified, only to feel relief at knowing that it didn’t happen. This however only made her scared as she started to wonder what the seal in Naruto’s scroll did do. Everything had revolved around her belly as she didn’t see any other physical changes. She realized that she had yet to even try using her Byakugan to look herself over but, she knew it was because she was frightened at what she might see.

Out of fear and to help herself to calm down, Hinata blocked out anything that didn’t have to do with Naruto himself and how he was letting her hug him. Taking a deep breath she inhaled his scent, calming her greatly as she started to snuggle into him. ‘I wouldn’t give this moment up for anything.’ The girl said to herself. And with that Hinata allowed her mind to wander, the thoughts of what their children would be like, if they ever had any, oddly being the most prominent.
-----
Quickly casting a genjustu to keep anyone from hearing them, Jiraiya stood next to his old teammate and friend. “So Hime (princess), what did you find?” He watched how she sighed and grumbled about not having any sake before telling him what little she could figure out. “I don’t know Jiraiya, I just don’t know. I’ve never seen something like this. What I do know is that the cause of her expanded stomach is chakra. Naruto’s chakra to be precise but, that’s not all. There is enough chakra inside her that if I could make it solid, we could replace the entire Hokage Monument and still have some left over.” Jiraiya blinked, completely stupefied. “Tsunade, your saying that there is enough chakra inside that girl’s stomach that we could replace the largest monument in Konoha with it and still have some left. And to top it all off, it didn’t kill her, only expanded her stomach to that size… Maybe you should lay down for a bit, you’re starting to sound crazier than me.”

Tsunade gave an irritated huff before continuing. “Jiraiya, I’m not only telling you that that girl has more chakra then the majority of the village combined, somehow compressed inside of her, I’m also telling you that it isn’t inside her stomach.” Seeing the confusion on Jiraiya’s face Tsunade told him. “Her womb you pervert, her womb! That is where all that chakra has gathered and it seems to be doing something. Hinata’s body is compressing the chakra in and on to its self but, some of her own chakra appears to be mixing with it. She and the chakra seem to be connecting with each other.”

The sage simply thought on this info for a few moments before asking, “So she now has a second source of chakra like Naruto?” He got a shake of her head as an answer before she tried to explain further. “No, she is going through a change. I couldn’t see too well into her womb but, I did get a look at how her body is changing. Her hormonal levels are acting much like most women in the beginning stages of pregnancies.” “WHAT!?!” The Sage yelled in shock, “Naruto got her pregnant!?!” Tsunade tried to force down a smirk but, failed. She was already thinking of a way to ‘punish’ Naruto for this stupid act as well as keep Hinata safe and away from prying eyes. ‘It wouldn’t due to have her be seen by the villagers just yet.’ She thought. “From what I’ve seen, yes. Naruto has somehow caused Hinata to become pregnant through chakra, though no real living children are forming yet. I theorize that the chakra will continue to mix with Hinata’s. After which it will compress even further till real human embryos have formed.” A small evil smile formed on her lips. “And I do remember seeing what looked like multiple points of concentration of the chakra, I’d bet that Hinata will be having a lot of kids.”
15111211111.title: The lost scroll....

choices: Jiraiya shows them the homey two-level house
151112111111.content:
Jiraiya wasn’t sure how to take this news. His student had done the impossible and gotten a girl pregnant using only chakra and a seal. To top it off the girl just so happened to be the heiress of the Hyuga clan and a girl that, if he had heard right, was head-over-heels in love with the moron. Whether that was good or bad he didn’t know, what he did know was that the girl would not be likely to survive the birthing process and even if she did, her father was likely to kill Naruto for what he had done as well as kick the girl out onto the streets. That he knew was bad. Before he could say anything though the ANBU member returned with the scroll. Breaking the genjustu Jiraiya saw something that he hoped wouldn’t cause any problems in the future. The ANBU currently handing the scroll to him was a women, a Yūgao Uzuki to be exact if the straight purple violet hair reaching down to her waist and the porcelain mask resembling a cat with three red stripes- one vertical stripe on the forehead and one horizontal stripe on each cheek was, anything to go by.

Jiraiya really hoped that the seal in scroll was of the one shot variety or else Naruto might end up in an even harder to manage situation.
----
Naruto and Hinata looked up at the ANBU that appeared and watched as the masked women handed Jiraiya the still open scroll, never letting the other go the whole time. After the ANBU vanished Jiraiya placed the scroll on Tsunades desk and started going over the seal design. “Tsunade, before I forget you may want to call that girl back in later and give her a look over. What happened to Hinata is bad enough without it possibly happening to one of your ANBU too.”

Hinata saw Tsunade and felt Naruto go stiff for a few seconds at the statement. She couldn’t help but giggle at the idea of Naruto getting another talking to about why he shouldn’t get their villages ANBU in the same condition as her. She stopped however at a thought, ‘Just what sort of condition am I in?’ With that Hinata tilted her head slightly in thought and returned to focusing on her thoughts while still cuddling Naruto for as long as she could.

She was returned to the present when she felt Naruto’s cheek press against the top of her head, a small huff of boredom making her giggle lightly as she felt him idly start to play with her hair. Feeling his finger brushing through her hair made her feel special, that this was a moment between them that couldn’t be shared with another. She blushed lightly, greatly enjoying the attention and hoping that they would have many more moments like this.

“Aaahaaa!!!”

The sudden sound of the Toad Sage yelling in triumph startled them both casing them to jump and look over towards the hermit, both of them wide-eyed and blushing. Tsunade was the only one to notice the blush and smiled. “So Jiraiya, what did you figure out?” The pervert started to cackle like a mad man. “Nothing. I learned Nothing, HAAhAha!” Naruto and Hinata sweat dropped at hearing this while Tsunade got annoyed. Thankfully it was Naruto who decided to speak up. “But, Pervy Sage, I thought that you were some kind of seal master?” “Brat! How many times do I need to tell you don’t call me that!?!” demanded the old hermit. “Besides it’s not that I can’t take this seal apart, no it’s that the designs have no connections to each other. It’s just a bunch of ink lines thrown together. I can’t even figure out how this thing could even work, it should have simply collapsed on its self with no adverse effects.”

Silence descended upon them for a few minutes before Tsunade spoke. “So what can we do?” “Nothing my dear, nothing but, ride this out till it ends. I think that we will gain more insight to what happened by simply observing Hinata over time.” Though an understandable course of action it was clearly not one any of them wanted to follow. “W-what d-do we do Lady Tsunade?” Everyone looked to the shy girl in surprise as this was the first time she had spoken this whole time, though the gaze switched to Tsunade shortly after, all awaiting orders.

Taking a few moments to think Tsunade used the best option open to them. “We can’t have this getting out, not right now and to top things off everyone already knows that Naruto and Jiraiya are suppose to be leaving for nearly three years in a few days. There is also the fact that we need to keep an eye on Hinata in case something happens. So, for now Naruto you and Hinata are going to go into hiding and will be staying at a small house hidden at the Hokage Monument.” Pausing she saw the looks from both Hinata and Jiraiya, blushing red and in awe, and a perverted suggestive look, respectively.

“Jiraiya I want you to try to break that seal and understand its secrets and if it turns out that what I think is happening to Hinata is indeed happening then you need to devise a seal that will put off the end results for as long as possible. Naruto, You caused this, as such you will be taking care of Hinata and waiting on her hand-and-foot. If she needs you to do something for her then you will do it. Understand.” She leveled a glare at the blond boy just daring him to refuse; she was a bit surprised to see him merely nod in understanding but, shook it off pretty quick. “Hinata I want you take it easy, ok?” getting a nod Tsunade told Jiraiya to bring them to what would act as their home for now.
151112111111.title: Talk of the Future and the Present

choices: There is only a Master bed in the house. Hinata wants to share it.
1511121111111.content:
A loud sigh escaped the Toad Sage as his mind went over everything that happened so far. All-in-all Jiraiya would like to think things had gone rather well, all things considered. When Jiraiya had first Shunshined (Body-Flicker) then to the old home of his late student and his wife, something strange had happened to the pregnant girl. Hinata had suddenly started moaning, quite loudly at that. Looking to her to figure out what had caused such an odd outburst from the normally shy girl, the Sage and his apprentice noticed something unusual going on with her large, protruding belly. The two had stood there in shocked silence as they watched lumps and bulges rise and fall from within her bulging belly and said bulges moved across her bellys taunt skin.

Jiraiya, being the amazing ninja that he is, quickly grabbed the girl flickered back to Tsunade's office; unintentionally leaving a panicking Naruto behind. Thankfully, they returned before the boy could get any bright ideas of hoofing it back to the Kages Tower. He did find the explanation that Tsunade gave rather weird but, then again he wasn't the Med-nin between them, so he could only go with what she told him. Apparently Hinata's body was trying to balance out the massive concentration of Naruto's chakra inside of her by leaking some of her own chakra into it. This process would normally cause the foreign chakra to be broken down or slowly assimilated into her own reserves but, somehow her body was confusing itself and instead of breaking down the chakra, her body was mixing some of hers with it while slowly compressing it. Tsunade theorized that the chakras, being fundamental to the creation and sustaining of life, where effectively filling in for a sperm and egg cell. She believed that once Hinata's body had mixed enough of their chakras together and compressed the combined chakra enough, it would become 'evolve' for lack of a better word, into embryos. These embryos would then grow as any baby would inside their mother. Thankfully it would take a while for the chakras to compress enough for that to happen. Jiraiya couldn't help but find some amusement in the fact that Hinata's baby belly would need to shrink down to normal non-pregnant size before slowly growing back out again.

'That boy is going to have his hands full.', thought the Sage. Seeing as how Naruto was the one to cause this to the poor girl, it only seemed fair that the boy take responsibility and care for the girl as she went through this. 'And oddly enough the boy doesn't seem to mind catering to her in the slightest.' He allowed his mind to continue going over what had happened so far. He had given them a tour showing the living area, the kitchen, the dinning room with a back door and porch out back. The second floor had the Master bedroom as well as two more, one of which was clearly a nursery which would have been Naruto's had his parents not died that night. There was a library filled with enough scrolls to take a lifetime simply to read them all and of course the study where Minato had kept all his business and Hokage related things. Jiraiya was just glad that the two hadn't thought to try the blood seals that protected that material. He had however stressed to never try entering the basement without him as it held so much security that it was easily the most well protected place in the whole Land of Fire.

After telling Naruto to make some clones he had them start cleaning the place out before showing the kids a rather unique training feature that the Fourth had made. A set of wooden logs positioned in a close triangle formation. While they didn't look all that special at first, they were in fact masterpieces of Fūinjutsu or sealing arts. Naruto of course had doubted him so he had the boy take a crack at them, only to soon find himself laying sprawled out on the ground with a black eye, bruised body and a broken pride. Hinata had been quick to start fretting over the boy where as Jiraiya just laughed his ass off at his poor apprentice. The training logs where made in a way that allowed then to react and fight back. One never knew when or where one of the longer poles would shoot out of the log, meaning you needed to always be aware of what was happening or you'd get your ass handed to you. On top of that one could up the level of difficulty by fighting two or even all three of the logs at a time. They could even be made to use seals hidden in hollow areas to replicate the use of jutsu.

After letting Naruto get his ass handed to him a few more times, Jiraiya told Hinata she could go back inside as the clones should be finished cleaning. He did have Naruto make a few more clones though, these ones being ordered to pamper her. Jiraiya then took Naruto to a nearby wind and water mill that through the amazing power of Fūinjutsu, could produce more then enough power for the house. It took about an hour for him to show Naruto how to care for the mill and the seals it used, thankfully when given an in depth explanation and details on a seal the boy seemed to memorize it perfectly and left Jiraiya feel safe in letting him do this on his own, for now.

Taking a look inside, he saw quite the sight as a number of Naruto clones where surrounding the gravid girl giving nearly her whole body a massage as she sat in one of the padded recliner seats. The girl seemed to be enjoying it if the blissful expression was anything to go by. Then again, in Jiraiya's experience, most girls loved having a man massage their feet, and when you through in the hands, shoulders at the same time then they just tended to melt right into your hands. And if Jiraiya's eyes whereby deceiving him, then the clones seemed to be enjoying the excuse to get their hands on her just as much as she enjoyed what they where doing. He chuckled as he wondered what Naruto's reaction would be once those clones dispelled and he received all the memories. He had already told them that he'd bring about a months worth of supplies over in the morning after bringing in some Ichiraku ramen for dinner. And so with a smile on his face the great Toad Sage slipped away into the night.

1511121111112.content:
Jiraiya  was just about to bring the two young teens to their temporary home when something weird happened. Hinata started to suddenly start moaning, loudly. Looking towards her due to her rather odd outburst, they noticed something other then her hands resting on her large, protruding belly. Her belly was moving, lumps and bulges rising and falling from within her as the bulges moved across her bellys taunt skin. The three ninjas could only stand there, watching in stunned silence as the red faced heiress moaned in pleasure as her hands rubbed her oddly moving belly.

Hearing the girl half moan half yell was what snapped them out of their stupor. They saw the girl taking deep, heavy breaths while leaning her back against the wall. Her glazed over eyes, far off smile and a dampness spreading from the middle of her pants legs told the elder two that the young heiress had just orgasmed. Paying it no mind, Tsunade moved over to the young girl, who was still trying to recover herself from her sexual high while another was starting to build.

Using a medical justu to check the girls still bulging belly only to cut the chakra from it moments after. 'It felt as if the chakra inside of her was trying to "eat" mine. Hmmm...' Turning towards her male companions Tsunade began to explain what she had found. "Well, we thankfully don't need to worry..." sadly a certain blond-haired boy decided to innterupt her. "WHAT?!? What do you mean 'we don't need to worry'? Old lady that," pointing towards the still panting young Hyuga girl "is not normal, even I know that! Just listen to her, something is..." He never got the chance to finish as Jiraiya bopped him on the head, ending the boys sentence. "Brat, just shut up and listen to her. If Tsunade says there's nothing to worry about then there is nothing to worry about. Now let her finish."

"Thank you Jiraiya, now as I was saying, we don't need to worry. The odd movement of her belly is from the chakra inside of her. Her body seems to be releasing some of her own chakra into the large mass of consentrated chakra the scroll forced into her. The mass of chakra is at this time 'mixing' the chakras together in order to keep a stable balance. It should cease it's odd movements once it has become stable." It took a great deal of will to ignore the moans, gasps and cries as the young girl became more and more aroused and suffered her second orgasim while explaining things to the two males.

A thought entered the busty women's minds and couldn't help but, grin. "Naruto, I think I know a way to help little Hinata here." "Really! How?" Tsunade nearly burst out in a fit of giggles at how easy he was making it. "Simple, just go and sit next to her, maybe you can put your arm around her like before and give her some comfort." said the busty blond in a teasing tone. She saw the blush and didn't even give him a chance to respond as she gave him a small shove towards the obviously highly aroused girl. She then brought Jiraiya to the other side of the room and placed the same genjustu over them as before, fully knowing that she was risking the boys virginity with her actions but, it would make for wonderful blackmail to hold over his head next time Naruto called her old.

151112111121.content:
Sakura expected nothing but an ordinary day. She had spent the morning training with Kakashi and Sasuke, with Naruto nowhere insight. While it was unusual to have him miss a training session, now that he had Jiriya, it was becoming more common. Not that she minded! She loved having all the extra time with Sasuke almost just to herself. She couldn't help but giggle at the though of her Sasuke, sweaty and hot from the hours of training they had spent with Kakashi. She didn't mind how dirty she herself was, because she had Sasuke all to herself. It was in these thoughts that Sakura kept to herself, that kept her from seeing the scroll-

It felt as if someone had punched her very hard in the gut. She let out a sharp intake of breath, clutching her belly as she fell to her knees. Almost immediately her training kicked back in and she scanned the deserted street for hidden enemies. But, as I already mentioned, the street was deserted. She couldn't feel any chakra-

No, there was something-

Shee jumped, knocking himself off balance and onto her rear, when she felt her arm touch something as she moved it to her side. She almost wanted to scream, she almost did scream, when she saw the white, hard mound pushing past her shirt, that now sat where her previously toned stomach muscle had. She tried to stand, almost as if to run away from it, but just kept slipping back down. Finally,s he was able to right herself on her wobbly legs, one hand on her hip and the other resting on her now bulging middle. Her mind, once focusing on only the boy she loved, was racing with a million thoughts. What could she do?

1511121111211.content:
Sakura was not sure what had happened. She gently touched what she could only think of as her belly. The skin was taunt, tight; it looked like...

But that wasn't possible. Without thinking, she began to rub her belly, enjoying the pleasure the simple motion brought her. She could just stand there all day, in the warm sun, just rubbing and caressing her belly. And then there was another feeling. It felt like a slight fluttering inside of her, in her belly. She could feel something through her tight skin, could feel it moving. What's happening to me?, she thought. She took a deep breath and, doing her best to avoid all main streets as possible, proceeded to go to the hospital. She was quite thankful that she hadn't met anyone she knew when she finally made it to the main doors of the hospital. But then she had to stop and take a deep breath. But she entered the lobby, her feet noticeably hurting, her back in pain.

Thankfully, the lobby was mostly empty, save for the receptionist, who gave her an empty look. Her name was Shizune, if she remembered right. Sakura took a minute as she approached the desk to compose what she would say, not that she had to.

151112111122.content:
Sasuke Uchiha expected nothing but an ordinary day. He had just completed his morning training with Kakashi and was going home for lunch and a short nap before heading out for his afternoon sparing. He wasn't thinking of anything in particular: a little bit of what he would have for lunch, of how Kakashi always seemed to be one-step ahead of him, of his usual dark thoughts of revenge and violence. No thought was defined, however; they all hung in a haze in his mind. It was perhaps this haze that kept him from noticing the scroll that sat innocently on the road. Or perhaps it was the shabbiness of the parchment, the poor ink, but whatever it was that kept his normally sharp eyes from seeing it, Sasuke stepped onto the scroll-

It felt as if someone had punched him very hard in the gut. He let out a sharp intake of breath, clutching his belly before falling to his knees. That was it.

He immediately activated his Sharigan, scanning the deserted street for hidden enemies. But, as I already mentioned, the street was deserted. He couldn't feel any chakra-

No, there was something-

He jumped, knocking himself off balance and onto his rear, when he felt his arm touch something as he moved it to his side. He almost wanted to scream, he almost did scream, when he saw the white, hard mound that now sat where his previously toned and muscled stomach muscle had. He tried to stand, almost as if to run away from it, but just kept slipping back down. Finally, he was able to right himself on his wobbly legs, one hand on his hip and the other resting on his now bulging middle. His mind, once focusing on nothing in particular, was racing with a million thoughts. What could he do?
151112111122.title: Sasuke?

1511121111222.content:
A million thoughts ran through his mind, and yet it felt strangely empty...

He wasn't sure what had happened to him. He rubbed his hand over his large-it couldn't really be his-belly, hoping that it would fall away, that this was a joke or a genjutsu or a dream and that he was home and everything wasn't wrong that this would be gone-

Movement. Inside of him, he could feel it. Inside of him.

He dared not say the word, because that couldn't be right. That couldn't happen to him, because he was a "him"-

But what if it were a parasite? What if it were a monster or a parasite or something scary like that?

And with that in mind, he decided that it would be best to go to the hospital, where they would remove this...Because they could remove, they would.


Tsunade and Jiraya were sure nothing worse could come of this. They would find the scroll and nothing more would happen. And then Sasuke was admitted by an exasperated Shizune, who quickly backed away from the room and shut the door as quickly as she could. For a minute after this, no one registered why he was in the room. It was Naruto who noticed "it" first, though the only indication was the way paleness washed over him and he was silent. Sasuke himself, quite ignorant of the situation, only noticed the Hokage's blank stare and, well, the quiet air of impending doom that was spread thin through-out the room. Without quite thinking, Naruto got up from his seat. Sasuke, also without thinking, gratefully sat down. The extra weight he now carried was becoming a hindrance. It was hard to balance, to stay upright when all he wanted to do was fall forward. He felt tired, hungry, and all that eased his mind was rubbing his large, moving belly. After a moment, he looked to his left, and saw Hinata, who sat much in the same position...
1511121111222.title: Run to the hospital

15111211112221.content:
Sasuke looked at Hinata, her face a bright pink. She was the only one not looking at him, her hands rested on her large, protruding belly. Sasuke gave it another look. He knew she hadn't had it when he had seen her the other day. And then he looked at his own belly, at her's again, and then...

XXX


Sasuke screamed, startling everyone out of the stupor his presence had caused. Suddenly, his top-heavy body toppled over, only being kept from hitting the floor by Naruto, who quickly caught him.

"Naruto!" Tsunade yelled, quickly making her way to Sasuke's side, checking his pulse. "What the hell have you done?"

"I-I-"

"Take Jiraya with you and find that scroll!"

"But-!"

"Go before it effects anyone else!"

"How do you know that's what happened to Sasuke?!"

Tsunade sighed, placing her hands on Sasuke's belly. It was hard and smooth, just like a pregnant belly would be. She gently began to scan for life, quickly finding three signatures of heat, three beating hearts. "He's pregnant too, Naruto," her voice terrifyingly calm.

"But that's not possible!"

But Jiraiya took him by the collar, jumping out Tsunade's open window and into the unsuspecting town below.

Tsunade herself called for Shizune and between the two of them were able to stabilize Sasuke, though not awaken him. Hinata all the while was even more quiet than usual, her hands rubbing over her belly.

"Hinata, are you feeling okay?" Tsunade asked after what felt like hours.
"Y-yes, Lady Hokage. I-I think I'm just a little tired."
"Of course," she signaled for two wheel-chairs, one for each of them. "I'll admit both of you to a room where you can rest."
"Thank you, ma'am".
