15121.content:
It was a warm sunny day in Konoha. Birds were chirping, children were out playing and laughing, everyone seemed happy… all but, one Naruto Uzumaki that is.
*sigh* ‘Why didn’t I listen. I find an old worn out scroll with a justu I can’t even read most of do to its age and what do I do, I try to learn and use it just so I can know what it does. Just how stupid can I be?’ Naruto paused his mental rant of how stupid he is to take a quick glance at his female companion ‘And the worse part of this is she’s stuck with the consequences.’ Naruto gives her a full look over.

Her warm lavender/white eyes are focused not on the ground but on herself as she waddles slowly alongside him, constantly pulling on her lavender and cream colored jacket trying to pull it down over the large creamy white skin of her stomach as it pokes out from underneath. Because of this lack of focus on where she was going Naruto had saved the kind hearted Hyuga princess from: falling over, running in to wall/people/children/poles, getting lost without knowing it, and a list of other things. Naruto wouldn’t admit to anyone but he acutely found that he liked the physical change using the justu had brought on to the poor beauty which only made him feel even worse.

Grumbling under his breath to himself that this is all his fault he went back to thinking how this all happened…
15121.title: Sober Hero, Heavy Princess

choices: Gets to the Hokage office without insudent. Ask Shizune to see Lady Tsunade.
Someone they know finds and stops them.
151211.content:
Grumbling under his breath to himself that this is all his fault he went back to thinking how this all happened…

(Flashback)

Naruto had just returned and given his report on his latest mission. It had been a simple C-rank. Drive out some bandits that were causing problems around a small out of the way village. Naruto had dealt with the bandits rather easily and after he gathered up all the loot they had hidden around their camp. However, he had come across a worn out scroll in the bandit leaders’ stash. Looking it over quickly he decided to pocket it for further study, it did have a justu of some sort written on it. He was now walking down the village roads towards a training ground to practice when he decided to take another look over the scroll. Stopping in surprise when he found a warning that the justu in the scroll only worked on women.

“Well that sucks! How am I suppose to know if this even works then?” He muttered out loud. “Um,..” went a feminine voice behind him and on instinct Naruto spun around, hand reaching for his kunai, only to stop when he saw the blushing face of one Hinata Hyuga. The small squeak she made showed he had surprised her, whether in how fast he reacted or that he had actually heard her he didn’t know. Loosening his stance he smiled at her and rubbed the back of his head with a small chuckle to help her relax. He had learned quite a bit on his two and a half year trip after all, info gathering and friendly greetings being just some of these things.

“Hinata, you scared me for a moment. Hehe, how are you?” Smile never really leaving his face, but then why should it? He was getting to talk to a cute girl who was also a friend of his. His friendliness only seemed to make the girl nervous, though she did smile and giggle at his obvious attempt to play off the reflex. “I-I’m wel-ll Naruto-kun. H-h-how are you?” She had asked mentally yelling at herself for the stuttering. “I’m pretty good, was just on my way to the training grounds to practice a justu scroll I found but, after looking it over it seems to be a bust.” His smile dropped at the last part, remembering the disappointment he felt at the restriction on the justu. Hinatas’ interest how ever was peeked.

For the next few minutes the two simply talked with Hinata eventually finding out that the justu he had said it only worked on girls. Now Hinata maybe very shy but, she was very curious too, so mustering all the courage she could she offered to help Naruto practice the justu. Excited but, still wanting to be careful he told her that he didn’t know what the justu did and that it could hurt her. Now knowing this he asked if she still wanted to try. Hinata only thought it over for a moment before saying she’d still help him. Resisting the urge to hug the daylights out of the girl he simply smiled, grabbed her hand an practically dragged the flustered girl to the training grounds, yipping and hollering the whole way.

They simply studied the scroll or the parts they could make out for about an hour, trading ideas and theories of what the justu would do. They did see near the bottom of the description a note that said there were ten levels that could come about based on the amount of chakra used, and sure enough there were ten stamp like marks in two lines of five neatly nestled between the description of the justu and the images of the hand seals used for it. From what they could gather about the justu, you could press the scroll against the women target in question and the stamp that corresponded to the level affecting them would glow. Meaning that after Naruto used the justu he could press the scroll to Hinata’s body and the justu level he used would glow as one of the stamps.

For the next 20 minutes Naruto practiced the hand seals and the chakra flow needed for the justu. Hinata however, was slightly worried about the fragmented parts that from what she figured said something about effects able to last 8 months to a full 12 month cycle. This info plus the fact it can only be used on females was starting to bother her but, this was her chance to train with Naruto so she stubbornly ignored the feeling and decided to get ready to defend herself on the off chance the justu would hurt her.

And so let it be known that the justu was used with no sign of it effecting Hinata, at least not right away. Thinking the justu had failed Hinata was about to tell him to try again till she suddenly fell to the ground clutching her middle. Naruto didn’t let the shock keep him rooted to the spot for long, as he was already next to the Hyuga princess by the time she started gasping in pain while clutching her stomach. He yelled to her in an attempt to get her to focus on him rather then, the pain. This ceased however when he saw her arms being pushed away by seemingly, her own jacket, however, he was rendered speechless as he saw the round like shape under her jacket revealed itself as an orb of pale-creamy skin. He snapped out of it only to be shocked again as he heard a sudden popping sound. Looking to the source he was stunned seeing a smaller bump near the front of the creamy colored orb.

The growth seemed to come to a stop if Hinata’s sudden gasps of relief were anything to go by. Naruto watched stunned stupid as Hinata slowly recomposed herself enough to stare at the large orb. Hinata slowly brought her hands to the sphere and touched it with the palm of her hand. The moment her hand made contact she gasped loudly, a look of shocked pleasure on her face as it was quickly covered in a cherry-red blush. She didn’t notice Naruto jump slightly at the gasp nor how his face suddenly went red as she closed her eyes, shuddering and moaning in obvious pleasure at the sensation. Naruto’s mind however picked back up as he watch the shy girl give off oddly arousing sounds as she rub the mass in front of her as it laid nestled between her legs.

He tried to figure out what happened to no avail on till his mind, which was trying to fill itself with some rather perverted and naughty thoughts, absently referred to the mass in front of his now slightly aroused friend as her stomach that he finally able to understand what had happened. Refusing to believe the idea so quickly Naruto tried to focus his chakra to break the genjustu, only nothing happened. Frightened he tried biting his lip, the pain did nothing. Now with one last option he reached over to Hinata’s ‘stomach’ and prepared himself to try breaking image by using touch. Whatever he expected to find was not there, instead he felt Hinata’s taunt skin under his fingers, the pulling caused by her breathing, the shudders brought on from his touching the stretched nerves.

Swallowing a lump in his throat and pushing down a blush, from both the thoughts going through his head and the moans of the now panting and seemingly needy heiress, Naruto could only register one clear none-lust induced thought, ‘We need to see Granny Tsunade.

(End Flashback)

Thus, leading to where their currently pace down the village streets towards the Hokage’s office, where Naruto hoped beyond hope, that Tsunade would be able to prove his conclusion wrong. Thinking on it, it wasn’t that he didn’t like Hinata in a possibly romantic, get married and have kids together, sort of way, it was just that he didn’t know the first thing about being a father. The fact that he and Hinata hadn’t even got on a date together could also cause some friction in such a relation, but if it came down to it he would stay by her side to help raise any kids they had. Blushing at the implied thought of Hinata as his wife he snuck another quick glance her way, she was obviously getting tired from walking as she was. Spying a nearby bench, he stopped walking and put his hands on Hinata’s shoulders, causing the poor girl to jump slightly at the sudden contact shifting her focus.

Holding her to keep her from falling he motioned to the bench in answer to the questioning look she gave him. “Let's sit down for a little.” Seeing the grateful smile on her face he helped her waddle over to the bench and sit down. Hinata did so with a happy sigh of relief. Watching her move her feet around he figured carrying that much weight around from one side of the village to the other had caused some pain. So being the nice and impulsive person he is he told Hinata to lie down on the bench. While she moved he removed his jacket and folded it up, placing it on one side of the bench, helping her to rest her head on it like a pillow then taking her feet and placing them on his lap. He merely smiled at the questioning looks he was getting from her as he tried to remove Hinata’s sandals, however, she protested to this and tried to stop him by sitting up, something that failed miserable do to her ‘pregnant’ belly. Naruto however proceeded to remove her sandals despite her protest. Upon removal of the sandals he calmly took hold of one foot and began to massage her feet, something meet with instant approval. They stayed like this for a good half-hour before reluctantly, in Hinata’s case, resuming their trek to the Hokage’s office which they would reach thankfully in about 20 minutes if they didn’t run in to someone they knew.
151211.title: The price of No Inpulse control

choices: Step back in Time and watch the meeting.
They are told the Hokage will now see them only to find the ANBU still there.
1512111.content:
Naruto and Hinata were thankful that they didn’t run into anyone they knew along the way to the Hokage Tower, needing to explain what happened to Hinata would have been… difficult to say the least. However, their greatest challenge was what came after stepping though the large wooden double doors. Stairs. Evil, EVIL STAIRS. Naruto had, to Hinata’s great relief and embarrassment, carried the shy girl up the stairs as carefully and quickly as possible.

*15 minutes later*

Naruto was tired; there was just no other way to say it. Carrying his stomach expanded friend up nearly 5 flights of stairs had been both backbreaking and exhausting. However, he refused to show it, especially when Hinata had been fretting over him since the first step. Speaking of said girl she was now worriedly hovering next to him, her cheeks a faint pink while her right hand sat in front of her mouth, blocking the worried frown from view. But it was her eyes that he noted were most active, as they dashed left to right obviously looking for any excuse she could to get him to sit and rest, even if only for a few moments.

His eyes locked with hers when she turned them to look at him once more. The emotions swirling about in her lavender gaze. Naruto merely gave a small smile, hoping it would show that he was fine. And so with seeing the admittedly reluctant nod they continued walking side-by-side towards the expertly carve large double doors of the Hokage’s office. Stopping only to speak with Shizune to see if they could speak to Lady Tsunade. The reaction they got, though expected still surprised them.
---------------
Shizune was having a typical day. She had arrived early, as was the norm. and proceeded to sort the mission request they had got recently as well as gather to beginnings of her Masters paperwork that she would need to organize, sign or void. Then as normal she had to fight with said Master and Leader of Leaf village just to get her to sign a single document. Then came a quick lunch followed by dragging in more papers for Tsunade to look over. Now that she seemed to finally have some peace she gets a visit from Naruto and Hinata asking to see Tsunade.

Now if Naruto had simply rushed thru and busted down the door only to start complaining, which would follow by an argument and a flying blond missile, courtesy of one tick-off old lady, then it would still be an average day. But, Naruto actually comes walking up to her desk and 'asks' permission to speak to the Hokage wasn’t weird and nerve racking enough, he brings a girl that looks an awfully lot like Hinata with him. The kicker to this now no-longer normal day… the girl is pregnant, heavily so.

Due to this it took a few moments to simply go through the motions but, was able to inform them that Tsunade was in a important meeting with one of her high ranking ANBU and asked the two to simply take a seat on one of the couches, hopefully without staring to intently at the mostly covered belly that stuck out in front of the young Hyuga. Watching as they proceeded to take a seat the now frayed-minded burnet could only think of four exasperatingly familiar words to describe what she was feeling. ‘I need a drink!’
1512111.title: A Hero's workout, a Secretary's disbelief.

choices: Tsunade calls Naruto and the pregnant Hinata in to meet Tsubaki.
Tsubaki pregnant belly suddenly grows a little larger as Naruto an Hinata enter.
15121111.content:
Tsunade was wondering just what she had done, be it in this life or a past one, that made some almighty presence of this world hate her so much that it would throw something like what she was currently dealing with on top of all her god-forsaken paperwork. ‘Why did I agree to take this thankless job again?’ she thought while rubbing the bridge of her nose. ‘Oh, right! A blond haired blue eyed, orange wearing idiot. I swear, nothing is ever easy once Naruto gets involved, is it?!? And to think he only got back from his training trip a month ago.’ Slumping slightly in her seat she cast a glance back at the ANBU that was currently reporting to her about Naruto’s resent… ‘Actions’ seemed to be accurate enough word for it. She could see why the ANBU before her was so shaken. 'She definitely didn’t look like that a few hours ago.’ Mentally Tsunade pulled up what she remembered of this particular ANBU from earlier this morning.

The ANBU was female, as one could tell by her figure. She was about a head shorter then Naruto, her poise perfect as one would expect from a member of her clan. Her midnight dark hair fell gracefully down to about her mid-back. Her body was the sort that turned the heads of men and most women would kill to have, the grace in which she moved with only added to her beauty. She wore the standard black pants and long shirt, with the standard ANBU armor consisting of; one chest plate, two armguards with extensions to cover the top of her hands, a set of shin-guards and a simple Ninjato blade strapped to her back just under the ends of her hair. The only non-standard to her attire was the color of her armor which was all black with a dull-dark red on the edges and her ninja sandals and kunai holster, both of which were black. Turning her gaze upward, Tsunades’ eyes settled on her white mask with the look of a grinning wolf.

‘Yes. That was only a few hours ago, and now look at her... She’s barely 2 years older than Naruto and now has to deal with something like this…sigh… Though Hinata might have it even harder than this one.’

Sighing for what seemed like the umpteenth time since this meeting with Wolf started Tsunade turned her gaze back to the mask once more. “Take that thing off, would you.” She muttered. Wolf, though slightly shocked, proceed to, admittedly shakily, do as her leader commanded of her. Removing the mask revealed the pale cream skin and white eye of the Hyuuga clan. Her right eye was covered with a custom made eye-patch that required no bands to hold it in place and simply covered her eye, extending to cover the area that would show her pronounced veins when Byakugan was active. The patch had a custom made seal on the inside; it was meant to stop any chakra from passing thru, save for the bare minimum.

‘Sad to know her right eyes “condition” was caused by her own father trying to alter the Caged-Bird seal that was placed on her. Though, I guess he did succeed in some manner of speaking.’ Deciding the young women before her had been left nervously standing in place long enough. Tsunade attempted to try and clarify what she had just heard. So with her voice of authority in place she began. “Wolf, no Tsubaki Hyuga, please tell me once more what you saw.”
Nodding the now named Tsubaki began to repeat her report of observing one Naruto Uzumaki. But when she got to the part of Naruto performing the unknown justu Tsunade cut in to get a better understand of what happened. “Tsubaki, your saying that Naruto Uzumaki preformed the justu with the intent of it affecting Hinata Hyuga, yes?” getting a nod Tsunade continued. “You then explained how Hinata suddenly collapsed to the ground clutching her mid-section, and even how she seemed to be affected by the justu itself.” She paused for just a moment but, when she continued Tsubaki could clearly hear the irritation in her leaders’ voice. “All this and you have still yet to tell me why you seem to be in the same position as one Hinata Hyuga! SO, I suggest you tell me how you seemingly became pregnant yourself within the timeframe of 5 hours!”

Tsubaki, for all her ANBU training could only look down in shame as her leader finished her irritated rant. Looking down however, only made her feel even more shame with a bit of embarrassment thrown in to the mix. Her eye took in the image of the pale orb of flesh that now sat were her once firm, flat stomach had been. She couldn’t even hide it from view, as it seemed to defiantly shove her normally semi-loose fitting black shirt aside as if to say, ‘Here I am world! Look upon me in awe and amazement!’ She had entered the Hokage’s’ office in a rush, huffing and puffing, her face bright red, though her mask had, thankfully, kept that hidden from view. She had even been forced to remove and leave behind her armor chest-plate to keep herself from, likely, snapping it in half.

Tsunades’ anger and irritation however, was squashed the moment she saw the defeated and utterly humiliated look cross the pregnant women’s’ face. Taking in her size with a practiced eye Tsunade concluded that Tsubaki would likely be carrying a set of large triplets or maybe a set of small quadruplets. ‘And from what she has told me, Hinata is even bigger! Oh, joy…’ She snapped from her thoughts just in time to barely catch the whispered explanation from the young girl. “…a pulse, mam.” “Excuse me?”

Watching Tsubaki take a deep breath before answering with a stronger voice, “The justu let off some sort of pulse, with Uzumaki at the center. I activated my Byakugan just in time to see it hit me. After the growing stopped, something I was forced to remove my chest-plate for, I panicked for a few moments before, calming myself and scanned the area around me with my Byakugan. The pulse, thankfully, didn’t go much farther than my position, so it was easy to scan the entire radius of the justus’ range and found no other females to be affected. As far as I could tell only Lady Hinata and myself were affected.”

‘Well thank god for small miracles then! But, we still need to do something about Hinata and Tsubaki. Their clan will not take them returning like this very well. Hinata will likely be branded and Tsubaki might be banished from the Hyuga clan along with Hinata. Something needs to be done….’ And so with that a plan started to form in Tsunades’ mind. One that might give the brat a family and give the two girls of the Hyuga clan protection from their own traditions. ‘That brat better be thankful for this. Hmm, I wonder how he'll take being engaged to two girls?’

“Tsubaki, tell me how do you feel about the idea of being able to keep your old friend, Hinata, safe and being able to live as part of a happy family with her?” The blush and almost dreamy look on her face gave Tsunade all the answer she needed. ‘Good thing her files imply her to be bi-sexual, and I’m sure she can come to love being a Mrs. Uzumaki just as much as she seems to love the soon-to-be Hinata Uzumaki.’ And with a small grin she started to put her plan in to motion.
15121111.title: Step back in Time and watch the meeting.

1512112.title: Someone they know finds and stops them.

15121121.content:
Hinata didn't want to complain about the very sore pain in her hips, legs, and feet. Her new center of gravity made what should have take only minutes into far longer. She only prayed that she and Naruto could make it to Tsunade without anyone noticing them. She shakily took a breath, whimpering at the pain in her back. As for her new belly, it was hard to explain; it was so heavy and full. She could feel something as it swayed and moved in her, sometimes gently, sometimes roughly.

"Hinata? Are you feeling okay?"

She opened her eyes, unaware that she had stopped and was rubbing her belly.

"Hinata?" he asked, worry in his eyes, "do you want me to carry you?"

"N-No," she turned away, suddenly feeling very tired, "I just need to -"

"Hinata?!"

For a moment, it took her a moment to recognize the voice. Naruto looked around worriedly, standing closer to Hinata, who leaned into him in return. It was Neji, running towards them, his eyes activated and angry.

"What the hell is this?!"

"Neji, I-I can explain!" she started, the thing inside of her beginning to move a little more quickly.

Normally, Naruto would have ran off as fast as he could, but he wouldn't dare leave Hinata. "Neji, it's really-!"

"What the hell is this then?" he turned to Hinata, trying to calm himself but finding that that was asking just a little too much of himself. He grabbed a hold of her arm and brought her into a hold, glaring at Naruto. "I can read the chakra, you bastard! I don't know how you got her this way, but I will kill you for it!"

"W-What chakra?"

"The child inside of her!" he turned to Hinata, "Are you okay?"

"N-Neji..." she felt suddenly dizzy. Her vision blurred and swayed, her body light as a feather as the world shifted in and out of focus.

"Hinata!" he caught her before she fell, glaring at Naruto before teleporting them both away to...
15121121.title: Neji?

151211211.content:
Hiashi wore a calm face, but only because if he did not, he knew that someone, someone blond and stupid, would be killed far too quickly. When he had fist viewed Hinata in her current state, he had assumed that it was a horrible joke put on by Neji, until he realized it wasn't. And then all else had been a blur; Tsunade had been called, threats had been made and negotiated. Currently, he, Neji, and the sleeping Hinata were in his room, waiting for Tsunade to arrive. Hinata laid on her side, her face peaceful and serene. Neji stood beside him, his face a younger twin of his uncle's. They could both see the different chakra's inside of her large womb; there were three, all strong and new. Most importantly, they were a little far too alike someone who was blond and stupid.

"What should we do?" Neji asked.

"We wait until Tsunade arrives."

"What if she wakes up before that?"

As if on cue, Hinata's eyes fluttered open.

Is she well?
151211211.title: the Hyuga compound

1512112111.content:
"F-Father?" she blinked, looking from her father to Neji and back.

"You're safe now, Hinata" her father said, a bit too kind as he leaned down to her level, taking her hand in his.

She leaned back into the pillows, a little confused. She sighed as she felt something pinch something else inside of her, her free hand rubbing the spot under the blankets that covered her.

"Are you well?" Neji asked, his eyes looking nervous as he noticed her rubbing her large belly.

"Y-Yes," she said, "j-just tired."

"Of course," her father said, eyeing her belly as if it were a horrible insect...then again, Hinata couldn't be sure what it was. She was just thankful someone had changed her into a loose night-gown and out of her far too small pants and shirt.

"What happened?" Neji asked, "What did Naruto do to you?"

"I-I-"

"We're not mad at you," her father said, dangerously calm as he gave her hand a tight squeeze. "Just tell us what that boy was did to you and we will fix this."

He explained it to her as if she were a child, as if she was delicate and innocent...

But then again, she felt so tired. And she had agreed to help Naruto, leaving her with half of the blame.

"N-Naruto was practicing a jutsu and I agreed to help him."

"What?"

"I-We didn't know this would happen..." she felt tears well up into her eyes, her face as she explained how Naruto was helping her to the hospital, how Neji...

"You let him do this to you?!"

"We didn't know," she said, leaning back into the pillows, her free hand resting on her large belly...

Has the jutsu effected anyone else?
1512112111.title: She's fne. sorta?

151211211111.content: What male did it effect?
151211211111.title: Male?

1512112111111.content:
Yamato awoke to a heaviness, which seemed to sit right in his middle. He had been sleeping peacefully against a tree in the woods when he suddenly awoke to the feeling. He struggled to get up, but fell back again. He finally opened his eyes.

There, on his stomach, was a large, pale orb. It had pushed his shirt up, his vest laying beside him. It was smooth, large, heavy, and attached to him.

XXX

Naruto heard the yelling before he saw Yamato. He had ran back into the forest in a panic, trying to think about what to tell Neji and Tsunade. For a moment, he thought it might have been Neji trying to attack him, but then he realized that the yells were too desperate. They sounded like a person in pain, getting attacked. He raced to the source of the sound, hesitating only for a second when the cries stopped. But he kept on, until he reached a clearing...

What does he find?
1512112111111.title: Yamato?

15121121111111.content:
Captain Yamato was unconscious, his body propped up against the trunk of a tree. Naruto approached him quietly, his heart pounding as he saw Yamato's belly, that it was round and pale...just like Hinata's...

But Yamato was a man! He knelt down and felt the mound. It was warm and taunt, just like Hinata's...

He looked up, as Yamato moaned, arching his back a little, his eyes fluttering open.

"C-Captain?"

His eyes moved around lazily, in all directions before settling on Naruto.

"N-Naruto?" he looked confused, until he looked down at his belly. Naruto felt nothing but extreme fear and guilt as Yamato felt it, hesitantly, before looking up at him, his large eyes begging answers.

"W-What is this?"

"I-I don't know. Maybe we should get to Tsunade?" he conceded. He couldn't leave Yamato. He knew they weren't that far off from the training site where Naruto and Hinata had first tried the jutsu.

Yamato nodded. "S-Should I try to stand?"

"Y-Yeah, sure..."

He didn't like the way Yamato asked him questions, like he knew what the hell was going on. He carefully helped Yamato to his feet, his body swaying just a little with his new center of gravity.

Naruto gulped, ill-prepared for what would surely follow.

XXX

Hinata couldn't even look at her father or cousin. She kept her face turned away as she heard them discuss her "condition". She felt whatever was inside of her move gently...

She had to use the bathroom.

She pulled back her covers and swung much too quickly, a dull pain beginning in her back.

"What the hell are you doing?" he father was by her in an instant. "You're in no condition to be moving around!"

"I-I have to use the, um..." she gulped. "Father, I, um, have to use the toilet..."

"Oh..." he turned to Neji, his face a little pale. "Get one of the nurses to help Hinata."

"But-"

She didn't want one of the nurses to help her, but before she could say a word against it, one was by her side, helping her stand and waddle to the toilet.
15121121111111.title: An unconscious Yamato?

151211211111111.content:
When Naruto and Yamato were found out, Naruto did not run. Of course, with Yamato, there was not much to run from. The man was confused, and looked weak. The Jonin and Hyuga who found them as they made their way through the forest seemed to put up a calm front, if only to keep Yamato from having another fainting spell. However, Naruto was still a little shocked when, instead of taking him in the direction of Hokage Tower or the hospital, the Hyuga took him in a completely different direction.

"Where are they taking him?" he asked as he was practically dragged through the village streets by the masked ninja.

"Lady Tsunade instructed us to take all effected by your jutsu to the Hyuga compound so that they could all be watched together. Lord Hyuga doesn't want Hinata out of his sight, so that's where we're sending everyone."

Naruto gulped at that end word, of the thought of even more people being effected...

XXX

Hinata didn't fuss as the nurse helped her back to her bed. There was nothing for her to do, really. She still felt a little weak, actually, and knew her father just wanted her to be save lest she have another fainting spell.

"Where's my father?" she asked Neji, who helped her back into her father's bed.

"He got word of something else he needed to see to. Just enjoy him not being here for a minutes," he said as he adjusted his pillows. "Are you comfortable?"

"Y-Yes," she said, leaning back into the pillows. Neji nodded for the nurse to leave, then sat at the edge of the bed.

"Hinata, tell me what happened. We're not mad at you."

"I-I told you. Naruto found a scroll and he wanted to see what it could do. He didn't know..."

"Did he hurt you-?"

"No! He was just as scared as I was. We were going to see Tsunade when you found us..."

She looked away, her hands rubbing her belly. It felt so relaxing...

She could fall asleep right there.

Neji smiled when he realized that Hinata had fallen asleep. He tucked her in a little tighter, then, on impulse, felt her belly. It was firm, not just fat. He could see water was inside of her. There were so many of them...

Who comes next?
151211211111111.title: With Naruto...

1512112111111112.content:
Hiashi entered the room, but he wasn't alone.

"Captain?" Neji gasped despite himself.

Beside his uncle was Captain Yamato, looking pale and tired, his standard black shirt doing little to hide his large belly...

"Get the bed set up there," Hiashi said to the attendants, who hastily set up a small, but comfortable looking cot beside Hiashi's bed.Hiashi himself didnt say a word to Neji, but was quiet as he held onto Yamato's shoulders. However, once Yamato was in the bed and seemingly passed out from exhaustion, Hiashi's face turned to quiet rage. Neji was thankful Hinata was asleep...

"What happened?"

"What the hell do you think happened?!"

Neji gulped. The attendants had quickly left the room, leaving the four of them alone. However, Neji felt a small amount of terror at being "alone" with his uncle, given the condition of the other two.

"Shouldn't he be at the hospital?"

Hiashi turned to Yamato, then back at Neji, then at Hinata.

"Tsunade wants anyone effected by this jutsu in one place and Hinata is staying here."

Neji nodded, fair enough.

They both turned. Yamato was waking up.
1512112111111112.title: Hiashi with Yamato...

15121121111111121.content:
The man groaned, rolling little to his side as he opened his eyes.

"Captain Yamato!" Neji said, rushing to his side, Hiashi standing by his daughter's bedside. Neji helped him to sit against his pillow. Yamato groaned, paling at the sight of his belly.

"What's going on?!"

Neji sighed, looking back at his uncle only to get a stern frown.

"There was an accident. We're getting help now."

"Why aren't I in the hospital?" he looked around, catching sight of Hinata. "What's wrong with Hinata?"

Neji sighed again.

Should he be straight with Yamato?
15121121111111121.title: He's better

151211211111111212.content:
"There...Captain, there was..."

"There was an accident," Hiashi said. "Just an accident. You and Hinata are here so that we can monitor you both."

"No, no, I-I remember...my stomach felt strange, and then it got bigger...What's happening?"

Neji did not like how frightened the man looked. He was looking between the three Hyuga, his eyes wild and big, his breathing getting faster and faster. Suddenly, Yamato's eyes flew to his belly, a strange look on his face that hovered between fear and excitement.

"What's that?"

"Yamato-"

"I-It's moving! It's moving! What's happening!"

The man screamed as he tried to stand, only to topple the cot and fall to the ground.

"Captain, please calm down," Neji said calmly. "It's okay, Captain. It's just a jutsu. You're fine."

"I-It's moving...why is it moving?"

"Yamato," Hiashi said. "Let us help you. Neji, fix his bed. Yamato, take my arms."

Yamato, still breathing hard, nodded. He let Hiashi help him stand on his shaking legs while Neji remade his bed.

"You and Hinata were hit with an enemy's jutsu," Hiashi tol him. "You're here so we can monitor you together. We will move you to a hospital later, but for now you must rest here. Do you understand?"
151211211111111212.title: Just a little lie?

151211211112.content: Who is the lucky (or shall we say unlucky) lady that was affected?
151211211112.title: Female?

choices: Younger girls (but, not to much younger)
151211211112222.content: Should it be someone from the older generation? Or maybe one of the newest genin were affected?
151211211112222.title: Generation Gap

choices: Knock up the little Firecracker and watch the sparks fly.
1512112111122222.content: Lets start with girls we know. How about Hinata's little sister Hanabi.
1512112111122222.title: Younger and Pregnant

15121121111222221.content:
Hanabi cautiously rubbed her large, firm belly, too much in shock to really be able to do anything. She was leaning against a tree, her legs spread out in front of her. She had been training in the forest, enjoying the solitude and beauty of nature when she had had the air knocked out of her. She couldn't even scream when she realized the pain in her stomach was it swelling, growing.

She didn't know what was happening, who to call for help.

She turned she heard a rustling, when she saw a man- the her older sister was in love with- emerge from the trees, so ungraceful that one would be forgiven for thinking he wasn't a ninja at all.

"SHITSHIT-" he was running as fast as he could, but stopped dead in his tracks when he saw her.

"Stop! Naruto-!"

Suddenly, more ninja appeared all around them, ready to fight...

Until they saw her.

XXX


"Lord Hiashi!"

A guard appeared, startling Hiashi, Hinata, and Neji.

"What now?!"

"I-It's H-Hanabi-"

"What?!" they all said at once, all paling as a servant led a pale, waddling, round Hanabi into the room.

"Father?" she looked desperately up at the three before noting Hinata. "Sister? What's going on?"

"Oh, Hanabi, I'm sorry!" Hinata started crying, her hands covering her face.

Does Hiashi blame her?
15121121111222221.title: Hanabi

choices: Follow Naruto as he is chased around Konoha by Neji
151211211112222211.content:
“I’m going to kill that boy. I SWEAR IT!” the head of the Hyuga clan shouted. Hinata however freaked, somehow knowing that her father likely would do just that if someone didn’t stop him. “F-Father, please. He isn’t…” “No Hinata, I blame both of you for your sheer stupidity in testing out a jutsu that you don’t even know the function of. And while you are partly at fault I think you will be punished enough by having to care for your ‘Little’ sister as well as yourself during this time. That boy however, is going to pay dearly for this once I get my hands on him. Getting my eldest pregnant is one thing but, getting both of my daughters pregnant is quite another!” ranted the enraged Hiashi.

Neji simply stood in the corner watching as Hinata continued to try and calm her angry father down before he really went out to kill her blond beloved. ‘Had it just been Hinata in this condition Lord Hiashi might have allowed Naruto to get away with his life, after he was severely beaten to near death and forced to marry Hinata that is.’ Thought the genius as he continued to watch the argument degrade until Hinata was in near hysterics and couldn’t continue speaking as she was too busy crying her eyes out. Thankfully for a certain blond, the sight of his eldest daughter breaking down into a sobbing mess at the thought that her father would really kill Naruto was enough to get Lord Hiashi to calm down if only somewhat.

“Neji!” came the commanding voice of his clan leader and uncle. “Yes, Uncle?” “Neji, go and find Uzumaki. I don’t care how badly you have to beat him just make sure he is alive and here by the time Lady Hokage gets here.” Neji bowed and quickly left to do his new task, after he helped get Hanabi settled onto the bed with Hinata who immediately wrapped the girl in a hug while apologizing.

‘I wonder how we will deal with both of the heiresses being pregnant with the same mans children.’ Neji thought as he left the compound. The thought was quickly pushed from his mind as he set his thoughts on catching the near uncatchable Uzumaki.
151211211112222211.title: One pissed off Father

1512112111122222112.content:
Hinata hugged her sister tightly, sniffling as she heard her father sit down beside her. She only cried louder when she felt him rubbing her back.

"It's okay, Sister!" Hanabi said, looking to her father for help. "I feel fine!"

"I'm so sorry, Hanabi!" she could stop crying. "Father, I'm sorry! W-We shouldn't have tried it!"

"It will be fine," Hiashi side, rubbing her back before hugging them both as best as he could. This seemed to calm Hinata, who hugged him back before wiping her eyes on her sleeves.

"Why don't you both get some rest before Tsunade gets here?"

Hanabi yawned and snuggled beside Hinata, who held her sister as they both fell asleep, unable to fight the tiredness that settled upon them. Hiashi adjusted their blanket before turning to a servant, telling them to find a night dress for Hanabi to change into when she awoke.

Using his Byakugan, Hiashi peered into his daughter's bodies.

Hinata appeared to be carrying at least three.

How many was Hanabi carrying?
1512112111122222112.title: Stay with Hinata and Hanabi

15121121111222221121.content:
Hiashi could have leaped for joy at the sight of Hanabi only carrying one child, especially given how many Hinata held.

Instead, he sunk back onto his bed, not wanting to think of anything before Tsunade arrived. He wanted to be in perfect condition for when she came, though he realized that killing Naruto perhaps might not be the best thing for Hinata, given her fragile state. And if Naruto was left alive, he could help care for the children, which would allow Hanabi to go back to her training. Hinata, he knew, was meant more for motherhood than battle.

He sighed as a servant entered to tell him that...
15121121111222221121.title: One?

choices: Naruto awakens and try's to escape
Neji's entrance with Naruto awakens the girls
151211211112222211211.content:
Although Haishi would never admit it he was rather surprised at hearing Neji had returned already with the blonde in tow. "Excellent I shall meet him at the front gate in just a moment." Haishi stated, watching the branch member bow before turning to leave. Haishi silently activated his Byakugan and gave a quick look into the room his daughters were currently resting in. Seeing them sleeping peacefully and holding each other in their sleep helped him to feel a bit more at ease. In truth, the scene brought a small smile to his face as he witnessed his two little girls sharing an intimate moment. It only made him want to insure Hinata's safety and protection from the cursed Caged-Bird seal that some of the elders were still trying to push him into placing on her. Thinking to himself for a moment he nodded, his decision made. 'If this Uzumaki boy makes her so happy then he maybe the best chance I have to keep my little sunshine safe. And if need be I can always use this pregnancy as blackmail to make the boy take care of her.' He thought. It wasn't his preferred method to keep Hinata safe but, it was better then marrying her off to some noble that she would be unhappy with, if not down right miserable.

With that he quickly started making his way towards the front of the compound, ready to give the blonde idiot a good ass whipping. As such Haishi was not prepared for the sight he saw upon arriving. Neji stood at perfect attention as always but, was this time dragging some... Thing. Although it looked like Uzumaki, Haishi was sure that living people don't normally look like they've had their face smashed in.

"Neji what is this... Thing, that you have dragged into our home? I thought I told you to retrieve Uzumaki?" Questioned the clan head. Neji just gave him a deadpanned look before saying, "This is Uzumaki." Haishi moved closer to the body and inspected it. Feeling a bit childish Haishi nudged the boy with his foot a bit. "What in the world did you do to him, Neji? I thought I asked you to return him alive." Neji merely cocked a brow in a 'really? Your not that stupid right?' sort of manner. "He's not dead, Uncle." Neji reaffirmed his statement with a quick kick into Naruto's side, earning him a moan of pain and a few twitches. Satisfied, Haishi nodded and motioned for Neji to follow while dragging their 'guest' to his room. "Again Neji, how did the boy end up like this? I know I said that I didn't care about how much you beat him senseless but, I didn't think you would go this far." "Well Uncle, he was actually like this when I found him." This peeked Haishi's interest. "Oh! How?"

"Well..."

-Flashback-

Neji was walking through the village streets thinking on how he could possibly find and catch Naruto Uzumaki when he was likely running and hiding for his life. A wise choice in Neji's own opinion. It was around this time that a loud noise was heard, oddly it sounded a lot like someone shouting.

"NNNAAARRRUUUTTTOOO!!! YOU IDIOT!!!"

This was soon followed by the sound of something breaking loudly as if it was being smashed by something with tremendous force. Recognizing the sounds of his villages kage, Neji turned towards the Hokages tower and saw an amazing sight. Naruto Uzumaki was flying bonelessly through the air only for gravity to reassert itself and pull the blonde back down. Neji watch in a mix of shock and fascination as Naruto hit the ground only to bounce and continue on. This repeated a good three more times with the blonde smashing into the ground before skidding across five feet of gravel with his face, only stopping inches from Neji's feet. Glancing around awkwardly for a moment before nudging him with his foot, Neji was able to confirm that the boy still lived. Neji gave a small prayer of thanks to whatever higher power caused this odd turn of events before grabbing the boy by one of his legs and started dragging the boy back to the Hyuga compound.

-End Flashback-

"And that's what happened Uncle," finished the boy as he literally threw Naruto into a chair before starting to tie up the blonde haired soon to-be-father of both Hyuga heiresses children.

Haishi blinked in dumbfounded awe before nodding and telling him to bring the boy to the room his daughters were in once he was done restraining him. Neji a nod in acknowledgement as Haishi walked out.
151211211112222211211.title: Captured Uzumaki

choices: Hiashi notices something off about the chakras.
Tsunade arrives having already heard about Hinata from Naruto.
15121121111222221122.content:
Hiashi let out a long exasperated sigh as he saw the two sparks of chakra that did not belong to Hanabi curled up in his youngest daughters belly. He figured he shouldn't be so surprised. Twins ran in the family after all, and being that Hiashi himself was a twin it made sense that his daughters might be more 'fertile' then the norm and carry twins themselves. Or triplets in Hinata's case.

Sitting down Hiashi closed his eyes and pinched the bridge of his nose, trying to keep the migraine of problems that these pregnancies would soon cause him and his clan at bay. The whole time he kept his activated Byakugan focused on his two daughters midsections and the lives that were now growing within.
15121121111222221122.title: Hanabi has twins in her womb.

choices: A filtered form of Kyuubi's chakra
Hinata and Hanabi are somehow pregnant with the others child!
Someone else's chakra mixed with his daughters.
151211211112222211221.content:
Hiashi blinked as his mind finally registered something off about the chakra in his daughters wombs. He could understand why he didn't notice it in Hinata at first, what with have four total chakras to look at at once, but why didn't he see it in Hanabi right away was beyond him. One of the chakras in his daughters wombs were different from their siblings.

'Why does the signature look so familiar? I could swear I've seen this chakra pattern before, but where...' Then it hit him like a ton of bricks. The other chakra was...

1512112111122222112212.content:
Hiashi felt his jaw drop and him train of thought come to a screeching halt as he realized just why the chakras looked so familiar. It's because he'd seen those very chakras almost every day since his daughters were born. Somehow the jutsu that ended up impregnating his two girls had rebounded in a completely unexpected fashion and gotten his daughters pregnant with each other's child as well as the Uzumaki boys.

After a few moments trying to wrap his mind around the fact that his two daughters were now pregnant with children from a boy as well as each other a thought occurred. Children between siblings were not a new thing, as interbreeding among the Hyuga clan had been more common then many would like to admit during the earlier days of Konoha and its founding. All though this was the first time two sisters had ever gotten each other pregnant. Still it was known that children born from such unions tended to have lots of problems, many of which the first signs of could usually be picked up via study of the fetuses chakra, even before medical scans were preformed.

This in mind he carefully studied oddity that was a jutsu-made sibling born child for any abnormalities in its chakra.

Does Hiashi find anything?

15133112122.content:
Tsunade looked over her medical notes. Ever since she'd become Hokage, she'd taken the duty seriously, overhauling various programs. One of the prime ones were the B Corps. To Tsunade's surprise the Corps. was rather well off with plenty of volunteers and a good amount of experienced staff manning it. Given that, she'd looked less into changing the program and more of finding ways of improving it further.

The main issue Tsunade noticed was for the male volunteers. Men were not designed to carry and have children. That was obvious and had been overcome with medical ninjutsu. However, the process only really allowed for a man to carry to one to two children. Tsunade found that unacceptable. Bending her medical knowledge and expertise and then combining with the detailed procedures of the B Corps., Tsunade had come up with a possible solution. By carefully tapping into a man's chakra reserves, the B. Corps' various jutsus could be strengthened and reinforced, thus allowing for more children to be carried and supported. If she was correct, she could easily increase the number of from the paltry one or two to easily four or more! She could already see the possibilities.

The next major hurdle came in the fact that this was all theory at the moment. As such, it needed to be tested and that required a subject. She needed someone with large chakra reserves, to make it safe as possible. She also needed the person to be in robust health, so that they could endure any possible complications and bounce back. The only person that the Fifth Hokage could think of that matched the description was one Naruto Uzumaki. Naruto had quite possibly, the largest chakra reserve in the village, his Uzumaki heritage made his body strong and he was even bolstered by the Kyuubi's healing.

Naturally, Tsunade had gone straight to Naruto. That...had been an interesting conversation. It made her want to down a barrel of sake just thinking about it. However, she had been able to get Naruto to agree through a combination of bribery (money and ramen), assurance that she'd monitor him herself and pointing out the fact that this would really help both her and the village. Naruto had eventually given in and agreed. Together they had scheduled for today to conduct the experiment at the hopsital.

Tsunade made her last minute preparations and waited. Naruto would be here any moment...
15133112122.title: Tsunade's Plan

choices: "Pretty good. I think we've got you a set of triplets."
"Excellent, you might have as many as six in there."
"Better then I'd hoped! You're carrying so many, it's hard to count them all!
"Well, there were few hiccups but we've got it sorted out in the end..."
151331121222.content:
"Ok, Granny, I'm here." Naruto said, a tad subdued. It was obvious he was as nervous as he'd ever been.

Tsunade gave him a reassuring smile. "Then, let's get it to it. I've got everything ready to go."

The Hokage guided Naruto to a decent sized cot in the middle of the hospital room. The cot itself was positioned in the middle of a somewhat complicated sealing array.

"Just lay on the cot, Naruto." Tsunade instructed gently. "And try to relax. I've got everything under control."

Naruto took a deep breath and sighed. "Ok but shouldn't there be more doctors or nurses?"

Tsunade raised a brow. "Are you saying that I can't handle this myself?"

Naruto held up his hands in a defensive gesture and shook his head rapidly. "No! I just expected more to this! That's all!" He cried out.

"Naruto, it's fine. Really. While I might be trying a new procedure, I've done this sort of thing many, many times in the past. You won't find anyone better for this than me. Besides, no one has the same level of familiarity as I do with and I've even got several medics on standby just in case."

That seemed to finally calm the blond haired shinobi down and he took his place on the cot. Whatever happened next was mystery as, with a tap of her finger, Tsunade used a anesthetic technique to knock him out.

//////////

Naruto awoke with a small start on the cot. The first thing he felt was a little...off. Not in a bad way, mind you, just different. He looked to his left to see Tsunade standing over him. Her hand was alight with green chakra and hovering just over his stomach. Tsunade quickly noticed her patient/test subject awake and gave him a bright smile.

"How are you feeling, Naruto?"

Naruto took a few seconds to really consider. "Fine. Just a little...strange, I guess."

Tsunade nodded. "That's normal. The procedure induces a lot of changes in your body. I'd be surprised if you weren't feeling anything."

"So how'd eveything go?" Naruto stared at his stomach. It was so weird to believe that there'd soon be living things actually growing inside of him.

Tsunade's grin grew wider and she said...

choices: "... a solid four months, given the amount of children you're carrying."
"... around 3 months. My improvements have really cut some time off!"
"...two weeks! Your chakra is really speeding everything along!"
1513311212223.content:
"Better then I'd hoped! You're carrying so many, it's hard to count!"

Naruto was taken aback, eyes wide. "T-Then how many are there?!" He gaze quickly glanced down to his stomach before returning to Tsunade.

The Sannin hummed to herself in contemplation. "Well, I would guess around...nine?"

Naruto's eyes bulged and his mouth opened and closed several times, no sound.

"Don't worry, Naruto. You'll be fine." Tsunade reassured, easily. "That amount of children is rare but not unheard of. Besides, the Corps. has handled this sort of thing before and I've delivered more children then I care to count. You won't even have to worry about being out of action that long either."

The Uzumaki took a few deep breaths, letting his surprise bleed out. "So...how long are they gonna take?"

"Given the nature of the procedure plus records we have for such cases, I say definitely around..."

151331122.title: All of Team Seven?

15133112212.title: How long is it?

151331122122.content:
The great village Konoha faced a very, very serious problem; they would not have enough ninja on the years to come. To resolve this problem, two special jutsus were created. The first was very difficult, as it gave men the ability to bear children. The second was a seal, that when activated, would speed up the growth of the fetus, shortening the span of the pregnancy to three months instead of 9.

All ninja are required to have two children in their lifetime, and it is honor to do so. It strengthens the bonds of a team, as teams often become pregnant together, with their sensei providing the other half of the genetic material.

That being said, most are not too happy about it...

XXX


While it was a great honor to bare children for the village, it was still hard to enjoy it. As Team 7 waited in the small hospital room for the procedure to begin, all three genin were nervous, fidgety.

"Now, calm now," Kakashi said, looking up from his book. " It's not so bad."

They were all in hospital gowns, all waiting in hospital beds facing the far wall.

"Easy for you to say!" Naruto said loudly, two skin tones paler. "You've already done it!"

"Yes, and it wasn't that bad. Most people even enjoy the feeling."

Kakashi had only had one pregnancy, so had decided to have the other with his team.

"Infact, your Iruka-sensei is already on his forth, and you don't see him complaining."

"What is it like, sensei?" Sakura asked. Unlike the other two, she seemed merely curious, even a little excited.

"It's hard to explain. It feels very calming."

"How will we train?" Sasuke asked, even his voice a little shaky.

"We'll train, Sasuke, don't worry. It's only three months. You'll be back in shape in no time."

At that, the door opened to reveal a short little doctor. It was time.

All three were wheeled in wheel chairs, with the boys to the male ward and Sakura to the females.

Naruto was shaking, just a little. It was only when they got to the room that he quieted down.

"To keep you calm," the doctor said, we'll going to give you some medicine that will put you to sleep. When you wake up, there may be some discomfort, but everything should be fine. Now, it says here that Mr.Uchiha here is scheduled to have twins? And you Kakashi want triplets?"

"Yep, figured I'd do it big."

Sasuke just nodded. It hadn't been his decision, however. Tsunade has assigned it to him given the size of his hips and his valuable Uchiha blood. Sakura was also scheduled for twins.
151331122122.title: shorter, 3 months

1513311221221.content:
One Week Later...

After the procedure, they were allowed to leave the hospital and return home. They were all told to rest and keep the training light, and eat a healthy diet.

For Naruto, this was easier said than done. He stared at the salad Kakashi had brought over, his sensitive stomach turning.

"Do I have to?"

"You can't just eat ramen when you're pregnant, Naruto. You're not going to gain enough weight."

Kakashi himself clearly had gained some weight; he wasn't wearing his vest, but instead just a black t-shirt and grey sweat-pants. Even Naruto could see that his normally flat belly stuck out just a little. Naruto gulped, but he nodded. He sat down, hesitant, and slowly began to eat the salad.Kakashi stood back, a smile under his mask...

And then he ran to the bathroom. Naruto paled at the sound of retching, but kept eating. He had been waiting for morning sickness, but it hadn't come. He felt fine, if maybe just a little more tired than usual...

Sasuke was not so lucky. He had spent the past few days either in bed or by the toilet. He was just thankful for when it stopped. He took in a shaky breath before slowly getting to his feet. If it kept up, he would have to go to the hospital, for the sake of the children. He smiled at the thought of his children. His right hand rested on his lower abdomen, where he could feel them already even at just a week. He loved them already, even if he would have to give them up. But he didn't want to think about that...

Sakura yawned, feeling tired, even after the full night's sleep. But for her, that was just more reason to take the walk through the village. She was headed to Ino's, who was herself a month and a half along with twins.

Does she meet anyone along the way?
1513311221221.title: A week...

15133112212211.content:
Sakura waved as she approached Hinata and Neji, who were coming out of one of the village's many baby stores

"Hello, Sakura," Hinata said. She was already a month along, but was still quite large as she was carrying triplets. The Hyuga always required their ninja to carry as many children as possible. Neji was also quite large, already on his second pregnancy, which Sakura knew involved carrying twins. "You look very well, did the procedure go well?"

"Yep!" she placed her hand on her lower abdomen and smiled. " They wanted me to start on two, but said I could do as many as four next time. How are you guys doing?"

"Fine," Hinata gave her belly a light pat, " but the doctor days I'm a little too large. I may have to go on bed rest sooner than we thought."

"Im just happy I don't have Gai as the father this time," Neji said, his hands supporting his lower back. "It was like watching a groan child."

"Kakashi-sensei has been wonderful," Sakura said. " I'm happy he choose to do this with us. Who is the father, Neji?"

"Ten-Ten, actually. She's carrying my twins as well."

"It must be exciting to keep them! I was thinking of keeping my second ones."

"Yes," Neji got a dreamy look on his face," we're very excited."

"Hey, Im heading to Ino's, do you guys want to come?"
15133112212211.title: Pregnant Friends

choices: Yes, and Naruto is the second father.
No it was just a slip of the tongue.
151331122122111.content:
“Do as you will Lady Hinata but, I’m going home to rest.” Stated Neji as he tried to cover a yawn.

“Oh, o-okay. Umm…” Hinata however found that anything else she may have had to say to her big brother figure would be ignored as Neji had already started on his way back to the compound.

“Well isn’t he just a barrel full of sunshine.” Commented the pinket of the two, the sarcasm in her voice being made quite clear. “S-sorry. Neji has a-always been l-like that.”Hinata apologized. Sakura however just waved it off and began walking towards Ino’s at a slow pace. Getting the idea Hinata quickly waddled up beside her and kept an even pace despite the large baby-filled womb she sported. This slow pace allowed them to look around the village and realize that there were quite a few members of the village community who were either pregnant or carrying around their babies. The two girls couldn’t help but beam at the knowledge that they too had new lives growing inside them. Sakura giggled in delight where as Hinata blush lightly and rubbed her belly, bright smiles on both of their faces.

Finally reaching the Yamanaka flower shop they knocked and were so usurerd in by Ino’s mother towards the stairs. At the top of the steps Sakura took a look at Hinata and saw that the poor girl was rather breathless. In all honesty it wasn’t that surprising seeing as how Hinata was a small girl and currently carrying around triplets inside her womb. Triplets that, though only a month along, were equal to three to four months or more in size due to the justu speeding up their growth. Suffice to say Hinata was carrying around a heavy load up the stairs. Sakura let the lavender eyed heiress catch her breath before moving to Ino’s door and knocking.

“Come in.”

Sakura didn’t need to be told twice and quickly opened the door and walked in, Hinata fallowing shortly behind. Ino was currently lying on her bed, her face pointed towards the door while the sun shone through the window at her back. Sakura couldn’t help but snort at this. “Sunning yourself Ino-pig? And here I thought only reptiles did that.” Sakura was rather surprised when Ino simply yawned and calmly answered back with, “You’ll understand when you get bigger Forehead, and then we will see who is mocking who. Right, Hinata?” finished the blond as she winked a sleepy but, knowing look towards the shy girl. Hinata gave a small smile and light blush as a response. She was guilty of sunning herself and her belly on more than one occasion.

Sakura merely huffed but when she heard no response she grew slightly worried. “Hey Ino, You Okay?”
"Yeah, just really sleepy. I've felt like this all week. Shikamaru still has morning sickness but, Choji's fine, lucky jerk. Asuma-sensei says we need to exercise more for the babies but, how can we like this?!?" Ino whined. Hinata merely nodded her head as she had had the same problem not too long ago, even now she would sometimes stop what she was doing and get lost in her own little world while rubbing her belly. Ino yawned again before asking how they and their teams were doing.


"We're all fine for the most part. Sasuke wasn't feeling too well and Naruto complains about his stomach sometimes but, all in all we seem pretty well off." Pinky started before turning to look at Hinata who seemed to be in her own little world. A small cough from Sakura snapped her out of it. “Oh, um. W-well Shino seems the s-same just a b-bit tired. K-Kiba however…” They saw how Hinata seemed to grimace at the thought of Kiba’s condition. “Come on Hinata. It can’t be that bad, can it?” asked the blond. “K-Kiba spends m-more time hanging over the t-toilet then anything. His m-morning sickness is pretty bad.”

“So… what about your sensei’s?”


"Kakashi-sensei is going thru the pregnancy too." Both looked towards Hinata in question. “K-Kurenai-sensei is to. I-I think she p-plans to keep t-this one.”


"Oh. How are you feeling about them?" questioned the blond. Hinata grew slightly pink and ducked her head as she had an idea of what Ino meant, Sakura however, had a confused look on her face. "What do you mean?"


"Didn't they go over it with you? Sometimes people become attracted to the people whose babies they're carrying." The blond gave a glance towards Hinata and noticed her posture. “Hinata anything you want to say?” The heiress in question gave the impression of being a deer in the headlights before quickly shaking her head side to side so fast the girls were worried she’d get whiplash. “You sure Hinata?” Ino teased. “I mean it’s not out of the ordinary for a young pregnant girl to fall for their sensei. I mean it’s not like your carrying oh say… Naruto’s babies. Right?” Ino was having a lot of fun teasing the poor girl about her blond haired crush and the possible attraction towards her own female sensei.

“Eeewww… Ino don’t even joke about that. I mean who would want to carry Naruto-baka’s (idiot) kid?” complained the pinket completely ruining the teasing moment. “Jeez Sakura, you don’t need to act that disgusted about it. I mean you are his teammate. Besides, he can’t be all that bad if Hinata likes him.” Sakura grimaced “Though it’s true that he is my teammate that doesn’t mean that I like him anymore than before. And what do you mean Hinata likes him? Hinata is to kind to just tell the baka off, she wouldn’t hurt a fly.” Ino was the only one to notice the change in demeanor of the sweet Hyuga and quickly grew scared. She had never seen an angry Hinata before and really didn’t want to in her own room.

“Sakura.” Called the angered Hyuga in a voice that was far too sweet to match the malevolent aura surrounding her, something that Sakura only just caught on to. “Y-yes Hinata?” asked the now scared pinket. “Shut up or I’ll kill you.” Stated the kind heiress; the gentle smile and sweet voice never leaving her as she threatened her crushes teammate.

After a few minutes Ino decided to try and break the tension. “Hinata are you sure you’re not carrying Naruto’s babies?” Hinata blushed and lightly pat her belly. “I-I’m happy carrying Kurenai-sensei’s b-baby.” This however snapped Sakura out of her fearful mood and made her perk up in interest. “Don’t you mean her babies? Your carrying triplets aren’t you?” Hinata winced slightly as she realized she had miss-worded her sentence and she would pay the price right about… “Ooh!” …Now. “Hinata you didn’t? I mean I never thought that someone in our age group would be able to pull it off…” rambled Ino.

“What are you talking about Pig?”

“You don’t know?!? Jeez Sakura, for the supposedly smartest person in our class you are surprisingly uninformed.” Scolded the blond. “Just tell me Pig!” Sakura growled while shaking her fist at Ino. The blond however just shrugged. “It’s called a Multi-donor pregnancy and is rather rare to find someone who will go through with it.” “Why?” asked Sakura who was now completely ignoring Hinata as the poor girl sat in a chair and sank in on herself, hoping to escape the questions that she knew would follow. “A few reasons really. Multi-donor pregnancies or MDP’s tend to take longer before birth due to the extra stress they put on the body. Plus you need at least two donors and there can be no relation between either donors or the girl getting the procedure. Another thing is that only females can do it as their bodies can naturally carry babies without justu. I’m pretty sure there are some other things but, I can’t seem to think of them right now.”

The girls simply sat in silence for a short time before Sakura spoke back up. “And you think that Hinata is doing this because of her slip of tongue and what I said?” If that was all it took to convince Ino then Sakura was entitled to be rather skeptical. “Well that and it would explain why she is so big as most MDP’s tend to be larger for some reason then most normal pregnancies. It would also explain the whole ‘I will kill you’ thing from before as the ones who experience the greatest shifts in mood at random are those who do a MDP.” Stated the blond with certainty.

“So Hinata” asked Ino as both girls now turned towards the highly embarrassed Heiress. “Did you do a Multi-Donor Pregnancy and if so are you using Naruto as the second father?” Hinata knew that there was no turning back now, she had to answer or they would likely start blowing things out of proportion.
151331122122111.title: Girl time

1513311221221111.content:
"Y-Yes..."

"What?!" Sakura yelled. "You can't be serious!"

Hinata sat back, her hands rubbing her belly. "I-I know, b-but..."

"It's okay," Ino said," we know you like him. Are you keeping them?"

"Y-Yes," Hinata nodded again, but this time looking up, a happy smile on her face. "Father has been very supportive."

"Does he know they're Naruto's?" Sakura asked.

"Y-Yes, but he said it was fine."

Ino and Sakura nodded, with Sakura sitting beside her on her bed. She suddenly felt very tired. Truth be told, she couldn't understand how Hinata's father could be fine with her carrying Naruto's babies.

"But does Naruto know?"
1513311221221111.title: Yes, and Naruto is the second father.

choices: Skip to Naruto and Hinata’s meeting at the White Lotus
15133112212211112.content:
“H-he should. I s-sent a sma-all letter t-trying to expla-ain.” Stuttered the heiress. She hoped that Naruto didn’t disapprove of her carrying his babies but, she had yet to hear anything back about it and was understandably starting to get worried.

“Wait…” Sakura near shouted as she shot up as if she had just realized something important. “By letter, did you mean a small scroll with real fancy writing in it and the symbol for ‘Motherhood’ on the outside?” When Hinata nodded Sakura planted her face in her hands and groaned. “Hinata I’m sorry. We had no idea what that letter said.” Confused by this Hinata asked for her to clarify what she meant. “Naruto brought a scroll like that to us in hopes we could help him figure out what it said but, none of us could make out the fancy handwriting and were thus stumped. When we asked Kakashi-sensei, he read it over before eye smiling at us and told us that real ninja’s won’t have all the answers handed to them. And that we should try to figure it out by gathering info.” Sakura paused for a moment, letting what she was saying sink in. “As you can see, that didn’t work out as well as we had hoped.” Hinata’s shoulders sagged as she realized that Naruto didn’t know about her being the soon-to-be mother of his two kids.

They sat there for a few moments before Ino sat up, a spark in her eyes telling all that she had an idea. “So let’s just tell him!” stated the blond as if it was the simplest thing in the world. Hinata however, disagreed. “W-what? N-no, I, I can’t.” the shy heiress fearfully stuttered. Ino gave Hinata a look and simply sat there studying the young girl. She knew that Hinata wanted Naruto to know; else she would never have sent a letter herself to the blond boy. Thinking on it Ino realized that Hinata wasn’t against telling Naruto, just that she feared doing it face to face. Understanding this Ino motioned Hinata to sit beside her on the bed, of which the young Hyuga did with confusion on her face. “Hinata why are you afraid to tell Naruto face-to-face?” the blond gently probed. Hinata shrunk in on herself, wrapping herself around her baby filled belly. “W-what if h-he does-sn’t want to b-be a f-fat-ther? Wha-at if he…” Hinata didn’t continue, simply curling in on herself dejectedly.

“’What if he doesn’t want you?’ is what your trying to say, right?” Hinata nodded. “Hinata, you need to remember that Naruto is an orphan. Now I don’t know Naruto’s view on it but, most orphans want a family. The idea that someone loves them being a big thing for them.” Hinata considered this point for a moment before nodding. Even she knew that most orphans craved attention and love, especially the love of a family. But, there was still that other problem. “B-but, what about…” she never got to finish as Ino interrupted her. “Hinata let me tell you right now that you are a beautiful young girl and if that baka can’t see that then I’ll happily pound it into him until he understands.” Seeing Hinata slowly starting to relax Ino felt that it was best to move forward.

“Now, I think that when you meet with him you should wear something a bit… different, more flattering maybe. OH, I know! A nice dress should do the trick.” Hinata however seemed a bit reluctant with the idea. “A d-dress? W-why?” Ino wrapped the shy girl in a one armed hug as she replied. “Hinata a dress is perfect for you. We can find one in a soft gentle color, something to complement your skin tone. I happen to know of one that would fit wonderfully. It should help to show off your curves and belly without showing too much skin. Not to mention your legs. Yummy!” Ino was honestly getting a bit too into the idea as Hinata soon found out when Ino place a hand on her thigh and rubbed it, feeling her leg through the pants leg. “Oh my! Such strong legs, bet they look wonderfully toned and fit. If these babies don’t make that baka start to drool in want for you then he’s probably gay.” The certainty in the blonds’ voice grew only stronger as she continued to rub Hinata’s legs, much to the poor girls’ great embarrassment and oddly excitement.

“I-I don’t kn-ow Ino.” The shy heiress muttered. She sure didn’t feel pretty, much less beautiful and thought that Ino was just saying things to make her feel better. “Hinata let me be strait up honest with you.” Announced the blond before she brought her mouth to Hinata’s ear and whispered something to her. Sakura watched as Hinata’s face went such a bright red that it would make an apple turn green with envy, just before a small trickle of blood ran out of Hinata’s nose and she fell back, completely out cold. Dumfounded, Sakura turned to Ino and asked what it was that she said to Hinata. Ino grinned before blushing lightly, “Just telling her that if I was a lesbian I would have tried making hot passionate love to her already, due to how beautiful she is.”

Sakura couldn’t help but, gape at that. “You’re a lesbian? When?!? I thought you were after Sasuke?” Ino snorted, looking almost insulted. “No I’m not a lesbian but, I am a Yamanaka. As you know we work with mental justu and one of the requirements to do so successfully is to be of an open mind. If you took the time to ask around you’d know that most Kunoichi in Konoha have at least one female friend/lover. Ninja tend to be rather open when it comes to sexual orientation.” Ino noticed how Sakura seemed to be scooting away from her. “Oh please, you have nothing to worry about. If I’m going to take a girl lover then they are going to have some curves sides the baby belly. Like Hinata!” Ino says before groping the unconscious girl’s breast “When you get a set of knockers like these wonders then you can start worrying about me trying something.” Sakura frowned at the jab at her body. ‘So my bodies not as curved as Hinata’s. So what! That shouldn’t make her the only one that gets to enjoy In…’ Sakura caught herself and immediately backpedaled on her thoughts, not willing to believe that she had just been feeling jealous of Hinata getting another girls attention. She blamed the crazy hormones from her kids for such thoughts.

Shaking her head Sakura tried to get her mind back on track, while trying to keep the images of a pregnant Hinata and Ino making love out of her head. “You were saying something about telling Naruto?” Ino look confused for a moment before sheepishly ceasing her groping of Hinata’s breast and getting back to making plans. “Yeah, here is the idea. You know that tea shop, the ‘White Lotus Springs’?” Ino asked hoping Sakura didn’t know too much about some of their more… ‘unique’ teas. This hope however, was dashed as Sakura narrowed her eyes at her. “You mean the one known for their sexual stimulating tea’s on top of their more normal varieties? The shop that couples having trouble ‘getting off’ go to for some ‘therapeutic teas’?” Ino sweat dropped as she realized that Sakura did know about the shops less talked about side. The blond would admit that she was surprised that Sakura knew as most of the rookies aren’t told till they have finished their first pregnancy.

‘Well, no point in trying to hide it now.’ The blond thought. “The very one.” Sakura nodded before continuing, “And I guess that you plan to have them meet there, where Naruto will see Hinata in her dress and be told about how she is the mother of his two kids as well as the mother of her sensei’s child.” Seeing Ino nod Sakura continued “Where they will just so happen to get a sexual stimulating tea by ‘accident’ and proceed to then have sex with each other, with us hoping that Naruto will remain with Hinata after as a way of staying faithful to her. Is that what you were planning?” Ino noticed the accusing tone in her friends’ voice but, brushed it off. “Actually, I was hoping that they would at least wait till they weren’t in public to start doing the horizontal tango but, if they want everyone to see then that’s their choice.” The blond said simply.

“OH YEAH! Well let me tell you Ino that I…” she paused to see her blond friend starting to grow worried and mentally smirked “… Whole Heartedly Approve! Now let’s figure out a cover story for Hinata for when she ‘spends the night’ with the baka blond.” She finished, a grin on her face that nearly split it in half as she already had a few ideas on how to make this plan work.

Sakura waved as they waddled away.

The rest of the way, Sakura noticed all the pregnant people and babies. Every fourth person was either was either waddling or carrying a child. She felt herself beam at the thought of the life growing inside her, and began to gighile. She didn't stop until she reached the flower shop, where Ino's mother told her Ino was resting upstairs in her room.

She knocked softly on Ino's door before letting herself in. Ino was lying on her side stairing into space, one of her hands resting on her belly.

"Hey, Ino Pig," Sakura said, surprised when Ino yawned and waved.

"Hey," she said, closing her eyes.

"You ok?"

"Yeah, just really sleepy. I've felt like this all week. Shikamaru still has morning sickness, but Choji's fine. Asuma says we need to exercise more, but how can we!" Ino wined.

"We're all fine, but Sasuke wasn't feeling too well."

"Is Kakashi going easy on you guys?"

"Yeah," Sakura yawned, suddenly feeling very tired herself. "He's pregnant too."

Does Sakura?

Sakura blushed,"A little, I guess. I mean, Kakashi-sensei has been very supportive..."

She couldn't deny much more attractive he seemed after only a week, but this was normal, she knew. It wasn't unheard of for whole teams to grow closer during their pregnancies, in fact. She felt herself yawn again.

"Do you want to take a nap? Let me get my dad. DAD!"

Within seconds, her father was at her open door, his eyes wide and his body shaking. "What?! Are you feeling okay, sweety? Are the babies okay?!"

"Sakura needs to take a nap too. Could you get her a futon?" Ino asked, her eyes closed.

"Oh, um, hello Sakura," he said, only now noticing her. "Are you feeling okay?"

"Yes, just tired. I don't know if I could walk home."

"Don't worry, I'll get the futon and call your mother to let her know where you are. Do you want her to come get you?"

"No, I just need a nap, but thank you."

He left, but came back a few minutes later with a futon that he spread out beside Ino's bed. Sakura laid down after he left, falling asleep the moment her head hut the pillow.

Who should we focus on now?
