151331122211.content:
She was nervous. Here she was, at the hospital awaiting the procedure that would make her a mother. Glancing to her sides she saw her teammates, Kiba Inuzuka and Shino Aburame. Neither of them seemed to be taking this much better then herself.

Hinata sighed to herself in defeat. She didn’t really want to be a mom just yet but, she didn’t really get much of a choice. Out of all the Ninja to graduate from the academy only 9 normally passed the true test given by each sensei. Those nine were then separated out into teams of three, giving an average of three teams with each graduation. Those three teams were normally made to join this program sometime within 2 ½ years after graduating. This insured that each member would have at least one child who would join the ninja forces when they grew older.

At least that is how things normally went. Hinata gave another small sigh as she remembered why they were being forced to do this so early. She didn’t know why but, some of the higher members of Konoha’s council had decided that Naruto would be forbidden from participating in this baby program and since this was done in teams, Team 7 would not be participating for the foreseeable future. Team 10 would have been next but, when Chōji got so nervous he ate himself into a food coma that pretty much excluded them. The fact that Ino would not have been likely to survive do to all her harmful dieting only reinforced this. So now it was up to Team 8 to provide enough babies’s to equal out the loss of two teams. She was not looking forward to that.

In truth it wasn’t really a bad thing for the Inuzuka and Aburame clans. Though they had clan status, their numbers were frightfully low. Out of the entire clans the Inuzuka had only 12 active shinobi members out of a clan of 20. The rest were too old, injured or too young to be counted among the active. The Aburame weren’t much better off. They were a clan of 13 total, with only 8 active members. Compared to her clan of at least 60 members with over two-thirds of them being active members of the ninja forces, her teammates clans were more likely to be wiped out then hers.

Hinata was snapped from her thoughts by her sensei’s voice. “Well team, I hope you are ready. It’s nearly time for us to start.” Hinata was very thankful for her sensei joining them as sensei’s didn’t really need to do this. She took a deep breath to help herself relax. In most procedures teams would be given the genetic material of either their teammates or sensei. This however would not be true for teams composed of clans, like theirs. Because of this they were given a choice to either receive from their sensei or to be given the genetic info of someone of their choosing as long as they had it in storage, meaning they had to be ninjas.

Everyone turned to the doors as the doctor in charge of the procedure stepped in. “Well everyone, I hope you are all doing well and we can get this done quickly without any issues. As I’m sure all of you know we will be performing two different justu on each of you. One will of course get you pregnant with your previously chosen donor. The other however will have some different effects on you depending on your gender. For the boys it will simply insure you are able to carry the children till the birthing time, which for males is much sooner than the girls. Luck you as this means you will be joining us for a second time before the girls are anywhere ready to give birth.” A small twisted grin could be seen upon the doctors’ face showing that they found the misery of the two young boys amusing. “The ladies however will find themselves affected slightly differently. Seeing as how the female body is naturally capable of bearing child the second justu will instead allow you to carry far more children then you normally could without having to worry about popping from too many babies or those nasty stretch marks you would usually get. The down side is that you will be pregnant for a lot longer, one year at least.”

The doctor allowed them a few moments to ask any questions they had before going over the pregnancy plans. Hinata learned that Kiba was trying for a small litter but, would likely need to settle for twins, were as Shino was going to start of small with only one. During that time she used her Byakugan to take a quick peek at the list, just to make sure she was getting the babies of the person she wanted. Seeing that she would be having herself little Uzumakis’, Hinata shutdown her eyes. She was rather embarrassed and honored when she found saw her sensei would be performing a multi-donor pregnancy with one child from Asuma Sarutobi and surprisingly a request for twins using her own donated genes. The doctor however was quick to snap her back to reality.

“Now then, Hinata Hyuga. It says here that… No that can’t be right. Hyuga-san are you sure you want ‘that’ boy as the father?” Hinata was thankful that the doctor had worded the question without revealing who she wanted. “Y-yes Doctor-san, I’m sure.” She watched the doctor for any signs of distaste or hate but, saw only disinterest. “Very well now it says you want to try for quintuplets but, even with the justu on you I personally believe your body will only be able to handle triplets. Will that be acceptable?” the doctor asked. A small nod was given in answer. “Excellent, now let us begin. We will need to put you under of course. Don’t worry you’ll be awake and out of here within a few hours.”

151331122211121.content:
{Here is a picture of Hinata's new camisole nightwear:" http://ep.yimg.com/ca/I/yhst-16141413251...}
{Here is a picture of the panties Hinata is wearing:" http://ep.yimg.com/ca/I/yhst-16141413251...}

Hinata felt slightly uncomfortable. It wasn’t the pregnancy but, it was part of the problem. As much as Hinata hated to admit to it, her panties just weren’t cutting it anymore. She had always worn panties but, now that she was half way through the normal timeframe for her babies to grow she had found that her panties wouldn’t fit her new shape anymore. She had gone out with Kurenai-sensei to a maternity store and was talked into buying some kind of camisole nightie with two sets of its matching panties, though they seemed more thong-like then anything. Hinata briefly looked back at the cami sitting on her folded futon. It was a gorgeous black satin with a bust enhancing, not that she needed it being rather big for her age, underwire and a middle clasp to create lift and give her developing cleavage some support. The mesh coverage had an adjustable lace up the front allowing her to loosen or tighten it as needed.

At the moment though she was standing in front of her full body mirror in nothing but, the panties turning from side to side while running her hands along her soft skin. She knew that she wasn’t fat and she loved her growing unborn children dearly but, she couldn’t help but worry what Naruto would think when he saw her. It was common practice to inform the donor of the gene’s if someone chose them for the baby program. The standard time was around the three month mark for girls. As such Hinata knew that Naruto knew someone had asked to use his genes for the impregnation process but, due to the notice leaving out everything but, the gender of the receiver Naruto would have no idea that she was the mother-to-be of his kids. She couldn’t help but, sigh at this fact as it would be up to her to tell him if she wished him to know. The fact that she intended to keep her children, rather than give them up to the Ninja child reserves center only made telling him that much more important.

‘But that in of itself is the problem. I can’t get anywhere near him or even think about him without acting oddly.’ The young mother-to-be mourned to herself within the confines of her mind.

Having started up near the beginning of her forth month, Hinata had started reacting oddly to Naruto. If she saw him walking around she would have this urge to hug him and not let go, or the more recent time she had been near him and had gotten a whiff of his scent, his natural odor and had wanted to bite him. What?!? She thought he smelled like cinnamon. Sometimes she would wake up during the night all hot and bothered, her breathing heavy and panting. She would lie back in bed and wish Naruto was there with her so she could… well she wasn’t really sure what she would do to him but, something told her it would be naughty and adult rated. Her most resent encounter with her blond fantasy was little over a month ago. She hadn’t even realized that she was running, as well as a four to five month pregnant thirteen year old could run, towards him till she was just about to jump on him from behind. Trying to stop herself had left her in an awkward position and caused her to fall over herself. Thankfully she managed to twist herself around and land on her bottom, well it was more of her tailbone so yeah, painful. Naruto had at least noticed and been kind enough to pick her up and help her back home.

That very same day Naruto left on his first C-rank mission leaving Hinata to feel lonely and somewhat depressed, she had very much wanted to snuggle with the warm and vibrant blond. Now she had heard that he would be back either today or tomorrow and a part of her, spurred on by her unbalanced hormones, wanted to welcome him back in a way that would be memorable. That was what left her in her current dilemma. She wanted to wear something that wouldn’t make think less of her but, would still proudly showoff her full belly. Hinata liked her baby belly, she had come to love rubbing her hands against it or to feel the warm sun gently caressing her taut skin.

Still in nothing but her panties she began to gently rub her belly. Due to the nature of the pregnancy she couldn’t use her Byakugan to see how many she was carrying but, the doctors and medics had assured her she had either quadruplets or her requested quintuplets growing inside her. She was rather large for only six months but, she didn’t really mind. In fact she was proud of her size but, even she worried what would happen to her if her pregnancy lasted longer than the standard one year. ‘Three years is the longest anyone was ever pregnant from these justu. As much as I love my kids I hope I don’t have to lug them around for that long.’ She thought to herself.

“I wish sensei was here. She’d have some ideas on what I could wear… and I’d get to see my other two unborn.” She said to herself while muttering the last part under her breath so only she would hear it. The fact that she was technically going to be a ‘father’ to two of the three babies Kurenai-sensei was carrying didn’t bother her much to her own surprise. She felt honored that her sensei felt such a connection to her that she would want to ‘officially’ bring her into the family sort of speak. She was brought out of her own little world by a voice on the other side of her door.

“Sister! Are you done yet? There are people…” Hanabi Hyuga, Hinata’s little sister paused as she threw open the door only to look in and find her older sister in nothing but a pair of rather suggestive black panties. The moment of awkward silence was broken however by an “Eeep!” as Hinata tried to cover herself with her hands in surprise.

“Hanabi! Don’t you know to knock before coming in to someone else’s room!?!” Though she didn’t yell, her voice was louder than its usual volume, the fact that she didn’t stutter only made it more impressive. “S-sorry, sister.” The Hyuga munchkin stammered in surprise and shock before moving completely into her sisters’ room and closing the door so no one else saw her sister nearly nude. “Sister, why are you so, um… under dressed? It’s nearly noon.” Hanabi quietly asked, her eyes roaming from Hinata’s face down to the panties then back up, stopping on her older sisters’ pregnant belly. While Hinata knew Hanabi was curious about pregnancy and that she was anxious to be pregnant like Hinata. The whole stuffing pillows and her stuffed dolls up the front of her shirt and following Hinata around sort of gave it away. But, something Hinata didn’t know was that Hanabi was actually a bit jealous of the babies Hinata was carrying as they would get to meet and know their mother. Hanabi also knew that she would have to share her older sister/mother figure when the babies were born.

Hinata waved her little sister over before sitting in seiza (folding their legs underneath their thighs, while resting the buttocks on the heels) as best as she could and wrapped the little girl in a comfortable one armed hug. “I’m still like this because I can’t decide what to wear.” Hinata freely admitted to her younger sister before looking to her belly and rubbing it with her other hand. “I want to show someone special to me that I’m proud to be full of so many babies that will one day call me mother. But, I don’t want this person to think poorly of me either. So I’m at a loss as to what I should wear that will impress them but, not give them the wrong ideas, get it?” Hinata watched as Hanabi furrowed her brow in thought for a few moments before huffing in annoyance. “Sounds stupid and complicated. Why can’t you just wear what you normally do? Just because your old attire is getting tight around your belly that doesn’t make you any less pretty. So why should you wear something you may not like?” questioned Hanabi as she hugged her sister and gently rested her head against one of Hinata’s bountiful breasts.

Before Hinata could answer a knock was heard at her door. “Lady Hinata,” one of the branch members most likely, a woman from the sounds of it. “There is a guest waiting to see you, do you wish for me to let them in?” Hinata gave a look towards her sister, figuring out now why she had barged in earlier. Hanabi however, either didn’t notice this or choose to ignore it as she busied herself by snuggling against Hinata’s bosom and listened to her heart beat, much like she enjoyed doing when she was a toddler. “N-no, thank you. I’ll be with them in j-just a moment.” She answered while channeling her chakra to activate her Byakugan to see who it was at the entrance.
151331122211121.title: Half way to Motherhood

1513311222111211.content:
She couldn’t help but wonder what had made her think that this would be a good idea. Hinata was currently sitting in a corner off to the side, watching as almost every member of the Rookie Nine partied. The party had been done as a thanks from the other teams as well as a congrats to team 8 for the successful pregnancies. In fact, the only member not in the private room at the Bar-BQ restaurant was Kiba and that was due to him still feeling rather under the weather. Hinata didn’t understand how he could still be feeling the effects of pregnancy since he had his kids shortly after the five month mark, like Shino. As such this made the party more for her then the team as a whole but, Hinata felt better thinking it was for her teammates as well.
Idly Hinata tugged at her clothes. She still had on her new panties but, had quickly slipped into her now rather tight pants and much too small shirt. In exchange, she had been forced to forgo any bra, not that she had one that would fit her pregnancy enhanced bosom. Right now a small part of Hinata couldn’t help but, blame Naruto for her current position. ‘Stupid wonderful blond with gorgeous eyes... Why did he have to invite me and look so adorable doing it?’ She mentally ranted to herself. She used this as an excuse to look for the scrumptious blond, the term oddly making her hungry, just not for food.

She finally found said blond calmly walking towards her with two cups in hand and… ‘Wait. Towards ME!?!’ Hinata started to panic as she realized that her crush and unknowing father of her children was walking straight towards her. ‘Oh, god! WHAT DO I DO? He’s coming right towards and there’s nothing to hide behind and, god does he have to look so HOT!?!’

“Hey Hinata!” greeted the blond, a genuine smile on his face. “H-hello N-n-naruto.” Greeted the pregnant heiress as she struggled to keep from fidgeting. ‘When did it get so hot in here?’ she questioned herself while trying to look at the boy who brought her to this party. “Would you like a drink?” he asked while offering one of the two cups “Don’t worry we made sure there was nothing that could hurt your babies in it.” Hinata took the offered cup and thanked him before taking a sip; she hadn’t realized how thirsty she felt.

“Are you enjoying yourself so far?” Hinata noticed how his eyes moved towards her belly as he asked and realized he was asking about the babies, not the party. “V-very much.” She started her other hand moving to her belly and rubbing it. “A-at first I was scared of this but, now I’m really glad it happened. I j-just hope that they g-get to meet their f-father.”

“You got to choose the father right? That’s what I’ve been hearing at least.” Asked the curious blond. Hinata gave a nod and a small smile in response. “Well, if you chose him then he must be a great guy or girl… I’m sure the father would want to meet their kids.” He stated with certainty not noticing the pleased and dreamy look she was giving him.

They would continue this for the next few hours, never knowing that someone else’s carefully laid plan had just been unknowingly ruined by the two.

Moments before
A blond girl standing nearby the punch quickly looked around herself trying not to draw anyone’s attention as she set her plan to snag Sasuke for herself in motion. Ino Yamanaka pulled out a small vile with some kind of milky white liquid in it. She poured half into one of the cups of punch and the rest into another. ‘With this arousal mixture Sasuke will be mine by the end of the night. I knew this would be worth all the hard work to grow the proper plants without letting daddy find out.’ The mixture was crafted with specially made plants grown by her family. Instead of a nearly instant arousal or a momentary delayed one, this mixture would release into the consumers bloodstream slowly over hours letting it build up so things seemed more natural.

Ino chuckled to herself only to yelp as someone tapped her shoulder. “AAAAHHHH!” turning she saw her heavy set teammate looking at her with a confused and startled expression. “Ino is everything ok?” asked the genuinely worried boy. “Damn it Chōji, DON’T DO THAT!!!” Ino would spend the next few minutes assuring her porky friend and teammate that everything was alright, before turning back to the cups and being unable to remember which ones held the mixture. She never noticed the blond boy walking away from the table with two cups of punch.

Hours Later
The party had finally ended and with Naruto using some clones to clean up, everyone had made their exit. "I do but the last thing I want is you hurting yourself trying to please me, so how about while we take that walk we stop someplace so you can pick out some clothes that better suit your, um, condition."

Hinata smiles brightly, and refrains from an overly excited squee of joy, at how thoughtful and caring her Naruto-kun was, and he didn't even know that the babies she was carrying were his by blood, but that news would have to come later right now she had an opportunity to spend a whole day with the one boy she loved the most.

The two made their way down one Konoha's many roads, Naruto having to reign in his usual quick stride so he could walk arm in arm with Hinata, matching the pace of her walk, which was something between a sexy sashay and a clumsy waddle.

Right now Hinata was on, well truthfully she passed cloud nine hours ago, so if there was a cloud ten or eleven that was probably closer to where she was. And Naruto was happier than a clam at high tide, this was what he imagined a day with Sakura would feel like only like a million time better. Then out of the corner of his eye the blond noticed some thing it was...

151331122211122.content:
It had only been three months, but Hinata couldn't believe she had ever been afraid.

She hummed happily as she prepared breakfast for her family. Her father was away on business, but she was happy to have Neji and Hanabi. While Hinata was a bowl of sunshine, there was one dark cloud in the room. Neji glared at the empty spot in front of him, his hands resting on his large mound of a belly. He grumbled a word of thanks to his cousin when she handed him his egg white omelet, but didn't touch it.

"Is something wrong, Neji?" Hanabi asked. "Is it the baby?"

"I'm fine," he said, his hands gently rubbing his belly. Hinata looked up with concern. Neji was four months along and was due in a few days.

"Should I call a doctor?" she asked.

"No, I'm fine. I'm just tired."

His pregnancy hadn't been easy, and this would likely be Neji's only pregnancy.

"How are you feeling, Hinata?" he asked.

"Just a little tired, but fine, but I'm sure I'll start feeling sick very shortly. Kiba has been having bad morning sickness too."

"And Shino?"

"Just more tired than usual."

She carefully handed Hanabi her own breakfast before getting her own.

"I can't wait till I'm in the baby program," Hanabi said between bites. "What do you think your baby is going to be Neji?"

"They told me it is probably a boy," he said between bites.

"I just want a little girl," Hinata said. She felt happy at the thought, and her hand absently rubbed her slightly larger belly. Most people wouldn't notice, but her pants were starting to feel a little tight.

"Miss Hinata?" a servant said from the doorway. "There is a visitor for you?"

Who is it?
151331122211122.title: Three months?

choices: Next day Hinata is given a D-rank babysitting mission.
Hinata goes to visit her teammates looking for advice about joining the exams.
1513311222111222.content:
Hinata was only slightly surprised to hear that her sensei was here to see her. Ever since the procedure at the hospital to get them pregnant, she and Kurenai-sensei had been spending a good bit of time together. This could stem from the fact that sensei was carrying Hinata's twins along with Asuma-sensei's child. Then again, Kurenai could just be spending more time with her in order to help Hinata along should any problems or concerns pop up. It was nice knowing she had someone with experience in pregnancy to turn to.

"Hello Kurenai-sensei. How are you?" Asked the ever polite Hyuga as her teacher walked into the dining area. "Hello Hinata. I'm doing well thanks, though I get this odd feeling that your twins will be giving me a hard time further down the road." Replied the older women with a small chuckle near the end. Hinata just seemed to beam at the mention of the twins growing inside her teacher. "Well in all fairness sensei, if I remember right father said me and all my siblings gave mother a very hard time near the seven month mark. Something about not keeping still..." Hinata giggled at the exasperated look on her sensei's face. The girl knew it was all in good fun. Besides, out of the two of them Hinata was carrying the greater number of children, so she would likely be the one suffering from over active children in her womb.

"Would you like something to eat sensei?" Kurenai politely refused as she already had a light breakfast before sitting down at the table. "Hinata I came here today for a very important reason. I'm sure you now about the Chunin Exams that are to be hosted here in Konoha, right?" Seeing Hinata nod as she continued eating her breakfast, Kurenai continued. "Now normally this isn't done but, there is some pressure to nominate the newest group of Genin for the exams. By this I mean your class." All the occupants stopped what they were doing upon hearing that.

"B-but sensei! We aren't ready! Not to mention I'd still be pregnant while the exams happened." The young mother-to-be stated. "True. However, something we need to consider is the fact that Shino and Kiba will not. Their pregnancies should end with about a month before the first exam. Due to how big you will likely get I doubt we will be able to take missions above D-rank by then. This will leave the boys with nothing to do but train, and you know how Kiba gets." Sighed Kurenai as she could already feel the headaches that boy would cause her. "There is also the problem that we only know the doctors gave you at least three babies but, until they are further along we won't be able to tell if you actually got your requested quintuplets or not." Hinata flushed slightly at that as both Neji and Hanabi looked at her wide eyed. She hadn't told them that she wanted such a large number for her first time, especially with how large her belly would get in comparison to the rest of her small body. Kurenai however paid it no mind and continued. "This however is all on top of us not knowing how long you will remain pregnant. You could give birth shortly after the first year of your pregnancy is over or you might remain like this up to three years before the doctors induce labor." Hinata dipped her head in defeat. It was quite obvious that they were being pushed to enter so they would get the experience while in their home village. It was practically a tradition to have Genin entered into at least one Chunin Exam before going through the baby program and allowed to keep the babies, a tradition that she was practically spitting on already.

"We already have a method that is being discussed between the other rookie teams Jounin. I'm pretty sure you will enjoy what we have come up with so far." She said a glint of certainty in her gaze. Kurenai's expression then softened to something more understanding before she continued. "However, if you feel better off not entering then tell me and I'll see what we can work out. For now I want you to take the next week to think over whether you will go to the Exam or not." Hinata merely nods, still trying to take in all of this information.

“Lady Hinata. I think you should seriously consider not participating in these exams.” The cold voice of her older cousin cut through Hinata’s thoughts like a red hot blade. Hinata couldn’t help but, be saddened by this. Despite the fact that Neji seemed to be more tolerant of Hinata now that she was participating in the baby program, the truth was that the boy still had a grudge against her. She hoped that he wouldn’t do anything to hurt her babies just to spite her. “You are weak willed and you yourself know that you would be better suited as a house wife then a ninja.” He continued. “There is also the need to think about the babies you are carrying and the harm that could come to them if you participate. I also doubt that the father would wish for his children to be put in harm’s way.” Finished the older boy before standing. “The choice in the end however, is yours Lady Hinata.” He thanked her for the meal before turning and walking out of the dining area.

“Don’t listen to him big sister. He’s just being a big jerk!” Hanabi clearly didn’t like how Neji was acting and neither did Kurenai. Kurenai decided to try and cheer the girl up, “Hinata don’t listen to what he has to say. He maybe a ‘mother’ soon but, a boy can never match a girl as a mother because we have our maternal instincts. If you want to take the exam then I say go for it! Besides, it’s less than three months away. No matter how many babies you have growing in you I doubt you will get overly massive by then.” Hinata didn’t seem completely convinced but, gave a small smile anyway only to giggle in surprise and shock as Hanabi used this moment to sneak a raspberry to her sisters belly. Kurenai smiled as she watched Hinata try to tickle Hanabi into submission before the little girl could get close enough to blow on her belly again.

Kurenai spent the next few hours simply spending time with the Hyuga sisters. The three of them enjoying their time chatting and answering the occasional question from Hanabi. Hinata would spend the rest of the week thinking over whether or not she wanted to risk entering the Exam.
1513311222111222.title: Meeting Teacher at the Hyuga household.

15133112221112222.content:
For two days Hinata simply sat around or did light training while she thought about whether she wanted to enter the Chunin Exams or not. The fact of the matter was that this would likely be her only real chance to become Chunin. After all, once she got too big to perform as a ninja she would be sidelined. After that she would have her babies and she had every intention of raising them, so that would take up all of her time as well. She could always try for Chunin once her kids were older, maybe before she had to do her second pregnancy. However that would mean having to refresh her skills back to what they are now and get them up to expectable Chunin standards. Hinata wasn't to sure she could do that after spending who knows how long being a mother and simply taking care of her kids. There was also Naruto to consider and whether or not she would tell him anytime soon about the babies growing inside of her and the fact that he was the father.

Having decided she needed some advice Hinata turned to the only people she could speak to about this; outside of her sensei that is. She knew that boys where encouraged to remain physically active while going through their pregnancy. Hinata walked up to the Inuzuka household planning to speak with her two teammate, who she knew normally went for a walk around the village from Kiba's place.

Knocking on the door, Hinata quickly sidestepped before the door was knocked over by the rambunctious K-9s of the Inuzuka. Hinata had learned her lesson after the door fell on top of her the first time she came over. Seeing the face of the clan head and mother of her teammate, Tsume pointed her further inside. It was rather easy to find her teammates from there as she found Shino leaning against a wall nearby a partly open bathroom door. "Good morning Shino-kun." Hinata hoped she wouldn't startle her clearly tired teammate and friend. Thankfully that didn't seem to be a problem as Shino seemed to know that she was there.

"Hello Hinata-san. How are you and your young?" Asked the bug user, his normally monotone voice clearly weighed down and seemingly exhausted. Still she appreciated the concern. "I'm well Shino-kun, as are the kids." She happily answered giving her much smaller belly a gentle pat. Being boys, their pregnancies where moving quite a bit faster then her own. Hinata had felt oddly jealous a few times about how much bigger the boys were then her. She had to remind herself a number of times that her teammates did not enjoy the large baby bellies they were lugging around.

Taking a look around and not finding Kiba she gave Shino a look. The boy simply pushed the bathroom door further open, revealing Kiba sitting in front of the toilet. With how his head leaned into the bowl however Hinata couldn't help but wonder if he had gotten his face stuck in the seat. "He's been like this for the past half hour. Why you ask?" He paused to push his glasses up a bit. "It would seem that Kiba takes after his father in that he has rather violent morning sickness. He will likely be removed from the list for the baby program." He must have seen Hinata's downtrodden look as he quickly added, "I have reason to believe that the rest of the team will be able to continue through the program if they so choose. Any member of the team that wishes to continue will merely need to sign a written form saying that they would be willing to continue providing children." He gave her a pointed look. "There will be no issue if you choose to continue birthing children. Though they may try to make you carry more at a time in order to compensate for the loss of one 'mother'.

She knew that it shouldn't but, she couldn't help but feel relieved at the knowledge that she could continue getting pregnant through the baby program. The idea that she would be required to hold more babies didn't bother her in the slightest, in fact she only got excited at the idea. It was odd really. Only a few short months ago she had been both scared and reluctant to become pregnant and now she could hardly wait to do it again.

"You plan to fully partake in motherhood, yes?" Hinata nodded at the question before asking what they planned to do about their babies. "Both Kiba and I plan to give ours to family members. I have a cousin who. Sadly lost her child a few years ago on a miss labeled mission. She has already agreed to it and is very excited to be able to raise a child again." He paused a moment wondering if he should continue. "Kiba however has a distant Aunt from his late father’s side who obtained an injury that left her sterile. He believes his pups will be well cared for by her." Hinata felt a mix of emotions at this. A part of her wished her teammates would keep their kids but, she knew that this was likely for the best. Besides, she figured that once Tenten had her kids their babies could be playmates. And once she got around to her second batch, Hanabi would likely be having her first.

"Was there something you needed Hinata-san?" Questioned the bug user. She blinked in confusion for a moment before realization hit her. "Y-yes actually." She admitted suddenly feeling a bit shy about the topic. "I need advice about..." Though she trailed off at the end Shino seemed to know what she was talking about. "You wish for advice before deciding whether or not to enter the Chunin Exams." Hinata wasn't surprised that Shino had read her so easily as that was just how he was, so she simply nodded and hoped he could help her with this like he normally did.

152.title: Upsized!

1522.content:
It was evening in the village of Konohagakure no Sato, the Village Hidden in the Leaves. The faculty of the Shinobi Academy had left for the day, all except two. One was the senior physician at the Academy, Eboshi-sensei. She had been absent from the Academy today, as she was also the Sandaime Hokage's personal physician. In his old age, he needed her assistance more than ever. Age was kind to no one, the God of Shinobi included. She had spent the day with him, giving him painkillers (for shinobi, arthritis is a royal PITA). She had left one of her junior assistants in charge at the Academy in her stead. The assistant in question was the other person present, because Eboshi was currently chewing the younger man out.

         "How could you have been so careless?! I left specific instructions!" The middle-aged woman was holding an empty syringe, waving it in the young man's face. "And on TODAY, of all days! You've bungled it this time, Ryohei!"

         Eboshi's current cause for concern was the fact that today had been immunization day at the Academy. Young shinobi-in-training were often exposed to things they hadn't been prior to the Academy. While most things weren't of great concern, enough were that there was a scheduled day, twice a year (for each semester) in which young shinobi were immunized against various nasty viruses.

         The problem was that today, Ryohei had grabbed some of the wrong syringes. Rather than immunization shots, they were hormone enhancers for women. It was one of those syringes that now lay empty in Eboshi's fist. She had found it while packing up after him, and had recognized it.

***


Was it just one syringe that had been used, or multiple?
1522.title: No Practice Like Malpractice

15221.content:
"You are so lucky that you only used ONE of these things! This is going to cause enough of a stink when the hormones kick in! I don't need MULTIPLE families yelling at me for what's happened to their daughters! And just before graduation, too!"

         Eboshi seemed to have worn out her rant by now, and simply stood, huffing in front of her terrified junior assistant. In a calmer voice, she asked, "Can you remember WHO you injected with this, so I'll know WHO will come yelling at me?"

         Fumbling around for a moment, the assistant muttered something unintelligible. Ryohei was so terrified of Eboshi, and with good reason. She was often hailed as the greatest medic-nin since Tsunade, which was saying something. The problem lay in the fact that Eboshi also had Tsunade's temperament, if not her legendary strength.

         "I'm sorry, Ryohei, I didn't catch that. Can you speak up?" The senior doctor had turned on the deadly sugar-sweet voice she used when she was ROYALLY pissed.

         Gulping, Ryohei spoke up. "I...I believe it was..."

152211.content:
The moment the name left his lips Ryohei knew that he might’ve well told her he used on a boy. Not that that would have made things any better, seeing as how Eboshi would know he was lying thru his teeth and likely beat him to near death any way. The fact that she wasn’t reacting at all let him know that he was in deep shit!

“Hyuuga Hinata… HYUUGA HINATA!!! You’re telling me that you gave the shy and self-concise Heiress to the most powerful clan within Konoha’s walls a massive dose of hormone enhancer!?! YOU DAFT FOOL!!! HER FATHER COULD BE BREATHING DOWN OUR NECKS WITHIN HOURS NOW!!!” cutting her rant short Eboshi took deep breaths to try and calm herself and think thru what would likely happen.

‘It’s too late to do anything about it now that the enhancers are already inside her. Poor girl will be at least a full cup size larger then before by the time she wakes up tomorrow but, the fact that Hyuuga’s most of all young ones, tend to have a stronger and longer lasting reaction then others doesn’t help the poor girl. Not to mention she will likely go thru flashes of sexual urges for at least the next few months. Hopefully, she doesn’t get near that blond boy she likes or it’s going to be even worse, especially once the hormones get going, I doubt she will be able to stop herself around him.’ Turning to the shaking assistant she gave a cold glare. “Hopefully this won’t case her problems during her exams tomorrow. Let us hope the small amount of chakra she needs for her justu exam doesn’t case any aggravated affects.”

Her assistant of course just had to ask the dreaded question. “Eboshi-sensei, how would using any chakra cause any aggravation?” Eboshi just sighed. “Chakra comes from every living cell in the body so if there is an enhancer in the body that affects hormonal levels, which can effect chakra itself, then it is safe to say the opposite is true as well. By using her chakra she ‘could’ aggravate the effects of the enhancer causing them to be even worse. During the test she may be hit by sudden… ‘urges’you could call it.”

*sigh*

“She was already ‘gifted’in terms of her transition from girl to young lady but, with the enhancers now in her puberty will be hitting her twice as hard. Chakra is directed without thought towards growing areas of the body or towards the hormones that cause the growth. Now his will be stronger and by forcing her chakra to move any other way will cause her body to try and compensate by drawing more towards those areas at times of rest. The human body also increases in terms of reserves of chakra as they age, that girl was just at the border of level 1.5 chakra levels now she will have level 2 reserves being shoved in to a body not able to hold more than level 1.5, this will happen within a couple of months. Likely she will start to suffer flashes of pain in her system around the Chunin Exams, which will cause her to instinctively try to flush it out and give off small burst of chakra to lessen the strain on her body. If I remember right she would normally go on a tracking team but, trackers don’t use large amounts of chakra which will cause her more problems as trackers need to be fast but, stealthy. In truth she would now be better off going to a frontline fighter team, doing so though would cause the enhancer to become aggravated till it settles, which will all the chakra use she will be doing won’t be for a while, likely some weeks after the Chunin Exams are over.” Looking at her confused and stupefied assistant Eboshi realized she had started thinking out loud again, she’d have to stop that soon.

‘For another time. We need to inform the Hokage of this so he can inform her teachers.’ And so with a heavy sigh she motioned for Ryohei to finish packing away their things while she walked towards the Kage Tower. ‘I just hope she does get on that blond boys team. The last thing she needs is to tell her father she got herself pregnant because she couldn’t resist jumping the bones of her crush.’

Hinata's white eyes opened with a flash. Her body was covered in sweat and her breaths were labored. She had been told about these types of dreams but never had she been told they would be so intense. Slipping out of bed, she got dressed but found her bra snugger than it was the night before.

"Oh no. I'm already bigger than Sakura and Ino. I don't want to be a freak," Hinata thought as she pushed her flesh into the bra. "But Naruto's also seen as a freak," she muttered, "Maybe we could be freaks together?" She unknowingly smiled at this idea. Once she was fully dressed, she left the house and went to the academy.

----------

Hinata tried her hardest to keep an eye on Iruka-sensei but Naruto was just ten feet from her and her mind kept going back to that dream.

"All right, to pass the exam, you need to preform a clone jutsu. Come when your name is called," Iruka explained before calling the first student over. The rest of the class began talking amongst themselves. Many girls were eying Sasuke but Hinata's eyes never left Naruto. Her mind was so focused, Iruka called her three times before she noticed and got up. Her face was beet red.

"Sorry Sensei!" Hinata said as she ran down the stairs to the door. None of the students had noticed her increased bust but Iruka, having been told about the likelihood of it from the Hokage-sama, did. His well trained eyes noticed the strain her chest seemed to be putting the brazier through. He led her to the exam room and sat down.

"Now please do the Clone Jutsu," Iruka said as he and Mizuki watched. Hinata put her hands together and released the jutsu and grew a little bit. Trained ninja eyes once again saw a difference. It helped that the two clones she produced reflected her previous bust size. Their eyes could see it was only maybe an inch at most growth.

"Great work. You pass," Iruka said, "Next up is Naruto." Mizuki smiled and went to call the boy over.

---------

"Byakugan!" she whispered as her eyes activated. She looked through the walls and watched as Naruto tried and failed. She felt so sad for Naruto. She wanted to be near him, to comfort him, to hold him close to her body, to her beautiful breasts, to have him suckle her breasts softly and rub them gently with his calloused hands.

15221122.content:
Using her Byakugan, Hinata watched from afar as Naruto spoke with Mizuki. She was sadly too far to hear what they were talking about and with her focus continually returning to her dream from the previous night, only to start making more mental fantasies, she was hard pressed to use what little lip reading skills she had. Sadly, after focusing on Naruto’s lips for a little longer then needed, Hinata found that she had lost sight of her blond-haired interest, while daydreaming on how they might feel pressed against her own. Panicking she tried to spot any sign of him or at least on which way he had gone. Failing to find anything, she deactivated her Byakugan and quickly went over what she had been able to make out of the conversation Naruto had had.

‘Lets see, I think they were saying something about the Hokage but, what?’ Thinking on the words she had read coming from their lips she remembered the words “Scroll” “Graduate” and “Kage Tower”. These words left her with the impression that Naruto had to do something in or around the Tower, so turning in the direction of the quickest route there she channeled her chakra to focus more towards her legs and began hopping off the roofs of the nearby houses. She never noticed how her bust would grow ever-so-slightly with every other chakra enhanced leap.

Reaching the Tower in record time, Hinata took a deep calming breath, only to flinch lightly at the pain her bra was starting to give her. The embarrassing idea of unhooking it came to mind only for her to force it back down; while some of her clan may do such things they only did so behind the walls of the compound, never when in public. Deciding that finding Naruto was more important than her bra at the moment, she activated her Byakugan and searched the Tower and its surrounding area. Not finding the bright-blue chakra of Naruto, something she noticed only he seemed to have, Hinata cut the chakra to her eyes and went to sit down on a nearby bench. She would periodically activate her eyes and do a quick scan for the blond, never paying the difficultly of breathing with her ‘slowly’ tightening bra on, much mind.

*Time skip- 3hours later*

Hinata was slowly losing hope of Naruto coming, as she had been giving the surrounding area and the Tower itself, quick scans every five to ten minute intervals, and she had yet to see any sign of him. Taking in the current time, she knew her father was going to be furious with her when she returned, so with a heavy sigh she willed herself to do one last scan, before heading home to an angry father and a likely painful late night spar as punishment.

Performing the hand seals and a quick mutter of her coveted doujustu’s name, she began her last scan of the area for Naruto before gasping in surprise. ‘It’s HIM! I’d know that brighter than normal chakra anywhere, but what is he doing in the Kages’ office?’ Lets’ just say she got her answer real quick as Naruto performed his, “Sexy Justu” for the Hokage, before said man fell backwards and Naruto shot out of the open window. Standing quickly, she channeled her chakra downwards again while keeping her eyes active long enough to know his general direction. With that she shot off after the energetic blond, following him on the rooftops.

After five or ten minutes of running through both the village and the forest she saw Naruto land near an abandoned shack. Hinata stopped in the trees, while keeping him in just in sight of her normal vision; she had to release her Byakugan due to a lack of concentration caused by her now very difficult time breathing. ‘Finally, he stopped! Thank goodness, as I wouldn’t have been able to go much farther.’ Taking a few shallow gasps, as her bra is starting to really cut into her; she squatted on her tree branch hidden in the shadows. She could see Naruto but, he wouldn’t be able to see her, and so with that in mind she quickly removed her jacket and placed it neatly on the branch.

Once certain her favorite jacket wouldn’t fall off without her noticing, she gave a quick look around, gasping shallowly the whole time. ‘I need to hurry… vision starting to blur… getting… dark…’ Her thoughts were getting muddled do to the lack of oxygen, while she tried franticly to unhook the back of her bra. Losing the battle against the darkness of her vision she grabbed for a weapon and came up with a shuriken. No longer caring if she got hurt she tucked the star-bladed weapon under the front of her shirt and quickly cut the thin straining material between her two breasts. Freeing her growing and sensitive mounds from their confinement caused them to bounce and hit her hand, causing the shuriken to slice through her shirt and under-mesh armor.

Hinata however didn’t really care at this point as she was too busy gasping in relief at the air that quickly filled her lungs. She didn’t even care that she dropped the bladed star from inside her shirt, or how the only sign of injury would be the sliced opening in her shirt, going from just under the half point of her breast, down to her belly button. She didn’t even care that each breath caused her shirt to open just enough to reveal a teasing amount of creamy-white skin. No, all she cared about now was Naruto.

Leaning forward to grab her jacket, as she had fallen to a sitting position during her fight with the bra, she completely ignored how the shuriken had fallen just between her legs with one blade in the tree and another now just poking into her pants and panties. Grabbing her favored jacket she threw it around her shoulders before working said shoulders to loosen the now ruined bra while quickly unhooking the back. She let the two pieces of her lavender bra slide out of her shirt sleeves and fall to parts unknown, before slipping her arms into her jacket and releasing a small burst of chakra from around her shaping bottom. Doing so gave her the momentum to get to her feet, never knowing her now forgotten shuriken had sliced a perfectly placed opening in her dark blue pants and lavender panties. If she was to widen her stance when fighting or simply spread her legs a bit too much she would in-avertedly reveal her lower lips for anyone at the proper angle to see. The sudden cold from her movement coupled with her only thinking of blond crush didn’t help to keep her ‘sacred spot’ hidden, as the small arousal made her dream come up to the front of her mind.

Watching Naruto practice whatever it was he had found in the scroll for the next hour didn’t help keep her thoughts clean. Half-way through she had to bite down on her lower lip and actively keep herself from rubbing her thighs together. (Don’t puberty suck?!?) She now had two options. She could go out and try to help him with whatever he was doing or she could stay where she was and hope she didn’t give herself away. Though the arousal was wreaking havoc on Hinata’s mind and morals, if she stepped out there was a good chance she would snap and give in to the burning need she felt building between her legs.

What to do, what to do…

"That ... is.... so.. GREAT!!" Hianta yelled. Before Naruto could get over Hinata yelling she went into a sprint and charged straight at the young boy. With chakra helping her feet move, Hinata covered the distance before Naruto could even blink. But a palm strike to the chest from an unknown force and a slap to the back of Hinata making her crash into the ground avtered what ever Hinata was planning. Though she did moan as the soft earth pressed against her breasts.

Shaking his head, Naruto looked at his assailant. "Iruka-sensei? How did you find me so quickly?"

"Naruto," Iruka began through clenched teeth, "How can you be so stupid? WHY the hell did you take that scroll?!"

"Huh? For the special exam!" Naruto exclaimed, "I've been practicing real hard. I only had time to learn one move before Hinata and then you found me!" The blond boy laughed. Iruka glanced back at the young Hyuuga. Slowly she was sitting up. Because of her landing as she did, her jacket's zipper was down showing the young girl's bouncy bosom. Her face was beet red as she tried to pull up the zipper but it failed. He looked at Naruto and saw the signs of him working out here.

"What exam are you talking about?" Iruka asked.

"The one Mizuki-sensei told me about," Naruto replied. Iruka's eyes widened and pushed Naruto down on the ground. Naruto was untouched but a large shurikan was now sticking out of Iruka's back. Turning to the attacker, Iruka saw his colleague Mizuki.

"Mizuki! What the hell is this all about?" Iruka yelled, keeping his eyes trained on the traitor.

"Isn't it obvious?" Mizuki asked, "When Naruto stole the sacred scroll, he ran into the Hyuuga heiress and killed her and then his beloved teacher before destroying the scroll it self in a great rage. If only I had been here quicker I could have saved my friend."

"Bu-But Mizuki-sensei, why?!" Naruto asked.

"Oh Naruto, you really are an idiot. You know why no one in this village likes you? You know why they hate you? Even Iruka hates you!"

"Mizuki don't!" Iruka called.

"Tell me!" Naruto yelled.

"Because 12 years ago when the Kyuubi attacked and the 4th Hokage defeated that monster, he did so by turning it into you! You are the demon-fox and no one wants to be near a monster!" The words echoed in Naruto's mind. Tears came to his eyes. He had to get out of there and so he ran.

"Naruto!" Hinata called, running after the boy. The young girl did not see Mizuki throwing another shurikan at her. Iruka raced to stop the girl from running into the blade. Iruka was sure he got her to safety as the blade missed. But in truth the blade did hit Hinata across the her ample chest and did not scratch it in the slightest.

"Hinata, return to the village and tell the Hokage what happened!" Iruka ordered her before running off to save Naruto.

"Naruto's in danger!" Hinata thought, "I must protect him!" Standing up, the young girl found courage she did not know she had and activated her Byakugan and looked for her boy. She did not care what he was, he was still precious to her. She would make sure he knew that.

Iruka saw Naruto and smiled. "Naruto, hand me the scroll, we'll get out of here!" Iruka called. Sneering at Iruka, Naruto slammed into Iruka before the illusion vanished and Mizuki was revealed. "How the hell did you know I wasn't Iruka?" Mizuki asked before seeing the illusion dispell around Naruto revealing Irkua.

"Because I'm him," Iruka said, coughing.

"Ha! You take the form of your parent's murderers?" Mizuki asked.

"No! You're wrong, Naruto .. He may be a failure at many things, he may not eat right or clean his house, but he is not the Kyuubi! He is his own person and going to make a great ninja one day!" Iruka yelled out.

Behind a tree, cowering and crying Naruto heard his sensei's word. Peering around, he saw Mizuki ready to throw another knife to kill Iruka. Naruto felt angry. Not a selfish anger but a deep, loving anger at this man who trick him and was about to kill his friend. Without hesitation, Naruto raced into the fray.

Mizuki threw the knife but a yard in front of Iruka it was stopped by a blue-glowing boy in an orange jumpsuit. Naruto stared down the traitor.

Hinata came upon the battle and watched as Naruto put his hands together. She nearly climaxed upon seeing nearly 50 Narutos all around the traitor Mizuki. Before the confused traitor could act, the clones jumped on Mizuki and defeated him.

After the battle was over, Mizuki laid beaten and Naruto was exhausted. Rising slowly, Hinata saw Iruka present Naruto with his ninja brand to signify his passing the exam and becoming a full rank Genin.

As did that Hyuuga girl whose breasts were now enhanced. But it seemed accelerated growth was not the only thing to befall them. 15221122121211.content:
"Damn it! Where is he?!" Naruto bellowed to the near empty classroom.

"Shut up Naruto," Sakura said firmly while her Inner Sakura agreed with the blond boy.

"It is nice to just spend time alone, wouldn't you say?" Hinata asked aloud but looking right at Naruto.

"Yeah, you know we should hang out and have some girl time Hinata," Sakura said, just missing the dark scowl on Hinata's face.

"Sure, then we can learn more about each other," Hinata said after she realized it would give her a better chance to remove Sakura from the equation. Turning back to Naruto, he was fixing an eraser so it was wedged in the door and once Kakashi opened it, he would be hit. This earned him approval from both Hinata and Inner Sakura.

Ten more minutes passed before the door finally opened and the white-haired man was hit by the eraser.

"Oh teacher, I'm sorry. I tried to stop him," Sakura said.

"Suck up" Hinata thought.

"Hmm, my first impression is I don't like you guys," Kakashi said calmly, "Now follow me." Kakashi turned around and led Team 7 to the roof of the school. Once everyone was seated, he looked at them with his one eye. "All right let's get some introductions," he said.

"What do you want to know?" Sakura asked.

"Hmm," Kakashi said as he put his hand to his mouth, "Why not your likes and dislikes or dreams of the future or hobbies and stuff like that?"

"Hey, why don't you tell us about yourself first?" Naruto shot back.

"All right. My name is Hatake Kakashi. I have no desire to tell you my likes or dislikes. As for dreams, well I have some. As for hobbies, I have a few as well," Kakashi said as his cheeks rose as though he was smiling.

"So all we learned..." Naruto began.

"From that..." Hinata added.

"Was his name?" Sakura finished.

"All right, you on the right start first," Kakashi said, looking at Naruto.

"Well,I'm Uzimaki Naruto and I like insta-cup Ramen but what I like even more is going to the restautant Iruka sensei takes me to. What I dislike is the 3 minutes I need to wait for Insta-cup to be done," Naruto began as Kakashi wondered if he talked about anything besides Ramen. "As for dreams, I want to be Hokage and have eneryone in the village acknowledge me!"

"He has grown in a strange way," Kakashi thought.

"I already do," Hinata thought as Kakashi turned to her. "My name is Hyuuga Hinata. My likes are ...Naruto and my dream is to marry him." Hinata began with only Kakashi understanding the mumbling at the end. "My dislikes are how my clan is currently run. I hope to change that." Hinata knew her father would never allow her to wed a clanless ninja like Naruto, so she had to get strong enough to become the next leader so she could be with who she wanted.

"So the hormone is really affecting her mind and desires," Kakashi thought as he nodded and looked at Sakura.

"My name is Haruno Sakura. My likes are .... My dreams are ...," Sakura began as she squeeled to herself, " My dislike is Naruto!" No one but Kakashi sensed the murderous intent Hinata just shot Sakura.

"Girls her age really are more interested in love than training. Though Hinata's no different really," Kakashi thought.

"Good. Now that that's done, on to your duties," Kakashi said as Naruto jumped up.

"Yeah, what are our duties?" Naruto asked.

"Well, first we'll do something just the four of us," Kakashi said,, "Survival training." This brought a look of confusion from the Genin.

"What?" Naruto asked.

"But didn't we do enough of that in the academy?" Sakura asked.

"Oh this is special. I will be your opponent and ..." Kakashi said before he started chuckling.

"What's so funny Sensei?" Sakura asked.

"No... well.. iT's just when I tell you you are all going to flip," Kakashi said.

"Come on tell us!" Naruto said firmly.

"Well, of the 27 graduates, only 9 will be fully promoted to genin rank. The rest are either sent back to the academy or tossed out completely. So this training has a 66% failure rate!" Kakashi said. None of the team were amused by this. "Told you you would flip."

"But what about the graduation exam we just did?!" Naruto bellowed.

"Oh that was to screen out the possible canidates for this," Kakashi said before getting up, "Your test will happen on the training field. Bring all your ninja tools if you want to survive. Oh and don't eat breakfast unless you want to throw up." Kakashi walked away from the team.

"There is no way I'm going to fail!" Naruto growled.

"Don't worry Lover, I'll help you pass and get the hussy to fail," Hinata thought as Naruto and Sakura left in their own directions.

-----------

The next morning none of Team 7 was in the best of conditions. Naruto spent much of the night unable to rest as he was filled with too much excitement and attacked a motionless Kakashi-doll. Sakura was starving as she had only a light lunch and no dinner or breakfast, so she was running on empty. Hinata did not go to bed until well passed midnight as she spent most of the night watching Naruto as he slept. For some reason she enjoyed rubbing her large breasts and wanted Naruto to touch them. Come the next morning none of her shirts fit her properly anymore. Even her largest revealed her firm abs. She could barely zip up her jacket.

Thankfully neither of her teammates were aware enough to notice the added growth, even as she practically shoved her chest in Naruto's face.. And an hour after the test should have started, Kakashi arrived.

"You're late," his students yelled at him.

"Sorry a black cat came towards me so I had to take a different route," Kakashi said. He put down a clock, setting it for noon and held up two bells. "The test is simple," Kakashi said, "Steal these bells from me before noon and you get to eat lunch and you pass. Fail to get a bell and you get tied to the stump, miss lunch, and you get dropped back to the academy." The team looked at each other. None of them wanted to miss lunch nor get dropped.

"If I get both, Naruto and I will be together!" Hinata thought.

"Oh Kami, I don't want to miss being a Genin with Sasuke!" Sakura thought.

"I will get the bell and become Hokage," Naruto thought.

"You can use any weapon you want," Kakashi continued, "You won't win if you don't come at me with the intent to kill."

"But sensei!" Sakura yelled.

"Separate me from Naruto and I will kill you," Hinata thought.

"You couldn't even dodge an eraser! We'll kill you!" Naruto yelled.

"In the real world, the dog who yells the loudest is the weakest," Kakashi replied, feeling a killing intent from Hinata again. Both she and Naruto pulled out shurikans but found Kakashi behind them both holding their hands and their blades at each others throat. "I didn't say go." Sakura blinked and jumped away. None of them fe.lt as confident as they just were. "But at least you two were ready to kill me. I guess I'm beginning to like you guys." Kakashi chuckled a little and let the pair go. "Start!"

Hitomi, you sly little minx…’ and with that Kakashi let himself drift into his own little world…

Hitomi translates to: Beautiful virtue; pupil of the eye; “charity" (hito) and "beauty/beautiful" (mi); "one" (hito) and "beauty; beautiful" (mi)
----------------
He had tried to keep up but, it all had happened so fast… One moment he’s charging Kakashi–sensei so he can beat him to a pulp and take a bell, getting one step closer to his dream. And the next moment he’s knocked for a loop, tumbling on the ground as something heavy yet, oddly light crashes into him. Next thing he knows he’s being pulled by the scruff of his jacket into the tree line and away from the bell he needs. Now he finds himself standing behind a tree, the person who grabbed him having one arm around his mid-section and pressing him against her. Yes, her. My eyes, your trickster nature, my gentle fist and you clones… together we could get the bells, eat lunch and be on our way… w-what do you think?... Naruto…”

Naruto…” he heard his captor say, the tone… almost… pleading him to say yes. ‘That voice, I know that voice…’ Taking a small step forward, he felt no resistance from the arm around him and so turned to face the person who had knocked him for a loop and dragged him off into the woods. “Hinata…” He looked her in the eyes and asked before he even knew what he was saying. “You… you really want to work… together!?” He couldn’t help it the idea that someone would want to work with him was… foreign to him. Yes, Hinata had been their when he found out about the fox but, still… she really want to… help him?!?

“Yes, Naruto. I think we have the best chance by working together.” The words held a level of sincerity and… hope… in them that he had a hard time thinking there could be any second motives behind her actions. “But, if that is true than, shouldn’t we get Sakura to join us?” he asked. The moment he saw the anger in her eyes he wanted to back away and hope she wouldn’t hit him like said pink haired girl. He was rather surprised when she only spoke to him, her tone having shifted so it was slightly guarded. “You can send a Shadow Clone to ask if you want but, I doubt she will accept, I bet she might even hit you just for asking. Personally, I don’t like her at all, but if you want to give her the chance then, so be it. We can figure out who gets a bell after we get them. Though, I’d rather she just stay in the bushes and not show herself.”
