Just how much chakra ‘does’ he have?’ He put away his precious book and immediately ducked down, hand lashing out he grabbed the clones’ leg that had tried to attack from behind with a swinging sidekick and thru it towards another clone that just started to move towards him on the left. He guarded with his right arm against a clone that had tried to punch him and shifted his weight to bring up his left leg, blocking a kick and avoiding the sweep from the second and third clone respectively. Slamming down his raised foot on top of the sweeping clone and grabbing the two other clones heads in his hand, he smashed their foreheads together, causing three poofs as the clones were destroyed.

This continued for another five minutes, with Kakashi noting how Naruto seemed to be getting better as time went on, only then something happened. He had just destroyed clone number 15 and 16, the former by stomp his head flat into the ground and the later, by kunai knife to the throat. Just as the puffs of smoke appeared, Kakashi thought he felt a gentle pressure brush his left calf but, he passed it off as another clone charged him with kunai and another threw shuriken stars at him. Destroying the clone with its own kunai and grabbing three of the shuriken from the air he tossed them back at the clone only for the stars to spread out and take out the clone that threw the stars and the ones next to it. At that time he felt another two gentle pressure brush his lower back and right triceps. This time Kakashi reacted by swinging a fist around behind him. He felt the side of his fist slam in to the side of his attackers head but, when he turned enough to see them, instead of Hinata as he had expected he saw a blond boy sailing through the air just before poofing into nothing.

Stunned, Kakashi wasn’t fast enough to stop the full hand strike to his right shoulder in time but, he did manage to bring his elbow around into his attackers’ side by crouching slightly. He cringed at the sound of a rib snapping and thought that maybe he had use more strength then necessary, this was proven unfounded as Hinata poofed into nothing. ‘Does Hinata know the Shadow clone justu too?’ he asked himself just before he faltered due to a kunai digging into his injured calf. Instead of blood thou, there was a small poof followed by another poof only a moment after.

Now hidden in the trees, Kakashi tried to catch his breath while watching the blond clones and surprisingly five Hinatas in the field. He needed to know which one was the real Hinata and which ones were fakes made by Naruto. He used what he knew of Hinata’s hormone condition and glanced at each ones chest to see if there were any differences only to find none, all of the Hinatas looked completely alike. ‘If those are real Hinata shadow clones then, does it mean there won’t be a difference until one dispels or is she simple growing slower for some reason? There is still the chance that they are just Naruto clones under a Transform justu. Hmm.’ He likely would have continued thinking if not for suddenly ducking to avoid a gentle fist strike to the back and snapping out a hard kick before he realized it. As Hinata flew out of sight he heard a loud grunt just before the sound of something hard hitting a tree reached his ears.

He slowly moved forward, noting how the clones in the field all disappeared at once. Crouching on a tree branch Kakashi looked to the source of the noise only to find two of his would-be students but, what caught his attention was how they ended up. Naruto had clearly used his own body to take the brunt of the collision, both with the tree and the ground. Hinata was either out cold or to dazed to make sense of anything around her and was lying on top of Naruto, but not as one might think. No, Hinata was on top of the blond boy but, her chest was covering the blonds face, effectively smothering the blond in her full cushy nearly-grapefruit sized bosom. Being that they were close to the same height, if Hinata sat up it would look like see was straddling him. Kakashi, absentmindedly noted that it would be the perfect position if they were to suddenly try face to face anal-sex. Suffice to say Kakashi immediately gave himself a mental smack for even thinking of his two potential students doing such a thing. 'I blame my wonderful books for such thoughts. Besides Hinata would never try such a thing out in the open, not even with those ‘urges’ Eboshi-sensei said she was likely to experience, right?'

He watched in amusement as Naruto seemed to come too, first. He couldn’t help but, let out a perverted giggle as he watched Naruto use his hands to try and figure out what was smashed against his face. He went back and forth between perverted giggles and small chuckles as he watched how Naruto gave a small squeeze to the soft things on his face only to start panicking when he heard Hinata moan in approval. Hinata for the most part didn’t seem to realize what was going on as she wrapped her arms around her chest and the squirming thing pressed against it. From Kakashi's view, it looked like Hinata was trying to suffocate Naruto to death in a valley of soft girl flesh or that he would become part of her breast if she just pressed his face into them enough. Giving one last giggle as Naruto’s muffled shouts were drowned out by the still loopy Hinata’s moans, Kakashi decided that this was something that they could work out on their own before, turning and bounding off in search of his last student hopeful. After all, it’s not like Hinata or Naruto would really take advantage of the other, right? 'The silly Hokage and his worries were groundless.'
1522112212121121.title: Stays on the Training Grounds....

choices: Kakashi gives his speech on teamwork, Hinata feeds Sakura.
Kakashi gives his speech on teamwork, Naruto feeds Sakura.
15221122121211211.content:
Sakura was lost. There was just no way to deny it any longer. She had gone after her sensei to try and get a bell but, now she was lost in the forest of trees. ‘Every tree looks the same, how am I suppose to find sensei and get a bell when I can’t even find my way around the training grounds?.. I feel like I’ve been running around in circles.’ Thought the pinkette to herself. Stopping for a moment to catch her breath she hears an odd wheezing noise coming from the other side of some bushes to her left. Moving to take a look she finds herself regretting it immediately. She sees the broken and battered form of her beloved Sasuke Uchiha, his blood can be seen splattered everywhere; the trees, rocks and ground are covered in the red life giving fluids. And his body is the worst of all. Broken, twisted and mangled to the point of being almost unrecognizable with kunai knives jutting from his torso. His head turns toward her and wheezes for help causing blood to spill from his mouth.

Sakura’s screams could be heard all the way back to the village.
-------------------
‘Well, I guess I should have expected that but, still… She could have at least tried checking for a genjustu.’ Thought the one-eyed ninja as he looked upon the fainted form of his third student, one who was currently foaming at the mouth if what he was seeing things right. ‘I wonder how Hinata and Naruto are doing.’ As if it had been waiting for that thought the memories of his clone that he left before looking for Sakura hit him. ‘Note to self: never try that genjustu on Hinata unless I want a super powered gentle fist strike to my necessary organs.’ The memories told him that his clone had separated the two before placing a subtle genjustu on Hinata, similar to the one just used on Sakura. But, instead of screaming and fainting like their third member did, Hinata had snarled at him, Snarled! After which she proceeded to give his clone a firsthand look at why you should never piss off a Hyuga.

Looking to the sky Kakashi judged that they still had 10 minutes left before the alarm went off. So, being the awesome ninja that he is, he vanished in a cloud of smoke and leaves only to reappear next to the three wooden stumps that the test had started near. He didn’t even have time to pull out his book before he had to catch the shuriken stars thrown at him from the tree cover.

His eyes narrowed at the realization that he could still hear something small and sharp moving quickly through the air. Ducking he heard the satisfying thunk of metal stars against the wood of the pole behind him. Giving a quick glance to the stump he counted three stars, the same number that he had caught only moments ago. Judging from how they had hit the wood, Kakashi quick calculated to position that they had been thrown from. Lazily coming to a stand he flicked his wrist and sent the shuriken speeding back from where they came, gaining a small yelp from his attacker. With the small smile he had covered by his mask Kakashi hopped to the right, dodging a fist before lashing out with his left hand. Kakashi’s grin only widened at catching his only male student off guard by giving him a small shove, knocking the boy off balance.

Kakashi proceeded to duck and weave between the boys’ punches and kicks, always on the lookout for his deadly white-eyed shadow. Almost five minutes passed before Naruto seemingly got in a good hit, only for Kakashi to disappear and reappear behind him, crouching with the seal for Tiger at the ready. The sensei heard Hinata rushing at him to try and stop what she thought was a nin-justu but, even with her using chakra to speed herself up she was too slow.
--------
Naruto was ferocious. Instead of some justu his sensei had the nerve to give him a super powered butt poke. Not only was that painful as it was but, he had done it in front of Hinata, his teammate and friend making it all the more humiliating. To top it all off, he went flying thru the air holding his bum in pain and surprise, only to land in the water. Oh, yes. Naruto was going to get some payback. ‘I wonder if those old explosive tags I’ve got are still any good?..’ the thought made him chuckle, or chuckle as best as one could when under water.
----------------
Kakashi was starting to feel a little worried. Naruto hadn’t come up for air yet and he was currently running for his life. ‘Maybe if I beg, she’ll let me live.’ He thought just as he ducked under another gentle fist strike. Sadly, in his effort to stay away from the murderous Hyuga heiress he had lost track of his surroundings, this is why his back hitting the wooden pole caught him by surprise. His wide eye shot back to look at the girl in front of him and could only think of one word to sum up his current predicament, ‘Shit…’

Less than a second later the chakra charged strike hit him dead center in the chest.
------------
Kakashi watched the young, busty Hyuga girl strike where he had just been, and to say he was terrified would be putting it mildly. He had performed a seal-less Replacement Justu only moments before the pissed off girl slammed her chakra coated hand into his chest, and he was glad he did. ‘The illusion didn’t even get a chance to dispel. The log I replaced myself with just… disintegrated… If she had hit me with that then… well they would have needed a new sensei.’ Kakashi trembled slightly at knowing he had almost been killed by a genin, a piss off, busty young girl of a genin but, a genin none the less. ‘Maybe I should run and hide before she finds me again.’ Nodding at the thought, he turned to leave only to have a kick placed right between his shoulder blades. Tumbling out of his bush, he turned to see a flash of orange just before it went ‘pop’. Springing to the side he managed to avoid being hit by Hinata’s chakra strike and did something very unexpected. He turned and ran.

This act made it so he could not see the confused/surprised expression she gave just before it was wiped from her face and she gave chase. A chase that ended at the edge of the river as she hadn’t mastered the water walking exercise, yet. Kakashi however, was relieved that all he had to do now was dodge any weapons she might throw at him. ‘I think I’ll just stay out here in the middle of the river for the last few minute of this test.’ He thought.

As Hinata threw a kunai at him he shifted his footing to dodge but, as he did he noticed something wrong. Chancing a glance towards his feet after the knife missed him he saw the hands wrapped around his ankles and swore. Moments later covered from the neck down by blond-haired, orange wearing clones. Realizing that Naruto not only got him but, had even made sure to keep his arms from moving he felt both pride and panic well up inside him. ‘What’s that sizzling sound?’ Wide-eyed Kakashi struggled to get the clones off of him before the tag on back of multiple Naruto clones went off.

“Hey sensei…” the one on his back said with a cherry tone, making Kakashi think how it sounded almost creepy. “I got a solution for your test… FOR GOOD!” It sounded like the blond had finally lost it, or at least had a few screws come loose. Either way, the blonds’ statement was followed by the tags on their backs going boom less than a second later.
----------------
Sakura came running out of the trees to see the aftermath of the big explosion. The three wooden stumps were still there, bits and pieces of wood were thrown about the place, smoke could be seen coming from the center of the river and Hinata was at the edge of said river pulling out a soaked and tired looking Naruto. Just as she was about to move towards them and find out what happened, the sound of a timer reached her ears. Next thing she knew, she found herself tied to one of the poles, looking at a singed and tired looking Kakashi.

“Well I think it’s easy to see… that you all Fail.”
15221122121211211.title: End of the Test?

152211221212112111.content:
“Well I think it’s easy to see… that you all fail.”

Kakashi watched as Sakura winced while Naruto and Hinata’s poster slumped slightly at the statement. Kakashi couldn’t blame them; they had been the closest to ever pass his test only to fail. He wordlessly motioned for Hinata and Naruto to come have a seat near the logs that Sakura found herself tied to. “Well, this has certainly been an interesting day.” He paused to look over their glum faces and couldn’t help but note how Hinata was sitting so close to Naruto. Kakashi brushed it off though as there were more important things. “Now then, Hinata Naruto, I admit I am rather pleased with the two of you.” He noticed how they both looked up with a bit of surprise and hope. “You worked together to try and take the bells nearly from the beginning and moved with better coordination then most would when fighting together for the first time. But, there is something I have to ask… Hinata were those clones of you on the field yours or Naruto’s?”

Hinata poked her fingers together idly, “Th-they were Naruto Shadow c-clones with a transformation justu on them but, I’d sometimes throw a clone out in to the crowd to try and keep you guessing.” Stated the Hyuga heiress with only a slight stutter, Hinata idly made a mental note to ask Naruto to teach her shadow clone as it would make snagging him much easier later. Kakashi merely ‘hmm’ed in thought before giving a small nod to show he understood. “The two of you did well even though Naruto nearly tried to do it all on his own at the beginning. The two of you did so impressive that I will be recommending the two of you be put on the same team again after another year at the academy.” He ignored the looks of broken hope on their faces even if it was harder then he thought it would be. “I am however saddened to note that you didn’t include your other team member in your plans, if you had you would have had a much better chance at getting the bells. Instead you left her to fend for herself against a superior opponent.” Sakura however had something to say about that, “But sensei, you said we had to get a bell and there are only two bells but, three of us. That would have left one of us without a bell, yet you’re talking as if we should have ignored that and…” Kakashi saw how she seemed to trail off at the end with a look of realization creeping on to her face. “Use teamwork. Yes, Sakura teamwork was the answer something that Naruto and Hinata seemed to at least partially figure out. This test was never about the bells but, to see who among you could put aside your own wants for the betterment of the team.”

“Sensei that doesn’t seem very fair.” He looked to the young heiress with a bored look. “Hinata we are ninja, we don’t play fair. The fact that I even need to tell you this makes me wonder if you’re really ready to be ninja.” The lavender eyed girl merely shook her head. “That isn’t what I’m talking about sensei. I’m talking about how Naruto did offer Sakura to join us in taking the bells but, instead she yelled at him. She demeaned her teammate and then physically attacked him simply because. If we are put on teams so we can work together then why would one team be composed of members that refuse any and all help just because it comes from one person in particular? It seems more like someone made this team simply so we would fail.” Kakashi couldn’t deny that she seemed to make a fair point but they were teammates now, whether they liked each other or not.

“Even still you are all a team now. This means that you need to find some way to work together or something terrible could happen in the field. For instance…” The kids jumped as their sensei suddenly vanished only to reappear behind them with Hinata thrown to the ground and a kunai knife at her throat. “Naruto, Kill Sakura or Hinata dies!!!” The blond stiffened, his eyes darting to the kunai in his hand, to Hinata’s shocked face, to Sakura’s fearful one. “This is the sort of thing you will face in a real mission...” began Kakashi as he slowly released Hinata who quickly jumped to her feet and ducked behind Naruto. “In a real mission one mistake is all that is needed to get your whole team killed…” stated the masked ninja as he walked towards the large polished black stone. “Do any of you know what this is?” he didn’t wait for a reply. “This is the memorial stone. It holds the names of all our greatest hero’s engraved upon it.”

Naruto was about to start shouting about how he wanted his name carved upon the stone but, something about Kakashi’s tone of voice made him hold his tongue. Instead he turned to his lavender eyed teammate and whispered “Hey, Hinata. What kind of Hero’s are on that stone?” The girl turned to look at her blond haired teammate, tears clinging to her eyes as she fought to hold them back, a look of sorrow easily seen on her face. “They are the hero’s that died to keep us safe. Like my Uncle.”

“Your right Hinata. Your Uncle Hizashi does have his name engraved into this stone for his part in saving our village from going to war with Kumo (village of Hidden Cloud)… *sigh* Alright team this is how things will work. I will give you one last chance to pass,” stated the masked Jounin as he turned to face his team. “Naruto and Hinata, you may eat but, Sakura gets nothing since she did nothing last time. After that you will have one last chance to pass my test.” He quickly disappeared in a swirl of leaves, all the while wondering if they would pass this new test.

*Note this chapter was to long and so I have cut it in to two parts. Sorry.*
152211221212112111.title: The New team 7 part1

1522112212121121111.content:
Hinata had been sitting and eating her box lunch for the past few minutes turning her sensei’s words over in her head. ‘Something tells me that things aren’t as they appear. But, how? Is this another test? And if so, how do we pass it?’ She was brought out of her musings by the voice of her crush and source of her resent wet dreams. “Hey Hinata, is Kakashi nearby?” She looked at him in confusion but, quickly used her eyes to look for her sensei. Not seeing him anywhere nearby she shook her head. Hinata watched as Naruto stood and started moving toward the pinket of the team. “Naruto what are you doing?” she asked not liking were this seemed to be going. “Sakura is obviously hungry and if Kakashi isn’t here then how will he know if she eats?” asked the blond with a big smile towards the heiress before turning back towards his pink haired teammate who was staring at him with a rather deadpan look. “Now open up Sakura.” He said while holding up a bite of his food.

He completely ignored the annoyed glare coming from said pinket and was oblivious to the murderous look Hinata was giving Sakura. ‘NOOO! The only one Naruto should feed like that is me! ME DAMN IT!!! If she eats even a single grain from his chopsticks I’ll kill her and make it look like and accident. I SWEAR IT!!!’ Hinata was not going to stand for this and moved quickly to stop Sakura from claiming an indirect kiss from ‘her’ Naruto. “Naruto…” The blond turned his head toward Hinata showing she had his attention. “…maybe you should let me feed Sakura. You did a lot more work than me so I’m sure you’re hungry.” Seeing that he didn’t seem completely convinced she pressed on not realizing that Sakura was silently thanking her as she would rather be feed by another girl then some boy who wasn’t Sasuke. “Besides Naruto I’ve seen you during lunch and know that it will take more than one little box lunch to refill your energy. We need you working at full power if we hope to get a bell from Kakashi-sensei.” Hinata watched as Naruto scrunched his face in thought making her want to squeal at how cute he looked and hug him. “But you fought him to so shouldn’t you eat to?” Hinata felt warm inside knowing that he was trying to think of her first but, she had to press on, a kiss from Naruto was at stake even if it was an indirect one. “Naruto I will be fine I promise… besides if we pass then we can just go to that ramen stand you like to celebrate.”

Naruto nodded though it seemed a bit hesitant. That was fine as long as Naruto’s lips, as well as the rest of him, was hers Hinata didn’t care if he hesitated a bit. Moving to begin her torturous job of feeding her pink haired rival Hinata heard Sakura whisper a thank you for getting Naruto away from her. Hinata felt like smiling, if she wanted to stay away from Naruto then why not give her an added reason. “Sakura,” she whispered earning a ‘hmm’ from said girl. “If I find you making any moves on MY Naruto…” Hinata moved closer to whisper in Sakura’s ear “I’ll kill you myself and hide the body so well no one will ever find it. Do we understand each other?” it wasn’t a question and Sakura figured that out quite quickly as she hurriedly nodded, her face a pale white from fear. “Good now open wide.”
-------
‘What the hell just happened?’ thought the blond. He had no idea. One moment he was eating as Hinata suggested he do and the next he topples over from a strong gust of wind. Looking towards the source he saw Kakashi-sensei looking rather peeved.

“WHAT DID I TELL YOU!?! One rule; that was all I gave you. Sakura would not get anything to eat and you can’t even follow that ONE RULE!!!” He gave a low growl that even at the distance they were at they could still hear it. “I am the Jounin! I make the Laws AND YOU GENIN FOLLOW THEM!!! What do the three of you have to say for breaking the Laws I set for you?”

For some reason Naruto couldn’t help but feel angry at his sensei and so he did as he always does, he let his mouth move before thinking things through. “SHUT UP YOU ONE EYED BASTERED! We are Team 7 and together we’ll kick your ass from one side of Konoha to the other! Believe it!” Kakashi merely blinked “Well, are the rest of you going to allow an idiot to speak for you?” he asked as if expecting them to refuse Naruto’s statement. “Naruto’s not an idiot Kakashi-sensei and he’s right. If you fail us for helping each other then we’ll just have to kick ass.” Stated the Hyuga heiress confidently, a fire a determination seemed to burn brightly. “Their right, Team 7 sticks together!” proclaimed the still tied up Sakura, inner-Sakura agreeing with a battle cry, ‘Shannaro! KICK HIS ASS!!!’

Seeing that they were ready to fight as a team Kakashi said his piece. “Well then. Congratulations, you pass.” He said with an eye smile. “W-what? We pass?” asked the blond. “Those who break the rules are scum but, those who abandon their comrades are worse than scum. That is the motto that I have come to live by and that is what I have taught you this day. Once again, Congratulations Team 7. You Pass!”

Soon enough she had to stop, she was just too tired to keep going. Panting heavily she looked around and groaned at finding herself lost in the woods once again. Hearing the sound of movement coming from behind her Hinata panicked. Jumping into a nearby bush she waited hoping she could come up with a way to get this bully to leave her and her Whiskers alone. And as if called on her stomach gave a small growl. Blinking in thought Hinata realize she did have a way to make the bully go away and get rid of anyone who tried to bully her or her hero again. So with a plan in mind she waited till the bully entered her view and moved past her before she struck.

That lead up to where she was, as she tossed the sandals off into the woods, then just as she had for her meal before she threw her head back and gulped hard. With the boys feet firmly inside her mouth she gave another hard swallow while inwardly hoping that the boy was very uncomfortable as he slid the rest of the way down and into her stomach.

"URP!"

Hinata's face darkened as she covered her mouth with a hand, a meek 'excuse me' being uttered through the hand. A second, small burp followed but, no excuse was given as Hinata rubbed her giant stomach contently. A loud groan signaled that it had already begun to work on its tenant. Shifting slightly, she covered her mouth as she yawned, the act of eating the older boy and her currently full stomach which wriggled around due to her meals struggles, trying to coax her to sleep. Deciding that taking a small nap wouldn’t hurt Hinata dragged herself to a tree to lean against before relaxing and contently listening to the sound of her stomach gurgling around her meal. As sleep started to take her Hinata got an idea and smiled. Soon all of Whiskers bully problems would be relocated to her stomach. And with a small yawn Hinata soon fell fast asleep dreaming about all the people that would soon be living inside her tiny belly as said stomach loudly gurgled and groaned.
155312111122112.title: The start of something...

choices: Hinata plays hooky so she can digest in peace.
Hinata pushes forward to class. Hopefully nothing embarrassing happens.
Hinata shocked to see some other girl her age eat someone in front of her.
1553121111221121.content:
Hinata Hyuga gave a pained groan before stifling a small belch that tried to escape her. She was no longer the little eight year old girl she once was. She had passed her first year at the ninja academy and was now in the middle of her second year, making her nine. Not too much had really changed with the young Hyuga in that time. She was still naturally shy and timid. She still secretly enjoyed eating people and had eaten quite a few since learning she could. She had however, grown a couple of inches in hight and her body had been developing wonderfully due to the highly nutritious meals of civilians and chakra wielding academy students.

Currently Hinata was now wearing a white long sleeved shirt over her under-mesh. Over this she had on a large lavender colored long sleeved jacket, with a pink hood top and pink sleeve ends; the bottom nearly reaching down to her knees. Her long pants were a type of brownish color and a pair of blue ninja sandals finished her current attire. Hinata gave another groan as she rubbed the massive bulging sphere that was her belly, of which was only just barely covered by her loose jacket, the fabric and zipper straining to hold back the gut its wearer currently sported.

Last night Hinata had snuck in to the home of a old woman. The bottom half of this woman's home was a store and mostly sold things like fruits and veggies. The old 60 something woman had always been kind to Hinata, occasionally giving her a free apple or orange to snack on. However, last week Hinata had born witness to the old lady assaulting her crush and hero, Naruto Uzumaki. Naruto-kun hadn't even done anything. The woman simply took one look at him before running back into her store. Only moments after running back in the woman came back out, swinging a broom around wildly while shrieking at Naruto-kun.

Hinata hadn't been able to let such actions go and immediately started making plans to remove the old croon from the world. She would except nothing less for the crime of possible breaking her crushes arm. The remains of what had once been that old hag were now sloshing loudly within the great dome of her belly. Still, the old bat hadn't gone quietly, or easily as Hinata's irritated stomach could attest to.

Hinata groaned again and rubbed the large bulge in her body, hoping it would help sooth her indigestion. Not only had the old hag tasted terribly sour but, she couldn't even digest properly. Hinata guessed it was her meals way of spiting her. She hadn't been able to get a wink of sleep last night due to the terrible stomach cramps and now she was on her way to her academy class, only to still be suffering from the hag.

Her stomach burbled and churned loudly as it struggled with its uncooperative meal; a bit of gas escaping her in the form of a wet belch. She hated this. The only reason no one had noticed her disappearance or the massive bulge straining her jacket, was because no one in her clan really cared to pay attention to her. Of her clan the only one likely to notice anything would be her little sister Hanabi, but knowing her she wouldn't make a peep about it unless the little girl thought she was doing something bad. "Bless her little heart." Thought Hinata just before another batch of gas forced its way out of her body. This time from the rear much to her embarrassment.

With her face alight from embarrassment Hinata wondered if maybe she should just skip classes today. If she actually entered class people were likely to stare at her and she really didn't want her crush to see her while she was so bloated. Still, if she didn't go her father was likely to find out and then he'd ask her why and likely insult her, or tell her how much of a disappointment she was. Hinata's lower lip quivered at the thought as tears formed in her eyes. She knew she was a failure, she didn't need her beloved father to keep reminding her.

Her belly gave an odd squelching sound and Hinata clutched her lower belly in pain. Out of all her meals, this had been her first time eating an adult. Most had been only a few years older then herself, one or two even being younger. This one had left her feeling so overly full, but she had enjoyed every minute of it. If terrible stomach pains were part of every adult meal however, she might just stick with eating others her own age. Feeling the cramp in her gut worsen, Hinata sat herself down on a nearby bench. It wasn't long till the pain vanished with the release of farther loud fart. Covering her face in shame, Hinata was seriously thinking of just staying where she was until she fully digested.

What happens?
1553121111221121.title: Time skip to mid-second year

choices: Her hunger makes her snap and trys to eat her team.
Team 8’s first C-rank mission, remove a bandit leader leave no trace of them.
1553121112.content:
Hinata shot up from her bed wide-eyed and panting from the pleasure her odd dreams gave her. Hinata had been having these odd dreams from time to time ever since she and her class had seen a live demonstration of a snake eating a meal much bigger then itself. She was nearing the end of her first year at the ninja academy when the demonstration had been given and she remembered the sight bringing an odd feeling to her soon-to-be nine year old self. The dreams of finding animals or even other people only to shove them into her mouth and start swallowing them like she had seen the snake do had popped up from time to time since then. This however, was worse than usual. The dreams had been coming far more often than ever before and they were starting to affect her daily life. To top it off, she hadn’t been eating much recently, as every time food was placed in front of her, her mind would go back to the dreams making her lose her appetite despite her body’s demands for food.

Reaching for a spare piece of paper she now kept nearby when sleeping Hinata began jotting down small details of the dream, she would write out the full thing into her dream diary later. Looking to a clock Hinata couldn’t help but sigh. ‘I woke up two hours early. I need to meet my team at 9am for training and then we are suppose to get our new mission. I wish I could go back to sleep but I know that I’ll never get back to sleep with these thoughts in my head.’ Thought the tired and hungry girl. Getting up she decided to get ready for the day and hope that it would keep her from returning to the images and feelings she had of her dream.

‘I wonder if Naruto or sensei would really taste that good?’ The image from the end of her dream appeared at the forefront of her mind. She was lying back against a tree, her pale creamy skinned stomach appearing as a large orb with various bumps in it as it shifted back and forth. Her meals in the dream having consisted of both of her teammates and her sensei, who now struggled against her powerful stomach and its digestive acids as they were slowly melted into a nutritious paste that her body would use to energize itself and maybe make her more attractive to her beloved Naruto.

Hinata couldn’t help but lick her lips at the idea before realizing what she was fanaticizing about and shaking her head in hopes of clearing it. Despite how slow she had been going she found herself finishing her morning routine with an extra hour before she had to meet her team, so she spent that time trying to force some breakfast down, while trying not to let the thoughts about her dreams stop her. Failing to eat much of anything Hinata tiredly made her way toward her teams meeting place, the dream constantly popping up making her lick her lips in hunger the whole way there.
1553121112.title: Filling dreams, Hungry life.

Quickly and subtly checking the surrounding area Hinata found that very few people were out and about. Plus their was a small dark alley near by that would easily hide her while performing the deed she had in mind. Licking her lips at the thought of being full of a live squirming meal was exciting her as her one time friend soon-to-be victim walked closer. 'This is perfect. Soon I will have a nice full belly and be able to get some peace from my hunger.'

 Thought the shy girl. Hinata watch anxiously as her target got closer. 'Thats right morsel, come closer. Ohh, you will look so good as fat on my body and then... a-and then-n... What am I thinking this is my friend I can't eat them. But, a friend would want to help me so,... so, that means I'm just helping them help me with my hunger... right?' Clearly the hunger that she felt was starting to affect her thinking and would likely only return to normal after eating. As her friend walked up to her and greeted her Hinata made her decision. She would...

155312111222.content:
Hinata was starting to panic. Her hunger was growing and she had yet to find a way to escape. If she didn't get away soon, Hinata would soon stop caring about who or what she ate as long as something entered her belly. Hinata looked to the person who had stopped her. It was a blond girl with pale blue eyes wearing a reviling purple shirt and skirt, with white bandages covering most of her body underneath. This was Ino Yamanaka, the gossip queen. Now Hinata had nothing against Ino, in fact the blond was the closest female friend she'd had since the academy. Because of this Hinata didn't feel comfortable with the idea of eating her, so she was looking for some way to getaway before she lost it.

Ino however seemed to be having none of it, as she continued to speak about all sorts of things ranging from boys to clothes, boys, fashion, did she mention boys! Just as Hinata was about to give up hope she saw what might be her salvation. Sasuke Uchiha was walking down the road behind Ino. Hinata had heard about the mission to Wave and had worried about Naruto but, seeing how the team had made it home in one piece she had only felt pride in the blond boy. Now however, that pride wasn’t important, only distracting Ino long enough to get away was. The fact that she didn't really like the Uchiha only made it easier.

"Umm, Ino..." Hinata was a little surprised at how the blond girl instantly stopped talking and listened. "I-isn't that S-sasuke?" she asked, yes it was insultingly easy to see what she was trying to do but, oddly, Ino fell for it easy. "Your right Hinata, good eye. Oh Sasuke, Sasuke!!!" Hinata watched the blond scamper after the Uchiha, she being the only one to notice the small increase in his walking speed.

'Well, now that that is over with.' Hinata quietly hurried off some streets away before she looked around. It was completely unintentional that her eyes happened to land on the back of a rather beautiful woman. She was about Kurenai height with shoulder length strait brown hair and a wonderful hourglass-figure, wearing a deep blue Yukata or casual/summertime kimono complete with a rich purple obi or sash. However instead of the normal geta (Wooden clogs) she was wearing a pair of tabi (Japanese socks) and zori sandals.

The women stopped and turned to look at the wares of a small fruit stand, this gave Hinata a good side profile. Now able to see her skin, Hinata saw no blemishes or scars. The tone showed that she was darker then Hinata's creamy white but, not quiet as dark as Naruto and his tanned skin. The woman eyes were a dark amber color, her nose small but, cute and a slight smile on her face made her a very beautiful women.

Hinata's eyes however were drawn to the large mass on her chest. 'How does she bend forward like that and not fall over? Those things are HUGE!!!' thought the shy girl and she was right. The woman looked to be no more than three or four years older than her and was already at an estimated G-cup maybe a borderline double G-cup. Looking further down Hinata noted how the women's rump stuck out somewhat, this was only being emphasized by the slight curve in her back. 'So much MEAT! I must have her.' thought the hungry Hyuga.

With the thought of having a full stomach in mind, the young Hyuga began to follow the women from a distance, absently noting that she seemed to be a civilian. As she followed target however, it became increasingly difficult to keep herself from simply trying to eat the busty burnet in plain sight. She paid no mind to the fact that she was starting to drool, nor that her eyes were firmly planted on the mid-to-late teen’s plump bottom, watching as it swayed side to side with each step. All that mattered was eating her and hope she didn't get caught.

'Now, how do I catch her?' the hungry heiress asked herself. 'I could try sneaking closer to her and pressing a chakra point. It would knock her out for a few minutes but, would it be long enough for me to drag her somewhere that I could eat in peace?' Hinata considered her options. In truth as taste as the women looked Hinata didn't want to eat the Yukata and Obi, it would just be such a waste to do so.

'I could keep following till a better opportunity shows its self but, I'm not sure I could last that long plus, my team will likely start looking for me soon.' Hinata did not like the odds of the second option but, they could be the easier choice. Thinking it over Hinata decided to...
155312111222.title: Hungers new Target.

choices: The tired black haired kunoichi. It’s a girl eats girl world.
The sleeping burnet belongs in Hinata's belly, NOW!
1553121112222.content:
A loud groan of hunger rang from the stomach of a young kunoichi as she continued to follow her prey as silently as possible. Hinata had in fact been following her chosen target for nearly two and a half hours now and was really starting to reach her limit in holding off her hunger. She had been sticking to the shadows or mingling in the crowds without drawing attention to herself. Knowing that her team would be out looking for her at some point, Hinata had taken extra precautions, such as; carefully removing any and all insects from her person and trapping them under potted plants or upside down cups, as well as moving through areas where her scent would be lost easily like in bakeries or flower houses and other such places. The first would ensure that Shino couldn’t trace her with his bugs, were as the second would make Kiba and Akamaru have a near impossible time in catching her scent. Being on a tracking and recon team meant that Hinata knew the tricks of the trade and how to hide from pursuers. In the darkness of a nearby ally, Hinata was watching her future meal with her Byakugan. She couldn’t help but, frown when she saw her meal meet up with another woman. Hinata assumed it was a friend of her targets but, that idea was quickly thrown out the window when she saw the two women kiss. ‘I really shouldn’t be so surprised. Same sex lovers are rather normal in the shinobi world, especially among kunoichi.’ Hinata continued to mentally grumble to herself at the turn of events while looking the newcomer over.

She couldn’t differentiate between colors while her Byakugan was active but, Hinata got a good enough look. The women was a few inches shorter then her burnet lover and not nearly as well filled out on top but, her legs and hips certainly made up for it. Long strait hair that went down to the small of her back, a heart shaped face with full lips and an upper body with just enough muscle definition to see that she was no push over. As said her chest couldn’t compete with her burnet friend but, was still an attractive D-cup and looked as if she didn’t wear a bra. The newcomers' lower body however was more muscled then her upper body and Hinata could tell that being on the receiving end of a kick from her would ruin anyone’s day. Hinata rather enjoyed the sight of the bubbly quality her bottom had in response to the strong muscles. The women wore shinobi pants and sandals with a simple spandex top tightly hugging her like a second skin. From the way she moved Hinata was certain that this woman was a Kunoichi. Frowning Hinata watched as the two simply walked around and chat with their arms linked, all the while Hinata silently cursed her luck at how much harder things had gotten.

Another loud growl of hunger caught her attention and made Hinata look down towards her starving tummy as it continued to quietly growl in impatient hunger. Patting her stomach in hopes of quieting it, Hinata whispered a promise that it would have a large squirming meal before the day’s end but, first she needed to grab a snack to hold her down.

Later that day…
Night was descending upon Konoha and Hinata was greatly annoyed. After grabbing some dumplings to try and hold over her hunger she had continued to shadow the two older women. She had even slipped into the hot springs bathhouse without them noticing so she wouldn’t have to expend her chakra. Her reward had been to watch in a mix of embarrassment and fascination as the two started to get rather hot-an-heavy in the hot spring. Had someone else been their then Hinata would likely have fainted out of sheer mortification, as such she was quite proud of herself for holding strong. A small part of her filed what she had witnessed and learned away to explore and study later.

Now however, she was on a rooftop across from her targets home. Hinata had placed herself between some outcroppings in the roof she was on as well as the surrounding homes. This would allow her to focus her Byakugan on just her intended meal and her lover as they continued where they left off in the hot springs. For the next few hours she would watch the two as they ravished each other, silently making mental notes to some of what she saw and took only short breaks to relax her eyes. She was rather surprised that no one had spotted her knowing just how red her face had to be while watching.

Just as Hinata was about to admit defeat in consuming her first human meal she saw her chance. One of the times she wasn’t using her Byakugan Hinata had found out that the long haired kunoichi had black hair and tanned skin with piercing green eyes. And now that same kunoichi was exhaustedly making her way to her own room, obviously intending to grab something before returning to her naked burnet lover, whom was sleeping heavily in her own room. Hinata knew that this would be her best chance, the only problem being who to go after. She had planned to simply eat the now sleeping burnet but, with a trained kunoichi in the house Hinata realized she would have very little chance of eating her meal and getting away unnoticed. ‘Maybe I should eat the kunoichi first while she’s exhausted, then I can have the civilian for breakfast tomorrow morning.’ Thought the white-eyed heiress. The idea did make sense as she would then have two meals for the price of simply waiting a little longer for the burnet to fill her hungry tummy. Licking her lips while thinking over her options, her stomach let loose the loudest and most demanding growl for food she’d had all day. Her stomach didn’t care who filled it as long as someone did.

Not wishing to lose the element of surprise due to her stomach made a split second decision and moved to slip in to the window of…
1553121112222.title: The Lavender eyed Huntress

choices: Hinata gets halfway before someone enters the room.
15531211122221.content:
It was surprisingly easy to slip into the kunoichis' room. Simply using the tree walking exercise to stick to the outer wall and applying the same principle to her hand and the window had been all it took to gain silent entrance. After slipping in it was a simple matter of returning the window to its previous position and silently latching herself over the doorframe. She turned off her Byakugan so as to not give away her position should her target have any sensory abilities. She didn’t want to be caught just because she was using her chakra; besides, even without her Byakugan being active she still had better eyesight then most and was perfectly capable of working in the shadows. Hinata stiffened slightly at the sound of the door under her opening and closing softly. She watched silently as the obviously exhausted black haired kunoichi walked into the room and moved towards a desk just under the window she had entered from.

Stealth fully dropping down to the ground Hinata took a quick look around the room. She could make out draws and dressers as well as other things that Hinata held no interest in on the left hand side of the room. In the opposite side sat a bed that looked to be rarely used as well as a small night stand next to the head of the bed. Turning her focus back to the kunoichi Hinata saw her seemingly making some last minute additions to a scroll on the table. Even with her greater sight Hinata couldn’t make out what was being written without activating her Byakugan, so she instead carefully made sure the door to the room was locked before tiptoeing towards her target. The kunoichi seemingly made the finishing touches to her report and turned just as Hinata got into striking range. And strike she did.

A quick strike to the women’s throat cut off any chance to call or shout for help as Hinata’s gentle fist damaged the vocal cords rendering them nearly useless. While the kunoichi grabbed her throat in surprise and pain, Hinata quickly grabbed her and with a sweeping kick the younger girl threw the kunoichi to the ground. Activating her Byakugan to insure she hadn’t awaken the taste looking burnet a few rooms down the hall, while leaping on top of her soon to be meal, Hinata quickly settled herself on the older woman’s waist. Effectively straddling the recovering Kunoichi, Hinata slammed two chakra filled open palms into the older woman’s shoulders, one to each. While this limited the elder of the two’s mobility Hinata decided to be cautious and make a quick strike to each elbow, thereby removing any chance for retaliation through those limbs. Starting to make sense of what was happening to her, the kunoichi shifted herself so as to use her strong legs to attack her attacker from behind. Hinata however, foiled this by moving herself to be sitting upon her soon-to-be meals thighs, just above the knees. The younger girl kept the powerful legs pinned by locking her own legs to the sides of said knees before giving a few chakra filled taps to the hips and upper thighs of the kunoichi.

Hinata panted lightly as she slowly rose from her position now that the elder kunoichi was temporarily crippled. Hinata took a few deep calming breaths in hopes of getting her heart to stop beating so fast, before she lifted the woman whom would soon be coating the walls of her stomach as a nutritious soup and as gently as possible, tossing her facedown unto the bed. Moving closer Hinata could see the slight shaking of the woman’s limbs as she tried to fight off the sluggish paralysis she was experiencing due to Hinata’s chakra blocking up her own. Hinata, unthinkingly, removed her jacket and let it fall to the floor before doing the same to her shirt and under mesh top, leaving her upper half bare. She took a step towards the twitching feet, planning to start with them so she wouldn’t have the taste of feet in her mouth at the end of her meal, but suddenly she just stopped and looked at the prone and nude woman that she had only just moments ago been thinking about as a tasty meal.

‘What is wrong with me?’ she asked herself. ‘Am I really thinking of eating another kunoichi, a comrade? A fellow human? I, I need to stop this. I need to…’ her thoughts were never finished as a low but powerful growl for food emitted from her stomach. Hinata looked towards her bare stomach with something akin to horror before she lifted her head and looked back to the still prone Kunoichi before with a look of reluctance. She was reluctant because she realized something. She was too far in to back out. ‘I’ve already attacked a fellow kunoichi of Konoha. If I simply leave then she will look for whoever attacked her and will either kill them or bring them before the Hokage to be tried. Either way, if I leave then everything is over for me.’ Hinata sighed sadly. “Seems I no longer have a real choice.” She muttered to herself, her stomach growling again as if to agree with such a statement.

‘Then lets begin.’ She thought to herself before clapping her hands together in thanks. “Thank you for the meal.” She muttered before grabbing the twitching feet and moving them towards her mouth.
