15531222211.content:
It wasn't that men weren't allowed to use this new jutsu, they were just unable to do it. A few years after the Kyuubi's attack on Konoha, a team of kunoichi had developed a fascinating new jutsu while trying to find a way to transport a prisoner safely and with no chance of them escaping. It had taken a while, but they finally figured out that by consuming the prisoner, and guarding the stomach lining with an indestructible wall of chakra, they could move them with ease. This jutsu even allowed them to control the digestive process so the prisoner wouldn't die from the natural process.

Soon, this jutsu was taught as part of the standard curriculum at the ninja academy. By the time they graduated, every young kunoichi had mastered this jutsu. Of course, there were those who would use it as they wanted, but it was hard to pin down exactly who did.

This year was the graduating class of Naruto Uzumaki, and he had just recieved his headband from Iruka, his teacher, for having learned the shadow clone jutsu. The young ninja was on his way to the lecture hall where he, and the others, would be assigned to their teams. It was on this path that he bumped into the...
15531222211.title: The vorish graduating class

choices: Naruto strait to the academy with Sakura hot on his heels.
Naruto makes a quick turn and slams into someone else.
155312222111.content:
Naruto stumbled slightly as he tried to recover from bumping into something soft or in this case someone. He spotted the person he had bumped into just as they spoke. “Naruto…” said the other the tone holding a low somewhat threatening growl-like quality to it. “S-Sakura! Hey, sorry about that. I didn’t see you there.” Naruto hoped that she would simply except the apology and be done with it as he really didn’t feel like running for his life right now. Despite Naruto's apology Sakura simply gave an annoyed huff while calling him a baka (idiot). 'I haven’t been punched yet. That’s a good sign, right?’ thought the blond.

Haruno Sakura was one of the larger and more voracious girls in his class. Her size was a testament to this fact as Sakura stood over his downed form while eagerly rubbing a bulging tummy. Her pale flesh tested the tight confines of her trademark red dress, jiggling with every movement that the now flabby ninja-in-training made. Her hips flared out, seemingly for attention, all the while supporting a monster bubble-butt. One of Sakura's hands, and the chubby fingers attached to it, was currently fumbling with the buttons on her top, acting as a last resort to holding back her huge belly which gurgled with fervor, whither out of hunger or digestion was anyone's guess.

Any who took the moment to really look at him would notice that Naruto was very nervous with Sakura so close. It wasn’t because of the small crush he had on her back when they where younger, it was because he had seen what she could do to someone that pissed the hungry girl off enough. He really did not want to get that close to his old crush. Naruto gave a small shudder as his mind went back to that incident. At the simple age of 10 he had born witness to the sight of a 10 year old girl eating the majority of the class ahead of them. That event had left a lasting impression and had quickly killed off any feeling he had for the girl. Naruto silently reaffirmed his promise to himself that he would avoid having such an intimate meeting with Sakura’s digestive track.

Naruto blinked as he realized that Sakura was talking to him. "So Baka, why are on your way to the academy? You failed remember?" Naruto unconsciously took a few small steps back. He didn't know why but, something about the way Sakura was carrying herself put him on edge. "No. I did pass but, there were complications that kept me from getting my passing grade at the time of the test.” Naruto felt like patting himself on the back for the quick excuse. Idly he looked down towards her stomach.

"H-hey, Sakura? You've had breakfast already, right?", asked the blond as he got ready to run should her answer be no.

Kunoichi could be considered lucky as one would think that eating and digesting other people would be rather fattening. However, the justu they used somehow made their digestive tract much more efficient as digesting someone actually left just enough fat on their bodies to be noticeable. He had once asked Iruka about it and he had said that as long as a kunoichi trained hard enough, they could easily work away any leftover fat from their meals. Not that all the girls did this however. Sakura was one such girl. She would eat a good number of people Naruto's size then just lay back and digest. She did no training at all yet, she was amazingly agile and persistent when it came to catching her meals.

Sakura took a moment before answering, as if considering the best way to word it. "Well, I did have breakfast and my after breakfast snack." Said the fat girl in an off handed manner, while giving her belly a small shake. Now that he was more focused on it, Naruto could easily see the forms of two people about his size struggling just under the thick layer of blubber on the girl. Despite seeing two people dying in agonizing digestion, Naruto felt greatly relieved at knowing that she wasn't hungry anymore. "Then again I did happen to lose track of my after breakfast snack-snack. Sneaky little Hyuga girl." This made Naruto nervous all over again and the look that Sakura was giving him now wasn't helping. "I'm still so hungry! Think you could help with that Naruto?" Naruto laughed nervously as he knew exactly how Sakura wanted him to help ease her hunger. "Yeah... About that... Um, Bye!"

Naruto ran as fast as he could from his potential eater, yet no matter what he did she was somehow always right behind him, that look of hunger gleaming in her eyes. Getting desperate, Naruto pushed chakra to his legs and ever so slowly he started to gain a little distance from the ground shaking steps of his hungry predator. He needed to get to the academy. If he could just find Iruka-sensei then he would be safe.
155312222111.title: Eating makes girls fat!

choices: Ino Yamanaka. Seems she is hungry too!
1553122221112.content:
Realizing that he was gaining a little distance, Naruto felt it would be prudent to try and lose the heavyset girl by taking a few twist and turns. Doing just that, he made a sharp turn at the next corner. Sadly someone else had been just about to turn that very corner themselves and so Naruto slammed into them at full speed.

Who was it?
1553122221112.title: Fancy running into you like this...

choices: Sakura manages to swallow them both at once!
15531222211121.content:
Hitting something at high speed is very disorientating. He knew this quite well from the time he had run face first into one of the water tanks adorning the occasional roof in the village. Those where not fun times. Running full speed into a person however was very new for him, especially so when considering who it was that he had slammed into.

The *eep* noise made by the girl was unmistakable, and before he even laid eyes on her, he knew it was the dark-haired, shy heiress of the Hyuga clan. This one girl was the only one that Naruto truly felt comfortable near ever since the girls had learned to eat others.

She was also the most confusing of all of them. He had seen just last year how gluttonous the shy and soft spoken girl could be. Like many of the other girls, he would sometimes catch Hinata looking at him with hunger in her eyes. Oddly, it seemed different then the hungry gaze all the other girls gave him. He couldn't for the life of him explain what it was and like never would be able to. All he knew for sure was that Hinata was the only kunoichi from class that clearly put in the long hours of training to stay in shape.

How did he know this? Because unlike the other girls who where massive blobs of flab on legs like Sakura or Ino, or even the only somewhat-on-the-chubby-side girls that dominated the class, Hinata was the only one that remained quite thin. Hinata was in fact the thinnest girl in class; not in a unhealthy way, more like a strong and fit manner. Though there was clearly some pudge on her from the feel of it. In some dark and rarely used corner of his mind he approved of this. He personally thought the girl would look rather cute with a little padding on her.

"Sor...sorry Hinata, I was in a big hurry and I didn't see you there." the blond genin apologized while trying to get up. Hinata blushed a cherry red at the fact that she had just been pressed against the very boy that she had been nurturing a massive crush on for some time. It was practically the best moment of her young life. At least it would have been had a certain hungry pink haired predator finally catch up to her meal.

The only warning the two had was the sound of something heavy slamming to a stop right behind Naruto and said heavy thing screaming, "Get In My BELLY!"
15531222211121.title: Hinata Hyuga

choices: They somehow lose Sakura and make it to the academy.
Sakura manages to corner them just outside the academy.
155312222111212.content:
Naruto didn't even think about it as he suddenly flashed into motion. He simply moved! To the others, they saw or felt in ones case, Naruto grab the Hyuga girl and take off screaming with a highly embarrassed girl hanging over his shoulder. Then again one of his hands was kind of grabbing the girls butt without even realizing it. Poor girl...

Sakura however was red faced at the fact that she had missed her chance to claim both her newest target and the one that she had lost earlier on in the morning. The fact that her other two meals were rapidly digesting from all her running wasn't making her any happier.

Dead set on enjoying those two digesting inside of her during the boring wait for team selections, Sakura charged after her runaway meals.
155312222111212.title: Run, Naruto! Run!

15531222211122.content:
¡Paf!¨Argh¨ Naruto fell backwards as something soft blocked his way. Opening his eyes he was welcomed by an scene that made shivers run on his back. In front of him was a giant orb belonging to his classmate Ino Yamanaka, who was finishing her meal. With eyes filled with horror Naruto watched as Ino finished her meal. As Ino directed her hungry gaze to him, Naruto did not think twice and ran like hell. He did not stopped until he managed to enter the academy and sat in the back with the others boys.

After 20 minutes passed he saw Sakura enter, or trying to, as she was sporting a giant squirming belly that was twice her size. After her was Ino with one bigger than Sakura’s touching the floor. Sighing gratefully that they didn't notice him, naruto waited for Iruka to come.
********************

“Team seven is...
15531222211122.title: Ino Yamanaka. Seems she is hungry too!

choices: As Team 7 waits for their sensei...
155312222111221.content:
Iruka entered the classroom before long. After greeting the class, he proceeded to congratulate everyone for passing and spoke a little about this being their first steps into the ninja world. Naruto listened for awhile but quickly tuned out, bored. That was until Iruka concluded his speech and started to announce the team announcements. Naruto gulped. He really hoped that he wasn't paired with some crazy people eating glutton like Sakura or Ino.

"Team seven will be composed of Naruto Uzumaki..." Naruto tensed in his seat, this was it. "...Sakura Haruno and Ino Yamanaka! Your sensei will be Kurenai Yuhi"

Naruto's head hit the table in front of him. He was doomed! He knew it. It was only a matter of time before wither Ino or Sakura ate him. Due to his head being down, the blond didn't notice the two huge girls look at him hungrily for a second before glaring at each other.

No matter what way someone cut it, things weren't looking good for the newly established Team 7.
155312222111221.title: Could it get any worse?

choices: Meanwhile, with the girls in the classroom.
1553122221112211.content:
"Idiot!" "Hussy!" "Slut!" "Forehead!" Naruto felt a sweat-drop behind his head as he looked at his teammates bicker needlessly, the other student been already picked up by their sensei.

He knew that he should stop the behemoths from fighting but he was still scared of them eating him, as full as they looked he was not going to take the risk.

So the girls continued for an hour till a chubby black haired woman with red eyes entered the classroom. Naruto focused his attention on her, subconsciously prepared to bolt if necessary. The girls turned the best they could, their bellies restricting their movement as they tried to see the person that entered.

Kurenai right eye twitched at the appearance of the two gluttonous 'kunoichi's ' in the classroom. 'Why Hokage-sama, Why ?' She thought, mentally sobbing at the idea of teaching the two gluttonous blobs that gazed at her hungrily from their awkward position.

"You three meet me on the roof." She said before disappearing in a small whirlwind of leaves. Naruto did not wait as he bolted to the stairs, leaving the two girls struggling behind him.
1553122221112211.title: As Team 7 waits for their sensei...

choices: The next day, Kurenai decides to just eat one of the girls.
Kurenai goes for broke and tries to eat them both!
Actually, something crazy happens at the test?!
15531222211122111.content:
As she waited on the roof, Kurenai massaged her temples with her hands, trying to ward off a headache before it came. She was doing this in preparation for the absolute Hell she knew was coming.

'I still can't believe this!' She groaned internally. 'Of all teams, I get the two most gluttonous, spoiled and dysfunctional kunoichi the program has seen in some time!...I'll just have to deal with it...some way.'

It was at this moment, Naruto came running up the stairs, fearfully looking behind him for a second before turning back to Kurenai expectantly.

Kurenai nodded to him. "Just take a seat Naruto." As he did so, a thought occurred to her. "Why were you running up here?" Kurenai had a guess but she wanted to hear it from her would-be student's mouth.

Naruto tugged at his collar nervously. "W-Well, sensei, I'm just really excited to be a ninja and want to get started right way! Also...you see..." Naruto trailed off, sullenly.

Kurenai sighed. That confirmed her worst fears. "You're really scared of them, aren't you?"

Naruto nodded rapidly. "Believe it!"

Just then, Sakura and Ino came lumbering up the stairs. They were pressed against each other, trying to knock the other off balance. As the two blob of girls approached, Naruto quickly scooted away, putting some distance between them. Kurenai noted that he didn't get closer to her, like logic might dictate. Instead, Naruto tried to get further away from Sakura and Ino while still giving himself a good amount of space from Kurenai. The red eyed Jonin frowned at that.

'Naruto's afraid of getting eaten.' She noted to herself. 'Then again, considering Sakrua and Ino's appetites and having to be constantly around them, that doesn't surprise me. He's become paranoid and it doesn't help that his teammates keep justifying it.'

"Okay." Kurenai spoke, getting all three Genin's attention. "I'm Kurenai Yuhi. I will be your instructor. As a newly formed team, I'd like for you all to introduce yourselves. Your names, likes, dislikes, dreams..."

Sakura tried to speak up but Ino beat her to it. "I'm Ino Yamanaka. I like flowers, dreamy guys and getting lots of practice with my vore jutsu." She even patted her large belly for emphasis. "I dislike going without a meal and forehead over here. " Ino jerked her thumb at Sakura who glared back. "My dream is to become the best at vore jutsu and marry a hot guy."

Now Sakura got a word in. "My name is Sakura Haruno. I like having a full stomach. I dislike Ino-pig and going hungry. My dream is...well..." She stared at Ino hungrily, who gave returned the look.

Kurenai turned to Naruto, who smiled for declaring. "My name's Naruto Uzumaki. I like ramen and Iruka-sensei. I dislike the 3 three minutes you have wait for ramen. My dream is to become the greatest Hokage!" 'If I don't get eaten first.' He added mentally.

Kurenai took all that in. 'It's just like I thought. Ino and Sakura are just rampaging gluttons. They'll eat each other, Naruto or even me if given half a chance. They're a liability and danger to everyone whose around them! Luckily, Naruto's much like his profile described. He's knucklehead with a ramen obession but he at least has clear goal and apparently learned the Shadow Clone jutsu in a just a few hours. It's amazing how the deadlast is the only ray of hope on this team!"

With everything tied up for now, she told the team to meet her at the training ground in the morning at 8 am. The moment she'd let them go Naruto, had once again, bolted before Sakura or Ino could react, jumping from rooftop to rooftop with almost reckless abandon. As for the two girls, they'd left in opposite direction after giving each other a heated stare.

Alone at last, Kurenai once again thought on the situation. 'Those two are trouble. I can't trust them. At all. I certainly can't teach if I'm watching my back 24/7. Then there's Naruto. If he gets eaten, the Kyuubi could potentially burst free. It's not a certainty but it's not a risk the village or I can take. Not too mention, he's the only one whose got his head on at least somewhat straight. Yet, he's also scared stiff of kunoichi due his experiences. He won't get far. If I can't teach while watching my back, it'll be utterly impossible to watch out for myself and Naruto. At least one of those girls has got to go. Heck, if I'm honest, it would be better if they're both gone and I just have Naruto. No matter what, the team would be benched for a little while before we get issued new recruits. That give me some time with Naruto to iron out his issues and a chance to get a much better team. Besides...I haven't have that good of meal in while. The Genin test be an excellent opportunity to for it.'

Kurenai contemplated on what she should do. No matter what, she had get rid of at least one of the girls, she decided. If questioned why, she could just claim that one of them had planned on eating her and it became self-defense. It wasn't like they hadn't thought about. Kurenai still remembered how they looked at her back in the classroom. However, going for both could be dangerous. She could get pinned down while eating one and end up devoured herself. It wasn't like she could count on Naruto to intercede.

Kurenai decided that she'd make up her mind when she unveiled the test on the 'team' tomorrow.
15531222211122111.title: On the roof

155312222111221111.content: Will Ino get nommed, or will Sakura get slurped up?
155312222111221111.title: Which crazy cannibal blob girl should I eat?

155312222111221113.content:
The next at the training grounds. Kurenai was standing at the appointed spot where she and her team would meet in order to begin there first tests to prove they are capable of being ninja. Looking down at her wrist watch she saw that it five minutes until eight thirty. "They should be here soon, hopefully if all goes well this'll help fix this disaster of a team. Gonna have to remember to thank Kakashi for this idea when we're done." She thinks to herself looking at her bag. About a moment later she heard the sound of someone approaching. Looking over she sees a Naruto making his way over. "Good morning Kurenai-sensei." Naruto says with a yawn. "Good morning Naruto. I hope you're ready for today's test." She says with a smile as he approaches. It was hard for her to believe that out of her entire team, she was genuinely the happiest to see the sole male member. It was then that she noticed that he was still standing a good distance from her, the look on his face suddenly changing to a nervous one. "Looks like he still doesn't trust me yet, not completely anyway." She thinks to her self, realizing that this problem was going to need to be addressed sooner rather than later. "Naruto, there's something I'd talk to you for a minute about." She says getting his attention from whatever thoughts was currently running through his head. "Oh, uh, sure, what's up?" He asks. "You know you don't have to be afraid of me right? It's not like I'm going to eat you or anything." She says hoping to help him calm down, only to realize he seemed to get even more tensed up at what she said. "Sorry, that was a poor choice of words on my part." She says apologizing. "N-No It's okay. I know you're trying to help. In fact you're probably the only female ninja I've felt comfortable around in a long time. It's just everyone else just sort of ignores me or gives me these looks like they don't want me around or worse. And whenever I'm with girls my age It just seems like all they're thinking about is what I might taste like when they eat me. But you don't seem to be like any of the others Kurenai-sensei. You actually treat me like a person instead of a possible meal, and I'm really grateful for that, It's just....." He trails off. "Don't worry Naruto, I understand." She says with an understanding smile. "You've been living your life in a certain way for a long time now, and to be honest that's probably one of the big reasons you've made it this far. But now that you're a ninja you need to learn how to handle being in a team and how to handle being around Kunoichi in general. Which is why I promise you, right here and now. That I will do everything I can to help you so that you won't always have to be worried about being eaten, you have my word." At this Naruto begins to visibly relax. In fact he even begins moving closer to her. "Thanks Kurenai-sensei, that means a lot! And i promise I'll do my best to live up to your expectations!" He says with a large smile. At this point Kurenai couldn't help but smile back, sure he may be a bit of a spazz and have a crippling, if not rational fear of women. But he's still a good kid and his heart is definitely in the right place. She was definitely going to enjoy teaching Naruto to become a ninja, now all that's left is figure out what she was going to do with her OTHER students. "Watch we're you're going Ino-pig!" "What? You're the one who bumped into ME bill-board brow!" And as if on cue, the familiar voices of said students could be heard coming down that pathway. At which point Naruto's instinctive survival reflex kicked in and caused him to quickly dart behind Kurenai in an attempt to hide from his new team mates. "*Sigh* Oh well, he's finally starting to feel comfortable around me at least." She thinks to herself as she pats Naruto on the head to try and calm him down.

Later after getting the two girls to stop arguing and Naruto to calm down the four went over to the center of the field. Kurenai standing in front of her three students and looking them over. "Alright everyone. It's time to begin your first test as real ninja." She says, the look on their faces showing she had their full attention. "Now as you three know, In order to be a successful ninja, you must be skilled in several techniques including Ninjutsu, Taijutsu, and Genjutsu. But that's not all, you all must also be able to complete missions and work as a team, from simple tasks such as supply gathering to delivering messages, to the important tasks of being body guards to political targets or even assassination." At this point a look comes over the girls faces as they begin to imagine said assassination missions, or rather the fact that they would get to eat said assassination targets and digest them and be rewarded for it. It was every young girls dream to be able to do make a living off of this. "Now then, In order to figure out just how well you're all able to succeed in these missions. I'm going to be administering one final test before we begin taking on real missions." She says as she reaches into her bag and pulls out two bells. "Your objectives Is to retrieve these bells from me. You may do so however you wish, If you manage to take the bell from me, then you will have passed the test and will be considered fully fledged ninja." She explains. At this point, Sakura interrupts. "But Kurenai-sensei, you only have two bells there. How are we all supposed to get one if you don't have enough?" She asks. "Ah, I'm glad you noticed Sakura, yes, there are indeed only two bells here. Meaning that no matter what, one of you Is going to fail this test. And to the one who fails, they will be sent back to the academy." She says to their shock. "What?!? But Kurenai-Sensei, we've already passed the exam and became ninja! You can't just-" Ino starts, only to for Kurenai to stop her. "Actually, I CAN. The school may say you have the ability to become ninja, but I'm the one who gets to decide whether or not you're ready to actually be a ninja. In this world you need to be ready to make certain choices, make the necessary sacrifices in order to complete the mission! Meaning that If you all can't put aside your petty differences and work together, you're not ready to be a ninja." She finishes, at which point the three of them all look at each other. "And don't even THINK about eating one of your team mates just to get a bell because if you do you will automatically FAIL and be sent back to the academy." Kurenai adds seeing the look on Sakura and Ino's faces. At which point the two audibly groan, while at the same time Naruto Sighs in relief. Glad he didn't have to worry about getting eaten just so that they could pass. "Now then, the test will begin at nine O'clock and will end at noon. Meaning you will have three hours to get one of these bells. If none of you manage to do so at this point, you will all fail and-" At this point Sakura jumps at Kurenai and tackles her to the ground. Punching her until she was knocked out and proceeds to takes one of the bells from her. "Tch, well THAT was easy." She says with a grin. "You two have fun deciding who gets the last bell. I'll be getting something to eat if anyone needs me." She says as she beings walking away. Thinking about what she's going to have when a hand touched her shoulder. "Oh really? And here I thought you actually wanted to be a ninja." Comes a familiar voice as Sakura turns around in shock to see none other than Kurenai standing there. "What?!? But I thought-" She starts looking over to where she had left her unconscious, only to see a large wooden log laying in her place. Looking down she sees that the bell she had grabbed was in fact nothing more than a leaf. Realizing she had fallen for such a simple trick she turned back to Kurenai ready to try again. Only to re-think her decision when she saw the look on her face. "May I remind you that I'm not just an ordinary Ninja, I am a Jonin, a high ranking officer that has had YEARS of experience. And it's going to take a lot more then a simple surprise attack to take me down. Speaking of which, I said the mission begins at nine O'clock. So i suggest you take this time to work on a better plan." She says as she points back toward Naruto and Ino. To which Sakura mumbles under her breath as she walks back to the others. "Now then, I want you all to take this time to prepare and make sure you know what you're going to do. Dismissed." She says as she walks over to a near by tree and leans back against it. At which point the three genin all look towards each other once again before running off in different directions. "*Sigh* I suppose that went about as well as expected." She says to herself as she begins to think this plan may have been a mistake. "Now all I have to do is just fend off those two idiots for the next three hours while at the same time try and find a good chance to slip Naruto a bell in a way that won't make it look like I'm just handing it to him...."

"Man, what's with this?" Naruto says to himself. Hiding in the bushes near by and looking over at Kurenai. "One minute she's saying she'll help me get over my fear of women and become a great ninja, next minute she's saying that If i don't get a bell off of her I'll be sent back to the academy! I really don't get girls." He says to himself while trying to figure out what he was going to do. True she made sure that Sakura and Ino wouldn't just try to eat him to pass the test, and she definitely doesn't seem like she's trying to eat him. But how in the world is he supposed to get close enough to her to be able to take a bell off of her without freaking out? Let alone while having to deal with her defending herself. "Hey Naruto!" Came a familiar voice from behind him, causing him to jump before turning back to see none other than.....
155312222111221113.title: The Bell Test.

1553122221112211132.content: "I-Ino? W-What are you-?!?" He asks trying not to run out from his hiding spot at the sight of the large girl moving closer towards him. Worried that she may be ignoring Kurenai-sensei warning and came to eat him for the heck of it. Only for that fear to be quickly quieted by what she had to say. "Relax, I'm not here to eat you or anything like that, but we need to talk." She says moving up next to him so that she could see Kurenai as well. "Um, okay, what about?" He asks having to ignore the feeling of her soft body pressing up against his in the small space they had. "What do you think? We need to get those bells off of Kurenai-sensei so that we can become ninja!" She says in a "No-duh!" kind of way. "Oh, wait-we?" He asks surprised by this. The way she had phrased that made it seem like she was asking for his help. "Yes, we." She continues. "*Sigh* Look, I know you and I have never really gotten along for, obvious reasons." She says as her stomach lets out a low growl. Naruto resisting the urge to run the moment he heard said sound and continue to listen. "But as of now we're at a cross roads. As much as I may hate to admit this, there's no way any of us will be able to get one of those bells off of Kurenai-sensei by our selves. Which means our only options are to either fail and go back to the academy for another year. Or work together and try and get those bells. And I'd rather go back to the academy for the rest of my life than work with Sakura!" She says this last part with a look of annoyance. "And from what I've seen you like Sakura just about as much as i do. So right now the obvious choice would be for us to put our pasts behind us and work together to get those bells. That way Sakura ends up failing and goes back to the academy, and you and i get to go on to be ninja's. It's a win-win! So what do you say?" She asks holding her hand out to him. Naruto had to stop and think about this for a moment. Ino brought up a lot of good points.There was no way in hell he'd be able to get one of those bells off of Kurenai-Sensei by himself. And If he fails and ends up going back to the academy, there's no telling when he'd get another chance, and that's assuming he doesn't end up getting eaten before then. So the only logical choice was to work together, and while he has had close calls with both girls before. With Ino it was never really personal, it was usually just being in the wrong place at the wrong time. She didn't seem to be openly targeting him most of the time like Sakura, who has openly admitted on several occasions that she'd eat him the first chance she got. This seemed like the only logical path to him, so after pushing all of his thoughts telling him to get away from her out of his mind. He slowly reached out and took Ino's hand and shook it. "Deal, so any idea's on how we're gonna get those bells?" He asks turning his attention back to Kurenai. At this Ino smiles. "As a matter of fact, I do, and it's a rather brilliant one if i do say so myself!" She says in a matter of fact tone. "Now listen up, my family is famous for its use of the mind transfer jutsu. A technique that allows us to take over the mind and body of the user. With it, all I have to do is use it to take over Kurenai-sensei's mind and get the bells from her." She starts. "Wow, really? Then why haven't you just done that already?" Naruto asks surprised by this fact. "It's not that simple." Ino continues. "I need to be within a certain range in order to use the jutsu, not to mention it requires having the target in my line of sight, and using it tends to leave me open to attacks from the enemy. So even if I did try and use it, Kurenai-sensei would just dodge it and take me out before i could do anything. That's where you come in." She says with a grin, "Oh no." He says already not liking where this was going. "I need you to draw Kurenai-sensei towards me and keep her distracted so that I can use the mind transfer jutsu on her. Then I'll be able to just hand you the bells and you can bring one back to me." She finishes. "And how exactly do you expect me to do that?!? If you can't get close enough to beat her then what makes you think I have any more of a chance?!?" He asks. "I told you you didn't have to beat her, I just said you just need to keep her distracted and in place long enough for me to use my jutsu on her. I heard you were able to use the shadow clone jutsu right? So just use that to get her into position and keep her there long enough for me to do my thing and that'll be it. Unless you have a better idea?" She asks looking at him with a raised eye brow. "Ugh, fine." Naruto said as he accepted that this was really the only plan that stood any chance of working. "Just be ready with your mind-whatever when it's time." He says getting ready to jump out of the bushes, only to be stopped by Ino who grabbed him by the collar and pulled him back. "What are you NUTS?!?" She hissed. "If you come out from here Kurenai-sensei will know where I'm at and will be able to see what we're up too! Go find somewhere else to jump out from!" She finishes. "Oh, uh, right." Naruto says sheepishly as he crawls away from Ino. "Ugh, Idiot. This better work." She says to herself as she waits for the plan to begin.
1553122221112211132.title: An unlikely alliance?

choices: Ino takes over Kurenai and calls Naruto to come get the bells. Where's Sakura?
Just as Ino is about to complete the jutsu, Sakura attacks ruining the plan!
Kurenai senses the attack and substitutes out. However, she is impressed...
15531222211122111321.content:
To Ino's surprise, and dare she say delight, Naruto was actually doing a decent job! After he crawled away from her, Naruto had not only started moving around Kurenai's position, circling her, but he actually discretely been making a leaving groups of Shadow Clones. As Naruto changed position, the clones would emerge from the brush and begin their assault/distraction.

'If I throw enough clones at Kurenai-sensei, I think I can force her closer to where Ino is,' Naruto thought as he made another batch of clones. 'Also, if I stay hidden like this, there's less of a chance one of those crazy girls will eat me!'

Ino, for her part, actually grinned. 'Well, well, well...I guess Naruto is more useful then just being a meal! Now I just gotta be patient and wait for Kurenai-sensei...'

Now on Kurenai's side of things...she actually found the multi-pronged attack to be a bit troublesome. Her larger frame made dodging and dealing with the clones more arduous then it really should have been for a ninja of her caliber. Not to say that Kurenai wasn't good enough to fend them off but close quarters combat wasn't her true forte. As a genjutsu specialist, she was usually good enough to keep such attacks at bay by making her enemies see manner of things, allowing her to get the drop on them. But with some many clones coming at her, she really didn't have the time for such an approach. Worse yet, she wasn't even sure that the real Naruto was among them and didn't wish to waste time or energy to what was essentially canon fodder.

'Note to self: must work out a little more. I need to take up sumo or something,' Kurenai thought as she dodged a clone's attack and kicked out, dispelling it. She immediately jumped back to avoid another two clones's attempts to punch her.

That last jump however put her in distance of Ino.

'Got you!' Ino mentally cheered. 'Mind Transfer Jutsu!'
15531222211122111321.title: The plan works!

choices: She was caught in one of Kurenai's genjutsu's...
She was hiding in the trees waiting to strike!!!
155312222111221113211.content:
'Got you!' Ino mentally cheered. 'Mind Transfer Jutsu!' She says as she begins to project her mind towards Kurenai. At the same time Kurenai felt a sudden rise in chakra from near by. "Is that Ino? What Is she-*gasp!*" She thinks to herself before she felt the presence of another person entering her mind. At that moment, Kurenai's body locks up, before going limp as her arms fall to her sides and her head falls forward, making it appear as though she passed out standing up. Seeing this causes the shadow clones to stop their assault on their teacher as they wait to see what happens next. "Did..... Did it work?" One of the clones ask, watching curiously and carefully, hoping beyond hope that the plan had actually worked.
After a few moments of silence, Kurenai finally began to stir from her trance. Her head slowly rising up, taking a moment to look down at her body before turning back to look at the shadow clones silently for a moment before a large grin spread across her face. "Alright! We did it! The plan worked perfectly! Just like I knew it would!" Kurenai finally spoke as she placed one hand on her hip, the other one rising into the air and delivering a V sign, and while what she said was with her usual voice, the way she spoke and her mannerisms seemed different now, like they belonged to someone younger and more wild than her. At this, the clones of Naruto all let out a collective sigh of relief. "Oh thank goodness..." One of them says before they all begin to disappear one by one.
Soon leaving only the real Naruto making his way out from the bushes on the other side of the field. "Great job with the timing there Ino, for a second there I was worried we might have messed up and had to try again." He says walking over to his now possessed teacher. "You weren't so bad yourself there Naruto! With my brains and your brawn, we might actually make a pretty good team!" She says with a smile. "Now then," She says reaching down to her waist, pulling off the two bells. "Here you go, with this our paths to becoming ninja are secured!" She says as she hands them to him. "Alright!...... So what happens now?" He asks looking at Kurenai and then back to where Ino was hiding.
"Now I'm going to undo the jutsu and return to my body. You're gonna wanna hurry and bring that bell over to me, because It'll only be a few seconds before Kurenai-Sensei wakes up and realizes what happened." She briefly explaining how the mind transfer jutsu worked. "Now hurry up and get over here, I wanna be holding my bell before she fully wakes up." She says getting ready to perform the hand signs to release the jutsu. "Um, hold on a second..." Naruto says stopping her. "Ugh, what is it now Naruto?" She asks growing annoyed with him again. "Well it's just that something doesn't seem right, this went way to smoothly, I mean, whatever happened to Sakura? You'd think she'd have tried to get one of the bells by now." He says now worried. "Oh great, you just had to go and remind me of her now didn't you?" She says putting her hand to her forehead and rub it in annoyance. But he was right, this was odd, It wasn't like her to just give up without even trying. Yet here they were already nearly finished without even a single sign of her anywhere, something was definitely wrong. Where could she be?......
155312222111221113211.title: All According To Plan...

choices: Sakura is able to start eating Ino! Does she succeed?
Just as Sakura gets ready, Ino releases the jutsu! Fight!
Actually, Ino thought this might happened and set traps around her body!
Sakura encounters...Kurenai?! Whose looking rather hungry...
1553122221112211132112.content:
Sakura Haruno was many things but prime among them, she was an opportunist. When she saw an opening, she took it and such a mindset was how she got to her current size. With that said, it was no surprise that she had avoided all the confrontation to simply watch how things played out. She was going to get a meal out of this, she just didn't know who or how.

Kurenai was more than likely out of the question. Sakura honestly doubted she could get the drop on a Jonin.

Naruto? Maybe...he was an idiot (at least, in Sakura's opinion) but he had also become in expert in dodging her over the years. While that alone would be all kinds of cathartic for her, he wouldn't be the most filling meal and, thus, not worth the effort for now.

Ino...oh, how Sakura longed to devour her rival. To finally prove her superiority and get the biggest morsel in the village. The very thought made drool! So you could imagine her delight once she overheard Naruto and Ino planning. She stumbled upon them by accident as she took off into the forest and hidden in a spot that was not too far from them.

It was so perfect. Once Ino did her little jutsu, her body would be easy pickings and even if she didn't actually get a chance to use the technique, she'd be so distracted focusing on Kurenai that it wouldn't matter. So, she waited and watched as Naruto and Ino actually maneuvered Kurenai into their trap. After they succeeded, Sakura started to move.

As she made her way towards where Ino's body lay, Sakura started to open her jaw, ready to ponce once she was close enough...
1553122221112211132112.title: She was hiding in the trees waiting to strike!!!

choices: Ino already halfway into Sakura's mouth, struggling to keep from being eaten.
Sakura sitting by herself, holding her stomach as someone struggled from within.
15531222211122111321121.content:
"Well Ino, It's been fun, but I think we both knew deep down that this was going to end with one of us eating the other." She says as she removes Ino's shoes. "And there's no way I'd be able to let a chance like this pass me by. So It looks like this is goodbye, but if it makes you feel any better, I just know you're going to be the best meal I've had in a long time, itadakimasu!" She says with a chuckle as she places Ino's feet into her mouth and gets to work. She knew she was going to have to move quickly here. There was no telling how long It would be before Ino's consciousness returned to her body and realize what was happening, and even with Sakura's level of skill when It came to eating others it was going to take a while before she could eat Ino's large frame. So as much as she may have wanted to enjoy this moment for as long as possible, she knew that time was not on her side and that she'd need to do this quickly as she took her first big swallow...

Meanwhile back with Naruto and Ino, both had looked around for any signs of Sakura in the area, but found absolutely no trace of her. "Damn it, where the hell did that billboard brow run off too? There's just no sign of her anywhere." Ino said as she scanned the area using Kurenai's body. Having no idea what was happening with her real body. "Yeah no kidding," Naruto added looking around from the tree tops. Still worried Sakura may pop out from behind him in an attempt to get a quick meal. "This is just too weird. Sakura was never too big on the whole "stealth" thing. Whenever she wants something she would normally just go straight for it and not let anything get in her way. Why would she not try to get a bell when she knows it's the only thing standing between her and being a ninja?" He asks knowing enough about Sakura to know that she was dead set determined to become a ninja since it meant that she'd be allowed to eat people at a much more frequent rate than she already has been. "It's more than just that." Ino added as she kept looking. "It's not just that she goes straight for whatever she wants. She does it in the way that would benefit her the most, especially if it meant getting a free.... meal......" She says stopping as a thought occurred to her. ".....Oh no...." She says as it finally hit her. Naruto noticing this turns to look at her from his view point. "What? What's wrong?" He asks now confused. "I need to get back to my body now!" She says preparing to undo her mind transfer jutsu. "Huh? Why? What's going on?" Naruto asks not realizing what Ino already has. "God how could I be so stupid! Sakura is an opportunist at heart! She'll do whatever she can to get to her goal while taking out as many birds with a single stone as possible! Meaning she probably realized she doesn't have to get a bell if she takes one of us out before we get one ourselves!" She thinks to herself, hoping she was wrong as she performed the hand signs to undo the jutsu. "RELEASE!" She says. Kurenai's eyes going blank for a moment as Ino's mind leaves her body. "What...?" She asks putting her hand to her head. Confused as to what was happening. A moment later a loud scream could be heard coming from the bushes where Ino's body was hidden. "What the? Ino!?!" Naruto yelled as he quickly jumped from the tree he was in and dove into the bushes. "Ino, what's wrong? What's-?!?!?" He says before stopping in shock and slight horror at the sight in front of him....
15531222211122111321121.title: SakuraVs.Ino

choices: Naruto and his clones are able to dislodge Sakura from Ino.
Despite his beat efforts, Naruto can't get Ino free but Sakura can't eat her.
Sakura slows starts to swallow Ino down in spite of Naruto's help!
Sakura falls asleep. An angry Kurenai has come and hit her with genjutsu.
155312222111221113211211.content:
Sakura had already consumed Ino's upper torso with the girls lower body wiggling frantically in panic when Naruto had burst his way into the bushes. Such a sight was something Naruto had seen many, many times. It was a fate that he'd done everything to avoid and if someone else got caught, he'd always looked at it as better them than him as he ran for the hills.

So, it would have been simple to do so again. It was Ino's fault...right? She left her body open, despite knowing what Sakura was like. Besides, Ino wasn't exactly innocent. She'd eaten numerous people and tried to get him more than a few times. And yet...

Ino was only in this position because she decided to help him and team up, which he had agreed to. She had put herself on the line so that they could actually pass...like a team. She'd put the team and the mission ahead of trying to get a free meal. So, if a bottomless pit of a predator like Ino could put aside her personal wants, shouldn't he be able to? He wanted to be Hokage! Wouldn't a Hokage conqueror their fears and face whatever they had? Wouldn't a Hokage risk their life to save a comrade?

"Hang on Ino!" Naruto bellowed as he went into a full sprint. "Shadow Clone Jutsu!" Multiple copies of Naruto joined him as they charged towards the pair.

For her part, Ino could hear Naruto's words, even if they were muffled and to say that they girl was relieved was an understatement. Once Sakura had clamped her jaws around her head, Ino had given up. In that moment, the Yamanaka had known true terror and despair. This was karma, for all the innocent people she had eaten. This was what they had all gone through as she dragged them down into her gullet. Panic had flooded her mind as she tried desperately to free herself. But then she heard Naruto. He was coming to help her! He'd get her out! If Ino wasn't crying before she was now.

"P-Please! Help m-me!" She wailed.

Her fellow blonde needed no more incentive. Naruto and some of his clones rushed to Ino's side and grabbed what they could of her bulk. The rest went behind Sakura and did the same. Both teams of Narutos pulled as if they were in tug of war.

Sakura glared over her meal. She finally had gotten Ino and now Naruto decided he had a spine and was going to deprive of her meal.

'Like hell!' Sakura mentally screamed, clamping down harder on Ino.
155312222111221113211211.title: Naruto to the rescue!

choices: Kurenai FINALLY shows up! Angry and hungry for Sakura...
Ino and Naruto recover first and move to deal with Sakura
Sakura recovers fist but is a lot more wary. What does she do?
Both sides recover at the same time and have a stand off...
1553122221112211132112111.content:
Naruto pulled. He pulled harder than he had ever in his life. He pulled as though it was his life on the line. His clones followed suit, each one just as determined as the original. Ino was not going to be Sakura's lunch.

They all dug their heels into the ground, not relenting, even as their muscles burned and their faces reddened with effort.

Sakura could have breathed fire at that very moment. She could feel it. Slowly but surely, she was losing her grip on Ino. This had never happened before and Sakura could safely say that she didn't like it. The feeling of prey, of food, being dragged back up her gullet was the worst sensation she'd ever had to experience, right up there with an empty stomach. The fact that this was being forced upon her by Naruto, of all people, just made it doubly worse!

But Naruto didn't care for Sakura's growing anger and frustration. No, all his focus, all his care was on the drive to see his newest teammate free. In Naruto's mind, he saw every person who he ever seen eaten. Every person that maybe he could have helped, every person he'd left to be food to some overly gluttonous pig of a human being. But not this time. This time he refused to be some kind of coward. He would become Hokage and this was the first step.

"BELIEVE IT!!" Naruto roared as his clone brigade all gave one mighty pull from their respective sides.

Ino came hurdling out of Sakura with all the speed of a wrecking ball right into the mass of clones that had been pulling on her. At the same time she crashed into Naruto, taking him with her to land on the ground with a loud thud. Sakura mirrored Ino own movement but landing in the opposite direction, putting tens of feet between the blondes and their ravenous foe.
1553122221112211132112111.title: Naruto and his clones are able to dislodge Saku...

choices: Stick with Kurenai and her devouring Sakura.
While Kurenai handles Sakura, how is Naruto handling a distraught Ino?
15531222211122111321121111.content:
"...Now, what do you think you are doing?" an angry voice called out from behind Sakura.

The pinkette, sprawled out on the ground, quickly looked up to meet Kurenai's fierce gaze. The Jonin's red eyes bored into Sakura's with frightening intensity.

"Did you think that I would tolerate you eating one of your teammates?" Kurenai's voice was as sharp and cold as an icicle. "That I, no, the village would accept that one their new genin passed only to be eaten by her gluttonous, lazy, cowardly teammate who did absolutely nothing to contribute towards the test's goal?!" By the time she was finished, her voice had descended into a venomous hiss.

"I-I-I..." Sakura was having trouble even formulating a thought. Kurenai's killing intent was suffocating her. Sakura had never been on the receiving end of such treatment. She was used to being a big fish in a small pond, the predator to almost everyone else's prey. She was used to being the one doing the intimidating and to now be one subject to it? She just couldn't process it.

Kurenai wasn't done, however. "You show no camaraderie. You show no care for the others around you. You show no sense of duty towards your duty as ninja of this village. The only thing you care about is filling you own damn stomach and nothing else! I could understand eating your enemies but to you, there's no line that can't be crossed! Being a ninja is just an excuse for you to serve yourself!

This exercise was all about teamwork. It was about seeing if you could put your differences aside and work together for the greater good and against a superior foe. To say you failed is an understatement and you are a disgrace to ninja everywhere! You, Sakura Haruno, are not a Genin. You are not a ninja. You. Are. A. Liability! That will not stand!"

Before Sakura could do anything else, Kurenai was upon her, mouth opened wide and engulfing her. She never even got to let out a scream...
15531222211122111321121111.title: Kurenai FINALLY shows up! Angry and hungry for ...

choices: Watch what happens the next few days with Naruto and Ino...
Fast forward to the day when the team receives their new team member...
155312222111221113211211112.content:
We cut back to Ino as she slowly sat back up rubbing the side of her head as she came to, the shock from the situation knocking her out temporarily. After what felt like hours alone in the dark pit that was Sakura's innards. Slowly moving forward on her one way trip towards her end. She looked around and realized she was not confined in a small, tight, and dark space filling with digestive juices, but was in fact still outside! Looking over just in time to see Kurenai Sensei finishing her speech to Sakura before pouncing on her and proceeding to stuff her head into her mouth. Now under normal circumstances Ino would have felt either pride knowing that this was how Sakura was going to meet her end, or possibly even a bit disappointed that it wasn't her being the one to finish off her long time rival. But at this point her thoughts were only focused on now glad she was that she wasn't inside of her before she received her punishment. And to think that this wouldn't even have been possible If It weren't for Naruto jumping in to save her.

"Huh?" She says as it finally hits her. Where was Naruto? She looked around but saw no signs of him. "Naruto? N-Naruto???" She asks now worried, scared that she may have been out of it for longer than she had realized and that Sakura had used that time to eat Naruto before Kurenai could get there. This thought caused her to begin to panic again. Not had she just barely avoided a fate worse than death to any predator, but now she'd have to live with the idea that the person who saved her life ended up getting eaten for just trying to rescue her! As she slowly started break down, she soon heard an all too familiar voice coming from underneath her! "I-Ino......C-can't........breath!!!......." She heard the voice gasp. Quickly standing up and turning to look behind her she sees none other than Naruto laying in the spot where Ino had just been sitting. "Oh, whoops...." She thinks to herself blushing as she realized what must have happened. The force from Naruto pulling her out caused them both to go tumbling to the ground, causing him to land first and ultimately with her landing on top of him before passing out.

"Naruto! Oh thank goodness you didn't get eaten! I'm so sorry about that, are you okay?!?" She asks checking on him as she helps him sit up. "*Gasp!* Y-yeah, I'll be fine, although I have to admit I definitely didn't imagine THAT being the way I'd go out. But you know what they say, "No good deed goes without nearly being suffocated!" He says not realizing how badly he had just botched that term. But the fact remained that he seemed alright, at this point Ino had seemed to reach her limit as tears could be seen streaming from her eyes as she sat down and began to cry. Naruto noticed this and became concerned, worried he may have said something the wrong way. "H-hey Ino, why are you crying? Come on, there's no need to do that. See? Everything's okay noooooooo-OH GOD!!!" He yells as Ino suddenly puts herself back on top of him. Grabbing him by the arms with her own. "W-Wait,wait! I'm sorry! I take it back! PLEASE DON'T EAT ME I REALLY DON'T TASTE THAT GOOD AND-huh?" He says realizing that Ino wasn't trying to eat him, but in fact was holding him in a hug as she leaned into his chest and began to cry even more. "Thank you! Thank you so much!!! I was so scared back there, when I realized my head was already moving down her throat I thought I was done for! If it wasn't for you I would have been as good as dead! I can't ever thank you enough for saving me! I promise I'll never try to eat you ever again!!!" She says practically sobbing at this point. To say this caught Naruto by complete surprise was an understatement. This was the first time he had ever seen Ino like this, so defenseless and vulnerable. Which honestly shouldn't be that much of a surprise considering what had just happened to her. But still, for her of all people to break down. After being known as one of the two top predators of the academy for so long to loose her cool. It really showed just how deep down they were a like, how we're all afraid of being eaten by someone bigger and stronger than them. And that in the end they were all just trying to find a way to live their lives in this world.

"Hey, don't worry about It." He says pulling her in to hug her. "We're team mates remember? We're supposed to look out for and help each other in these kinds of situations. That's what being in a team is all about..........Oh, that's right!" He says remembering something as he reached into his back pocket. Pulling it back out it was revealed that he was holding one of the bells needed to pass the test. "With everything going to crap like it did back there I almost forgot about these." He says reaching over to take Ino's hand. Putting the bell into it before closing it so that it wouldn't fall out. "There you go! One bell, just as promised! With this, our paths to becoming ninja are secured!!!" He says with his usual big, dopey grin. Ino looked down at the bell now sitting in her hand, then back up to Naruto as he smiled, In response to this Ino's face turned a bright pink as she blushed heavily. This boy went out of his way to save her and help her fulfill her dreams all in a single day, and all she had ever done for him in return was try to eat him. The one weird kid in class who only ever talked about becoming the Hokage while at the same time running away screaming from any girl who even made eye contact with him. But now all of a sudden he was acting like an entirely different person, sure he still won't shut up about trying to become Hokage, but now he was actually showing the confidence to back up those words. There was just something about him now that actually made her believe in those words he kept saying. "You really are one weird kid, you know that right?......" She finally says which completely stunned Naruto. "What? Hey come on! I was just trying to help!" He says not getting why she was acting like that. "Yeah I know, come here you little idiot." Was all she could says as she pulled him in close to kiss him on the cheek before pulling him in for a hug.

Now It was Naruto's turn to go bright red, both from the kiss, and the action of suddenly being pressed up against a girls body. Under normal circumstances Naruto would have been absolutely terrified of the idea of being this close to a girl, much letting her do all of this. But now? For some odd reason he was surprisingly okay with it. He had no idea why, but maybe just this once he wouldn't question it and just let this happy little moment stay happy. This moment lasted for a few minutes until It was promptly ended by someone speaking. "Awww, isn't that cute?" Came the voice of Kurenai, who had finally finished eating Sakura and was able to turn her attention to those two. Sure she put up a good fight for a while there. But in the end she was just a kid who wasn't even a fully fledged ninja fighting against a jonin. There was no way she was going to get out of this one. Of course that didn't stop her from putting up one hell of a fight inside of her now massive stomach. After hearing her words, both Naruto and Ino separated and stood straight up at attention. "K-Kurenai Sensei! Th-Thank you for your help in all of this as well! If it weren't for you showing up when you did Sakura probably would have just gotten up and tried to eat us both again!" She says with a bow. Blushing heavily as a result of being caught in that embarrassing moment. "Uh-yeah! What she said!" Naruto said with a nod as he thanked his teacher as well. At this Kurenai chuckled.

"Think nothing of it. Odds are this was going to happen eventually given her rather chaotic tendencies. Let's just all be glad we were able to catch her and put a stop to her now before she could have caused any serious harm." She says patting her gut in an area that was bulging out, her own subtle way of telling Sakura to give it a rest. "At any rate, I want to congratulate you both on a job well done, not only were you able to put aside your differences and work together, but you were even able to come up with a plan that worked and allowed you to complete your mission! Suffice to say you've both passed the test with flying colors and are both ready to become ninja as far as I'm concerned!" She says with a smile as she watches their faces light up at hearing this. "YES!!! You hear that Ino? We did it! We really managed to pull it off!!!" He says jumping up and down in happiness. "Hm, of course we did!" She says in a manner of fact tone, her composure now completely restored to how it once was. "Like I said before, with my brains and your brawn. The two of us make a surprisingly effective team!" She says in a round about way of thanking him for his help, now to shy to say what she meant directly. At this Kurenai couldn't help but chuckle, "Yes, well unfortunately we won't be able to do any official Ninja work at this point." She says getting her attention. "As of now we are officially short a member and unable to perform to the full extent expected of a team. Not to mention that It's going to take me a few days to deal with our little drop out." She says, even though she knew of a jutsu that would accelerate the digestion proccess for situations like these, she wanted to let this one take it's course so that she could fully enjoy the fruits of her meal. "So as of right now our team is going to be on a temporary leave of absence until a new member can be found to fill our missing spot. In the mean time I want you both to take this time and prepare yourselves for your first official mission whenever it may be." She says giving them their orders. "Yes, Kurenai Sensei!" They both respond. Knowing it would be unwise to disobey their teacher after seeing what she can do. "Alright then, you're both dismissed, enjoy the rest of your day!" She says before disappearing in a puff of smoke......
155312222111221113211211112.title: Naruto and Ino's recovery

1553122221112211132112111121.content:
The next few days went by surprisingly fast for Naruto. At first they started off like any other day for him, waking up first thing in the morning, making himself some ramen to have for breakfast, the same old routine that he normally had on his day's off. However that quickly changed as he had finished dressing himself in his usual orange clothes he heard a knock at the door. Wondering who It could be since he had already received his monthly allowance from the third Hokage's office and he hadn't remembered ordering anything. He opened the door and surprised to see none other than Ino standing there looking rather awkward. "Uh, hi there Naruto...." She says waving to him once he opened the door. A light shade of pink spread across her cheeks as she says this. "Ino? What's up?" He asks now worried, they weren't supposed to be meeting up for a few days since they had to wait for a new member to be assigned to the team. Was It possible that she had decided to go back to her old ways and eat him now that her rival was no longer in the picture to get in her way. After everything that had happened yesterday he thought things would probably be different now, especially since she promised that she'd never try to eat him. But still there was that voice in the back of his mind telling him to panic and jump out the window ASAP! It was this voice that usually helped Naruto avoid getting into trouble with girls up until now so he was always inclined to listen to it whenever he heard it. But this fear was quickly put to rest as Ino continued. "Oh, well.........you know............ I just happened to be in the neighborhood, and I remembered that you lived here so I thought I'd stop by to say "Hello!" and..............." She says rambling for a short while before realizing Naruto was giving her a look like she was acting weird and that he was going to run soon out of fear if she didn't get to the point. "*sigh* Alright! Alright, I just.......... I just wanted to stop by and say thanks." She finally admitting what she came here for. "I know I already said it back at the field yesterday....But It honestly just feels like It wasn't enough. So I wanted to come over and say it again and maybe...... maybe ask you if you wanted to spend the day together?" She asks as her face turns bright red as she admits the last part.

Suffice to say, this caught Naruto completely by surprise. To the point of him not actually being sure he heard her right the first time! "What?!? Y-you mean, like-like a da-" "WHAT? NO YOU IDIOT!!!!!" She yells turning a bright shade of crimson, quickly cutting him off before he could finish his question. "What I MEAN is that now that we're team mates, we need to learn how to work together and how to get along. Sure we may have been able to defeat Kurenai-Sensei yesterday, but that was only because she was holding back on us at the time! If she were actually taking that test seriously like a real mission, she wouldn't have hesitated to put us all in one of her genjutsu traps and eat us all! We need to start learning about each others strengths and weaknesses so that we can learn to work together as a team more effectively!" She explains. Naruto stood there listening while occasionally nodding every now and then. "Oh, yeah I get it! When you put it that way It makes perfect sense!" He says once she had finished her explanation. "Good! Glad we're on the same page then!" She says, mentally relieved that he believed her reasoning. While what she said was true and she really DID want to get to know him better so that they could function as a team more effectively, that wasn't the ONLY reason she wanted to spend time with Naruto. Not that she'd ever admit that to anyone else, and if they did figure that out she'd certainly make sure they wouldn't live long enough to tell anyone else about it, ESPECIALLY Naruto. "So what do you say? You coming or not?" She asks trying to quickly move on before he put any more thought into the conversation. "Oh, uh yeah sure! Just let me take care of a few things here and I'll be right out!" He says agreeing. "Alright then. In that case you better get moving or else I'm leaving you behind." She says with a serious look, while on the inside she was cheering and screaming happily that he agreed to come along.

And so it went, for the next few days Naruto and Ino would meet up early in the morning and spend most of the day together. Whether that be working at Ino's parents flower shop where Ino would tell Naruto about herself, stopping for lunch at Ichiraku's Ramen Shop for lunch where Naruto would tell Ino about himself. While at the same time having to deal with the shop owner smiling and calling them a cute couple. At which both got embarrassed and explained that they were just team mates, although It didn't necessarily bother Ino that he had said that as much as she thought it would. and even just walking around and enjoying there time together. There was even a point when they were going to the movies, where right before they were able to buy the tickets and get their snacks Naruto ended up being harassed by a few of the patrons who happened to "dislike" him. This of course was nothing new to Naruto, he was used to dealing with the occasional situations where people would try and force him to leave before he caused any trouble. Only this time the situation didn't last very long as Ino soon stepped in. "HEY! Just what the hell do you assholes think you're doing?!? That's my friend you're messing with!" She asks getting up in their faces. Not even realizing she used the word "friend" instead of "team mate" which she had been making a constant effort to use up until this point. "We have just as much of a right to be here as anyone else! So If you don't like it, then to bad! You can either leave us alone or get the hell out of here if it's such a problem for you! Or if not, I'm sure we could work something else out, I am going to need something to eat before the movie starts!" She says as her stomach lets out a low growl which drives the point home as the people quickly took off out of fear of being eaten. Ino then smiles as she watches the two run off, her work now done, she turns back to Naruto.

"Alright, now that that's been taken care of, lets go get our snacks before the movie starts." She says as Naruto stares at her in disbelief. "Oh, um, right." He says as he follows after her. "Hey uh, you know you didn't have to do that back there right? I'm actually pretty used to that kind of treatment, they'll just go away if you ignore them for long enough." He says surprised she stuck up for him like that. "What? and just let them think it's okay to push you around like that? No way! You've gotta stand up for yourself more Naruto! Like what you did back with Sakura, otherwise people will never get it through their heads that they can't just do this kind of stuff to you!" She explains. "Besides, standing up and defending your friends is never wrong in my book!" She says proudly as she realizing she had used the word friends again, only at this point she decided that it was fine at this point since that's what they were now. This affected Naruto in a profound way, he could only stand there watching her as she ordered her food. "Friends......" He says to himself as the reality of the situation sank in. "Hey Ino," He says getting her attention. "Thanks, for everything." He says with a smile. "Hm, like I said, that's what friends are for!" She says as she hides the fact that she was turning bright pink from the comment. "Anyway, lets get in there before the movie starts!" She says grabbing Naruto's hand and pulling him into the theater. Things continued like this for the next few days until they were called by Kurenai, who told them both to meet her at the Hokage's office where they would meet up with their new team mate before being assigned to their first mission.

The next day in one of the meeting offices, both Naruto and Ino were sitting in chairs waiting for Kurenai to show up with the new team member so they could get their mission. "Maaan, what's taking Kurenai-Sensei so long?" Naruto asks having already gotten bored and tired of waiting. "She's probably still filling out the last of the paperwork for our new team mate, whoever that is. Just be patient Naruto." She says a little annoyed that they don't know who their new team member is. Kurenai refusing to tell them over the phone so it'd be a surprise. After another few minutes Kurenai finally came into the room. "Hello you two, sorry that took so long, I've been buried up to my neck in paperwork over the last few days." She says as she remembers the events of what had happened. After a retelling of the events that took place at the training field and confirmation that it was true. Kurenai's actions were deemed a "necessary response to a potential future threat to village security". As such no punishment was dealt out for devouring Sakura, who by now was nothing more than a layer of fat on Kurenai's body, and quite the noticeable layer as well. While Kurenai was by no means a small woman before. The sudden addition from eating a voracious predator like Sakura pushed her weight above and beyond what most would consider "normal" for a Kunoichi. So once the paper work for that was filled out, all that was left was to find a new ninja to replace her. Which was actually easier than she expected, It turns out that one of the other teams ended up losing two of their members before they could even start, the reasoning behind this was vague, but the fact remained that it left the last member without a team. So it was a simple matter of filling out the paperwork and soon after that Team 7 was back up to four people. "Now then," Kurenai started. "Allow me to introduce the newest member of team seven." She says as she opens the door, both Naruto and Ino gasped as they immediately knew who it was....

Sakura closed her jaws tightly around Ino's large mid-section as she glared at the group of blond males that were currently stopping her meal. She could feel 3 of naruto's clones grabbing her waist and arms, while the real naruto ran between Ino's legs to get a hold of her thighs while two other clones held her legs before they all started to pull.

Finally! She had her one true rival in her mouth and was halfway done from sending her into the one place she deserved to be at. In Sakura's large belly! But now her progress was halted by the only male of her team who used to run away just by the sound of her growling stomach. 'I won't let you stop me you baka! I earned this meal!" She mentally shouted as she forced her throat muscles to swallow again. She kept this up for a minute before feeling Ino start to slowly get pulled into her again. 'I will get Ino into my stomach and you won't stop it!' With those words in mind, Sakura tried to increase her pace.

They knew that if they kept this up they would free her. "I swear Ino! I will get you out!" Naruto shouted as he shut his eyes, trying to pull her out with all his strength, his clones shouting in agreement. They were unaware of the slight pull from Sakura's throat muscles.

Ino would only whimper as she stared into the abyss of Sakura's stomach. The smell of her breakfast and snacks mixed with the digestive juices to create a putrid smell. She knew that if it wasn't for Naruto, she would have been fully eaten and prayed that he would be able to pull her out. If he could then she would swear to never attempt to eat him and protect him from being another woman's meal.
P..p...please Naruto. H.. help me." She quietly said as her tears fell into the digestive mixture.

See the slight progress she was making, caused Sakura smirk lightly before her stomach released a loud growl, demanding for a meal. The sound alone caused all the Naruto's to freeze slightly and allowed Sakura to tug her arms free before throwing them back into the chests of the clones and causing them to 'pop' from existence. This brought the real Naruto and his clone out of their frozen fear before they all started to pull once more, but it was all for not as Sakura used her freed arms to grip Ino's waist and pulled her deeper into her mouth.

Sakura smiled as she felt Ino's ass enter her mouth slowly before they shined in enjoyment as she could now see a scared Naruto between Ino's thighs. She gave a wink to him as she used her hands to push Ino's thighs together and trapping Naruto between them. Releasing a slight moan, Sakura kept Naruto's face in Ino's ass as she felt his head enter her mouth.
