choices: He slowly hands over one of the bells...
He refuses, and orders Sakura to spit Ino out!!!
155312222111221113211212.content:
To Naruto's horror he find no sign of his team mate and possible new friend Ino. Instead sitting where she once was was Sakura, who was now licking her lips and holding her now swollen stomach. It had already been large before, in fact it wasn't much of a stretch to say that Sakura was one of the heaviest girls in the academy, rivaled only by Ino who was in constant competition with her, but now it was absolutely huge! Her gut was now fully exposed as it had forcibly pushed her shirt up and out of the way to make room for it as it sat in her lap, covering most of her thighs and even reaching past her knees! "*BUUUURP!* Oh hey Naruto, I was wondering when you were going to show up." She says now noticing him. "For a minute there I worried you might have gotten here before I was able to finish taking care of Ino, but It looks like I was worried about nothing." She says giving her stomach a few playful pats. Signalling that Ino was indeed already deep within Sakura's gullet. In response to this her gut began to shift and move in short erratic bursts. Bulging out in a few places as Ino tried desperately to punch and kick at the walls of her new prison. Some muffled screams could be heard from inside as Ino called out. Most likely cursing Sakura or begging someone to help her. "Oi, I said knock it off in there Ino-pig!" She says giving her stomach a slap, causing it to jiggle and vibrate from the sudden force applied to it. "You've already lost this fight, so just accept your defeat and take comfort and pride in the fact that you're going to be going to contribute to making me bigger, stronger, and even more beautiful that I already am!" She says with a smirk at the thought of how large she was going to be when she was finished digesting her.

Meanwhile Naruto was left speechless, suffice to say he was horrified by what he was seeing. Sure It was one thing to watch someone like Sakura swallow a boy whole was nothing new. In fact he wouldn't have even blinked if Sakura had said she had eaten two or three people in one sitting. But this was Ino they were talking about. A girl who was able to keep up with Sakura in terms of eating and size on a daily basis, and the very idea of Sakura being able to just grab her and swallow her whole in less than a few minutes was just terrifying. True Ino may have been unconscious during the initial stages of being eaten giving Sakura a head start. But still the fact that she was able to finish doing something like this so quickly spoke volumes on just how gluttonous she truly was, and the worst part about all of this, was that the look in her eye told him that she wasn't even done yet. In a feat of Herculean strength, Sakura manages to pick herself up off the ground with little effort and return to standing on her feet. Her stomach now jutting out a good four to five feet in front of her, as she slowly turned and began to walk towards Naruto. "Wh-wha-what a-are you-u d-doing?" He asks in absolute fear of her. Normally he'd have no problem running from the girl if she wanted to eat him. And this was without the extra two too three hundred extra pounds of person in her stomach. But just the sight of Sakura having finally eaten her long time rival and showing no signs of slowing down, now had Naruto frozen in place in shear panic. "What am I doing? Well I figured that'd be obvious!" She says with a grin as she makes her way over to him. "I may have finally beaten Ino once and for all, but I still need to get one of those bells If I want to become a real ninja! And from what I heard, It sounds like you managed to get not just one, but BOTH of those bells off of Kurenai-Sensei while I was having my meal. So It's pretty obvious what I need to do now." She says licking her lips again. A sight that would have sent Naruto running as fast as possible during any other time, but not this time, this time Naruto could only stand there, his legs refusing to move out of shear terror. "But then again, maybe not." She says putting hand to the side of her face. "For once Naruto, you've caught me at a good time. Not ONLY am I in the best mood I've ever been in. But for once, I think I might actually be a little TOO full to try and eat you." She says patting her stomach for emphasis. "Not to mention that I technically only need ONE of those bells in order to pass, just like you, and since Ino Is no longer in the picture, that means you have an extra bell that you don't need!" She says with a smile, although this smile seemed less than a friendly smile coming from her. "So tell you what Naruto, how about you just give me that extra bell you have and I'll pretend you weren't trying to work with a certain someone to try and screw me out of my future, and we'll call it even. Who knows? Maybe you and I might actually start to get along and work together once we become ninja together?" She says as she holds out one of her hands at him.

Her stomach practically pressing up against Naruto, the feeling of the trapped person inside curled up into a ball in the tight confines were not lost to him. It was almost as if Sakura were trying to say that if he didn't do what she was asking that this would be his fate. At first Naruto stood there in a panic, to afraid to even breath, much less think about what to do next. For once he truly thought this would be the end for him, Sakura had him right where she wanted and there was no way he'd be able to worm his way out this time.. The only comforting thought in all of this being that at least this one time, Sakura was willing to let him go as long as he handed over one of the bells. Despite the fact that this would probably be the only and possibly LAST time he'd get away from her. Since once he gave her that bell, that would mean that she not only would become a ninja, but that he'd also have to work with her from now on. Meaning he'd have to deal with constantly being afraid of her deciding to use him as a mid-mission snack in the near future, just because she could. Hell, there wasn't even any guarantee that she wouldn't just go back on her word and eat him once he handed her the bell. But still, as things were right then and there, Naruto saw little choice but to hand over the bell and get out of there, hopefully Kurenai-Sensei hand finally snapped out of her disorientation and be able to help him, and if not then he'd simply run back home as fast as he could and hopefully forget about this disastrous day. He slowly began to reach into his pocket for one of the bells, when something caught his attention. It was a muffled sound coming from Sakura's stomach. At first he thought It might have just been her digestive tract getting to work on her meal, but in reality it turned out to be Ino who was.......crying? Sure at first she tried her hardest to fight against the walls of her prison in an attempt to escape. But once she realized that wasn't going to work she began to shut down. She realized that she soon was going to end up suffering the same fate as so many others before her. Becoming nothing more than a layer of fat on Sakura's body. The Irony was not lost on her as she realized she had done the same thing to many others just as well as Sakura, but the fact remained that this still wasn't how she wanted things to end up, for the first time in her life she was afraid she was going to die. So she began to cry, begging for help from someone, anyone who could help her escape. Sure many would have seen this as poetic justice for someone like her. But she still didn't want it to end like this! And Naruto couldn't help but relate to this feeling. He knew exactly what she must have been going through in that moment, the panic, the fear. He was all too familiar with this sensation. But now it was coming from someone else, someone who actually tried to help Naruto when he needed it. Ino was only in this position because she decided to help him and team up, which he had agreed to. She had put herself on the line so that they could actually pass...like a team. She'd put the team and the mission ahead of trying to get a free meal. So, if a bottomless pit of a predator like Ino could put aside her personal wants, shouldn't he be able to? He wanted to be Hokage! Wouldn't a Hokage conqueror their fears and face whatever they had? Wouldn't a Hokage risk their life to save a comrade?

"Well? What are you waiting for? Hand it over already!" She says growing impatient with him. At this point Naruto was at a cross roads, he could either continue being the coward he has always been in order to live another day. Knowing full well that he let someone else die just so that he could escape. Or he could stand up to Sakura, stand up to the one person who had made his life a living hell for the last several years and finally say that he was done getting pushed around and letting other people get eaten just so that others can get whatever they want! Because that's what It meant to be a ninja to him. But would he live up to that ninja way? It was at this point that he made his decision as he....
155312222111221113211212.title: Sakura won! Ino's lunch!

choices: Naruto and Sakura fight it out!
Kurenai finally decides to step in.
1553122221112211132112122.content:
After a moment of silence, Naruto began to slowly reach back behind himself. Sakura stood there waiting impatiently for him to hand her the bell, but was caught off guard as he slowly pulled out something from the pouch he kept on his hip. Not a bell, but a kunai. This had her confused and surprised as she wasn't expecting him to actually pull a weapon out on her. Nor did she expect him to suddenly raise it up and bring it down, stabbing himself in the leg, the wound was shallow, but it was deep enough to draw blood, which shocked both her and Naruto as well but for obviously different reasons. At this point Naruto jumped back to gain some distance between himself and Sakura. "Heh, alright, looks like that trick worked! The pain snapped me out of that panic I was in and got my legs working again!" He says with a grin as he tried to ignore the self inflicted wound. "Ooookay, so what was that supposed to be about?" Sakura asks wondering what this idiot was trying to accomplish by stabbing himself in the leg. She wasn't sure if she should be amused or annoyed at what Naruto was doing at this point. "What that was, was my decision to stop letting fear rule over every part of my life." He says as he raises his free hand to point at her. "I'm done letting people like you scare me and threaten me into doing what you want with the threat of eating me! On this wound, I make a solemn vow! A vow to never let someone like you or anyone else determine who I am or who I'm going to be! My name, Is Naruto Uzumaki, and I'm going to be the greatest Hokage! And you can forget about getting one of these bells as long as I have anything to say about it! Now spit Ino back up right now before I force her out of you!!!" He says with a look of serious determination in his eyes.

Sakura stood there looking at him in dumbstruck silence. After a few minutes of silence Sakura finally responds. "...........*Pffffft!* Hahahahahahaha!!! Ho man! That's a good one Naruto! You actually had me going there for a minute!!! I had no idea you had a sense of humor! But wouldn't you know, you actually have some pretty good material!!! HAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" She laughs, having taken what Naruto said as a joke. At this point, something inside of Naruto snaps as he raises his right hand and actually throws the Kunai which he had stabbed himself with at Sakura, It just barely missed hitting her as it flies straight forward and plants itself into a near by tree. Whether or not this was intentional Sakura had no idea, but It was enough to get her to stop laughing and look back at Naruto. "I'm not joking here damn it! I said what I meant and I meant what I said, and I never go back on my word! BELIEVE IT!!!" He says showing her he was serious this time. After hearing this the look on Sakura's face changed once again, this time to a look of anger. "*Tch* So now you finally decide to go and grow a spine and stick up for yourself?" She asks. "And not just that, but you're seriously trying to help HER?" She asks slapping her stomach again to show she was speaking about Ino. "So what? You've gone and decided to become a white knight for her because she was nice to you one time? You do realize she has tried to eat you almost as many times as I have right? Hell she was probably only nice to you just to get you to help her get the bells!" She yells. "That's not the point here!" Naruto responds. "It doesn't matter who you are or what you've done in the past. I'm done letting other people get eaten for no reason other than just because someone else thought they'd make a good snack, or even if it's to further your own ambitions! There are plenty of other ways to get what you want in life, ways that don't involve shoving people who may annoy you into your mouth to get rid of them! Ino saw that herself earlier and put herself out on the line in order to do just that! She put herself at risk just to help me achieve both my dream, and hers! And I'm not gonna just let that trust she put in me down because I might be afraid! Now either you spit her up right this instant! Or else I'll just have to reach in there myself and pull her out if I have to!!!............................Uh, actually, never mind, that would be a terrible idea......... But you get what I mean!!!" He says correcting himself after realizing what he had just said. At this point Sakura just sighs out of reflex, she was used to dealing with Naruto's stupidity on a regular basis, but this? This has just crossed over into new territory. And this was something that Sakura just couldn't let slide. "Alright, fine. You want me to let your "friend" go so badly? Then come and make me!!!" She says as she cracks her knuckles, showing that she was ready to fight. "Way ahead of you! SHADOW CLONE JUTSU!!!" He says as he forms the hand sign for the shadow clone jutsu, several clones of Naruto appear around him before they all begin their assault on Sakura........
1553122221112211132112122.title: Naruto's Ninja Way!

choices: Naruto reaches the class with no problems. But is Iruka there to save him?
Naruto reaches the academy but, bumps into another girl along the way.
155312222112.content:
Naruto stumbled slightly as he tried to recover from bumping into something or in this case someone. He spotted the person he had bump into just as they spoke. “Naruto…” said the other the tone holding a low somewhat threatening growl-like quality to it. “S-Sakura! Hey, sorry about that. I didn’t see you there.” Naruto hoped that she would simply except the apology and be done with it as he really didn’t feel like running for his life right now. Haruno Sakura however simply gave an annoyed huff before calling him a baka (idiot).

‘I haven’t been punched yet. That’s a good sign, right?’ thought the blond. Any who took the moment to really look at him would notice that Naruto was very nervous with Sakura so close. It wasn’t because of the small crush he had on her but, because he had seen what she could do to someone that pissed her off enough. He really did not want to get that close to his pink haired crush. Naruto gave a small shudder as his mind went back to that incident. No more than the age of 10 and he was already scared for life. Naruto silently reaffirmed his promise to himself that he would avoid having such an intimate meeting with Sakura’s digestive track.

Naruto blinked as he realized Sakura had said something to him and he hadn’t even heard it. “Sorry, what was that?” Sakura sighed and rolled her eyes. “You really are a baka, you can’t even listen right. What I said was, ‘Why were you on your way to the academy? You failed remember? Unless you’re coming to give yourself up and become fat on my belly.’” Naruto couldn’t help but, think that Sakura was hoping he would agree to the last part. The look of hunger in her eyes wasn’t helping Naruto to feel any more at ease with her. “N-No. I did pass but, there were complications that kept me from getting my passing grade at the time of the test.” Naruto felt like patting himself on the back for the quick excuse. Idly he looked down towards her stomach.

Kunoichi who used the justu tended to be rather lucky as digesting someone rarely left much of any fat on their bodies. He had once asked Iruka about it and he had said some things that Naruto really hadn’t understood. In the end though, he had figured out that kunoichi who used the justu had a faster metabolism or something. Basically, girls could eat people and be left with only a little bit of fat from each person. The amount was so small that most girls worked it off with only an hour or two of training. The very idea of ending up as nothing but, a small layer of fat and pile of poop, one that would be quickly flushed down the toilet after working so hard in life scared Naruto to no end.

In fact, the only girl in class that didn’t show signs of wanting to eat him was that weird shy girl, Hinata he believed the name was. Despite that, even she made him a bit nervous to be around as he had seen last year just how gluttonous the shy girl could be. ‘Seriously, how can someone pack away a small family of four into their stomach and still be so shy?’ he wondered. He could understand that she got rather hungry, as she was one of the harder working girls in their class but, still that was a lot of live meat to swallow down, much less digest.

Returning to the present he noticed how Sakura was still looking at him like he was a piece of tasty meat. “You're not actually hungry yet, right? I mean it’s not even lunch time.” He asked while slowly inching in the direction of the academy. Iruka was still their superior, so if he ordered Sakura to not eat him then she wouldn’t be allowed to eat him. Once they were placed on teams, it would be up to the Jounin-sensei to keep the kunoichi in line and prevent them from eating their team. Those of equal rank however, had no say in it. If you didn’t want to be eaten by a kunoichi then you simply couldn’t let them eat you. Once you were eaten, your future was decided by the mercy of the one who ate you.

Naruto gulped as he got ready to run for his life only to go wide eyed and pale when he heard Sakura’s stomach growl loudly in hunger. He watched has she licked her lips before speaking, “You know, I actually missed breakfast. Maybe I should fix that…”

If Sakura had more to say, Naruto didn’t hear it as he had already started running towards the academy at top speed. Chancing a look back however showed him that Sakura wasn’t too far behind him and if his eyes weren’t playing tricks on him, he would swear that she was drooling. Likely in anticipation of the meal he’d make.
155312222112.title: Is this the end of the line for Naruto?

Ino Yamanaka or some other girl.
1553122221122.content:
Naruto was running as fast as his legs would take him. Franticly trying to get away from his now questionable crush. In fact he was so preoccupied with getting away that he didn’t notice the person in the academy halls until he slammed right into them.

Sitting up from where he fell he looked to see who he had collided with and say it was…
1553122221122.title: Salvation or Ingestion?

choices: Hinata eats and carries him to the academy in her belly, playing with him during
Hinata knows a shortcut to the academy that no one else does
15531222211221.content:
Naruto ran headlong into the dark-haired, shy heiress of the Hyuga clan. The *eep* noise made by the girl was unmistakable, and before he even laid eyes on her, he knew who it was he had slammed into.

"Sor...sorry Hinata, I was in a big hurry and I didn't see you there." the blond genin apologized. He was about to turn and run again, when he felt a tug on his shirt sleeve. He turned to look at the pale-eyed girl, puzzled at why she stopped him.

"Why we...were you running, Na...Naruto?" she stuttered, extremely nervous about talking one on one with the boy she had nurtured a crush on for some time.

"Um...okay, I'll tell you. I was running 'cause I think Sakura wanted to make me her late lunch. I was hoping to get to the academy, but I don't think I've lost her yet."

Hinata, upon hearing this, became worried. She wasn't about to let the boy she loved become just another meal for that pig, Sakura Haruno. No, she would make sure that he would make it to the team assignments safely.

"I think I could help with that Naruto."

"Oh yeah? How?"
15531222211221.title: Hinata Hyuga, his voracious admirer

155312222112211.content:
“I-I think I c-could help with that N-Naruto.” Stuttered the shy but, very determined girl.

“Oh yeah? How?” the blond boy asked with genuine curiosity. Naruto watched as Hinata seemed to fidget for a moment before taking a deep breath to steel her resolve.

“D-Do you trust me, Naruto?” she asked. Naruto couldn’t help but, feel she was fearful of his answer. Naruto coked his head to the side in confusion but, answered as truthfully as he could. “I trust you far more than any other kunoichi in this village. You’ve never been mean to me and have never tried to eat me so I’ll trust you.”

Hinata sighed, it wasn’t quite what she had been silently hoping to hear but, it was certainty better than she had feared. “I-If this i-is to work I’ll n-need you to tr-rust me. P-Please close your eyes.” Naruto gave her a wary look but, he did say that he would trust her so in the end he did as she asked and closed his eyes. Hinata then surprised him by moving his headband down from his forehead to cover his eyes. “N-no p-peeking!” Naruto couldn’t help but, find the playful tone in her voice cute. “Please r-remember that I-I’m only trying t-to help you Naruto.” He gave a small node to show that he understood. He was soon blushing lightly when he felt her step extra close and wrap her arms around him. He stiffened for a moment before forcing himself to relax in her embrace. The fact that he was trying to get away from Sakura barely remembered. It was quite nice. Hinata’s embrace was warm and gentle but, still held a strength to it that would prevent him from moving away easily. ‘Some sort of teleporting justu maybe?’ the blond wondered. He didn’t have long to wait as Hinata finished what she had to say to him. “A-and try not to s-struggle to hard on the w-way down.”

With her mouth closing the moment his toes passed her lips, she tilted her head back again and accompanied it with an audible gulp, the bulge that was the last of Naruto vanishing behind her coat covered chest.

Who does she see?

It was Shikamaru, Choji and Kiba, and it looked like they only caught the very end of her eating Naruto. They did not know who it was Hinata had eaten, but it was an unspoken rule that it was better not to ask and pretend like you didn't see anything.

"Hey HInata," Shikamaru greeted lazily, "you better hurry up, or you are going to be late to get your team assignment." He and the other two boys took off running down the street towards the school.

Hinata looked at the small watch she kept on her, saw that they were right, and took off as fast as she could in the same direction. What she was doing couldn't really be called a run, not in the technical sense, it was more like a very hurried waddle. The truth was Hinata was not yet used to carrying the person she ate any farther than ten feet. She knew that it was her responsibility as a practitioner of this jutsu to be able to use it effectively, but had not had the time to do so. Most of her spare time was taken by practice with her father. Now, she was seeing the downside of this, and swore to get used to the feeling of carrying another person in her body while sprinting.

It took her a while, but Hinata just barely got to academy on time. She made a quick stop just to the side of the entrance, and, with a great retch, spewed out a wet Naruto onto the ground.

"Hu-hurry up, Naruto. We are going t-to be late."

The spiky blond shook off the excess saliva, and other goo that he didn't want to know what it was, and followed her into the academy.

As they ran to the classroom, Naruto couldn't help but, give looks towards his female companion. He felt so confused. He had trusted her and she swallowed him but, she also let him back out once she got to the academy's front door. Feeling himself sliding down her throat and curling up inside her stomach had been the most terrifying thing he had ever experienced. The fact that he told her that he'd trust her only moments before, made it that much worse for him. But, she didn't hurt him. Made him feel a bit motion sick, yes but, not hurt him. This left him feeling a bit conflicted as he was a bit fearful of visiting her stomach again, but she did it to give him some safety from the other hungry kunoichi. As they entered the classroom, he decided that he would continue to trust her. After all, if she had wanted to hurt him, even digest him, he wouldn't have been able to stop her. She only ate him to try and help him. Nodding to himself he idly wondered if she would need to swallow him and lug him around again. For some reason, he found the thought of her doing so didn't bother him nearly as much as before.
----------------

Hinata felt relieved when she entered the classroom and found Iruka-sensei hadn't arrived yet. That meant they were still on time. She gave a sigh of relief before she walked to a seat in the back. A small part of her hoped that Naruto would take the empty seat next to her but, she doubted he would want to sit next to the person that had just crammed him into her stomach.

Hinata gave a small dejected sigh at the thought as she sat down. The thought of Naruto possible avoiding her now made her feel so miserable that she wouldn't be surprised if dark rain clouds started following her. As such, it is understandable how she 'epp'ed loudly and jumped when a male voice spoke to her from the previously empty seat next to her. Even more so, when the voice sounded much like Naruto.

"Uh, Hinata are you alright?" Asked the blond boy. "Y-yes Naru-uto. I'm f-fine." Stuttered the shy girl as she got her racing heart under control. She couldn't believe that Naruto was willingly sitting next to her, she would've squealed in delight if she wasn't so shy. "So Hinata," the boy began, breaking her from her thoughts, "do you think we will get too be on the same team?" Hinata couldn't believe her ears. Naruto was asking for her opinion and from the sound of his voice, he seemed to be hoping she would be his teammate. "I-I hope so. I'd l-like t-to be on your t-team Nar-ruto." She really did hope so and the smile he gave her in response made her want to melt into a puddle of goo as her heart fluttered. It wasn't one of Naruto's wide grins but, a softer smile. It left his wonderful blue eyes open, letting her see how they shined in glee while holding a soft feel in his gaze; a silent sort of thanks that was for her and her alone.

They sat there for the next few minutes, simply looking into the others eyes and feeling a connection form between them. It was a sense of trust the two felt towards the other, solidifying a feeling of unity that if given a chance could evolve into something so much more. The moment ended however, when the door opened and in walked...

It took a bit but, Iruka had managed to get the class to settle down and quickly questioned some of the students to learn what happened. Now he was at an impasse. Naruto was originally slated for Team 7 but, with the knowledge that Sakura was so determined to make a meal of him and their sensei's habit of being hours late, Iruka knew that putting Naruto on that team was tantamount to a death sentence. So using his authority as teacher of the class, Iruka could overrule the team selections once and change them has he felt was needed. This just left one problem; who to place as Naruto's last teammate? Hinata was a no brainier once Naruto told him all of what had happened so far. He also made sure to give him a good teacher in one Kurenai Yūhi. The women would make sure Naruto was at least taught and cared for, even if only to prove that she could.

As much as he didn't want to, Iruka could only find one person to put on their team that wouldn't over power it or leave the other teams lacking. So after calling team 7 which consisted of Sasuke Uchiha, Kiba Inuzuka, and Ino Yamanaka under Kakashi Hatake; he began on team 8. "Team 8. Your sensei is Kurenai Yūhi. The members are: Naruto Uzumaki," he saw Naruto perk up from his seat next to Hinata. "Hinata Hyuga," Iruka had to fight to keep down the smile he felt coming as the two looked at each other, the joy in their faces clearly able to be seen even from the other side of the room. But as they say, all good things come to an end. "And Sakura Haruno.”

Iruka winced internally as he saw Naruto and Hinata’s expressions quickly change from joyful to horrified. Their faces paled and their eyes widened as they looked over at their new teammate. A low rumble was heard coming from Sakura clearly showing what thought of the team arrangements. Iruka could do nothing but, give the two a look that showed how sorry he was at putting them on the same team before continuing. To say that Kurenai Yūhi was having a bad start to her day would be an understatement. First she finds that the alarm on her clock wouldn’t work, causing her to get up an hour late. Then she couldn't find her shinobi uniform, one that she was sure she had left out so it would be easy to find and the hot water valve in her home isn’t working leaving her to take an ice cold shower. A number of other small things happened to slow her down before she finally left to pickup her new team, only to be caught by ANBU and informed that the teams had under gone a sudden change and the Hokage would explain it to her after she dismissed her team for the day. The ANBU at least gave her a few sheets of paper, each having info about her new students. Kami (God) however, had other plans as she soon got dragged into helping track down and capture her friend Anko, who had gotten herself plastered at one of the bars.

Now, nearly two hours after the pickup time she was finally entering the academy. As she walked she looked at the sheets of info on her new students. She was happy that she was still training Hinata as she had developed a bit of a soft spot for the girl during the time she escorted her to the academy. The boy maybe a problem but, she was sure she could handle the boy and mold him into someone great. And if not, well you could say that one of the girls won’t need to worry about lunch. Kurenai gave a wicked smile. She had a method of dealing with baka’s. They were taught and either learned to not be such baka’s or they ended up as a nutritious meal. The third one however, could prove to be a problem if this info was correct. The girl seemed to care only about Sasuke Uchiha and who to make her next meal out of. Kurenai hoped that this Sakura would keep her hunger impulses under control or the village would likely be losing a kunoichi.

Finally arriving at the classroom, Kurenai opened the door expecting to see the six genin of her team 8 and Kakashi’s team 7. As such she was slightly surprised when she found the numbers coming up short. She looked around and saw the brooding Uchiha and a girl with pink hair with a rather smug look on her face and the sounds of digestion coming from her stomach. Do to her sitting behind a desk though, Kurenai couldn’t be sure if what she thought happened really did happen. 1553122221122111221121.content:
Over in the corner hiding beneath the tables were Ino and Kiba, who had both sought refuge there. It all clicked for Kurenai after she noticed this. Obviously, the Haruno girl had been hungry and wanted to be alone with the Uchiha at the same time. The red-eyed jounin deduced that she must have eaten both Naruto and Hinata, and in the time she was Kiba and Ino had hidden themselves so as not to be next.

Kurenai marched over to the girl with the overextending, wiggling belly and stopped right in front of her with arms crossed and a stern expression on her face.

"I can't believe this! I was just a little bit late and you've already eaten your teammates!" she yelled, furious with the girl for being unable to control herself. "Look young lady, there is something I think you need to hear again, because it obviously didn't take when you were taught it in the academy. Kunoichi who prove themselves a danger to their fellow Konoha ninja, and who are unable to control their baser urges, are themselves disposed of in a similar manner." Her eyes drilled into Sakura''s, and caused the pinkette to flinch back. "I never want to catch you doing this to your teammates again, or you won't be able to make the mistake a third time."

Luckily for Hinata and Naruto, roughly the same time when the vore jutsu was created, a forced regurgitation jutsu was made in order to prevent Konoha casualties. Kurenai performed the necessary hand seals and slammed her chakra coated palm into Sakura's stomach. With a horrible retch, Hinata and Naruto were deposited on the floor.

"Now follow me, we can introduce ourselves along the way and I can tell you about what's next."

The usual introductions were given, and shortly after Kurenai told them about their next test. Her three pupils got up to leave, but their jounin sensei gave them one final warning.

"Remember, I have been given permission to eat any of you three during the test to subdue you. Nothing permanent, just thought you should be prepared."

choices: Sakura still plans to eat Naruto and Hinata. And maybe Kurenai too.
Sakura ate someone last night so she is satiated, for now.
15531222211221112211211.content:
When Kurenai arrived at the training ground she found herself rather surprised. She had expected to find Naruto, as he apparently had some kind of healing factor, or even Sakura as she didn't have any wounds from yesterday. She hadn't expected to find Hinata here, trying to run laps around the area while weighted down. In truth, Kurenai had expected to have to postpone her test for a few days or just fail her team outright. The reason being that she had brought Hinata to the hospital to have her acid burns treated and such things normally take a few days.

Continuing to watch her timid student run till she hunched over and started huffing, Kurenai decided it was time to make her presence known.
.……
Hinata was tired beyond belief. She hadn't expected running laps while weighed down by someone else her size to be so tiring. Finally getting her second wind Hinata straitened and was about to try for one last lap, when the air in front of her shimmered and Kurenai appeared before her.

"Eep!" The startled Hyuga princess jumped, throwing her balance off and causing Hinata to fall forward. Kurenai watched amused as Hinata twisted herself so she wouldn't land on her stomach. Thought in hindsight, Kurenai couldn't help but, feel sympathy for her student as Hinata landed hard on her back. The stomach the young girl was sporting was of course a victim to gravity and slammed into the poor girl with a hard bounce, causing a loud wet belch to exit Hinata's mouth while her belly bounced and jiggled.

"I would tell you to calm down but, it seems that would be rather pointless now wouldn't it." Kurenai stated more then asked her groaning student.

"Hello, sen-(urp)-sensei."

After helping the girl stand back up Kurenai began to ask if what she was doing here so early, much less alone.

"I'm not a-alone, sensei." Hinata meekly stated. Kurenai looked at her confused and asked for some clarification. "W-well you see, um... I-I needed hel-lp with training. As Kunoichi I n-need to be able to car-rry prisoners or c-captives back to Konoha." Hinata paused for a moment only continuing when Kurenai motioned her to do so.

"All of m-my spare time is u-used for train-ning with my father in our clan style. So I needed to practice." Kurenai smiled as Hinata shyly finished her explanation.

"That's wonderful, Hinata. I'm glad to see you are taking the initiative and continuing to train even when you haven't been ordered to in you spare time." She saw how Hinata seemed to beam in delight at the praise. "However, it is nearly time to start the test, so go ahead and digest your meal and rest." Kurenai found it surprising at how Hinata seemed to suddenly get very nervous.

"I-I can't."

Kurenai could barely hear her as she whispered. "Hinata, if you are having a difficult time digesting this one then you don't need to hide it." Kurenai gently told her while starting to make hand signs for a digestive aid jutsu. "We've all had stubborn meals before. Now just stay still and I'll..."

"NO!" Shouted the shy girl as she quickly jumped away from Kurenai's glowing hands. Kurenai looked on in confusion as Hinata put distance between her and the girls stomach.

"You d-don't understand. I-I at-te Nar-ruto!" Hinata went on to explain how she had asked Naruto to help her with this training and how he had agreed to let her eat him but, only if she kept her promise to let him back out.

Kurenai rubbed her temples as she processed this new tidbit of info. "He let you eat him?" She asked incredibly. Hinata simply nodded, her attention half on her and half on her stomach as she rubbed it. An obvious attempt to comfort herself if Kurenai ever saw one. "And all because you promised him that you would let him out?" Again Hinata nodded.

Kurenai sighed. She couldn't believe her only male student was that trusting or at least that dense. If it had been any other girl, Kurenai knew that she would be searching for a new member of the team right now. Hell, if it was anyone else in her stomach, Hinata might have just said 'too hell with it' and digested them anyway. Taking a peek Kurenai say Hinata off in her own little world as she rubbed her stomach lovingly. There was no way Hinata would willingly digest Naruto unless as a last resort to keep him safe from others.

Sighing again Kurenai told Hinata to let Naruto out, which she did just as her protection for Naruto collapsed. Kurenai had to admit that it was somewhat amusing to watch Naruto fall flat on his face as Hinata threw him up. She also noticed how the boy tried to hide his reaction to moving through Hinatas body from them, though only Hinata didn't seem to notice the effect she now had on the boy.

Kurenai shook her head has she realized that Naruto starting to experience the effects of puberty. And to make it worse, the boy seems to physically enjoy the sensation of Hinata's body surrounding his whole being. She wondered if Naruto even realized why he was reacting.

It was around this time that Sakura showed up. Kurenai decided it was finally time to start.
15531222211221112211211.title: The day of the bell test

"Alright," began the Jounin quickly catching the attention of her charges. "I would first like to thank Naruto and Hinata for showing up today after what happened before." Kurenai threw a glance at Sakura whose attention seemed to be drifting towards her teammates. Kurenai gave a mental sigh at this. "Also, Hinata. I'd like to know how you seem completely healed after having suffered stomach acid burns only just yesterday." It was more a statement then a question though. The shy girl fidgeted for a moment seemingly working up the courage to speak. "I m-make healing creams in my sp-pare time. I always add some compounds that-t neutralize the acids and accelerate the healing process." The young Hyuga girl glanced up and saw the look of amazement in her sensei's eyes before returning her gaze down towards the ground, blushing the whole time at the sense of accomplishment she now felt for her creams.

When Kurenai finally stopped gaping, a large smile made its home on her face. She was so proud of the girl. It also meant that she had some talent for healing. Kurenai made note to introduce Hinata and maybe even Sakura to the healing arts of medical jutsu. For now however she had a test to give, she just hoped these three would pass and not fall to some of her nastier genjustu traps that had been place about. "Well, team let’s start this test shall we? Now, most teams when made are arranged with a certain goal in mind. For instance, a group with members having tracking related abilities tend to be placed together in order to create a tracking and recon team. Or the famous Ino-Shika-Cho team, which was an interrogation/infiltration/support team, as their abilities made them ideal for supporting others or attacking the enemy through none direct methods." She took a moment make sure everyone was with her.

"Sensei?" Kurenai turned to her pink haired student, slightly surprised that the clearly hungry girl was paying attention to what was being said and not on how to eat her team. Though Kurenai didn't put it past the girl to try later. "Yes, Sakura." "Sensei, if every team is designed with a purpose then what is ours? Hinata is the only one of us from a clan and she would likely lean more towards tracking and recon or ambushing. Naruto and I however don't have any unique abilities."

Kurenai smiled at the fact Sakura had caught on so quick. "Your right! You and Naruto don't really bring anything to a tracking team or even an assault or support team. But there is something you have in common Sakura, or at least something you and Hinata have in common." A grin spread on Kurenai's face as she saw the confused looks she was getting. Hinata seemed less lost then the others yet still didn't seem to grasp what Kurenai was saying. She almost chuckled at how simple the answer was. "The answer is that you are both kunoichi. And what can every kunoichi do that no boy can?" Looks of understanding blossomed on the girls faces. "We are Konoha's first ever, genin level disposal team. It is our job as a team of mostly kunoichi to consume and dispose of our comrades and villages enemies. We will likely be given missions involving the removal of people, such as bandits." Kurenai couldn’t help the hungry grin that soon found its way to her face, she hadn’t been on a good disposal mission for some time and her stomach was just aching for the chance to be filled till she was immobile. There was no surprise in seeing Sakura practically drooling at the thought of being ordered to eat her fill. Hinata on the other hand, though less obvious about it looked just as eager to start gorging herself on some pitiful bandits. Naruto of course looked both out of place and rather unsettled at being on a team composed of hungry females but, the girls were too far in their own little worlds to really care, even Hinata didn’t notice his discomfort.

Snapping from her daydreams of stuffing herself well beyond the limits of what any person should be able to consume, Kurenai clapped her hands to regain her students’ attention. “Now, for this test you will have two ways of success. The first is simple. I will be attacking you with the intention of consuming every one of you. If I succeed in putting all three of you inside my belly,” she pauses a moment to give said stomach a gentle pat drawing her students attention to the bandage-dress covered stomach, “then you will affectively fail this test and be sent back to the academy.” She noticed how all three of them relaxed slightly at hearing what failure would mean, none more so then Naruto. Kurenai smirked as she could already think of what punishment the boy had been so afraid of. “Now knowing this you must have already realized that your objective is to not be caught and eaten for a set period of time. Seeing as how I can keep my stomach from digesting whatever is in it for nearly five hours time, you three will need to remain free of my stomach for that long in order to pass.” Kurenai paused to look up at the suns position. “It is nearly 8am, so you will need to remain outside of my stomach till 1pm. Any questions?”

“What is the second way we can pass?” This was asked by the lone male of the team. “Well Naruto, this second method is something that you won’t be able to do unless you can suddenly change into a girl.” Despite herself Kurenai felt a chill of foreboding run down her spine at that but, brushed it off and continued talking. “The second way of passing is for one of the girls to swallow me. The moment they manage to trap me completely inside one of their stomachs is the moment that every one of you passes.”

The moment Kurenai said that Sakura’s mind went into overdrive. It was obvious that once a person was trapped inside the stomach, they had little to no chance of escaping without being let out by the kunoichi that had swallowed them. This was due to the insides of a kunoichi having some kind of sealing effect on their meals chakra, so once inside the stomach jutsu couldn’t be used. ‘If I play this right then I can swallow down Kurenai-sensei once she swallows the other two. If I do, then I’ll be getting a three course meal for the price of one with no one able to stop me from digesting them.’ Thought the pinket as plans were already being made to insure this happened.

“Before we start a word of warning. If either of you girls eat your teammates and try to digest them then I will fail you! I give you this warning because there are a number of genjustu around the area that if you fall under its sway you will try to eat the first living thing to see. These genjustu also lower your reluctance to digest any living meals, so be careful you don’t fall prey to these genjustu.” Despite what she said there was one person that Kurenai would make an exception for; Hinata. If the girl ate one of her teammates and digested them before the test was over, then Kurenai would have no choice but, to take her under her wing and teach the young Hyuga girl how to avoid this from happening ever again. Then again, with her Byakugan Kurenai doubted that Hinata would fall prey to such a genjustu. After all, just because her family saw her as weak didn’t mean that they wouldn’t even teach the girl how to recognize genjustu and dispel them, right?

“So let’s get started.”

Narrowing her eyes in concentration Kurenai tried to feel out the chakra signatures of her students. Although not a sensor type by any means, Kurenai still had a talent for feeling out familiar chakras. This made finding Hinata the easiest of them. Feeling the young Hyuga girl near one of her hunger inducing genjustu traps, Kurenai felt it best to go and see if the girls training had been neglected as much as she feared. If Hinata had fallen to her genjustu then it would only be a matter of time before she tried to eat and digest one of her teammates. The worst part was that those genjustu could only be broken if you 'knew' you were being affected by them before they fully activated. With her eyes Kurenai was sure that Hinata would see them long before she fell prey to the genjustu. The only other way to break free was for the jutsu caster to release them.

Kurenai reached out, trying to feel her other two students. She couldn't find any trace of them. That left two realistically possible options, as she didn't believe it possible for a genin to hide themselves from a Jounin. The first possible option was that their chakras were too weak to be felt. She could believe this to be true for Sakura but, not someone like Uzumaki. The second option was that they had been eaten by a kunoichi. A Kunoichi’s stomach blocked off chakra to those trapped inside but, it also interfered with a sensory ninja’s chakra sensing abilities.

Kurenai frowned at this. Naruto's chakra was too great to fully suppress, especially for such a young ninja. That could only mean that Naruto had been eaten. Now, while Kurenai wasn't particularly fond of the boy, at least not yet, she knew that if something happened to him then Hinata would be devastated. Sakura seemed like the most likely culprit for such a thing. She had already proven that she wasn't above eating her teammates should the chance arise. However, Hinata hadn't moved from her spot in the genjustu trap area. The only answer Kurenai had for this was that Hinata had eaten something or more like a someone and was now laying back and digesting her meal(s).

A horrifying thought struck Kurenai. 'What if Hinata ate Naruto and was digesting him right now?!?' If this happened then Kurenai wasn't sure what the girl would do upon learning of it. The greatest problem was that it could already be too late. Kurenai hadn't been keeping a very close watch on her students for the last three uneventful hours. If Hinata had fallen to the genjustu early on then she would likely be too far into digestion to save whoever had been eaten. Kurenai hoped that that wasn't the case as she started moving towards Hinata's location.

She idly noted that she could feel his form through her skin, her hand happily rubbing against his legs as they bent inside of her stomach in order to make more room.

It didn’t take her long to shift around so she was kneeling on the ground, the hand beneath Naruto’s back being used to support and lift what remained of him outside of her body as the other hand continued to rub and massage her growing stomach. Now that gravity was on her side, she'd make even shorter work of him. A rapid series of gulps buried him inside of her up to just below his shoulders only proved this to be true. The quick succession of swallows however, jerked him this way and that, jolting him from his slumber. Seeing this and knowing that she couldn’t allow Naruto to start screaming or yelling until he was curled up inside of her stomach, Hinata slowly reached up and gently poked the side of his neck with a finger. The simple poke allowed her to inject a little chakra into his vocal cords, paralyzing them for a very short time.

Taking advantage of his drowsy state she gave another deep swallow, one that brought his shoulders into her mouth and let her lips tighten again, less stretched as all they had to wrap around was his neck. She could feel his legs bending inside of her, likely more than slightly uncomfortable for him as more of his body was slowly pushed into the small cavern that was her stomach.

Naruto awoke to feel something warm, wet, pulsing all around him, massaging him from every angle up to his neck. He grimaced slightly at feeling some kind of stinging sensation slowly replace the tingling one that had been surrounding his feet. Though only semi-painfully, it was still an unwanted sensation. It was here however, that he found he couldn’t move any part of him that was feeling the warm, wet, pulsing sensation. He felt whatever it was that was surrounding him, tense up for a moment before he was yanked down. He immediately knew what was happening to him; the fact that he could see the top part of Hinata’s face only confirmed it for him.

She knew he saw her and she didn’t care. All that mattered to her now was eating him up and taking a nap so she could digest. Knowing she was now at the end of her meal she swallowed and her lips now around his face, just above his nose... Another gulp, and her lips closed behind his head, her tongue pressing hot and wet and thick against the back of his head as his face was pushed against the roof of her mouth. Even without words, and without hope, he struggled, squirming and writhing against the constant downward tug. But it was useless; even before she swallowed he could feel her muscles pulling him hungrily down to the acidic fate that awaited him, and then when she did swallow, it was like someone had forcibly pushed down on the top of his head - he was instantly and entirely trapped in her throat and stomach, rapidly filling the latter. His body bent and curled as more and more of it was deposited into the ever-expanding organ, the walls of it stretching both internally and externally to fit the bumps and bulges of his form.

Through his struggles he felt her hands on her stomach, outside, rubbing over and around his body, stroking almost... lovingly?... over the various bumps and bulges that he made. Finally he was entirely inside her stomach, the slimily walls rubbing against his face as soon as they had the chance, churning noisily all around him. The sounds of her body were deafening from inside - the churning, groaning, growling sounds of her stomach, the steady, rapid thumping heartbeat above him, her whooshing breathing also above as she gasped for breath for the first time in minutes. He pressed his hands out against the walls of her stomach as he struggled. The struggling seemed to be too much for her, and he felt another shift of gravity, the acids pooled at the bottom of her stomach sloshing messily as she seemed to flop onto her back... He could feel her arms wrapped tightly around him, around her swollen stomach, but that didn't help at all - he continued to struggle, and hopelessly feel for something, anything, that could get him out again.

But it was useless. The sphincter he'd come in through was clenched shut again, too tight to get even a finger through. Somehow, he knew that this Hinata wasn’t the same one that had promised to release him every time she ate him. Somehow he just knew that this Hinata was planning for this to be a one way trip. This only seemed more certain as he felt the walls of her stomach massaging as-of-yet semi-useless acids into his skin and no sign of a protection jutsu being activated anytime soon. Hugging his knees tight against his chest, he finally stopped struggling, resigned to his fate.
--------------
Feeling the shaking inside of her, Hinata hugged her stomach tighter. "Kami you are delicious Naruto-kun!" She said with an explosive sigh. She smiled slightly at hearing the muffled cries and sobs from inside her, feeling kicks and spasms, punches and struggles renewed by the burning, hungry acids that slowly coated her stomach walls. She fell asleep on the warm grass only moments later, the genjustu forcing her to feel happy as she sunned her massive stomach as it let out its first loud groan. As she fell into warm dreams of her and Naruto being together, the small part of her that had been forced to watch herself eat her beloved took solace in the fact that Naruto still had a chance to escape. Despite how strong her stomach was, it would still take some time for her to fatally digest someone as resilient as Naruto. She could only hope that would be enough.

Kurenai had been pressing her hands against the gurgling stomach of her shy and naked student as the girl slept for the past minute and she was starting to think it was pointless. As she moved her hands around, trying to feel everything that was happening through the girls stomach Kurenai's hopes of finding Naruto alive and well where dropping rapidly. Just as she was about to give up and write Naruto off as having been digested she felt something. It wasn't much and truthfully she had nearly passed it off as simply Hinata's stomach but, when she felt it again Kurenai stopped and pressed a little harder against the gurgling and churning gut. Finally she found something solid floating around in the sleeping girls gut but, Kurenai's relief and hope for her only male student quickly died as she managed to get a better feel for Naruto's condition. The boys movements where weak and rather lacking in responsiveness. If she had to guess she'd say that Naruto was simply reacting out of instinct to try and escape now. Kurenai sighed as she pulled away from Hinata's stomach. There was no point in trying to get Naruto out as the trauma of being expelled from her stomach would likely be enough to kill him anyway.

Giving another heavy sigh, Kurenai shattered the genjutsu that had been affecting Hinata while placing another one in its place. The new genjutsu would keep Hinata asleep for a while longer, hopefully most of Naruto would be gone by then. Next, Kurenai did something that she truly hated herself for doing. She cast a new genjutsu that muddled Hinata's memory and would keep her from realizing that she had eaten and digested the very boy she cared so much for. Kurenai would not take the chance of Hinata trying to kill herself out of grief for this, especially since her clan was suppose to teach her how to recognize a genjutsu before it took hold and dispel it. She would need to bring Hinata to Ino's father and have him work out something a bit more permanent.

Finishing her work on Hinata, Kurenai gathered up Naruto's clothes and sealed them away. A strong enough trigger could break her genjutsu and Hinata would be forced to remember that she had turned the boy she liked into food. Once done Kurenai moved back into the forest thinking on what would be the best way to deal with her final student. She could either fail the girl and send her back to the academy. Or she could just eat the girl herself and simply pass it off as Hinata having retaliated against Sakura for her eating Naruto. The second would give her greater leverage to take Hinata on as her apprentice rather then just a student.

1553122221122111221121112122.content:
Looking around she saw some orange in the tree branches. Kurenai was surprised at how well he hide himself. How could something in bright orange be so good at hiding? Her shock must have shown on her face because Naruto laughed as he hopped out of the tree.

"I'm able outrun ANBU and Jonin after my pranks, so why're you so shocked? Iruka is a sensor and he's the only one to find me because I LET him and he's a Chuunin! Some of those ANBU and Jounin can't find me."

The red-eyed woman "I see...well, no offense Naruto, but given how you were in the academy, can you blame me if I'm surprised?" she asked.

Naruto shrugged "That's something I never liked, that the academy dose that. What good will paperwork and test scores do to determine how good someone is as far as practical application in the field?" Naruto asked.

Kurenai looked at Naruto and had to, at least mentally, concede to that point. The fact that he was better than everyone thought made her excited.

Eyeing Naruto, she took note of his features.

On his head was short, blond, spiky hair  that stuck up in all directions like the spines of a sea urchin and a blue headband with a metal plate attached to it that had the Hidden Leaf Village symbol of a spiral arrow engraved into it. As for his face he had blue eyes and odd whisker-like marks on his face. He wore orange pants and an orange shirt that has blue near the shoulders and was white at the neck, on the back of the shirt was a red spiral symbol, He had some bandages on his thigh and a carrying case for a kunai knives. He also wore a small pouch on his belt for basic ninja supplies

In fact, the Jonin found Naruto rather cute...cute enough to EAT! 

Or even better...love making!

After all, males were nothing more then breeding stock or food. And  her only male student was trusting or at least, dense. She had learned that when she'd had Hinata explain how Naruto LET her swallow him for training purposes.

Still... 

Kurenai sighed and rubbed her temples "Well since there can't be a three-person squad now, I'll have to flunk you since Hinata ate Sakura."

"HEY! You can't blame Hinata for that! She was just out to keep that damn cannibal from going after all three of us!" Naruto snapped.

Ok...THAT caught Kurenai's attention. THREE?! Sakura was out to eat her would-be teacher too? That brought a frown to her face.

As Hinata went rosy at her long-time crush defending her, Kurenai eyed the two as she processed the information.

"Well...alright, I'll need to report this to the Hokage, see if there's a way to bend the rules. I'll tell you tomorrow."

The two genin-hopefuls nodded and turned to leave. Neither of them noticing Kurenai making a handsign. As Hinata left, she smiled at getting her revenge on Sakura for earlier.

when she got home, however, she saw that Naruto wasn't with her. She frowned, but then...she knew where he lived and Kurenai DID say she'd see them both the next day. 

BACK AT THE TRAINING FIELDS...

Naruto looked around, confused. How'd he get back here? He could've sworn he had gone home after Kurenai dismissed them!

He heard a laugh and turned to see said woman laughing with a hand in front of her face. "Well...you DO stink a Genjutsu, Naruto. You have to admit that. And now that we'er alone..." Kurenai said, advancing towards him as Naruto backed away.

Just as he was about to break out into a full run away, Kurenai pounced and pinned him to the ground.

"W-why are you doing this?!" Naruto cried.

Kurenai smiled "I like strong men. And you clearly have the potential for it." she said as she stuffed the struggling young man into a full-body bondage suit to make it so he couldn't move to escape her.

Now...What to do now with him?

Kurenai had just finished asking herself what she wanted to do with the boy when her stomach suddenly rumbled, feeling empty after not eating anyone all day. Looking from her belly up towards the rapidly paling boy, Kurenai smirked, “Well seems I’m feeling rather hungry. And look, I have such a tasty looking meal right here.” Naruto’s eyes widened at that as his sensei walked towards him with the grace of a predator hunting its next meal.

“S-s-sensei! I thought you said you’d see us tomorrow about being placed on a team under you?” It was a pathetic attempt at stalling her, he knew this but, it was all that he could think of at the moment. “Silly morsel, I never said anything about seeing both of you tomorrow.”, she said in a mocking tone. Naruto was as white as a ghost now but, he still struggled as best he could with the suit binding him.

“Now, Down you go.” She said before opening her mouth wide. Naruto barely had time to scream before his head was shoved into his sensei’s waiting maw.
----------

Hinata was walking through the halls of the Hyuga manor towards her room, intending on getting to bed early so that she could better digest her still barely living meal and so that she could see Naruto. Hinata blushed at the thought of just the two of them on a team and her mind slowly started moving towards the more naught side of things. She could barely wait to have him all to herself. He would finally see her and one day fall for her.

So lost was she in her daydreams that she paid no mind to the screaming and thrashing bitch in her stomach as she pressed against the walls of her prison. Her belly churned and gurgled pleasantly as her would be teammate sloshed around in what would be her final resting place. Hinata was only drawn out of her thoughts by a very unlady-like belch escaping her lips. “Excuse me!”, the girl meekly whispered before glaring at her bellies occupant, blaming her for the gas.

Finally reaching her room, Hinata opened the door only to stop as an ominous feeling washed over her only to vanish just as quickly as it came. She’d almost swear that her Naruto-senses where tingling but, that made no sense as Naruto must have still been with Kurenai-sensei, since he had just vanished from beside her. There was no way that her sensei would take her Naruto away from her… ‘For if she ever did, I’d insure that her digestion was long and very drawn out.’, threatened the shy girl in the depths of her mind.
---------

Kurenai gave a final gulp and felt the last of her only male student slide down her throat. As Naruto settled in her hungry tummy, Kurenai sighed in pleasure at having something in her before giving a loud belch. Licking her lips and patting the wiggling bulge in her belly, Kurenai started on her way out of the training grounds. She still had a report to give before she went home to sleep. As she walked away she ignored the sounds of her meal, noises that had she been listening closer would have sounded suspiciously like the boy calling for Hinata to help him.

After the test where Hinata had eaten her would-be pink haired teammate, she had gone home so she could sleep off her meal as it digested. It had all been fine only for her to wake up during the night from terrible stomach cramps and indigestion. She wasn’t able to get much sleep after that started up as her stomach would have a fit every few minutes. It would seem that Sakura had her revenge against the Hyuga heiress by denying her a pleasant digestion.

Hinata was now awaiting her hopefully, new sensei and teammate/crush while sitting on a nearby bench and rubbing her agitated tummy. ‘I can’t believe there is still so much left. She should have been thoroughly digested and nothing but, a pile of shit and bones on its way down a toilet by now. Instead I’m left with this…’ the young girl thought to herself in annoyance as she glared at the large bulging potbelly she now sported. Hinata had unzipped her jacket so as to better reach the large and surprisingly hard mound. She had been hoping that it would settle down and finish digesting its meal if she rubbed it long enough but, that didn’t seem to be helping.

Hinata hissed and clutched her gut as it suffered another bout of cramps and a fresh wave of nausea hit her. She really wished her stomach would quit having these fits and remove the last bits of that bitch from her system already. When her stomach finally calmed down Hinata laid back against the bench with a tired sigh. What she wouldn’t give to have Naruto here and giving her a nice belly rub. She smiled at the thought and let her mind run with it, daydreaming about her crush happily rubbing her belly and telling her how she was so cute and how her belly was so nice and soft. Hinata sighed happily at the daydream as a light blush covered her cheeks at the idea of having Naruto touching her skin in such an intimate manner.

Kurenai couldn’t help but, smirk as she walked out of her apartment started on her way towards the Kage tower. It had taken all night and more than one digestive aid and accelerated digestion jutsu but, in the end she had finally proven that a woman’s stomach was stronger than even Naruto Uzumaki’s stubborn determination. In truth, after digesting him for a few hours and not getting anywhere, she had been a bit scared that she would have to regurgitate the blond and hope that her genjustu was enough to alter his memory. Kurenai’s smirk turned into a full-fledged smile as she strutted down the streets, knowing that she had managed to digest the blond in the end and all that was left of him was a little padding on her body, a pile of shit and bones in her septic tank, and a small layer of fat around her belly that would be easy for her to burn off. That didn’t mean it wouldn’t be a bit annoying at having to do so as most meals, even the more massive ones of thirty people, rarely ever left any fat behind on her body. Still she did enjoy the little upgrade to her measurements.

It took Kurenai a few moments to notice her new apprentice as she was too focused on how energetic she currently felt. Chalking up the ‘feel good’ sensation as a pleasant side effect of eating the Kyuubi container, Kurenai swiftly made her way over to her sloughing apprentice. “Hinata wake up!”, although she didn’t yell her voice clearly still startled the poor girl as she jumped slightly before focusing on her.

“Kurenai-sensei, good morning.” Greeted the shy girl. “Maybe for me it is but, you seem to be having some problem”, she said pointing at the younger girls gut. “Would you like a little help with that before we get started?” Getting a nod, Kurenai was quick to administer a digestive aid jutsu to the girls’ stomach receiving a loud sigh of relief from the girl in thanks as her indigestion finally settled. “Thank you Kurenai-sensei. Is Naruto-kun here?” asked the now excited girl.

Kurenai paused, not really sure what to say to the girl. She had no wish to enrage her new student and that is all that telling her the truth would do. Then again, she really didn’t want to outright lie either as once she found out the truth, if she ever did, then that would likely only make things worse between them then outright telling the truth. Then again, Kurenai fully believed that Hinata would eventually grow out of her silly crush on the idiot and would simply be upset with knowing that she had missed her chance to eat the boy. Quickly weighing the pros and cons Kurenai decided to…

It was a warm sunny day in Konoha. Birds were chirping, children were out playing and laughing, all was normal for its citizens. Unless one counted the odd sight of what was arguably the shyest and most soft spoken girl in all of Konoha trying to sooth and comfort the loudest knucklehead in the village, who just so happened to be her crush. So maybe it wasn’t all that normal a day after all…
----------

When Hinata had gotten up this morning she had thought that today would be a great day, as she was meeting up with Naruto to see if they had been given clearance to continue as a team after she had eaten and digested their other would-be teammate. She had gotten ready and ran out of her families compound faster then was thought possible by most of her clan. Upon seeing Naruto sitting on a bench not too far from the Hokage’s tower, Hinata had been all smiles. Then as she approached she noticed that not all was well with her blond haired crush.

The boy looked like he hadn’t had a wink of sleep and his eyes were shifting around as if he was trying to look everywhere at once. The part that scared her though was how his eyes seemed to be glazed over, like he wasn’t really there or was lost in his own little world. From the pained looking twitches he made every few moments, Hinata would bet that it was the later and that it was a world full of pain. As she walked closer she noticed how he seemed to be shaking, as if he was jittery and on edge, ready to bolt at any second. This was not the strong and determined young boy that she had fallen for. It was a young boy that looked as if he had just gotten away from a very traumatic experience. She remembered that ominous feeling she had had last night before going to sleep and cursed herself for not rushing off to check on him.

“Naruto-kun?” she called out to him in hopes she wouldn’t startle him, however he didn’t respond. It bothered her how his eyes simply went right past her as if she wasn’t there while still looking like he was searching for something, as if he expected something to jump out and attack him. Not willing to be ignored by her crush she reached out with her hand, intending to gently place it on his shoulder and called his name again. “Naruto-kun?” This time as her hand touched him she got a response, it just wasn’t the one she had been hoping for.

Naruto shrieked in terror the moment her hand touched him and tried to jump away from her. Hinata was too shocked by Naruto’s reaction to try and stop him and even as he tumbled in his haste to jump away while still sitting on the bench she did nothing but, stare at him with wide eyes feeling both hurt and worried. Her worry for him only grew as she watched him turnaround from his spot on the ground and look at her like she was the Shikigami himself come to take his soul. It took a few moments but, she eventually saw recognition make its way through his eyes and he visibly started to calm down. While Hinata was felt the hurt that Naruto’s earlier reaction had caused to disappear, she still worried about what had happened to him to cause this.

Taking a small step forward she reached out for him but, made sure she didn’t get to close out of fear that he would start panicking again. She needn’t have worried, as before she could call his name again Naruto had leaped up and embraced her in a powerful, if seemingly desperate hug. She was quick to push the embarrassment she felt away and wrapped her arms around him, whispering soothing words and rubbing his back as she felt his body quiver from barely contained sobs. Gently she maneuvered them back to the bench and sat down. Never once releasing her hold on Naruto as the boy continued to hug her with a sense of desperation, like she was his last lifeline in whatever had happened. She silently swore to herself that she would find whoever or whatever had done this to her Naruto-kun and she would make them suffer the slowest and most agonizing digestion that she could possibly give. Hinata would never forgive the one that had hurt her beloved Naruto.
------------

Kurenai walked towards the Hokage Tower feeling very nervous. She had desperately tried to digest her only male student nearly all night long but, after using four Rapid Digestion and three Digestive Aid jutsu’s in her attempt to end her male students life and failing, she had no choice but to let him out. She had regurgitated him and then quickly slapped some very powerful genjutsu’s on him in an attempt to alter his memory of the entire event. Even if she had managed that, the chances of him going back to how he was before she ate him were not very good.

As she came closer to her destination she noticed a very unusual sight. Hinata Hyuga was currently holding a boy’s head to her chest and running the fingers of one hand through the boy’s spiky blond locks. She stopped at that and looked again. ‘Spiky blond hair, check; orange jumpsuit, check; Hinata willingly allowing the boy to live more than a few seconds after having his face pressed against her breasts, check; There is only one person that could be then…’ she thought to herself with a sigh, ‘Naruto.’ Kurenai was now really hoping her genjustu had done its job or else she might be walking right up to a potential beating; from her shyest student no less.

Continuing towards her should-have-been apprentice and would-be meal, Kurenai attempted to calm her racing heart and readied herself for what would likely be her best acting moment ever.
------------

Hinata felt relief at seeing her teacher appear and pulled the much calmer boy just a little closer to herself before gently whispering to him, “Naruto-kun, Kurenai-sensei is…” She got no farther as Naruto immediately stiffened at hearing their teachers name and quickly realized that he was starting to have another panic attack, this one even worse than the one he had to her. “Naruto-kun?!? Naruto-kun what’s wrong?” She could feel Naruto’s panic starting to seep into her and her voice. Looking at the boy she noticed how he had turned to look at their teacher and how that glazed I’m-not-here look had returned to his eyes as his entire body started trembling. Her feelings of worry soon mixed with fright as she saw that he was starting to hyperventilate at the sight of Kurenai.

Thinking quickly Hinata, forced Naruto to stop looking at the woman and buried his face in her bosom while trying desperately to calm him down. Her mind didn’t want to except it but, from Naruto’s reaction she now knew that Kurenai had something to do with his current condition. She pushed the thoughts of vengeance to the back of her mind for now. Naruto was all that mattered to her, she would simply have to deal justice to her sensei later.

Sakura swallows Kurenai or the plan ended up failing.
15531222211221112211211122.content:
When Kurenai arrived she quickly hid herself in the trees so as to get a peek at what was happening. Suffice to say the scene she saw playing out was not one that she had expected. In the clearing she could see the two girls of her team, both looking like they had seen better days. Hinata was on the ground looking as if she had just gone ten rounds with a rabid animal. Her clothes were torn and her body, from what Kurenai could see as the girl was laying facedown in the ground, was covered in cuts, bruises and blood. Kurenai was happy to see that Sakura wasn't all that much better off, as the pink haired girl was clearly in pain and favoring her left leg.

She wondered where Naruto was but, on seeing Sakura moving in with the clear intention of making Hinata into a meal, Kurenai decided that it was time to act.

--------- Some Minutes Earlier-----

Naruto wasn't to sure about the plan that Hinata and Sakura had cooked up together. Despite their pink haired teammates desire to eat them, Hinata had believed that working together would bring about better results then working alone. To that end Hinata had approached Sakura and struck a deal with her. He wasn't sure what that deal was but, it somehow involved letting Hinata swallow him down again. Not that he was complaining about letting Hinata eat him. No, he was more concerned with how doing so would then make Hinata into a much more desirable target for their hungry teammate.

Working with Sakura made him feel uneasy and he had made sure to tell Hinata this. Her response had been a small comforting smile. It shouldn't have been so easy for her to put him at ease. It shouldn't be that easy for her to get him to agree, yet all it took was that one smile and a promise that it would all work out to get him to go through with it.

Naruto sighed into the slimy, pulsing muscles of Hinata's stomach wall. Common sense told him that it was a bad idea to go along with an agreement that he didn't even know the terms to. Then again, he never was one to listen to common sense.

-----With Hinata and Sakura------

Sakura couldn't help but, feel a strong sense of jealousy as she observed Hinata gulping down the rest of Naruto. The boy hadn't fought against being eaten by the heiress in even the slightest manner. 'It's almost like he wants t...' Sakura quickly banished that thought with a shake of the head. It didn't matter to her if Naruto wanted Hinata to eat him or not. All that mattered was that their plan worked so they could get missions that told them to eat people. Every hungery kunoichi dreamed of being on a disposal squad as it meant being ordered to eat till you were about to pop. Even Hinata, as shy and kind as she was, dreamed of being ordered to go out and eat herself into a food coma. It was just how kunoichi's were.

Seeing the last of Naruto enter Hinata's stomach she decided to push forward. "Now that he is packed away, perform the 'Stomach Concealment no Jutsu' so we can get started." Sakura cracked her knuckles as she prepared to start wailing on the sated girl. Hinata gave a wet belch while looking at her impatient partner in this plan. "I need to ~urp~ let him settle ~Buuurrrppp~ first, before the jutsu. You remember the plan right?" The bloated Hyuga asked clearly enjoying the tiny wiggles Naruto made as he settled into his hiding place.

Sakura groaned in a mix of irritation and hunger. "Yes, I remember the plan. After you use the concealment jutsu we beat on each other until sensei comes. Then you will lay on the ground and I'll move in as if I'm going to eat you. You'll give a signal to tell me that sensei is incoming. My job will then be to distract her while you throw Naruto back up. Then all three of us will attack her with the intention of one of us eating her so we can pass." Seeing the girl smile at her while rubbing her Naruto belly made Sakura's eye twitch in annoyance. "Well?!? Get to it!"

Hinata performed the seals for the 'Stomach Concealment' jutsu but, seeing as how she had not mastered it yet, her belly only shrank down to a bulge the size of a basket ball rather then to a barely noticeable bump in her otherwise flat belly. With that done the two got in their battle stances and charged each other, fully intending to beat the other to a bloody pulp.

Pulling the last of their sensei into her, Hinata closed her mouth and gave the strongest swallow she'd ever produced.
