She could however, still make out the tiny movements of Sakura struggling inside of their sensei's stomach and that was just enough to get Hinata lost in the feeling of her meals squirming.

Moving just ever so slightly closer he felt his heart beat double or even triple while hammering so hard in his chest that he was sure that Hinata had to be able to hear it.

Looking upon that creamy white skin, he wanted to reach out and touch it, to run his hands over the bulges and shapes of her belly. Forcing his eyes away from the sight that was surely to haunt his wet dreams, not that he knew that part, he turned to look at Hinata's face.

"Umm, Hinata?" He suddenly went ridged when her eyes flashed to him and he saw something in them. Before he had a chance to even consider moving away he felt Hinata grab the front of his jacket and lift him up to her face before she....

1553122221122111221122.content:
Sakura felt wonderful. The day had started out like shit yes but, now she was quite content. Her day started with failing to eat the blond haired baka (idiot) known as Naruto Uzumaki on her way to the academy. Her second attempt to fill her stomach had also ended in failure. Once she had entered the classroom she had noticed Naruto and quickly leaped to consume the blond before he tried to run again. Oddly, Hinata of all people had jumped in her way but, in the end could do nothing to stop the pink rocket as her lips enveloped the poor Hyuga girl. Sakura of course really didn’t care. If Hinata wanted to be eaten before Naruto then hell, Sakura was all for it. The fact that Hinata tasted like the finest treat that money could buy only added to Sakura’s desire to consume the Hyuga heiress. But, Naruto just had to ruin it by punching her, PUNCHING HER! Of all the things that idiot could have done, he chose to make her gage and nearly choke on her half finished meal. Sakura had had no choice but, to release the girl as the baka’s punch had knocked the air out of her lungs.

Sakura couldn’t help but, grin wickedly as she thought on how sweet revenge tasted. Third time was the charm they say and Sakura had to agree. The class had emptied out no more than twenty minutes after Iruka-sensei finished reading out the team listings. Iruka himself had to leave five minutes after to attend to his other duties. The moment Sakura was sure that Iruka wasn’t coming back she struck. Naruto and Hinata were so surprised by the sudden attack that they had only just risen from their seats by the time Sakura was upon them. The pinkett’s first order of business was to deal a debilitating blow to the blond, and nothing debilitates a boy more than finding a chakra powered kick hitting home. Naruto crumpled quickly, tears in his eyes as he held his crotch. Sakura would admit that kicking him like that had felt really good and she would swear she heard his pelvis bone crack from the blow.

Hinata however, moved in at that moment, planning to defend the agony stricken blond. Sakura had different plans however, as she quickly dodged the palm strike and grabbed the Hyuga’s arm. She used this to throw Hinata off balance before tripping her and slamming the shy girl down into the wooden floor face first. Sakura would give Hinata credit though, as the girl recovered rather quickly from having her nose nearly break. Too bad for her that she didn’t recover faster, as when Hinata spun herself to face her attacker, one of her hands had remained around her face, cradling her nose. That cost her greatly as Sakura used that moment to shove her enlarged mouth around the heiress, the lips stopping their descent around Hinata’s chest. With one of the Hyuga’s hands trapped in Sakura’s esophagus along with her head, Hinata stood no chance. Not wishing to tempt fate, Sakura quickly started swallowing the now panicking girl the moment her saliva lubed her enough to go down. With Hinata still stuck with her rump on the ground, as opposed to Sakura who was standing over her, Hinata had no way of stopping her consumer and soon found herself pushing past Sakura’s sphincter and beginning to fill the pinkett’s stomach.

Sakura, now having consumed Hinata up to her rump, quickly raised her mouth up so that Hinata was hoisted into the air. She watched idly for a few moments as the legs kick and flailed at naught but empty air. The moment soon past as she let Hinata’s own struggles help drag her down into Sakura till only the twitching feet and toes of her delicious meal remained. Those to soon fallowed as Sakura threw her head back with a gulp, pulling the last of her meal into her body before sealing her mouth shut the moment those tasty toes past her lips. She repeated the motions with great vigor as an audible gulp was heard by all still in the room, the bulge signifying the last of Hinata quickly disappearing down her throat.

Sakura gave a loud sigh followed soon after by a wet belch. “Bbbbbuuuurrrrrrp!” Sakura allowed her hands to grab the sides of her swaying and squirming gut. Though her stomach was large it simply pushed against her dress, causing it to lift up a good bit but, not so much that you would see the skin. One could however, clearly make out the contours of the ingested girls body as she squirmed and fought the best she could given her new position. Sakura gave her belly a pat and a small belch, not at all discomforted by the fighting of her meal. She soon turned her hungry eyes on the barely recovered blond and licked her lips in anticipation.

20 Minutes Later
Sakura watched as the toes of her blond haired rival twitched a few times before sucking them in and giving a hard gulp. The bulge didn’t have very far to go before it disappeared, as Sakura had made quick work of the delectable Uzumaki before turning her sights on Kiba and Ino. After all, she had still been hungry. Now, she was laying on top of her gut as it gurgled and churned violently at its squirming contents, the organ itself now being big enough that it looked like she was laying on a skin colored bean bag. She felt so content, she could probably still eat a small child half her size but, seeing as those were currently in short supply and she was rather weighed down with something around three-hundred and fifty-one pounds of nutrition-heavy meat she decided to simply be happy with what she had.

Sighing happily to herself she began to rub her gut while rubbing her cheek against her belly, happy beyond belief at finally having something in her stomach to digest. She let her hands run over the bulges her meals made and groaned in pleasure as she could feel her stomach starting to release weak acids that would work away at her meals clothes and skin. She smiled in a wicked fashion as she thought of how much they would thrash around once the stronger acids poured in and started eating at them. She could hardly wait to hear their muffled screams as her stomach melted them alive into a nutritious goo that her body would happily absorb. She was looking forward to Naruto and Hinata’s last moments most of all.

Current time
Sakura had a smug smile on her face as she knew that her meals would soon start to give in to her and her powerful stomach. ‘Just a few more minutes before they start going limp, and once they do no one not even the Hokage will be allowed to order me to release them.’ She thought, giddy at the idea as it was seen as pointless to force a Kunoichi to throw up a meal that has already expired. So pointless was it that it had become a law among Kunoichi that once your meal goes limp or expires, no one is allowed to take them from you, not even the Hokage could order it. Sakura rubbed her loudly digesting belly, the glee she was feeling growing by the second as she could feel her meals movements slowing, weakening. She licked her lips trying to taste the flavors of her meals once more. She was looking forward to rubbing the fact that she ate and digested two clan heiresses and the dumb blond Naruto in the faces of every girl in her graduating class.

It was around this time that a rather haggard looking woman entered the class and looked around, clearly confused at the lack of students. When she asked where they were Sakura cheerfully stated that she ate them and was currently digesting her large meal. The women did not seem pleased by this however as she marched herself up to Sakura and glared down at the girl.

“My name is Kurenai Yūhi, Junín sensei to Team 8. You wouldn’t happen to be Sakura Haruno, would you?” the red-eyed woman asked. Sakura, either not recognizing the dangerous glare Kurenai was giving her or simply not caring due to how close her meals were in expiring gave and affirmative. “Yep, that’s me. And if you’re looking for your team, well I’m right here.” The pinkett said, as cheery as could be. “I see…” Kurenai responded “the team seems a bit lacking in members though. You wouldn’t happen to be digesting your teammates, would you?” the Junín asked with a dangerous tone in her voice. “Yes I am, I’m also digesting the pieces of trash on Sasuke’s team. Not like these worthless sacks of meat could amount to anything more than wonderful meals for a real Kunoichi.” She said with such certainty staining her voice that Kurenai realized that Sakura truly believed what she had just said.

“I see… that’s such a shame.” Kurenai coldly said as she began a short string of hand seals.

Kurenai finished her hand seals and gently placed her hand upon Sakura’s loudly churning stomach. She watched as her student suddenly went wide eyed and pale before she started heaving and retching, both loudly and violently. Kurenai watched with a cold impassiveness as a bulge slowly formed outside Sakura’s loudly protesting and groaning stomach. The single bulge was soon followed by more as they traveled up through Sakura’s chest and into her throat. Kurenai was hoping that Sakura would at least vomit up Hinata though she would prefer the pink haired girl lost all of her meals. Sadly, Kurenai knew that would not happen as the justu she had used would only force up two students, and due to how the justu worked she would not be able to use it again on Sakura. So if she failed to save her students through this justu, she would have to use her authority to order the girl vomit up the rest or force her to. Kurenai was worried though as she had no idea just how long the girl had been digesting her captives, on top of that she had little experience in using this forced regurgitation justu and thus ran the risk of accelerating the girls’ digestion on the two who were not released.

Kurenai was broken from her thoughts and worries by the sound of a wet body hitting the floor. Looking she felt a sense of dread form in the pit of her stomach as she saw the red and acid burned form of Kiba Inuzuka, his clothes having been digested to the point that they were nothing more than tattered and sticky strands of thread. The boy was still breathing and would live if given proper medical attention. Kurenai hated herself for hoping it but, she dearly prayed Hinata would be the one to find her way out of the death trap her pink-haired teammate turned out to be. Her prayers went unanswered however, as Ino Yamanaka hit the ground next to Kiba with a hard bang. The girl didn’t look much better then Kiba but, she at least still had some clothing, though tattered cloth and partly digested bandages may not really count toward such.

Kurenai stared at the two young genin in a mix of horror and relief, relief that she had managed to save two promising ninja of her village and horror because, Hinata wasn’t among the two she had saved. Turning her eyes towards Sakura she saw the girl clutching her throat and coughing while using her other hand to support herself against a wall. Kurenai eyed the girls’ stomach which was swaying gently underneath the pinkett as she slowly started to get her breathing under control and relax. Kurenai saw the movements inside the organic prison and her heart sped with worry at seeing so little movement from her captive students. Kurenai made to move towards Sakura and demand that she release her teammates as well but, stopped as she heard a terrible sound. Sakura’s stomach churned loudly and violently for a moment before returning to a calmer pace as it continued to unleash acids to painfully melt the meat inside it into a nutritious goop.

Kurenai had never felt such disgust for a Kunoichi’s stomach as they digested their captives alive as she did right now. She lost herself for a moment simply glaring hatefully at the organic prison as it continued to peacefully sway as it work away at her other students. A gurgle snapped Kurenai out of her hateful glare and reminded her that there was still time to save them, if barely. She moved quickly to Sakura and grabbed the girl by the shoulder, forcing her to turn. Kurenai opened her mouth to speak but, took on last glance at the girls’ stomach where she saw…
15531222211221112211221.title: Only moments to save a life.

choices: Sakura to die by digestion. I’ll eat her myself. (Hanabi eats Sakura)
Sakura to suffer as my personal slave.
155312222112211122112211.content:
Kurenai couldn’t believe it. She stood there, mouth agape as she stared at Haruno’s stomach. She had turned her pink haired student around and had just opened her mouth to demand that she vomit up her teammates, when she saw the forms inside the girl’s stomach suddenly go limp. Kurenai watched the stomach, a mixed feeling of defeat and hopelessness filling her. She had failed two of her students before she even got the chance to see them. Kurenai felt a need to sit down and slowly walked backwards to a chair before collapsing in to it like a puppet with its strings cut. So deep was she in her self-reflection of her failure that she almost didn’t hear Sakura as she spoke.

“It's about time they just died! I swear, I expected the blond baka to keep fighting even past the time he should’ve died but, Hinata surprised me. She was downright delicious but, still. She fought a pointless fight longer then Naruto. Stupid tasty bitch should have just rolled over and died as soon as…” Sakura however never got to finish her sentence as Kurenai, in a fit of rage sprang up and grabbed the girl by her dresses collar. The wind was soon knocked out of Sakura as Kurenai slammed the girls back into the nearest wall with a loud ‘THUD’. Opening her eyes and looking at her new sensei Sakura finally realized that maybe she had crossed the line with that comment. “Listen and listen well you little pink haired monster,” Kurenai began, her voice low and colder the ice the look of disgust and hate burning behind her eyes creating a small spark of fear in the semi-stated Haruno. “I don’t care what anyone else has to say on this matter; the fact is that you have just committed a crime as stated in the village charter. Now, if you don’t feel like visiting ‘MY’ stomach as punishment then you will go to the Hokage’s office and inform him that there are some ‘issues’ with the team setup, you will also tell him that I will explain everything to him once I arrive. You are not to tell anyone who has died in your stomach, is this clear?!?” Haruno opened her mouth to speak, a defiant spark in her eye but, Kurenai would have none of that and slammed her into the wall again. “I said, IS THAT CLEAR!!!” Sakura seemed to get the message and though glaring at her while doing it, she did nod. “Good,” Kurenai replied while dropping the girl to her feet “Now go.” Kurenai watched as Sakura stomped her way out of the room, her belly, which was already starting to soften and round out as her meals slowly lost their form, gurgled and sloshed loudly the whole time.

Turning around Kurenai directed her gaze at the Uchiha. “You will inform that lazy bastard you have for a sensei that he can find his other students at the hospital.” She didn’t wait for a reply as she quickly but, carefully scooped up Kiba and Ino before she used a Shunshin (body flicker) to quickly bring them to the hospital. After dropping the two genin off, Kurenai decided that it would be best to get the one person that would be most affected by Hinata’s fate and bring them to the Kage’s office. So with a resigned sigh she disappeared in a flash of Shunshin towards the Hyuga compound.

Twenty minutes Later:
Hokage’s Office

Sarutobi Hiruzen the Third Hokage was watching the pink haired girl with a curious eye. He had no idea what had happened that Kurenai sent her obviously gorged student to him with a message rather then simply coming to report it herself but, something told him that it was going to cause quite a lot of problems soon. He was soon proven correct as Kurenai entered his office along with Hiashi Hyuga, Hinata’s father and Hanabi Hyuga, Hinata’s little sister of nearly eight years old. Sarutobi groaned, expertly ignoring Haruno’s quite belch as he wondered what could possibly have happened.

“Kurenai please explain to me what this is about? And how it involves Hiashi and his youngest daughter?” Hiashi took this moment to move forward and speak to Kurenai. “I too would like to know why I have been dragged away from my daughters’ teachings, Kurenai.” Kurenai gave Hiashi a look of slight contempt before speaking. “I’m sorry. I thought you would’ve liked to have a say in the future of the one you ate and digested you eldest daughter?”

The room went silent for a moment. The quiet broken by the voice of a young girl. “WHAT?!? WHAT DO YOU MEAN MY SISTER WAS DIGESTED?!? I THOUGHT YOU WERE SUPOSSE TO BE HER TEACHER!?!” everyone turned to the little Hyuga who was now shaking in both shock and fear of what she had heard. Tears started to build in her eyes as she gave Kurenai a pleading look, as if begging to hear her say that this was some sick joke. Kurenai looked away from the distraught child in shame and began to make her report. Needless to say most of the occupants of the room started to glare at the Haruno, who barely seemed effected at all. No, Sakura was spending her time much more productively, in her mind, as she made small taunts and jeers to Hanabi. She saw the girl was barely holding herself back from charging her with the intent to kill and Sakura was hoping she would as it would mean a second Hyuga snack. As far as Sakura was concerned, if the little girl wanted her sister back then she just had to take a trip down her throat and digest like Hinata still was.

The Hokage looked gravely at Hiashi before speaking, “Hiashi, as the injured party you have say over what to do with this criminal.” He was prevented from saying anymore however, from the shrieking voice of said criminal. “WHAT?!? That’s not fair! I ate them fair an square, you have no right to punish me!” Hiashi however was the one to speak surprising everyone as his voice showed only the slimmest glimmers of hate and contempt for Sakura, a testament to his emotional control. “That is where you are wrong. If you had paid better attention to the laws you would know that the consuming of teammates is forbidden unless given permission by said teammate or ordered to by the Hokage themselves. On top of this, there is a ruling in Konoha’s charter that expressly forbids the consumption and digestion of clan heirs and heiresses. This law also applies to Naruto due to his value to the village.” Kurenai, not to be forgotten, pick up from there. “You have not only consumed and digested you teammates without any form of permission or orders but, you have also done so to both, Naruto, a valued village military asset and Hinata, the heiress of one of the most protégés clans in the village. That’s three charges right there, all of which have a punishment ranging from lifelong imprisonment to public execution to even forced enslavement to the injured party.”

Sakura by this time had paled considerable as she realizes that her life as she knew it was over. She silently blamed Naruto and Hinata for being so damn tasty and stupid.

“So Hiashi,” asked the Kage “what sort of punishment should Sakura be given?” Hiashi however turned to Hanabi and told her that she would be the one to choose. The Hyuga munchkin glared hatefully at Sakura and said, “I want…”

1553122221122111221122111.content:
Hiashi looked to his youngest daughter, only slightly surprised by her choice. “Are you sure, Hanabi? You have only just started learning how to consume things as big as your head and with your teacher,” he took this moment to look at Sakura’s churning stomach which by now had lost all the bulges Hinata and Naruto had once made, “permanently indisposed, you have some ways to go before you could eat this girl when she isn’t so… sated.” Hanabi turned to her father, a determined and stubborn flare in her lilac eyes. “Then I’ll just learn how to eat her quickly. Give me two days and I’ll eat this… this, “bitch” no problem.” Sakura seemed insulted at the bitch comment but, Sarutobi cut her off before she could even begin. “Very well. In three days time Sakura Haruno will suffer punishment of death by digestion from one Hanabi Hyuga. Till that time Haruno will be kept in a secure prison and not allowed visitation by anyone. ANBU take her.”

And like that Sakura found herself surrounded by members of the ANBU Black Ops and escorted to a small secured room, were she was chained to a wall by a short set of chains meant to keep her standing the whole time she was there. Sakura huffed in annoyance, she promised herself that she would show that little bite sized snack who was boss and so patently waited for time to pass. The sounds of Naruto and Hinata’s remains sloshing around in her belly acting as her only company.

Back in the Kage office
“Well Hanabi, I wish you luck in your practice. The execution will be a private affair done in the small room Haruno is locked up in now. Will you want anyone with you as you consume her?” asked the aged leader. Hanabi thought on this before deciding against it. She wanted the payback to have a more personal feel to it. Something that would be lost to her if she had an audience. “Very well then. When the time comes you will make your way into her cell to consume her. We will return after a time to check up on you. An hour or two should give you plenty of time to swallow her down and be well on your way to digesting her.”

The meeting soon ended with her father stating that he would have some of the more talented kunoichi in their clan teach her what they can with what time she still had. Hanabi thanked her father but moved to her sisters’ room the moment they entered the compound. Hiashi made sure the clan members knew not to bother her as Hanabi needed this chance to grieve for her loving older sister.

Later that Night:
In Haruno’s cell

A man in cloak and mask stepped through the shadows with long practiced ease. He moved quietly and quickly. Removing the guards around his targets room proved easy as a simple push of pressure points knocked them out cold allowing him to silently step inside. There chained to the wall, he saw his target and made contact.

“Awaken Haruno” he spoke in an emotionless voice, he was one striped of the burden of emotions thanks to his master. A master that now had an offer he felt this girl would find most enjoyable. He waited till the girl awoke and looked at him before continuing. “My master was most displeased to find you had digested this village’s greatest weapon.” He saw fear enter the girls’ eyes and would have scoffed if he was capable of it. “With Naruto Uzumaki gone, he has decided to shift his view to others, such as you. My master wishes to make a ‘deal’ if you will. A bargain that will be seen as favorable for both sides.” He gave her a moment and saw the fear vanish from her eyes, curiosity now taking hold. ”I will loosen the shackles that bind you enough so that you can break free and turn things around on your executioner before making an escape. Though my master has already shifted some of his people in place you will still need to make the escape yourself. And you will not have much time after consuming your would be consumer.”

Sakura thought on this a moment before asking the obviously question, “What do I need to do in exchange?” The masked figure gave a small grunt before responding. “You will eat.” He said as if that answered everything. When he saw her cock her head to the side in confusion he explained further. “My master wants a weapon against the other villages. You, or more precisely your stomach, will be that weapon. You will be given special training before being sent out with the goal of literally consuming the other ninja villages and rouge ninja.”

He gave her a moment to think it over before asking, “Will you accept my master’s most generous offer? Freedom, the right to consume anyone not bearing Konoha’s symbol, and of course making a meal out of a second Hyuga heiress. What more could you ask for?”

Sakura thought and thought. This offer seemed like a holy grail to hungry Kunoichi’s but, was it worth it to… She was snapped from her thoughts by her hungry stomach. Hinata and Naruto now long gone, nothing left of them but, a small layer of fat on her belly and the rest currently collecting in her intestines as waste for disposal at a later time. Sakura licked her lips in anticipation. “Tell your boss he has a deal!” the masked man nodded, “Lord Danzo will be most pleased.” He said.

Kurenai blinked in shock as she continued to stare down at the naked Hyuga girl. How couldn't she? She had believed that Hinata was the girl in orange yet, here she was, naked as the day she was born with only angry red skin and very light acid burns to show for her time inside her teammates stomach. Yet, she could see no blond haired boy exiting from the pink haired death trap that was Sakura. So where was he?

"That was close!" Stated the clearly relieved orange wearing girl. Kurenai wondered just who she was and kept a close eye on her while ripping some of the bandages from her dress so she could make some makeshift covering for the young Hyuga girl. To say she was shocked at seeing bright blond hair and blue eyes on the girl would be an understatement, or it would have been had she not remembered the rumors about this boy developing some kind of anti-pervert jutsu. Still she had a few questions that she had to know the answers to.

"Naruto?" The blond girl turned towards Kurenai and smiled while attempting to strip herself of the skintight orange suit. "Sorry Sensei but, when I'm like this I prefer you call me Naruko." Kurenai couldn't help but give the blond a curious look before sweat dropping at the sight of her male-turned-female student complaining about the suit being too tight around her boobs as she tried to free herself. "Oookay, Naruko then. How are you not, well, digested? And an even better question, how did you swallow Hinata like that?" Seemed the other girl was in some pain from regurgitating such a massive shape as a Hinata-filled-Naruko.

Naruko, who much to Kurenai's shock and embarrassment, gave her sensei a confused look while trying to wiggle her hips out of the tight suit and expose her naked form to everyone. "What do you mean, 'how did you swallow Hinata like that'? I just swallowed her, like any girl does." Answer the confused girl as she finally freed her hips and started hopping around while trying to slide the suit off her legs. Kurenai felt like hitting the boy, err, girl for making such a display in public. Didn't she notice how her hopping was causing her rather large, for her age, breasts to bounce and jiggle in front of everyone? Face palming in embarrassment her annoyance only heightened when she heard Hinata give a small 'eep' and faint with a small nosebleed.

"Naruko you realize that a boy shouldn't be able to do that, even if they use the 'Transformation jutsu'? It is only an illusion after all." Hearing that Naruko stilled and promptly fell over before sputtering out, "WHAT?!? But, sensei, if it's only an illusion why did no one tell me I've been doing something wrong? I mean these are rather real if I do say so myself." The blond emphasized her point by cupping her breasts. "No way those can be real Baka! Right Sasuke-kun?" Came the horse voice of team Kurenai's pink haired member. All she got from the still brooding boy was a "Hn" and a scowl before he went back to thinking of ways to kill a certain brother of his.

"He is so gay. I mean Hinata-chan and I are butt naked and he hasn't even tried to steal a peek." deadpanned the naked blond girl who was still fondling her rack. "HENTAI! DIE!! CHA!!!" Came the obvious response from 'Pinky' as she smashed the blonds face in with her fist, KO-ing the poor girl.

Kurenai ignored Sakura's ranting and refused to acknowledge the out cold naked blond girl who clearly didn't understand the term modesty. Instead she focused on the orange suit. She knew that there where fabrics and materials that were resistant to even a kunoichi's powerful stomach but to have an entire suit of it was very rare, and very pricy... The fact that Naruto had it on as a jumpsuit and that it now took the form of a complete bodysuit said that it was not only custom made but, that it had to have a multitude of seals in it that would allow it to shift and access a stored up chakra that was likely sealed up in some complicated seal array. 'There is no way that an orphan, much less a hated orphan with nothing to his name, has the money to make purchase something like this. And if that's not all, he can even perform a true transformation! That shouldn't even be possible; at least I don't think it is...'

Kurenai had a lot she'd have to think on about this but first, "Alright, Sakura you are staying here and explaining to Kakashi why he is lacking two students. You will then perform any punishment that he finds appropriate without complaint. Uchiha, you will insure she informs your sensei as this could give him an excuse to simply drop your team completely." She ignored the looks of surprise that crossed the only two conscious genin, though she did take some delight in the angry glare the Uchiha sent Sakura. "If Kakashi asks, I'll be dropping these four off at the hospital. Sakura, I'll be speaking to the Hokage about this. If he doesn't revoke your headband then meet at training ground 16 at 7am two days from now." And with that Kurenai and the four out cold students simply vanished.

15532111112231.content:
Naruto Uzumaki was looking for food, it was just after sunset in Konoha and he was being very cautious, you see, as far back as anyone can remember, one day suddenly all males have been shrunken in the elemental nations to be at an inch tall, many people speculate that it was an act of Kami, others say it was an extremely powerful jutsu that seems to only effect the men.

Either way, females were now the dominate gender in the elemental nations. But it wasn't all bad for the shrunken males.

Due to the being shrunk males have become somewhat more durable, but only by being in contact with a woman, for example, if a brick falls on a male, the weight from the brick will crush him to death. However, when a female sits down on top of a male and puts her full weight on the shrunken male, the male will survive, though it likely hurts them or at least makes them feel extremely uncomfortable.

Also after learning this, the women began to abuse the males in one of two ways, the most common way the women do is, that they swallow any shrunken male they can, While digestion isn't fatal and doesn't cause any real lasting damage, traveling through a women's digestive track is anything but fun for the males. Being eaten is an embarrassing and humiliating experience for the males, and under the right conditions (such as the girl who eats them and how often they get eaten compared to how long they spend outside a girls hungry body.) can leave a lasting stigma on a boys reputation.

This is the exact reason for why Naruto is to be very cautious as he was looking for food, cause he remembers all to well just how close he was to being inside a woman's stomach.

----Flashback ----

When Naruto was six years old, he was alone, and it was already night and he was looking for some food, and then he saw a piece of dango fall in front of him and since he was so hungry, he threw caution to the wind and he ran to the piece to eat.

But then a shadow covered him, causing him to look up and he was suddenly snatched up from the ground and he was suddenly in Anko's mouth on top of her tounge, being swished, tasted and also being rapped by the special jonin's tongue and Anko wanted to also enjoy her favorite snack, tied with shrunken males, a piece of dango to go with her prey, so when she opened her mouth, Naruto took that as his chance to escape Anko's mouth and he quickly jumped out of her mouth and began to run as fast as his legs could go, the second he hit the ground.

Seeing her little snack was running, Anko got angry and gave chase but Naruto was using his size to squeeze under places that Anko was too big to go through or had to make her go around, and after a while of being chased, Naruto finally lost her.

---- Flashback end ----

Since then, Naruto has been very cautious and Anko wasn't the only Kunoichi to try and swallow him though, Naruto has also encountered Tsume Inuzuka, Yugao Uzuki, Kurenai Yuhi, and more and everytime, he's always escaped from each of them before they could swallow him, and soon enough the Kunoichi had put a bounty on his head and the reward to the kunoichi who could bring him to the mission assignment office, the kunoichi in question will get the right to claim Naruto as theirs.

But as Naruto was out looking for food, someone was looking for him.

A young girl named Tenten that had chocolate brown eyes, lightly tanned skin, a perpetual blush due to her young age, and wore a pink blouse, and yellow fastening buttons. She also had bangs that covered her forehead, along with her long, chocolate brown hair being done up in a practical style of two Chinese-style chignon buns, one on either side of her head with them parted by a space between them in the middle so that they resembled the ears of a panda or a cartoon mouse to keep it out her face.

She was after Naruto so she could claim the reward on Naruto's bounty to help get more materials and supplies for her family's blacksmith shop, to see if Naruto's sexual rumors were true or not, possibly see what Naruto would taste like ("possibly" being the key word there), to prove that women are just as strong if not stronger than men and to prove that she had what it takes to be a real kunoichi even though she was still in the academy.

But the one thing that she really wanted to see, was that if it was true or not, was how it was rumored that her target actually respected women, even felt that they could do and take things that men can only ever dream of doing.

She heard that Naruto felt that the whole men-are-stronger-than-women thing wasn't just chauvinistic garbage, it was ass-backwards! If anything, it was WOMEN that are tougher and stronger than men, as a sheer principle of the laws of nature.

A good example of that, from what it had been heard Naruto saying, was giving birth.

Naruto felt the reason that WOMEN are the only ones who go through it was simple―they were the ONLY ones with a firm enough constitution to be able to handle it! Hell! Tenten heard that, he even considered the Make-Out Series he had to use as temporary shelter from a rain storm to be complete filth and that "Toad Sage" guy that writes them to be an absolutely shameless pig for making women be presented that way, just so he could make himself a few bucks!

So, Tenten had plenty of reasons to want to get ahold of him as her own.

Trouble being, she couldn't FIND him! She'd been at this for hours already!

Tenten was just about to call it quites, she looked everywhere every shrunken boy Naruto's age would go to, but she couldn't find that blonde Uzumaki boy, but she thought of looking at one last place where she heard that he does go to and when she got to the Ichiraku ramen shop, her eyes widened and used an optical jutsu that her fellow kunoichi-hopefulls were learning to use to find shrunken boys and there he was, naked as the day he was born and sitting near the service counter eating a fishcake that some kunoichi must've dropped. Containing her excitement and joy to finding him she carefully and slowly crept up from behind the blonde Uzumaki.

As she crept up from behind Naruto, Tenten was mentally chanting to him, 'That's right Naruto, you just keep eating that delicious fishcake piece you like so much, don't mind me, I'm just a curious giantess to you and about to catch you.'

When she was close enough, Tenten quickly snatched Naruto right off the ground saying as she did, "Gotcha!"

The result was instant as Naruto started to struggle desperately.

Tenten blinked. Well...as common as this was, she had to admit Naruto was putting up such a spirited struggle that his capture seemed unjust.

Quickly pulling out a spool of ninja wire, the girl looked down at him while saying, "For whatever it's worth, I'm sorry."

With that, she procceded to wrap him in the wire until he was cocooned in it, up to his chin. And he still struggled frantically. Tenten had to admit, she could see why this little guy was such a handful to capture. He never quits.

Well...she had him, now the trick was keeping her hold of him.
Tenten smiled as a though struck her and she put Naruto in one of her hair buns and lightly pressed him down into it until he was completely submerged in her hair. She hoped he'd find his place to hide from anyone out to take him from her to be cozy.

'Now to turn him in to the mission assignment office.' Tenten thought to herself as she turned and quickly ran to the mission office...

Naruto opened the classroom door slowly and took a quick peek in. He wasn't late for class or anything. Then came the screams of panic and fear only to soon be replaced by muffled sounds and a loud burp. Naruto had quickly retreated once he broke from his shock. All the girls were gathered in the clearing. They all knew what was about to happen, and how could then not? They've only spent the last three or so years preparing for it. All that time spent learning numerious styles of martial arts, all the exercises in existance and just how they effect the body, strategy and tactics lessons, and most importantly how to gather and channel chakra. Everything they would need to become kunoichi. And now it was time to see if it was worth it, or if the last three years of their lives were wasted.

Needless to say, everyone was under a lot of stress and trying to deal with it in their own ways. Many were clustered in small groups, nervously chatting. Others were doing some warm up stretches and exercises, trying not to think of what failure would mean. And there amoung them, towards the back, was one girl with a hard look of resolve in her eyes. She knew exactly how she wanted this to play out and she would not settle for anything else.

And then a new figure emerged into the field through the thin stretch of trees that separated the forest from the academy. The wide figure, sporting a large gut the preceded him, was one that was immediately familiar to the girls. It was Iruka, the male teacher of the academy. He spent most of his time instructing the boys portion of the class, but the girls had all seen him many of times when he would emitt chakra for them to practice weilding and gathering.

He came to a stop before them, a rather serious expression on his round face in place of his normal cheerful grin. Seeing that he had their attention, he began.

"Today is the day. Today is the day when you all prove to us if you have what it takes to be Kunoichi of Konoha. This is what you have all prepared for. I trust that you all know what is at stake and what you are supposed to do, but I will repeat it one last to ensure there is no confusion and no excuses."

"The way of the ninja is composed of two parts, the way of the shinobi and the way of the kunoichi. Shinobi are the only ones capable of generating chakra, but are incapable of wielding it. Kunoichi are the only ones who can wield chakra but cannot make it. So the two must always act together. The shinobi must train to enlarge his reserves and their bodies in order to hold them, which the kunoichi must train her body to make it a strong as possible and learn to wield to chakra shinobi lend them. The two must always act together to be strong."

"And that is the purpose of today's test. For the boys to prove that they have the reserves necessary to become shinobi and you girls to prove that you have the strength required to be kunoichi. The boy's half of your class has been scattered throughout the far reaches of the forest, and when the test begins at noon, they will begin to release their chakra into the air. Now, if it were me or another experienced shinobi, you would all be able to feel it easily. But that is not the case here. None of the boys have anywhere near my charka reserves or my level of chakra dispersion skills. And that is where the test begins for you."

"As you all should know, certain kunoichi are more receptive to certain shinobi's chakra. The chakra just seems to match the coils very easily. And that is what will happen here. You will only be able to feel the chakra of one of the boys, if any, and that will be the one to whom you are the most allined with, the one who you will work best with. And if the two of you pass, the one you will be paired with for your entire ninja career."

'My entire career, maybe my entire life, spent together with Naruto,' the girl thinks to herself, further strengthening her resolve with that thought.

"But first you must pass your exam," Iruka continued. "And to do that, you must follow the chakra they are emitting back to them. As said, they are in the far recesses of this forest, dispersed at random, making it highly unlikely that you will find one of them unless you are following his chakra, feeling it growing stronger as you get closer and using it to speed you on your way as you get closer and the terrain gets ruffer. And don't expect any of them to make their way to you. As I said before, the terrain between them and the academy is very rugged and difficult, in order for them to all get in there, they had to be carrried by kunoichi, and that is the only way they can get out, whether it is with one of you or one of the instructers after the test is over."

"But even once you reach one of your male peers, there is still more to the test. We must be absolutely sure that both of you have what it takes to be ninja and that chakra really is flowing between the two of you. Now I know that all of you are more than strong enough to carry a civilian your age over this terrain. But these are not civilians you will be carrying. The boys have spent a long time preparing for this day, strengthening their reserves, so now even the smallest and lightest of them is far heavier than a civilian their age. And as I said before, the terrain is far to difficult for them to cross and the distance far too great for them to cover in the three hours you have for this test. That means that you will have to carry them back here the whole way."

"The terrain is not so difficult as to stop you, even if you aren't using chakra, but that is only true on the way there. For the trip back, it will be impossible for you to carry them back in time without chakra. However if you can use his chakra, you may very well find the trip back easier than the trip there."

"To sum it up, follow a chakra signiture to the boy who is emitting it. Then use that chakra that they are emitting to carry him back. If the two of you make it back within three hours, then your ninja careers begin."

"And I wish you all the best of luck, because the test starts NOW!" Iruka shouted the last bit, concluding his speech.

All the girls stood still, searching and feeling for any chakra. And among them stood one of them whose eyes held such resolve eariler, eyes now closed, completely focused on the task at hand. For her the rest of the world faded away, trivial and unimportant compared to the undertaking before her. She stood there perfectly still, searching for it. 'THERE!' she thought, her head immediately turning slightly to the left, before she shot off in that direction.

She tore through the foliage, not even bothering to look at her peers or sense, aware only the path before her and the faint energy in the air. Energy she was swiftly gathering, sending straight to her legs, strengthening her toned leg muscles to speed her one her way. 'I'm coming Naruto,' she thought.

----------

Meanwhile, the subject of the pale eyed heiress's thoughts sat in a field deep within the forest. He had no idea where where in said forest he was, or even which was the way to the academy, but none of that mattered. He had far more vital things demanding his attention and could not afford to be distracted by such trivial thoughts.

He had to focus all his thoughts on the chakra he was emitting and his reserves. He had to make sure that it was enough to be noticed and to lead someone here, but not so much that he wouldn't have any to lend on the way back.

He tried to ignore everything else in the world, but he could not help himself. He was already extremely anxious when the exam began, and as time passed he only grew more so. He began to fear that he wasn't sending out enough chakra to be noticed or that it wasn't reaching far enough. With a shake of his head, he banished such thoughts. He had to stay focused, he couldn't allow for doubts.

And then, he was started as he heard a rustling in the vegetation around him, and into the clearing strode . . .
15533111111.title: The Graduation Exam, Find Your Partner!

choices: Yes, why limit Naruto to just one amazon?
No, Naruto has enough with just one amazon
155331111112.content: Was it really just someONE? What if Naruto's chakra (perhaps due to the Kyuubi) was actually attuned to mutiple girls and they all wound up paired with him.
155331111112.title: A Harem?

choices: Naruto with Sakura and Ino.  Are there anymore girls next to him?
1553311111121.content:
In a well lit room within the walls of the Konoha sat two figures. One was a tall, blonde, powerful woman. Before her sat a man who would normally be seen as morbidly obese. They were the Fourth Hokage. With the other changes to the Ninja world, the title no longer referred to a singular being, but the power of the two. This pair was Lady Tsunade and Lord Jiraiya.

"Naruto's in this year's exam isn't he?" Jiraiya asked, looking at the shogi table before him. Tsunade nodded.

"I've been worried about this day since his parents died," Tsunade said, recalling the amazing powerhouse pair of Minato and Kushina. Kushina stood much taller than any of the other girls, as she was the previous host to the kyubi. And like so many other pairings they ended up falling in love and had a son. But on the day of his birth, the Kyubi broke free with the help of a dark pair. So, using what they had left, they sealed the Kyubi within Naruto, ensuring his fate to be a powerful Shinobi. His natural chakara reserves were evident soon after birth as he was naturally chubby, but the village elders knew in most every case of a tail-beast container being a man, he would have several partners. But this fact was not commonly known, nor was what Naruto contained within him.

-----------

Sakura stood before the sitting Naruto. She let out a heavy sigh. She had hoped to find Sasuke, but knew her duty as a Kunochi to work with her partner. She walked towards her new companion. Like most other girls, she had not been given much chance to befriend many boys since she started in the academy.

"Hello Naruto," Sakura said finally. Naruto looked up at the fit girl before her.

"Sakura, so you're my partner?" he asked. He hoped it had not been some trick. Despite little contact with the girls most of the boys still mocked him, inheriting their parents' hatred of the blond chubby boy. Only his friendship with Iruka-sensei and his partner Anko-sensei helped him through the loneliness. Though she still freaked him out at times.

"I followed my instincts and it led me he-" Before she could finish Sakura turned quickly and saw an equally tall blond woman coming from another way. Ino's eyes narrowed as she saw Sakura sitting near Naruto.

"Given what Iruka-sensei had said Naruto had to be the only guy in the area, so why was Sakura here?" Ino thought.

"Forehead," Ino said on approach. Her voice was cold.

"Bimbo," Sakura replied. She took some steps towards Naruto and put her hand on his shoulder. Ino put her hands on Naruto's other shoulder. "What are you doing here?"

"I followed my path to my partner. Why are you?" Ino replied.

"Same as you," Sakura said before looking at Naruto.

"Don't look at me! I was just happy to have someone find me," Naruto confessed.

----------

Hinata cursed herself. She had tripped on that one root, causing her to lose time in finding her Naruto. But now she was running hard and fast. She knew he was right before her and pushed on. When she entered the small clearing, she saw...
1553311111121.title: Past and the Future

choices: No, he only has three partners (for now at least)
15533111111211.content: Are there any others with him?
15533111111211.title: Are there anymore girls there?

choices: They make it to the academy without any problems
Something happens on the way there
155331111112111.content:
Hinata froze as she entered the clearing, spotting the two other girls standing were standing next to Naruto.

"Oh great, you too Hinata?" Sakura said, growing more confused by the minute. "What is going on here?"

Hinata was just as confused, but she forced herself to remain calm, she'd spent too much time preparing for this day to let anything screw it up, no matter how unexpected. She raised her hands up, forming the ram seal, "Byakugan!" she cried, veins bulging around her pearly white eyes.

"Huh, Hinata, what are you . . .? " Ino began before trailing off, growing ever more perplexed. "How are you . . .?" She didn't understand it. She was sure that she felt chakra entering her body and leading her here and that there was no shinobi (potential or otherwise) around besides Naruto. So, how was Hinata able to activate her Byakugan? Unknown to her, similar thoughts were running through Sakura's head. And finally, Naruto continued to sit on the ground, so focused and confused by the events around him that he forgot to stop channeling chakra outside his body.

Hinata merely stood there for another moment, Byakugan still active and focus evident on her face. Finally she released it with a sigh. "I just don't understand."

"Yeah, none of us do" Sakura replied. "Iruka-sensei never mentioned anything like this in the test, l don't know what's happening here."

"What's happening is that we're all somehow responding to Naruto's chakra," Hinata stated as she walked further into the clearing.

"What!?" everyone else responded in shock, even Naruto stopped channeling chakra.

"How is something like that possible?" Sakura questioned, a puzzled look on her face.

"I don't know," Hinata responded. "But when I used my Byakugan I saw that Naruto was the only source of chakra around and that we were all accepting it."

Ino lightly scratched her head, still every bit as confused as she was when they started. "So what happens now?"

Hinata adopted a determined look on her face as she continued drawing closer to Naruto. She would not allow herself to be weak or indecisive in front of her long time crush, not when there was so much at stake. She'd already spent a great deal of time and effort preparing for this day, preparing to show Naruto how strong and beautiful she was, even if it wasn't happening as she imagined. "Well we can't just go back empty handed, so . . ." And with that she knelt down next to Naruto and slid one hand underneath his knees and the other behind his back.

She paused for a moment, fighting back a blush at the close contact with her crush. She spoke gently, "Are your ready Naruto?"

That seemed to snap Naruto out of his stunned silence and he gave her an enormous grin as he formed the ram seal. "Let's go! I've got more than enough chakra for this, believe it!"

Hinata easily lifted Naruto with the new found strength of his chakra flowing through her. She turned back towards the direction of the academy and glanced over her shoulder at Sakura and Ino. "Coming?" she questioned before jumping into the forest, using Naruto's chakra to propel herself.

Sakura and Ino shared a momentary glance as they gave each other a slight shrug before they took off after them, drawing on the chakra Naruto lent to them as well. They soon caught up and found Hinata again with her Byakugan active, navigating through the forest.

And they were partially right. Hinata was using her Byakugan to help move the forest, but only slightly, for most of her attention was focused on the blonde in her arms. She slowly took in all of his features in their exactness. First there were his thighs, round and plump, stretching the fabric of his pants and spreading around where her arm held him. Next she continued upward to his widened hips and expanded butt. She could not help but take advantaged of the situation to take a quick feel, pretending to readjust her grip. Then she came to his chest and plump arms. The large gut spread across his lap and small moobs resting a top it were a stark contrast to the firm abbs the pressed against and the large breasts just above them. And finally she came to his face, his checks plump with thin whisker marks extended across them, and the hints of a double chin forming. And although his eyes were closed in concentration, she knew them to be the most beautiful and brilliant shade of blue. And last but not least, there was his golden blonde hair, shining like the sun. And she found all of these features to be so cute and handsome, for he was perfect in her eyes and his weight felt so right in her arms.

She wanted nothing more than to stay with him for as long as possible, and no matter what, she would find a way to make it happen, even if she also had to tolerate Saukra's and Ino's presences. If nothing else, it was just more protection for Naruto.

Do they make it to the academy or does something happen to the on the way?
155331111112111.title: Three Partners (For Now At Least) But What Now?

choices: Follow as dinner and Naruto's first meal with friends comes.
Skip to the next morning.  Who is their teacher?
1553311111121111.content:
"Hey Hinata," Saukra called out. The lead girl turned her head to look at the pink-haired kunochi.

"Yes?" Hinata asked.

"Ino and I should be carrying Naruto as well," Sakura said, "I didn't workout for so long just to run back without doing anything." Hinata's face scrunched up. "If I was carrying Naruto and you were following, wouldn't you feel the same?"

"And if this isn't some freak accident and we are forced to work together, knowing how to pass Naruto to each other during a run would be wise," Ino added.

"Naruto, would you like to try that?" Hinata asked softly.

"Hmmm, what?" Naruto said as his ears told him what was just said. "Umm, that sounds pretty smart. I think Iruka-sensei and Anko-sensei would want that. Hinata bit her lip but nodded.

"Okay Sakura come up on my left," Hinata said. Sakura did as commanded and carefully pulled Naruto into her arms. Feeling his chakra this close was very pleasant. "No wonder Hinata was hesitant to let him go," Sakura thought.

-----------

The test entered into the final hour as Anko worked out with her favorite weight: Iruka. Using a disc for him to sit on, she bench-pressed her partner as he gave her a little chakra.

"Anko, someone's coming," Iruka said as the first pair was about to exit. Anko set Iruka down and stood up. They held their faces as four people emerged. Hinata was in the lead with Sakura to her left and Ino holding the heavy Naruto to the right.

"The Hokage suspected this might happen," Anko said, "We'll proceed with the plan."

"See you soon," Iruka said smiling up at his muscular lady.

"Um Senseis," Hinata began, "All three of us felt-"

"It is understood," Anko said, "You four are to follow me now." She turned and started to run towards the village and the Hokage residence. The three young girls followed.

"Is this some part of the exam?" Naruto wondered aloud.

"Your guess is as good as mine," Ino replied, taking in Naruto's smell. It was a nice smell.

With her byakugan active for the first time outside of training with her father, Hinata was looking around and saw Anbu pairs watching them. What could the reason behind Naruto's attraction be?

Coming to the entrance, Anko led the three up the stairs before coming before the Hokage's office. Anko knocked.

"Enter!" came a female voice. Anko opened the door. Lord Jiraiya and Lady Tsunade looked up from their shogi game. "I see," Tsunade said coldly, "You may leave Anko." Anko nodded and departed closing the door so the four youngsters were alone with the strongest team in the village.

"I imagine you have many questions," Jiraiya said coldly. The four nodded.

"Did I do something wrong with attracting three girls?" Naruto asked, still being held by Ino.

"No Naruto," Jiraiya said.

"Sometimes a shinobi is born with such an impressive level of chakra that multiple kunochi find it matches well with them. It is rare but not unheard of," Tsunade said.

"Then who will Naruto's partner be?" Sakura asked, "I found him first."

"And you think that should give you precedence over the other two?" Jiraiya asked.

"Um.. Well ... This is just confusing," Sakura confessed. Tsunade nodded.

"I imagine so. But this is how things are," Tsunade said, "So to better train you three and Naruto we are assigning you a special pair for your training Sensei." Tsunade wrote down the location and time. "You will meet them there tomorrow at noon. For now I suggest you retire, rest up, and eat."

"Um, where will we stay?" Hinata asked, "Anko-sensei told us we would live in either house together so we can get to know each other better, but with four of us ..."

"Well, this is just my view, but which of your homes would best fit all of you?" Jraiya asked.

"There's a larger apartment next to mine with more rooms in it," Naruto noted. "We could move in there, if we had your permission." Jiraiya glanced at Tsunade and both nodded.

"Now remember one crucial fact: Naruto is providing strength to three of you. His health is key for you to continue on your paths as Ninja. You will need to widen him up as part of your training," Tsunade said, "Just between us, Jiraiya was a skinny guy at only 220 pounds compared to the next smallest at 260 pounds but he developed nicely." Jiraiya patted his large belly.

"She's telling the truth," Jiraiya said, "Now dismissed." The three girls bowed and left.

"They didn't put Naruto down once," Tsunade noted when the door was closed.

"It runs in his blood. Kushina didn't set Minato down for almost a whole day," Jiraiya said.

-------------

"So do we go together or alone?" Hinata asked.

"I think if we all went and packed some stuff up alone it would be quickest," Sakura said. Ino nodded.

"Agreed. Now Naruto, what do you have at your place for dinner?" Ino asked before setting him down. He looked up at the taller girls.

"Ramen." Naruto said.

"And?" Sakura asked.

"Just Ramen." Their eyes widened.

"You are this large with just ramen?" Hinata asked.

"Yep. All I could afford," Naruto said.

"Well, that won't do Naruto," Ino said.

"The Bimbo's right," Sakura said, "So how about we pick up some groceries for tonight?"

"Um, what do you like?" Naruto asked.

"Beef," Sakura said. "Pork," Ino replied. "Chicken," Hinata answered.

"Um, I like them all," Naruto said, really trying not to show favoritism between the girls. They sighed before looking at each other and nodded. The answer to all disagreements like this could be solved with Rock-Paper-Scissors.

Several rounds later, Sakura won and would bring some beef from her home, Ino would pick up the vegetables, and Hinata was in charge of the dessert.

"See you in a bit," Naruto said, happily before the ladies departed and Naruto walked home. When he got home, he found his key no longer worked in the lock and a note on the door.

"Your property was moved next door." Nodding, Naruto went to the next apartment and opened it. It was much nicer than his small-corner place. The bedroom, its own separate place with a door to close, was certainly large enough for him and the girls to sleep in. Now all they needed was three more beds. They only left one large one in here.

-------------------

The girls moved quickly, none of them wanted to be the last to get back to Naruto. With their gear packed up, they left and reached the apartment at the same time. They shot each other friendly glares. This would take some getting used to.
1553311111121111.title: Great Girths Give Great Gratification

choices: See the awkward night of the four having to share a bed
skip to the next morning and their first team training session
15533111111211111.content:
Once the three girls returned with the groceries they quickly and efficiently split up their duties for getting dinner ready. Sakura was currently working a wok making some beef stir fry, Ino was chopping up a number of vegitables to make a salad, and since Hinata bought cinnamon rolls for dessert she was busy setting the table, and Naruto, well he was sitting on the couch watching this all happen.

"Um, are you girls sure I can't do anything to help?"

Hinata looks up from her chore.

"Don't worry Naruto you just take it easy."

Naruto's face scrunches up in frustration.

"I've been taking it easy all day, hell you girls spent at least an hour each carrying my fat ass around Konoha, I want to help. Don't forget I spent a lot of time by my self I know how to do a few things around the house."

The girls then share a quick glance with each other, and while he was very blunt about it Naruto did have a point.

"Well Naruto if your so sure, you can help Hinata set the table."

"You got it Sakura!" Naruto cheered before picking himself off the couch and waddling over to Hinata's side.

The girls couldn't help but smile a little bit at how eager Naruto was to help them. Being kunoichi they've heard the stories from Anko-sensei, about how through out history, there were shinobi who treated their kunoichi counterparts as personal servants. Ordering them around and threatening to deny them chakra on the field if they disobeyed. Thankfully there were plenty of laws now-a-days to protect kunoichi from such treatment, but the girls were greatful that Naruto would definately not be one of those.

Some time later all four were seated around the table, enjoying the dinner they prepaired.

"So Naruto what do you think."

Naruto was working his way through his, obviously, much larger servings of food with a pleased smile on his face.

"It's awesome Sakura, and Ino I've gotta admit your salad might change my opinion on vegitables."

The two girls blush good naturedly at the praise.

"You know what? You girls should teach me how to cook, so I can help in the kitchen too."

The three girls smile appreciatively at that statment, all three mentaly thanking the gods that they got such a thoughtful partner. The night progressed well, with dessert receiving similar ovations. And the four just sat around and talked afterwards, sharing little bits about their lives before this unusual arrangement started, and eventually they decided to go to bed, knowing they had an early day tommorow.
15533111111211111.title: Dinner time

choices: skip ahead to a few weeks in
155331111112111111.content:
A few hours after dinner everyone in the apartment was getting ready for bed, and right now Sakura was in her jammies, a set of white shorts with a pink tank top. And right now she was concidering the situation in the bed room, sure the bed was definately big enough for everyone but there was little chance of everybody being comfortable with sleeping together, especially with it being their first night together.

"So what are we going to do?" Sakura turns to see Naruto in his sleep wear, a pair of well fitting orange lounge pants and a white t-shirt that was a bit too small, showing off his plump body fairly well.

Sakura blushes a little then turns back to the bed. "Well I don't know. This is technically your place so I suppose you should get the bed."

"What, are you kidding? I'm the one with all the extra padding, I can take the couch and you girls disscuss amongst yourselves about who can get the bed."

"That's really sweet of you Naruto."

The two turn around to find Hinata and Ino both in their own pajamas, Ino was wearing a silky violet camisole, while hinata was in a fluffy set of lounge pants and a white long sleeve shirt.

Ino stepped forward continuing where she left off. "But were a team now, lets figure this out together okay?"

Ino carefully caresses a hand along Naruto's pudgy face, the boy was stunned silent and could only nod in response.

"W-well, w-why don't we just try sleeping together tonight."

Everyone turns to Hinata, surprised at the girl's rather bold, even with the studdering, proclimation.

"It's just when we're away on missions we'll have to stay close to Naruto-kun to keep him safe, I f-figure that we should s-start t-trying to get used to that."

Hinata's logic was pretty sound, so with the expected amount of trepidation the four of them were comfortably settled into the bed which surprisingly had some room to spare. At the moment the four of them were trying to fall asleep, try being the key word here, Naruto was especially nervious as he was currently sandwiched between Hinata and Sakura, and he was trying very hard not to squirm to much and accidentally do something one of the girls would think was perverted, even without full acess to his chakra the two of them were still strong enough to give him quite the beating.

But as the night wore on everyone slowly started to relax and just when Naruto was about to fall asleep the felt a pair of arms circle his waist, sure enough Hinata was snuggling up to him like a big teddy bear, not long afterwards Sakura did the same to his left, then just beyond Sakura one of Ino's hands reach over and touch him too, one thing was for certain, it was going to be a long night.
155331111112111111.title: Bed time

15533111111211112.content:
The next morning the girls moved quickly to make a big breakfast for Naruto and packed their training pack and freshened themselves up. While Naruto ate they try to feed him and soon there was a contest between Ino and Sakura which led to him being forced feed by the two girls and moaning in pain from all the food. After that they went to the training grounds and found no was there.

"Is this a joke? Where are the trainers? I know something was up!" shouted Sakura.

"Maybe we are early or we are in the wrong spot," said Hinata to the others.

"No, you are in the right spot," said a voice.

The group tuned around and saw Tsunade and Jiraiya, Anko and Iruka, Kurenai and Asuma, Rin and Kakashi, Yugao and Hayate, Shizune and Ibiki, and Ten-Ten.

"Why is everyone here?" asked Naruto.

"The women will help train you guys and Ten-Ten is going to be part of your group as you are going to need a combat member." said Tsunade

"Sakura, you have the potential of being a great medical ninja, so Shizune and I will train you in that field as medical ninjas are needed to help if the team is injured." said Tsunade.

"Hinata, you have the rare talent of being a sensor ninja, Rin here is one of the few a best sensor ninja in the village and senors help where are traps and how many enemies are there." said Tsunade.

"Ten-Ten, you will have Yugao to train you in all types of weapons and she is also know as the Goddess of weapons," said Tsunade.

"Ino, you will have Anko and Kurenai will train in genjutsu and interrogation skills with the skills your clan has already taught you," said Tsunade.

"Naruto and the guys will go eat as most of them had breakfast a long time ago. Jiraiya if I hear that you peeped and you turn Naruto into a mini pervert, let's just say Icha Icha won't be out for a long time" said Tsunade cracking her knuckles.

With that the guys head into town all hungry will the girls go train.....
15533111111211112.title: Skip to the next morning.  Who is their teacher?

choices: With Naruto, he thinks about the other women.  Do they feel a boost of energy?
155331111112111122.content:
"Now. Ten-ten, carry Naruto over to where the guys will be eating," Tsunade ordered.

"Lady Hokage, I could do that-" Hinata began before getting a cold glare from the Hokage.

"If she is going to be in your group, Naruto will need to be familiar with her," Tsunade said as she hefted Jiraiya up once more and the women moved out. Ten-ten walked forward, looking at the obese boy.

"Um, hi," he said, smiling. Naruto could feel the glares of the other girls aiming at the bun-topped girl.

"Thank you for giving me this chance," Ten-ten said, lifting up Naruto and felt his chakra go into her. She turned and ran after the leaders.

"Um, why did you thank me?" Naruto asked as he pushed out his chakra.

"I failed last year to find a partner. I was sent to a special squad of others who didn't find a partner but still nothing," Ten-Ten said, "I thought I was a failure. I'm not the most receptive girl but yesterday I came to your location but I was late and you were gone."

"Ouch," Naruto said as the others came into view. They had stopped just outside the town were a large picnic was set up.

"So, you are my last chance to help protect this village as a ninja," Ten-ten said as they arrived. She set Naruto down.

"All right ladies, move out," Tsunade yelled, leading them away from the men.

"Naruto, come sit," Jiraiya said pointing to an open seat next to him. Naruto waddled over and took the seat between Jiraiya and an near equally obese Kakashi.

"Now Naruto," Iruka said across from him, "You know how we taught you to focus on the image of your partner?" Naruto nodded.

"Yeah, I remember," Naruto said.

"Well, now as you eat, you need to focus on all four girls starting now. Think of no one else but them. It will be hard to maintain it but you need to do it," Jiraiya said. Naruto nodded and accepted the bowl of dumplings and dug in. After downing the first two, he looked at the men around him.

"So this is all my training is going to be? Eating and thinking of them?"

"For now. In time, you will learn to better control who gets more chakra and how fast you give it to them," Ibiki said. Naruto noticed Iruka and Hayate smile.

"What's the report gentlemen?" Jiraiya asked the two.

"The girls are receiving his chakra and the training has begun," Iruka announced.

---------

Sakura grunted as she ducked left to right avoiding the sporting balls being launched at her from her senseis. The baseballs, golf balls, and softballs flew at her with speeds that could kill a normal civilian. Sakura was assured she was getting the slow attacks today.

"Keep it up Sakura!" Tsunade said, throwing one at Sakura's leg. Sakura jumped into the air only to receive a double shot of baseballs to her gut and head.

"Don't make such unneeded movements!" Shizune chided, "You need to make small movements, contain your strength and energy!"

----

Ten-ten did not look at her right arm where a blade had scratched on it. Her sensei was demanding all her focus.

"Good on defense!" Yuago said as she continued to press the shorter Tenten.

-----

Hinata stood in a circle of trees and shrubs. There were charms all around her and one was activated.

"Yes, feel the world around you Hinata," Rin said, "Look for the marker I set up." Hinata punched in the location.

"How close?" she asked.

"Off by a bit," Rin said, pointing to one charm that was ten feet above and to the right of the one she picked. "You need to clear your concern of all else, including Naruto!" Hinata's eyes widened. She wanted to respond but didn't. She only nodded.

------

Ino looked around the genjutsu her. Gathering her chakra, she pushed it out. "Kia!" she called out, dispelling the jutsu.

"Impressive," Kurenai said, "Now let's make the next one harder to notice when you fall into it."

"That's only if I do," Ino said proudly. Anko chuckled.

"Oh, do not try to challenge us young lady," Anko said. "You won't like what you see."

"Sorry Anko-sensei," Ino said.
155331111112111122.title: New Feelings

choices: The training continued well, leaving the students properly exhausted
something happens and Naruto accidentally sends demonic chakra to his partners
1553311111121111222.content:
Right now, while the girls were performing increasingly difficult tasks, Naruto was sitting and eating while focusing on the girls his eyes clamped shut in concentration, all the while the men around him would occasionally give him little hints and tips to make the job easier.

"Focus on how they look Naruto picture the girls as clearly in your mind as you can." Says Kakashi.

"I'm trying Kakashi-sensei." Naruto mumbles around a mouthfull of buns.

"I find that a different form of visualisation is better. Naruto try to picture your chakra as water and the girls as glasses."

One of Naruto's eyes peek open at Hayate's little hint.

"Sensei I don't think thinking of them as objects is going to help me much."

"Naruto's right, sometimes the simplest ideas are the best. Naruto just close your eyes and try to tune the rest of us out, Kakashi was right about one thing though, picturing the girls in your mind will help, so try to ignore us for now just focus on eating and your partners."

Naruto found Iruka's advice to most helpful, so taking that advice to heart he closed his eyes again and started back onto his lunch. Eventually he became so focused on the double duty of eating and sending chakra to the girls that the side conversations of the other men around him faded. In his minds eye he could see each girl, their details comeing to him clearly, even though he barely spent a full day with them, even less with Tenten. If any one there was be able to see chakra they would be able to make out several blue streams of energy, tinted slightly red, flowing from Naruto and out to the various training grounds.

'with Sakura'

Sakura was the closest to where the men were stationed so she was the first to benifit from Naruto's chakra. At that moment she was doubled over winded and sweaty her pink hair matted to her forehead.

"Come on girl you can't be tired yet were, only getting started here."

Sakura can't help but glare a little at Tsunade and Shizune, the two had been relentless with their baseball pitching and Sakura could tell she was reaching her limit. Then almost suddenly a very familar warm sensation starts to wash over her, starting from her chest and moving outwards all over her body. The fatuige she was feeling mere seconds ago practically vanishes, her breathing quickly became less ragged and a smile starts to creep over her face, she could even feel her muscles grow a little from the sudden introduction of chakra.

"Naruto." The pinkette whispered to herself, before she heard the familar and now very hated whisle of an incoming baseball. Then quick as a snake she reaches forward with her hand and catches the ball squarely, before crushing the damn thing like a balloon. Sakura then picked herself up straight cracks her neck left and right, before taking a ready stance.

"Okay what's next?"

The two women share a knowing glace with eachother before resuming the exercise. Meanwhile at all the other training grounds similar hapening were occouring with the other girls, Tenten's reflexes picked up to the point where she could block even the difficult to see senbon needles. Hinata's Byakugan surge to full power with the introduction of her male partners chakra making Rin's test boarderline childs play. And while the genjutsu Ino was exposed to didn't dissapear it was now easier to tell the difference between fake objects and real ones.

Of course now that the women teachers knew that the girls were now receiving the full benifits of Naruto's chakra, ammeturish was they were, they had to increase the difficulty of the training exercises accordingly, so they started to actively draw chakra from their male partners.
