155331111212.title: Let's bend some genders

1553311112121.content:
Naruko Uzumaki was not happy. It should have been one of the happiest days in her life, because today she would graduate the Shinobi Academy, but she had one major problem. To be acknowledged as Kunoichi, one had to be paired up with a male who would become her companion for life, but there was a simple thing that had been a problem for her for years.

She was too thin.

Don't get me wrong, by civilian standards she was most certainly overweight, being close to 190 pounds on a 5'3 frame certainly wasn't skinny by their standards, but compared to a Kunoichi she was barely worth mentioning.

But it wasn't her fault goddammit!

Whereas most girls in her class came from decently rich parents or were clan heirs, she was an orphan so she wasn't able to spend all of her money on food alone so she could get some fat on her bones. She had to pay rent, and even if she was able to have enough money remaining at the end of a month shops were selling their products at higher prices to her.

She of course knew that, for her size, she had an incredible amount of Chakra, but no one in public knew that, so she couldn't imagine any boy wanting to be seen with her.

Naruko was currently sitting on the edge of her bed in her pajama's, her potbelly straining the fabric usually made for civilian girls, who still were retaining skinny bodies. How the blonde wished she would be able to shop in a Kunoichi store, but she simply wasn't big enough. Naruko undid the buttons on the shirt, leaving her belly to fall on her lap. She kneaded the lump of fat, wishing, that if she graduated she would be able to earn enough money to finally get some more food.

Naruko stood up, and began her morning routine of showering, combing her hair and brushing her teeth. Next she went to her closet, rummaging around until she found what she was looking for.

She picked a simple outfit, the orange monstrosity that she had worn throughout the academy finally having served it's purpose, so now she decided upon a simple black shirt with orange highlights that showed a tiny bit of her belly and black Kunoichi pants that hugged her chunky thighs and emphasized the curve of her bottom. She had them special ordered, just for this occasion, because she knew that she had to be looking her best to make a good first impression on her future partner.

Naruko went to leave her apartment, and left towards the academy. Thankfully she didn't live too far away, so it was only a short walk. She went into the building and into her classroom, sitting down in her usual seat to the far back. She felt small again, because the sitting arrangement was designed for a usual female graduate, so the seat was bigger than her bottom by a fair margin.

She looked around for a bit, seeing a few no name students, but after a few minutes more familiar faces entered her vision. Sasuke Uchiha was probably the most popular and the strongest guy in the academy at the moment, and while Naruko hated to admit it she certainly knew why he was so popular. The way his muscles moved when he worked out, and his handsome face had certainly been fantasies of hers for a long time. But she also knew that he was out of her league, so she didn't pursue anything with him.

Next came the two people Naruko certainly liked the least out of all the people in the academy. They had everything she wanted but took it for granted because they came from two rich families.

Sakura Haruno came from a rich merchant family and was spoiled to the core. Not only was she rich, but she also had the boxy to prove it, weighing at least twice as much as Naruko and standing nearly a head taller than her.

Ino Yamanaka from the prestigious Yamanaka family was about the same size as her pink haired friend, but whereas Sakura had a belly that fell halfway down to her knees but no breasts to speak of Ino's fat gave her an exaggerated hourglass figure with a bit more weight centered towards the ass. Of course Ino had a pudgy belly too, but it was far, far smaller than Sakura's own.

Still, Naruko knew it eclipsed her own meager midsection by a mile. Ino and Sakura knew this too, so Naruko was constantly teased for her small body, and sometimes even squashed underneath or in between the other girls.

While Ino and Sakura were best friends they constantly argued about who would be Sasuke's partner, so they were in a competition of sorts to see who would become the biggest before graduation, and like everybody expected it was a tie.

After another few minutes their teachers entered. Iruka was certainly muscular, but compared to other Shinobi in the village he was only average. In contrast to this, his Kunoichi partner Anko was simply enormous. Not even Sakura's belly could compare to the enormous apron the purple haired woman had attached to her.

They were told what they had to do for graduation test. The Kunoichi would be hidden in the forest around the village, while the Shinobi were tasked to find them. The girls were forbidden to move too far from the place they were deposited at, but they would have to constantly emit Chakra so that the Shinobi who was the most tuned to the Kunoichi's frequency would be the one to find her.

The Kunoichi were given enough food to last a few hours and then were brought outside of the village. As soon as Naruko's guide left she sat down and began to emit Chakra. After a few minutes she noticed a growl coming from her stomach, and knowing that she had enough food with her she opened her bag, in which she found a cup of instant Ramen. She used her Chakra to heat it up and began eating right away, when she noticed steps approaching her. She turned around, noodles still hanging from her plump lips, and immediately blushed when she noticed it was the Shinobi who would be destined for her. When the Shinobi stepped into the clearing she immediately recognized him as...
1553311112121.title: The chunky blonde

choices: Due to Sasuke's wealth Naruko blows up like a balloon.
Naruko begins to realize she has feelings for her partner.
15533111121211.content:
Naruko couldn't belive it. Here she was, the smallest girl to come out of the Academy in probably forever, and she got the hunkiest guy there was. Sure, Naruko hadn't talked to him that much, but she was sure that Sasuke was a nice guy...

"Hnn, do you even have enough Chakra to be considered a Kunoichi?"

Or not. "Hey what is that supposed to mean?" Naruko spoke with her mouth full, now jumping up from the ground, causing her tummy to jiggle lightly. She marched up to him and stood only a few inches away from him, her growing chest nearly touching him.

Sasuke meanwhile was highly amused. Here was this girl, barely tall enough to reach his pecs, trying to stare him down. As much as he was used to brooding and despite all his self control he couldn't help but smirk.

"What are you smiling about, you jerk?" If Naruko was intimidated by the size difference she certainly didn't show it.

The Uchiha simply ignored her and picked her up, his strong fingers sinking into the layer of fat that coated Naruko's gluteus maximus.

"Put me down you pervert!" Naruko ordered. Sasuke again couldn't help himself and openly chuckled. Here was this girl, this small, feisty girl that, without even trying, broke through years of building up his emotional walls. Ever since the Uchiha massacre Sasuke had been a loner, but in the five minutes since he began talking to this girl she had with her strange ways brought him to care for her. Maybe it was her Chakra that he was absorbing, but he felt as if she was someone important to him.

"Be silent. I'm going to carry you back towards the academy." Sasuke tried to say it in monotone, but Naruko realized the emotions in his voice and her eyes softened. She knew that he would be able to protect her, and if she supplied him with Chakra he would be able to do that without any problems. Kunoichi were usually defenseless alone, except certain few that are able to use their own special techniques. Because of this most were constantly together with their Shinobi partner to minimize the risk of one of them being killed, the Shinobi being greatly weakened without access to Chakra.

This special bond was also used to bring two people together more quickly. Naruko could certainly feel the bond that her Chakra had created with Sasuke. At the moment it was weak, but she had no doubt that both of them would become great ninjas, with each other's help of course.

For the next half an hour both walked in silence back towards the academy, both thinking about the future that awaited them. Sasuke still wanted to kill his brother, but now, with this girl in his arms there was no doubt that she would become important to him, maybe more important than his mission. Naruko meanwhile wondered about Sasuke. Both of them were similar yet so very different. Both of them were orphans, but while Naruko had never even known her family Sasuke had seen his slain right before his eyes. Naruko was poor, Sasuke was rich.

Her train of thought could have gone on forever, comparing the two of them, but she realized that they had arrived at the Academy. They were the first to arrive, no one else but the teachers being there yet. There was Mizuki, who was slightly more muscular than Iruka and then there was his Kunoichi, a women that was a few dozen pounds lighter than Anko.

They told Naruko to go and get measured and weighed while she would be releasing as much Chakra over ten seconds as she possibly could. Sasuke's strength, speed and endurance would be tested meanwhile.

Sasuke passed his test with flying colors, as was expected from him, but Naruko had a few problems. Firstly, the minimum weight for a Kunoichi was usually 200 pounds with a few exceptions. She was one such exception, her Chakra being denser than normal, but despite its density it simply couldn't compare to other girl's quantity. Despite all of the effort she put into the test she simply wasn't able to meet the requirements, so she failed.

Naruko was close to tears now. She had gotten a chance at being a ninja, but she simply didn't have the means to be useful to her Shinobi. She ran outside the room, going to the roof, where she cried herself to sleep.

__________________________

When Naruko was women up she realized it was nearly evening. She looked around and saw that it was Mizuki that had shaken her awake.

"I know that you want to be a Kunoichi, so I searched around and if found a backup test for people with problems similar to yours. "

Now Naruko was wide awake, all thought of sleep forgotten.

_________________________

Naruko was running through the forest, a large scroll strapped to her back. She was headed for a clearing which Mizuki had designated as finish point for her test.

It was incredibly easy to steal the scroll, because while it would have been impossible to reach for a civilian, the average Kunoichi or Shinobi were too big to enter the location without detection. But because of her small stature she managed to slip in and out without being detected, now having escaped past the village walls.

Naruko arrived in the clearing with time to spare, so now she wondered what was written in the scroll. She opened it, finding dozens of Jutsu's and techniques there, some she knew, but most of them were completely unknown to her.

Luckily she had a pen on her, so she was able to write down jutsu instructions on every part of her body.

Just when she was finished with the last jutsu on the scroll Iruka appeared in front of her. Before he could say anything Naruko asked him:"Iruka-sensei, I got the scroll. Do I pass now?

"Naruko, who told you that you would pass if you stole the forbidden scroll of sealing?"

"Well, that was" "Me" Mizuki appeared in front of them, with a crazed look on his face.

"Sorry Iruka, the plan was for the demon bitch to die alone, but I guess I can't leave any witness alive now, so I'll have to kill you too." With that Iruka began fighting Mizuki, but it was clear that the silver haired Chunin had the upper hand.

Naruko meanwhile ran as fast as her chunky legs could carry her, having received orders from Iruka to bring the scroll back to the village where it would be save, but she suddenly stopped when she noticed that Iruka and Mizuki were talking now, the former heavily wounded but still alive. Naruko hid behind a tree, listening in.

"... don't know why you protect the demon, it killed your parents! "

"That maybe true, but Naruko Uzumaki isn't the demon, she is my hard working student, and a proud citizen of the leaf. "

Naruko couldn't help but let out happy tears, finally having gotten somebody's acknowledgement after all these years.

"Maybe we should tell the demon bitch why she is the demon bitch."

"No, Mizuki, it's forbidden! "

"12 years ago, on the day you were born the Kyuubi attacked, but the fourth Hokage sealed it away inside of a baby. That baby was you Naruko Uzumaki, or should I say Kyuubi!"

Naruko was now in shock. The reason why she was ignored or downright hated by the villagers finally having been revealed to her. Once again a multitude of emotions ran through her and she wondered if she was indeed the demon. All of this stopped though when she felt a hand on her shoulder. She turned around to see Sasuke looking down at her, a small smirk on his face.

"Don't cry, dobe. What happened to that girl that takes no shit from anyone from a few hours ago? "

At that Naruko couldn't help but smile. Knowing that her partner had her back her worries had been mostly lifted.

"Now let's show them what we are made of!" Sasuke said, and without having to receive any form of signal Naruko transfered her Chakra towards the Uchiha.

Sasuke beat Mizuki without much trouble, because the Chunin didn't have his Kunoichi with him, and because of that had only access to his own Chakra, which was barely above the level of a civilian.

After Mizuki was laying on the ground unconscious Sasuke went to pick up Naruko, who was now panting heavily, the strain of transferring all her Chakra visible. He grabbed her ass again and had her lean against him, but instead of complaining like last time she just leaned into his shoulder and wrapped her legs around his waist, pulling him close. In that moment she knew they could make this work.

"But you have some serious training ahead of you if you have only so little Chakra. But I think the both of us will enjoy that very much. "

Oh yes, they definitely would make this work...
15533111121211.title: The broody guy

155331111212111.content:
As was custom Naruko moved in with Sasuke, the Uchiha easily having enough place to accommodate for her. In the week they had lived together now they had fallen into a routine of sorts. Sasuke would wake up an hour before her and he would prepare breakfast, which consisted of the most fattening foods available for her, and he did so in a quantity that she was nearly unable to eat everything, and was usually close to nauseous after the meal, throughout which Sasuke encouraged her to go on and rub her belly, which would go from a soft, doughy shape to a tightly stretched, rock hard sphere by the end of breakfast. She ate more at one meal than she had been able to afford for an entire day.

Next Sasuke would train in the weight room, where she would watch him, often times munching on a multitude of snacks ranging from sandwiches to fries, all the while massaging her belly, which would by now be distended far more than ever, coming close to Ino's in size. But where Ino's was soft fat, Naruko's was filled with an incredible amount of food.

Afterwards the Uchiha went on a jog around the village, when Naruko would take a nap to digest. She would wake up around lunch time, Sasuke having brought back takeout from his Lunch. Each day it was something different, for example yesterday he returned with 3 civilian family sized pizza's for her. Of course she had eaten them, not wanting to disappoint him, which caused her to fall into a food coma.

When she woke up Sasuke would have a cake or two ready for her, which she again forced down her throat, knowing that this was for her own best interest. Now the two would take a walk around the village, Sasuke carrying her when she got too tired.

He would oftentimes treat Naruko to Ice cream on their walks, and he would oftentimes simply listen to her while she talked, telling him about her life. Sometimes he would comment, but he mostly listened.

When they got back to the house Sasuke would begin preparing dinner. Surprisingly he was a very good cook, and Naruko was more than happy to assist him. He would cook enough for the both of them, which meant that he would cook enough to get him sated, and to get Naruko absolutely stuffed to her limits. After every dinner she swore she could hear her belly creaking, and the tremendous amount of food placed within her tummy caused it to become hard as a rock, and to swell so far into her lap that her thighs were completely covered.

While she ate Sasuke would massage her belly, so that she would have more room in there and sometimes, when he thought she was too distracted by eating he would cup her growing breasts.

Her breasts wasn't the only thing growing though. The rest of her body was quickly filling out, her having gained 20 pounds in a week, which was quite impressive. Her belly filled out, making it a real gut now and her breasts went up half a cup size, her B cup bras having to be replaced by a C cup, that, while still a bit loose she would quickly grow into. Her pants were thankfully elastic, so she hadn't encountered any problems with them. Her shirt though wasn't so lucky, it becoming so strained that her belly button was showing even when her tummy was empty. When she was stuffed full it would ride up, covering only her breasts and leaving her belly naked for Sasuke to admire.

After dinner The Uchiha would carry his Uzumaki to bed where she slept till morning, where the cycle began anew.

Today, seven days after they had become Ninja's they were on their way to the academy. They were to be apprenticed under a Kunoichi and Shinobi pair, to be taught more then what they learned in the academy. Naruko was excitedly babbling about how good a Kunoichi she would be, while Sasuke was quietly enjoying the sound of her voice. When they arrived in the room they were designated to meet their new teachers Sasuke pulled food from his bag and gave it to Naruko, who gladly ate it. It didn't matter to her that she was still stuffed from breakfast, she still wasn't used to the quantity of food that Sasuke procured from his wealth and she still thought that she mustn't let any food get to waste.

They waited for a bit, until after a few minutes two people entered the room. These two people were of course their new Senseis, and they introduced themselves as...
155331111212111.title: The two Teachers

1553311112121111.content:
"Heya, my name is Rin, and this is my husband Kakashi!" The obese brunette proclaimed loudly, while pointing towards her partner, a man that muscles that had more muscle in an arm than Sasuke in his leg. He was very tall too, standing close to 7 feet, which gave him a very powerful presence. He easily towered over his wife, who was 6'3, which was still much, much taller than Naruko herself was. Sasuke meanwhile was just shy of 6'2, so he was nearly eye level with their Kunoichi sensei.

She was a very bottom heavy woman, with thighs bigger than Naruko's waist and an ass that weighed more than the blonde's entire body. She only had a small potbelly though, with equally normal breasts resting on top.

Kakashi only eye smiled at his new students, but he was still sending glances to the orange book in his hands.

"We're going to have so much fun together! And can you even imagine the delicious food we'll be eating?" Rin was hugging Naruko into her bosom now, which caused the blonde to blush, but not wanting to be rude to her new Sensei she didn't say anything.

"Kakashi, you start with the boy, I'll start the girl's training now." And with that she vanished in a cloud of smoke, taking Naruko to who knows where.
1553311112121111.title: The Training

choices: A month of boring missions and training later they leave for Wave Country.
Sasuke's training isn't something to scoff at either
15533111121211111.content:
When Naruko came back to her senses she was still slightly dizzy, being completely surprised by her Sensei.

"Sensei, how did you do that? I thought Kunoichi couldn't use Jutsus."

"You are right about that, but there are some Jutsus a Kunoichi can learn. For example most of the Jutsus without an element are easy to learn, and medical jutsu, though that is a bit more difficult." Rin answered and as an afterthought added, " and non of that Sensei crap. From now on you're my cute little sister, so you'll call me nee-chan."

"OK Sen..." Naruko stopped herself when she saw the look Rin was giving her, "I mean OK nee-chan."

"So to start with we're going to see what your limits are. Concentrate on Sasuke and focus on transferring your Chakra to him."

"But he's too far away! He out of my range!" Each Kunoichi had a range over which she could transfer her Chakra. This range could be increased by practicing Chakra Control exercises or simply increasing one's reserves and simply pumping more Chakra, but it would be like sending water through dripping pipes, because much of the Chakra would get lost. The best way to increase ones range was doing both things at the same time, but usually Kunoichi specialized after a certain point in their careers.

"What is your range right now?" Rin inquired.

"It's 30 meters" Rin expected that. Naruko was still smaller than the average graduate, and because her Chakra was so dense and potent it was harder to control. An average Kunoichi fresh out of the Academy had a range of 50 meters, give or take a few. Most experienced Genin had increased it to 100 meters and a Chunin usually rested between 100 and 200 meters. Jonin came in a wider range, having the ability to actively supply their Shinobi from 200 up to 1000 meters away. Kage level Kunoichi were on a different level altogether, because they were able to transmit their Chakra over kilometers without much trouble.

"Then we're going to use a little trick. I'm going to teach you the Shadow Clone Jutsu. With it we'll be able to speed up your training. While you yourself will be eating your clones will train with Chakra control." Rin showed Naruko the handseal, and the brunette was surprised when her blonde charge had mastered the Jutsu in under an hour. Rin was fuming silently, because it had taken her weeks to get it down, and even then she wasn't able to procure a perfect replica of herself like Naruko had done.

While the real Naruko was eating ravenously, two Shadow Clones (which was her limit at the moment) were doing Chakra Control exercises with Rin. Rin was currently explaining a technique where one would send Chakra only in the direction of the Shinobi instead of just constantly releasing it into the surroundings. She demonstrated by laying out a few seals that would glow when Chakra was sent into them. Rin demonstrated, and the clones tried to replicate her. It wasn't very useful over short ranges, because it was impossible to change the direction of the Chakra stream so fast, but over long ranges it was a definite improvement, because it didn't waste too much Chakra.

A few hours later the real Naruko was stuffed full and had a headache, because the clones thought it would be a good idea to pop at exactly the same time instead of one after the other. Rin had also given her some scrolls with Control exercises which she would have to do. She returned home, noticing that Sasuke wasn't there yet so she simply decided to lay down on the couch and sleep it of.

She was woken up when she noticed that Sasuke was home, and was currently making dinner for the two of them. Despite the enormous picnic she had she noticed that she still had a bit of room left to eat, so she made her way over to the dining room, where she was shocked to see the sheer quantity of food prepared. The entire table, which was built for a family of 6 was full of plates and platters, some of which had food on them that she hadn't even heard of.

Naruko had a feeling that the previous feasts were but a snack compared to the feasts that would await her in the future.

A small part of her couldn't help but be excited by this.
15533111121211111.title: First day of "training"

choices: Woken up by someone grabbing and prodding her belly.
155331111212111111.content:
A month later Naruko and Sasuke had just completed another D-rank mission in the village. They had managed to catch the demon cat and were currently standing in front of the Hokage. Jiraya and Tsunade had replaced their sensei Sarutobi 13 years ago after the Kyuubi attacked and he lost his Kunoichi, forcing him into retirement. He was still a highly respected man in the village and served as an advicer to the Hokage.

Jiraiya was a man that made Kakashi look lanky, with arms that looked powerful enough to bend steel and legs that looked string enough to carry a building around. Tsunade meanwhile was the single fattest Kunoichi in the village. Weighing over a thousand pounds easily she was recognized as the strongest Kunoichi that had been born since the founding of the village.

In the month since graduating Sasuke and Naruko had changed quite a bit, Naruko more so than her Uchiha teammate. She had grown a few inches, now standing 5'8 tall and she had also gained quite a bit of weight, which was emphasized by her constantly too small wardrobe. Sadly she hadn't gained quite as fast as in the first week, her body having gotten used to more food, but in the end she had still gained another 60 pounds, putting her at 270, which was about the same as a freshly graduated Genin.

Sasuke meanwhile had grown a bit more muscle, making him look like a seasoned Chunin, not the Genin he was. Also he had grown an inch, so now he stood about as tall as Rin.

Their training had gone splendid, with Kakashi teaching Sasuke offensive Jutsu, while Rin taught Naruko all about channeling her Chakra, so now the blonde had an effective range of 70 Meters. The quick advancement could be attributed to her Shadow Clone training, because by now she constantly trained with four of them.

"I can't catch anymore cats, give us a real mission!" Naruko demanded from the Hokage, for which she was quickly reprimanded by Iruka.

"Now now Iruka, don't be so harsh. Kakashi and Rin, do you think your students are ready for a C-rank mission?" Jiraiya inquired, to which Rin enthusiastically punched her arm in the air, which sent a wave of jiggling throughout her body.

"Hell yeah they are!"

"Very well. Send in the bridge builder."

They received the details to the mission and they learned that they would have to protect the man named Tazuna from bandits while he was finishing his bridge. They were told to meet at the gate in two hours and then they went their separate ways to pack.




They had set out of the village and made their way down the road to Wave country. But suddenly, after they had passed a puddle on the ground they were assaulted. Kakashi was quickly taken out, which caused Rin to freeze up for a moment. Naruko and Sasuke quickly looked around and found two people holding onto the chain that killed Kakashi. They were two Shinobi, but they weren't Shinobi like Sasuke or Kakashi, no these two were trained for infiltration and assassination, which meant that instead of being mountains of muscle like most Shinobi were they looked like normal civilians. These kind of Shinobi were trained to stick to the shadows instead of being front line fighters like a modern Shinobi.

Naruko quickly established a stream of Chakra towards Sasuke, so now he was fighting against them. He quickly overpowered them, because they simply couldn't keep up with the power of a Shinobi and the stamina and endurance a Kunoichi provided them.

When they were both unconscious, Kakashi walked out of the tree line, completely unharmed. Naruko immediately flung herself at him, having come to see the older Shinobi as a sort of older brother. She impacted with Kakashi's chest and immediately hugged him.

"Don't you ever do something like that again. We thought we lost you."

"I didn't" came from Rin's direction.

"But you froze up" Sasuke nonchalantly replied.

"I acted you little brat!" Rin punched him on the head, causing a bump to form. "Anyway, Tazuna, mind telling us why Shinobi were after you, and not only bandits like you said?"

Afterwards Tazuna presented them with an obvious sob story. Or at least it was completely obvious for the two males, but Rin and Naruko totally fell for it. Not wanting to face the wrath of their respective partners, Kakashi and Sasuke agreed to continue the mission.

After another few hours they came upon a body of water covered in fog, and a boat waiting to take them over it. When they got sight of the bridge that was to be built Naruko was in awe. She clearly hadn't expected the old drunkard to build something even remotely like this!

When they stepped ashore on dry land again they walked on, until Kakashi suddenly stopped them and pushed all of them to the ground. A huge, cleaver like sword passed over them and stuck in a tree. Then, an even huger man appeared on it. He introduced himself as Zabuza Momoichi, and after the two Jonin's ordered Naruko and Sasuke to stay back Kakashi engaged.

After a brief fight and a successful rescue attempt after which the silver haired Jonin dominated the fifth Kakashi was victorious, but before he could kill Zabuza he was interrupted by a Hunter Ninja from Kirigakure. The Hunter thanked them and vanished with Zabuza's body.

They then continued their way towards Tazuna's house, and when they arrived they were greeted by his daughter, who introduced herself as Tsunami. She was a civilian beauty, with a flat stomach, thin arms, some ass and a whole lot of bust. Her face had a cute heart shape, and the button nose that she had only emphasized her beauty.

It was nearly nighttime when they arrived, so now they received all rooms. Kakashi and Rin would have their own room, because they were a married couple and it was pretty clear what they would do to relax after the journey and the fights. Sasuke would get the room of Tsunami's son, and Naruko would share Tsunami's room.

They all changed into their sleep wear, which for Naruko consisted only of her panties, which by now looked more like a thong as she had gotten them two weeks ago, and her bra, which was straining to hold her burgeoning bust, because the D-cups that she had when she had gotten the piece of cloth were buried under another layer of fat when she had gained the last dozen pounds. Naruko lay down on the bed, which she could only assume was meant for a married couple and drifted of to sleep.

In the middle of the night she was...
155331111212111111.title: Wave

choices: In the week till the battle of the bridge she balloons faster and faster
In the morning she is having a talk with Sasuke
1553311112121111112.content:
Naruko was confused. She knew that she had fallen asleep in Tsunami's bedroom, so how was she suddenly in a sewer. She was standing ankle deep in water, but the water wasn't cold, it was exactly her body's temperature, so it was comforting. She looked around for a bit and then decided to explore a bit. She walked for what seemed like a long time, but she really couldn't tell because everything looked the same. Until suddenly, the tunnel she was in widened until it looked like she was standing in a hall. One half of the huge room was split of by a large cage, whose gates were held closed by a single piece of paper. Naruko squinted a bit, trying to look at what was in the cage, but she could only see a pair of large, red eyes.

Faster than she could see, a clawed hand shot out of the cage, and stopped only a few centimeters in front of her, which caused her to fall on her well padded behind.

"W-what are you?" Naruko had clearly not calmed down from nearly being skewered by a claw bigger than she was.

A deep, baritone voice answered her:"I am the mighty Kyuubi!"

"Well if that's the case, why are you trying to kill me? The Hokage told me that if I die you die with me."

"Fool! I would just reform! But now that I think about it, that is actually quite painful. Hmm, alright brat, I'll not kill you for now." Naruko sighed in relief, "so now tell me what you want."

"I don't want anything, I don't even know how I got here!"

"Well then let me tell you what I want. I want you to get fatter, the bigger your belly is the larger the room for me to move in."

"I was already planning to do that, if you hadn't noticed I'm a Kunoichi. It is expected of me to get as big as possible."

"Oh no, I have seen your 'big', and let me tell you, when I'm through with you your Hokage will look svelte compared to you. Let me tell you what. I have some control over your body. I will slow down your metabolism so far that everything you eat will become fat, and I will boost your digestion speed. Of course you're going to need more food, but with that Uchiha of yours that shouldn't be a problem. The only thing I want in return is access to your taste buds. I haven't eaten anything in so long."

Naruko pondered. It was a deal that would only bring her advantages really, because she would become stronger faster.

"I accept. But only on the condition that you lend me your Chakra should I need it."

"Fine brat."

And with that she was awoken by the heavenly aroma of food.
1553311112121111112.title: The dream

choices: Back in Konoha the Chunin exams are starting
On their way back they run into another team from their graduation class
15533111121211111121.content:
After Naruko had woken up she had eaten more ravenously than ever. She had eaten about the same amount as Rin at that breakfast, a woman who was still over 300 pounds her senior. The older Kunoichi was quite surprised, but not being one to be outdone she still ate a bit more than Naruko.

A week later the results of their little contest were a bit different. While Naruko was still going full swing, Rin was wheezing to keep up. It was quite funny really, the Kunoichi that weighted a bit less then double that of Naruko was beaten in an eating contest by her student.

All the eating had payed off though, because Naruko had certainly gotten bigger. She had gained another 35 pounds, finally breaking the big 300 barrier. Naruko was now closing in on Sakura and Ino when they graduated, and she definitely wasn't the smallest girl of their graduation class anymore. She was a bit above average now. Also she had grown an inch.

They had also had the pleasure of meeting Inari, Tsunami's son. The boy had upset Naruko with a comment he made about family, after which the blonde beauty was running into the forrest. There she ate a bit from the bag she had grabbed before leaving and fell asleep. She was awoken by a slightly chubby girl, who introduced herself as Haku. She was even smaller than Naruko had been when she graduated, but she said she was a civilian, and with the small amount of fat she had the blonde believed her.

They talked for a bit, and Naruko managed to befriend the other girl, helping her find healing herbs for the other girls friend.

Currently Naruko was asleep in the bedroom, but she was awoken by a commotion coming from downstairs. She stood up and quickly got dressed, but she had gained so much weight recently that there was still more skin showing than what would be appropriate. She went down the stairs and found that two thugs were attacking Tsunami. She quick formed two shadow clones and had them tackle the bandits to the ground and sit on them.

It worked, and after a few seconds of both bandits being smothered by 305 pounds each, they fell unconscious. Naruko quickly made her way to the bridge, where she knew Sasuke was and ran. When she arrived she found Sasuke amidst an ice dome, looking exhausted, but when she tried sending Chakra to him the Ice blocked it from reaching him. She looked around for a second, Kakashi dueling Zabuza once again, who was receiving Chakra from a seal. Obviously a Kunoichi had stored her Chakra in there for him, so he wasn't dependent on one.

With no one to help her she did the only thing that she could think of and ran into the dome of ice mirrors, and once she was in she opened her Chakra up to Sasuke who was immediately up on his feet again, the Chakra giving him a much needed boost.

But it wasn't enough. The other ninja was simply too fast, jumping from mirror to mirror. The fight shifted slightly when Sasuke awakened his Sharingan, but the other ninja only adjusted the speed of attacks and movement. Also Sasuke had to protect Naruko, because as Kunoichi she wasn't trained to fight herself. They were in a pretty bad spot.

After the ninja threw Senbon at Naruko, Sasuke jumped in front of her, making him look like a pin cushion.

"Why did you do that?" Naruko had tears in her eyes, desperately clinging to Sasuke.

"Because you're my partner and *cough* I lo..." Sasuke head rolled to his side, and Naruko was openly crying.

"Is this the first time you see someone precious to you die?" The ninja asked.

"Shut up! Shut up shutupshutupshutup!" Naruko's eyes were turning red now, and the ninja noticed that her clothes were visibly straining to hold in her girth. She was getting fatter right before the ninja. But how was this possible?

The Kyuubi had sent her a small amount of Chakra. Small for him, but for her it wasn't small at all. It was a huge surge that went through her system, and her body being too small to accommodate for the power swelled accordingly. She expanded quickly, feeling like she gained 100 pounds, no 200 pounds in seconds. She finally stopped growing once she was close to Rin in weight, and when that was the case she released her Chakra in a destructive wave, that shattered the ice mirrors and caused the ninja to fly through the air. The ninja immediately fell unconscious, and the mask that the now revealed she was wearing shattered, showing Haku's face.

Naruko wanted to get answers, but she had more important things to do. She crawled over to Sasuke, her belly dragging over the ground, and, when she was kneeling next to him, she shook his shoulders, trying to wake him up. Naruko was crying into his chest, and she didn't notice when he began breathing again.

"Naruko, you're too heavy, get off me." Sasuke voice was strained, most likely due to the 600 pounds of Kunoichi sitting on him.

Instead of answering, the blonde just looked up from his chest, shocked that he was still alive. She quickly crawled upwards, her pendolous breasts now resting on his chest, and her belly pressing down onto his eight pack. She lowered her lips to his, and quickly caught him in a kiss. In that moment both of them felt a spark go through them, and Sasuke couldn't help himself and used his hands to reach as far around Naruko's belly as he could. He began massaging her love handles and squeezing every roll he found, all the while still kissing Naruko with such a possessiveness that one could assume he had bought her on the market like the food that she ate.

They had to stop eventually, as both of them needed air to breath and so they pulled back.

"Wow." Naruko muttered under her breath, but Sasuke still heard it clearly.

When she got off him, they looked around, noticing that Kakashi had beaten Zabuza once again, but before he could deliver the killing blow his employer, the shipping tycoon Gato showed up with an army of mercenaries. Zabuza sacrificed himself to kill Gato, and asked Kakashi to take Haku with him to Konoha, so that she may have a better live where she wouldn't be seen as a tool.

After that the renmants of the mercenaries were quickly taken out by the villagers, who had been convinced by Inari to fight. They stayed for a few more days, in which Naruko deflated to her original size, much to Sasuke's displeasure and Haku woke up. The ice user was sad that Zabuza was dead, but she accepted that his last order had been for her to live in Konoha.

She had been welcomed into the team by Naruko quickly, who after learning that she hadn't thought about killing Sasuke once quickly befriended the older girl. They left Wave country with a happy smile on their face, because they knew that they had done something good.
15533111121211111121.title: Wave II

155331111212111111211.content:
When they arrived at the village Kakashi left them to report back to the Hokage and he took Haku with him to get her situation sorted out. That left Rin alone with Naruko and Sasuke, and wanting to celebrate their first mission outside of the village she took them out to get something to eat. They quickly made their way to one of the restaurant owned by the Akimichi family and when they arrived there they quickly got a booth. Because this was a Shinobi restaurant the seating arrangements were extra large because of the many bodacious Kunoichi that frequented the place.

Now Naruko and Sasuke where sitting next to each other, Rin across from them and the single male was constantly supplying the two Kunoichi with food by making frequent trips to the buffet.

"So *burp* you two know that the Chunin exams are starting?"

"No nee-chan, we *belch* didn't. In fact this is the first time I heard about it." Naruko replied, Sasuke nodding in confirmation when Rin looked at him.

"Well then, me and Kakashi have thought about sending you to compete. Even if you don't make Chunin, it will be quite the experience for the two of you. As the name says you get the chance to become Chunin, which would make both me and Kakashi quite proud." Naruko immediately got stars in her eyes, wanting to prove that she wasn't a failure and she proclaimed that they would of course pass. Sasuke gave Rin a quick glance that said that they would be participating, which caused Rin to smile brightly.

"Then let's celebrate! We need a bit more food for that though. Sasuke! Do your duty!" Rin joked, but Sasuke did as he was told, happy that he would be able to watch Naruko stuff her mouth.



When they left Naruko was stuffed full, clutching her belly that was so tight that it looked as if it would burst if a single ounce of food passed through her mouth. Rin soon said her goodbyes and left Naruko and Sasuke alone on their way home. They ran across Konohamaru, who was the third Hokage's grandson. He was a scrawny kid, not having started the Shinobi Academy yet, but he was constantly trying to prove that he was stronger by making frequent "attacks" on his grandfather.

After talking for a second he ran away again, and when he turned around a corner wasn't looking where he was going, so he bumped into something soft, heavy, but to his disadvantage unmoving, so his momentum transfered itself back to him and he was sent sprawling to the ground. He looked up, but he could only recognize a silhouette of a large woman, who was blocking out the sun with glowing yellow eyes. In that moment Naruko and Sasuke came around the corner and witnessed the scene in front of them. Konohamaru was lying in the ground, in front of a foreign Kunoichi whose breasts were still jiggling from the impact. Next to the Kunoichi was a Shinobi none of them had ever seen. He wasn't really that muscular, which confirmed his position as a long range fighter.

"You little brat! What do you think you're doing! You dishonor my sister by touching her breasts, and now you're not even going to apologize?" The foreign Shinobi clearly was pissed, but he was quickly silenced when his now revealed sister used her hip to easily bump him aside.

"We don't want to cause an incident, Kankuro. It's fine."

Kankuro, who was now embarrassed cried out:"But Temari, he touched your boobs. Shouldn't you be pissed about that?"

Suddenly a new voice joined them from above, someone who was clearly standing in the tree next to them. The voice was
155331111212111111211.title: Chunin exams

choices: Two weeks later the first test takes place
Sasuke is challenged to a fight by a certain green spandex wearing weirdo
1553311112121111112112.content:
When Naruko looked up, searching for the owner of the voice she was shocked to see who it belonged to. Out of the corner of her eyes she could see that Temari's and Kankuro's eyes widened in fear, which caused her to come to the conclusion that they knew the voice's owner.

On a thick branch in the tree above them stood a female that made the other women standing there look anorexic in comparison. It was a mystery how the branch was able to hold her, the girl clearly weighing close to 600 pounds. Whereas Temari's fat occupied her lower body, with thunder thighs as big as tree trunks and an ass to match them, the red headed girl in the tree was completely round. Though her fat was deposited more equally in her body, that didn't mean that Temari's cheeks were bigger, the 200 pounds between them clearly giving the redhead an edge in body size.

"G-gaia, we were just-" Kankuro tried to explain to the now revealed Gaia, but he was interrupted by the red head, who spoke in monotone, but clearly with an edge that said she would hurt you when you pissed her off.

"Temari, Kankuro, shut up." The two immediately stopped, and stepped back a few steps, making space for Gaia to jump from the tree and land in front of them. The redhead did just that, and with her feet landing on the ground she sent massive vibrations through the ground, which could be felt for dozens of meters.

"This is Temari, my sister." Gaia pointed at the blonde haired, pear shaped 400 pound beauty behind her.

"And this is Kankuro, my brother." Gaia's fingers were now pointing towards the boy, who, while being muscular by civilian standards was nothing impressive. He was even smaller than Kiba, who was the dead-last in the Shinobi class during Naruko's Academy time.

"My name is Sasuke Uchiha, and this is my partner Naruko Uzumaki." Sasuke introduced them, while wrapping his arm around her shoulder. Naruko meanwhile was stunned. She could feel something familiar from the redhead, but she didn't know what.

"I'll look forward to facing you in the tournament, Sasuke Uchiha and Naruko Uzumaki." With that Gaia turned around and left, her siblings quickly following her.

When they were out of earshot the strange feeling Naruko had finally stopped, and she turned to face her boyfriend:" I think we should watch out for them. Gaia gives me the creeps."

Sasuke quickly reassured her with a quick kiss, and after they said goodbye to Konohamaru they were on their way home. After all they both had a lot of training to do for the upcoming Chunin exams.
1553311112121111112112.title: Chunin Exams II

15533111121211111121121.content:
Two weeks later Sasuke and Naruko were on their way to the academy, a place where they hadn't been since they graduated. The two walked in relative silence, only speaking a word or two every few minutes, because they were both deep in thought.

Sasuke thought about everything that had changed since he had been partnered up with Naruko. He had been broody, and would ignore everyone around him if they wouldn't be able to become stronger. Also he had been constantly stalked in his Academy days by fan girls. Thankfully that had stopped once everyone had become ninjas, which was a great relieve to him. Never again he would wish to see Sakura or Ino. They were girls that were greedy, and saw him as the ultimate price to be had. Their greed reflected in their bodies, which were the biggest in the academy. But then again, he hadn't seen them since graduation. He couldn't help himself and looked to his right, where Naruko was walking. During the last two weeks the blonde had gained immensely, quickly growing towards 400 pounds.

He at first couldn't believe it, her unnatural growth was simply too fast, but then she confided in him the deal she had struck with her prisoner. Naruko was currently wearing a battle dress which showed an incredible amount of cleavage, but covered everything about halfway down her thunder thighs. They had used bandages to make her look smaller, so their enemies would underestimate them more easily, because her belly was pressed to her body so much that she easily looked 30 pounds lighter. It had been a small argument between them, because Naruko wanted to show of, but Sasuke managed to make her see his point.

They hadn't been able to use the same tactic to make him look smaller, because while fat was soft and malleable, muscle was not. His training had gone well too, because he started using Naruko as a weight for bench pressing, and lifting her ever increasing girth made for a perfect exercise.

Naruko meanwhile too thought about how her life had changed since graduating. No longer was she the scrawny girl everyone would bully, no, she was pretty sure that by now she was one of if not the biggest Kunoichi their age. She couldn't wait to see the looks on Sakura's and Ino's faces once would realize that the scrawny girl that Naruko was was now bigger than them. Not only that, but she had gotten the boy both of them wanted for herself. Of course she loved Sasuke, but rubbing it in their faces would be sweet revenge. By now she also had some of the problems Kunoichi would face. Civilian clothing stores were off limits to her, chairs designed for non-Kunoichi women began buckling under her weight, and she had more than once woken up in front of an empty fridge, having emptied it out while sleeping. But all those problems were - for Naruko at least - achievements.

She looked to her left, and couldn't help herself but blush. Sasuke had been nothing but sweet to her since they graduated, and he had helped her become stronger than ever. She had fallen for him, and fallen hard. She couldn't imagine her live without him anymore, and she didn't want to. It didn't hurt that he had only gotten hotter since they left the academy. He was still wearing the same blue shirt white short combo he wore, but where before the shirt was loose it was now skin tight, showing off every single muscle he had trained for. Naruko didn't mind that one bit, because she certainly got her eye candy, and she got lots of it.

They arrived at the Academy and they went into the room they were supposed to be tested, but they quickly noticed a Genjutsu over the room sign, so they went up another floor. There they then went into the real room, where the other people were waiting. There were many Genin, from as many countries in the room, some sitting in their seats waiting for the exam to begin and others formed groups with allied villages.

Sasuke didn't see anyone he knew until a heavy weight pressed down on his back and chunky arms wrapped around him from behind. Out of the corner of his eyes he saw
15533111121211111121121.title: Chunin Exams III

155331111212111111211211.content:
"Sasuke-kuuun, did you miss me?" Sakura swooned, all the while leaning into Sasuke, which caused Naruko glare at her. Sakura even began groping his muscles! That was her boyfriend goddammit, and she wouldn't let some pink haired harlot touch him!

"Look pinky, that's my partner you're groping, so back off, before I make you regret it." Even Sakura wasn't blind to the malice that Naruko put in her words, but without even turning to look at Naruko she said:"As if some skinny, tiny child could ever be Sasuke-kun's partner." She was clearly too busy fondling Sasuke, who was clearly amused by all this and decided to let Naruko handle the situation. He knew she was easily capable of holding her own against Sakura.

Sakura suddenly was pushed to the side, causing her to fall onto the ground, which sent vibrations through the ground which could be felt in the entire room. The pinkette was lying there for a few seconds, until she returned to her senses, and looked at the person that pushed her.

First she saw small, pudgy feet that wore Kunoichi sandals with small heels, shins covered by guards, which lead up to much bigger, tree trunk thick thighs in a perfect cone shape. The person wore an orange long sleeved battle dress with black accents, that fell just below her knees, which had a slit going down all the way from the waist, allowing greater mobility. Underneath the dress the person wore mesh stockings, which ended underneath a small skirt in a slightly darker color than the rest of the dress. Wide hips carried more ass than Sakura herself had two times over,and above that a black belt wrapped around an expansive, nearly perfectly round belly, which, while impressive was still smaller than the pinkette's own midsection. Still, Sakura couldn't help herself but be jealous. A round belly was seen as more attractive than one with rolls, because it indicated that the Kunoichi was stuffed, which meant that she was still getting fatter and hadn't reached a plateau in her weight gain.

On top of the orb of a belly rested Sakura's attackers breasts, which were many times bigger than Sakura's own pair of knockers. She would say they were a medium G-cup, which was quite impressive for the age of the attacker, which Sakura guessed to be around the same as her own. They formed an impressive amount of cleavage, because they were clearly pressed together by the dress confining them. Sakura couldn't help but take note of the persons arms, which were stuck out to the sides by a few degrees because of the love handles the girl had. They were quite pudgy too, being a bit wider than most civilian girls thighs. Sakura let her eyes wander upwards, seeing a pudgy neck, which was partially covered by what would be a double chin, but because the person was looking down was a triple chin. Full, plump lips were smothered between chipmunk cheeks, giving the persons face a round look which many Kunoichi would kill to have, leading upwards to eyes blue as the sky. She would say that The girl was around 360, maybe 370 pounds, which put her and Sakura at the same weight.

The girls hair was blond, a golden color which framed the persons pudgy face, and was quite spiky, making it look like a golden crown, or a lions mane. Sakura didn't recognize who it was that had knocked her to the ground at first, but after being stunned for another few seconds she caught sight of whisker marks upon her attackers cheeks. There was only one person Sakura knew that had whisker marks.

"Naruko?" she inquired

"That's right, and you better stay the hell away from my boyfriend." Naruko ordered, clearly being annoyed by the pinkette's stares.

"B-but how? How did you gain so much weight? You were so skinny a few months ago! There's no way you gained 200 pounds in that time! It's impossible." Sakura stuttered, not being able to believe that small Naruko, who she could always bully was now this fat Kunoichi.

"Well, Sasuke helped, and I'm thankful for every pound he helped me gain since we became partners." Naruko turned to Sasuke, and pulled him into a long, passionate kiss, making her claim all the more clear to Sakura. While the two were making out Sakura was still in shock, only coming back to her senses when someone tapped her on the shoulder. She turned around and found that it was her partner,...
155331111212111111211211.title: Chunin Exams IV

choices: Reaching a tower in a Chakra eating wildlife infested forest.
1553311112121111112112111.content:
Kiba hadn't changed that much from the Academy days, he got a bit more ripped, sure, but compared to Sasuke he was still scrawny. He also wasn't as tall as other boys his age, standing at just under 6 feet, which was about Naruko's height. Speaking of the blonde she had finally stopped making out with her boyfriend and was now looking around the room.

The desks were arranged so that teams would sit together, but couldn't see each other's piece of paper, which made it all the more clear that teamwork was one of the things that would be tested today. She began looking at the different people in the room, seeing quite a few familiar faces. She saw Kiba arguing with Sakura about something, but she couldn't make out what the two were talking about. She saw Ino standing next to Shikamaru, breasts and ass bigger than ever, causing Sasuke to duck down in order to get unnoticed by the platinum blonde hourglass. She had clearly put a bit more effort into her Ninja training than Sakura, because if Naruko had to guess she would say she was a few pounds heavier than herself.

She also saw the Suna team they had stumbled across a few days ago, Temari was already sitting on one of the Kunoichi chairs, her ass completely engulfing the seating arrangement, and leaking over the sides.

But as impressive as it was to see someone being heavier than was expected, she was still looking tiny next to her sister Gaia. The redhead was crushing the two chairs on which her rear end was parked, Naruko could practically hear the sound the girl was making the chairs make, even over the sound of the crowd. The rest were not really that impressive.

They were alerted of the arrival of the instructors by a cloud of smoke that signified the use of Shunshin. There were two that caught Naruko's eye in the crowd. The first was a man wearing a black trench coat and wearing a bandana covering his head, who would later introduce himself as Ibiki Morino. The next was a woman who introduced herself as Yugao Uzuki. She had purple hair, and if Naruko had to guess she would say that she weighed about 700, maybe 750 pounds. It was clear that she was an elite Kunoichi.

All the Chunin hopefuls took their places and we're handed out different pieces of papers. There were ten questions, and when Naruko read the first one she had no clue what to answer. She read the second, and she again had no idea. And how could she? These were all Shinobi questions! She hadn't learned this!

She looked over at Sasuke and saw him having similar problems, causing her to guess that he had Kunoichi questions. She sent a small thread of Chakra to him, undetectable by anybody not looking for it. She knew that she couldn't talk, because they would be disqualified, but if no one knew they cheated than no one could call them out for it. The technique she used was taught to her by Rin. It was apparently developed from the Yamanaka clans mind switch techniques. It allowed the user to hear the targets thoughts, but because it worked both ways it was useless on the battlefield. But for situations such as this it was perfect.

Sasuke helped her answer the Shinobi questions, which were about fighting and maximizing muscle development, while she helped him with Kunoichi questions, which were about eating the most, the best ways to gain weight and even how to best distribute Chakra.

They were quickly finished and were allowed to leave the room once they turned in their papers which they of course did. They were brought to a waiting lounge with weights and food, which both of them used immediately. Sasuke sat down on one of the couches with two dumbbells, while Naruko sat next to him with a plate of food loaded high with calorie heavy goodies.

After a while they were joined by others and, when more and more people entered the room it was clear that the exam had finished. They were lead back into the testing room, where - to Naruko's surprise - Anko waited for them.

They were told that the second task was...
1553311112121111112112111.title: Chunin Exams V

choices: The Kunoichi will fight, not the Shinobi. "
Shinobi will be forced to carry their Kunoichi while fighting. "
15533111121211111121121111.content:
They were led to the edge of a forest which had a fence in front of it. Naruko was astonished by the huge size of the trees, the smallest branches being bigger around than all tree trunks she had seen in her life up until now. All Genin that passed the first test were standing in a semi circle surrounding Anko, who was standing with her back against the fence and started explaining the next test to them.

"In the middle of this forest there is a tower which you will have to reach to pass my little test. But this isn't any normal forest we'll have you go through. No. This forest is called the Forest Of Anorexia. Now you may wonder why it is called such a horrible name. The reason behind it is that it is populated by Chakra absorbing wildlife. They mostly ignore Shinobi due to their negligible Chakra capacity and their high agility due to their muscles, but the slow and heavy Kunoichi make for excellent prey." Anko made a dramatic pause before continuing. "The Forest has the interesting property of robbing it's Victims of their bulk, and through that of their Chakra capacity. All those who lose more than 200 pounds will be disqualified immediately, which means that you have a maximum of 5 days to arrive at the tower, because that's how long the trees in the forest need to suck that weight out of you. The sooner you arrive, the more you will be able to gain back before the finals. Good luck."

With that Anko led the female portion of the Genin into a tent which had previously been set up. They were weighted one after the other, with following results.

Sakura Haruno: 374 pounds
Hinata Hyuuga: 279 pounds
Tenten: 440 pounds
Naruko Uzumaki: 412 pounds
Ino Yamanaka : 415 pounds
Gaia no Subaku: 627 pounds
Temari no Subaku: 445 pounds
Karin: 256 pounds

After Karin Naruko stopped paying attention, because there weren't any other people she knew. She zoned out and thought about all the food she had stashed in the sealing scrolls hidden in her rolls. She knew they weren't supposed to take food with them, but she just couldn't help herself. She got hungry quickly dammit!

Naruko returned to Sasuke, who was waiting in front of the gate that would allow them to enter. Sasuke explained that he had thought of a plan, which would allow them to get to the tower quickly,while she wouldn't lose too much weight. He knew a bit about the forest, because he had hidden there a few times when his fan girls got too crazy, so he knew a good path to the tower. She trusted him, and allowed him to carry her bridal style, because she knew he could carry her.

They ran across a few other teams, all of which were easily defeated and, after making it within a few miles of the tower they set up camp for the night. Naruko was bloated from all the food she had eaten from her stash, so she lay down in the small cave that was their temporary home and fell asleep. After Sasuke set up some traps he joined her and used her belly as a pillow.

After waking up the next morning Naruko got quite a scare, because the bandages across her midriff had loosened so much that they were loose enough to fall to the ground. She gathered her bearings quickly and they were off to the tower.

A few hours later they arrived, and were led to the rooms prepared for the faster Genin. They weren't the first Genin to arrive, Gaia's team having arrived a few hours before them, but second place was still good. Naruko quickly got to work on regaining the weight she lost, and by the time it was time for the weigh in she had grown her fat deposits back to its previous size and then some. The bindings actually slightly painful now, and it wouldn't be long before her belly shredded them to bits.

They were weighted with following results:

Sakura Haruno: 205 pounds. The pinkette had only arrived in the last few hours, and apparently she was nearly sucked dry by a strange plant before Kiba managed to free her.

Hinata Hyuuga: 223 pounds. She arrived sometime on the fourth day.

Tenten: 405 pounds. Having arrived on the second day she quickly worked her way back above 400 pounds.

Naruko Uzumaki: 430 pounds. Now that wasn't a surprise, because thanks to her constant snacking and the deal she had with the Kyuubi she was constantly growing.

Ino Yamanaka: 367 pounds. The blond haired heiress blamed her arrival on the third day on her partner Shikamaru. Still, she sported a grin that was nearly as wide as her hips when she saw the now only chubby form of Sakura walk in.

Temari seemed to have neither lost nor gained that much weight, she topped out at 450 pounds.

Karin had apparently not made it to the tower, because she got dangerously underweight so she was rescued from the forest by an experienced Shinobi from her village.

There was a bit of a hold up after Gaia stepped on the scale, because she had broken the thing. It topped out at 640 pounds, so the redhead must have been a bit over that.

The rest of the Kunoichi were weighted, but Naruko didn't recognize anybody else, so she stopped paying attention to the numbers.

The entire group was led into a large sparring area, where the statue of a hugely obese woman several times bigger than most of the girls in attendance and a male that was a mountain of muscle that made the Jonin look lanky holding hands was.

A man that was similar to Kakashi in size walked into the middle of the arena and explained what will happen.

"Now, because so many teams have passed we have to hold a preliminary round. This will be similar to the finals, but instead of multiple fights you will only fight once to see if you advance. As a little extra rule...
