15533112.content:
Alright, let's try and reverse things a bit.

Suppose we still have the same idea, that ninja are divided into roles from birth based on gender and then trained appropriately to these roles.

One will be in charge of generating chakra like before, but instead, they will need to build up their strength and muscles to generate the chakra.

Meanwhile their peers of the opposite sex will need to develop large amounts of fat because fat is the medium through which chakra is most easily channeled.
15533112.title: The Same But Backwards

choices: Girls build muscle to build chakra while boys build fat to channel and use it
Boys build muscle to build chakra while girls build fat to channel and use it
155331121.content: Which gender gets which role?
155331121.title: Which is Which?

155331122.content:
Perhaps you don't like the idea of it all being so set in stone, determined from birth.

How about this, one of the ninja's most essential jutsus is a very special technique. The way it works is when you activate it, your opponent who your using it on begins to gain weight, while the user develops increased muscle mass.
155331122.title: Something a little more flexible

1553311222.content:
Alright, what if the jutsu worked in the opposite way. Your opponent gains muscle while the user gains fat. Why they would want this is because fat is the ultimate conduit for channeling chakra, while excess muscle mass prevents the use of jutsu. Thus the jutsu is dangerous, but if used right, very effective.

On the other hand it would probably be very effective if used on an ally.
1553311222.title: A strange reversal

1553312.content: How about Muscle growth combined with BE?
1553312.title: No, I'd prefer a different combination

15533122.content: How about wg and gt/gts?
15533122.title: Another combonation please

155331221.content: In this world getting fat equals getting bigger, and getting bigger equals more Chakra. Now before we start does this only apply to the girls, boys or both?
155331221.title: That sounds interesting

1553312211.content: Great, now to the story, in this world only kunoichi can produce Chakra but are unable to use use it, so they can only use taijutsu. On the flip side the boys can do jutsu but can't produce there own Chakra, so in order for the boys to perform jutsu they have to be pared with a girl. Together, forming a link between each other, they graduate from the ninja academy, but to connect one final exam they must pass and it won't be easy.
1553312211.title: Girls

15533122111.content:
Naruto sat on his bed in the center with his gear laid out before him. It was early morning and he hardly sleep all night worrying about his upcoming test, now it was only a short time away. This test was one of the most important test he would have to take as it will be the first step in achieving his dream, becoming Hokage! But as of right now he was scared of taking his test. Although not because it was a hard test, it was, but because that it was not just up to him alone to pass but with a partner, and not just any partner but a girl partner, and that made him nervous. Normally he would be very confident in himself, but relying on another he was not used to. For most of his life he always had to take care of himself, and now he was going to be pared with a girl for the rest of his life and that scared him. Was she going to be mean to him like everyone else, was she not going to be as driven as he was in achieving his dream, or worse was she not big enough to achieve his dreams. He then thought about the resent events that happened to him. Him learning about how he poses the Nine-tailed fox within him after stealing a scroll, how that would effect their relationships. He began to think about how he was betrayed by one of his teachers because of the Nine-tailed fox that lies within him. Lucky he was saved by another teacher, the one who will give him his graduation test, Iruka Umino.

The alarm clock chimed snapping Naruto out of his thoughts. He quickly looked at the clock on his nightstand see that he was running late.

"Darn," he yelled as he hopped off his bed and quickly started to pack his gear. He ran around his house gathering his clothes before bolting out of his abnormal large door.

Running down the road to his school, passing houses that would be considered to be too big for a average man with doors bigger then the width of couple of men, all to accommodate for the large women population of their tribe. Although for the most part women was similar size to men with the exception of female ninjas. With kynoichi on average being almost one-and-a-half to two times bigger then their male counterparts.

Naruto was crouching in front of the massive school huffing and puffing. As he was catching his breath he looked up to see that the rest of his class was already waiting. Although most of his class he didn't know personally there was a few familiar faces. Neji, Choji, and his self-proclaimed rival Sasuke stood near the entrance of the school with several other boys just chilling out.

"Hey Naruto, I see your actually on time for once," Choji said while eating a bag of flavor chips.

"Wouldn't miss it for the world," Naruto huffed. He then looked at the other boys before returning back to Choji, "hey where is the rest of the guys?"

"Their taking different test from our own," Sasuke spoke annoyingly.

"Different test? There other kinds of tests?"

"Yea but that doesn't matter, your not going to pass this one," Sasuke stated strongly.

Naruto rushed to Sasuke's face with a serious face, "Oh yea well I bet you I'll get a girl long before you do!"

"As if." Sasuke said without acknowledging Naruto standing before him.

"By the way Naruto which girl are you hoping to snag," Choji spoke as he opened another bag of chips.

Naruto blushed as his body recoil back at the question. Although he haven't had thought much on which girl he would want he did have a crush on the two largest girls in there class, Sakura and Ino. Both being of equal size standing almost 8 feet tall and weighting just over 800 each, they was the largest girls in our school, with the next size down being at 7 and 650. The two girls were always competing with each other, over food, size, and most of all over the affection of Sasuke, the strongest boy in the school, although Naruto won't admit that. Being also the largest they are the most desirable out of the other girls, even Sasuke wanted them, although he wouldn't tell you that.

"Well, um, I... I was hoping I get Sakura," Naruto said sounding a little embarrassed.

Sasuke scoffed. Naruto quickly turned to face Sasuke, "Oh yea! I'll take you on right now!"

A loud cough come from the entrance of the school. Everyone quickly turn to see that Iruka Umino was standing there with a clipboard and looking sternly at Naruto.

"Everyone line up," Iruka commanded. The boys quickly formed a line shoulder to shoulder in front of their teacher with Naruto snorting at Sasuke before he fell into line with the rest of his classmates.

"Alright boys, your graduation test will begin shortly. But before you all begin I have a couple of things I want to discuss with you about the test. First of all this test is to test your ability to track your kunoichi, this will be essential in a mission if you two ever get separated. Secondly inside you will find a underground maze where five kunoichi will be hidden throughout the it with several different types of traps guarding the pathways. These traps are to test you on your ability to fight, dodge, and maneuver around danger either by the traps or by you fellow classmates."

Naruto raised his hand went up.

"Yes Naruto?"

"Only five girls? There is about ten of us!"

"That is correct, not everyone here will able to pass and those who fail will have to retake the test next year."

A dread fell upon the boys as the realization that less then half of them will pass this year.

"And lastly, once you find your kunoichi you two will be escorted out so nobody will try to find that kunoichi."

Naruto and his classmates stood in silence contemplating on what was in store for them. If one of them was following the trail of one of the kunoichi and that kunoichi's chakra signal disappeared before found them then you could be lost and have to start all over again. Secondly since there is only five kunoichi that mean that they would have to fight each other.

"Ok then," Iruka started, snapping the boys out of their thoughts, "if there is no more questions we will begin the test shortly."

Waiting for a response Iruka looked at the boys gauging there response. Some of them was panicking, including Naruto, while others remained clam, like Sasuke and Neji, confident in their abilities. "Ok then, follow me," he said when no questions arose. He walked away from the doorway and headed towered the nearby forest, the boys following close behind him.
15533122111.title: Continue

155331221111.content:
The forest was thick and dark showing its age. It is said that the older the village, the more secrets and dangers hid within forest.

The boys followed closely to Iruka through the forest for what felt like an hour until they came upon a old concrete entrance that went down into the hard soil. It was covered in moss and vines, hiding most of the doorway. Iruka hadn't slowed down as he walking into the structure, wile the boys hesitated in front of the out of place entrance looking down the dark staircase. That was until Sasuke and Neji entering it first prompting the others to follow.

The staircase was dark and moist, with only light illuminating was by the entrance and exit way down bellow. They slowed walked down into the darkness barley able to see Iruka. Luck for them it was a short way down before they came into a large concrete room. It was dimly lit by a couple ceiling lights and ahead of then was several hallway also illuminated dimly. Iruka stood in front of the hallways facing the boys as they entered the room.

"Ok boys, this is where you start. Down these halls are the girls waiting for you to find them. On my mark, they will start releasing chakra and do what is needed to track them down." Iruka then pulled out a walkie-talkie, "start!" Upon the signal the boys made a couple of hand signs and concreted on the oncoming chakra.

The room was silent as the boys stood in a line waiting for any sign of the girls chakra. It was a couple of minutes before the first boy detected any chakra, and to nobody surprise it was Sasuke. Without making a sound he bolted forward into the most left hallway. As if on cue some of the boys looked at each other in confirmation and rushed in following behind him. Shortly after that Neji detected something and ran into the middle hallway. Soon one by one the line of boys dwindle as they ran into one of the entrances or following one of there classmates, and after a couple of minutes almost everyone has went into the maze, that is all except one, Naruto.

He stood still now starting to sweet as he tried to concreted on feeling anything from the hallways. Although he could of followed one of the boys or just guessed like some of the other boys, this was a matter of pride for him and need to prove that he had the making of a good ninja. But even with that he was beginning to strain as he stood there in silence concentrating with all his might as Iruka watched from the wall off Naruto's left. Iruke, although looking calm, was worried for the student he as grown fond of. He knew Naruto was one of the weakest of the students in his class externally, but he also knew he had the most potential out of everyone to become one of the greats. But if dose not succeed here Naruto might lose all his confidences.

Just as he thought that Naruto jolted in shock as if something nipped him in the butt. Naruto, with a large smile growing on his face, quickly looked down the most right hallway. With surprising speed he bolted down the hallway with Iruka smiling feeling relieved.
155331221111.title: The Maze

1553312211111.content:
Iruka walked into a small room with only a seat, a desk, and several monitors arranged into a grid hanging off the wall where the desk was. Each screen was on showing each student as they progressed through the maze. Once Naruto zipped into the maze Iruka had opened a nearby hidden door that lead into this observation room. He took a seat and began to observe the students progress. No surprise to Iruka that both Sasuke and Neji was doing the best as they dodged traps and pitfalls in the dim lited maze. Occasionally he would see a student or two fighting off other students when they cross paths or caught up to students that they were fallowing. There was only four girl to the ten boys, so fighting was inevitable. Then Iruka turned to the screen that showed Naruto's progress, and he was persistent Iruka had to give him that. Although Naruto kept moving forward he really didn't have much for situation awareness. Iruka could see that Naruto would rush into traps, triggering them, and barely dodging the knifes and needles or dropping into pits with spikes, either barely jumping over them or catching the spikes themselves preventing himself from being skewed. For a accident prone boy he was extremely lucky.

Naruto was catching his breath from his latest trap that he narrowly escaped, a collapsing ceiling. Even though he knew about the traps from Iruka-sensei he was too focus following the chakra trial that he total forgot his training for checking for taps, although he wasn't probably paying attention in class when teaching it. But to him that didn't matter, he was just too ecstatic that he could feel that chakra that fact that he almost died a couple of times didn't bother him. The chakra he felt warm and strangely soft, a lot different the what he felt from school practice. From school it felt more rough and stiff, he's sensei told them that's because they was not that compatible with it, some girls will be more compatible with them then others and they'll know it when they feel it. So Naruto knew whoever chakra he was following it will be compatible with him and this made him excited. So excited that he over came his tiredness quickly, running down the hallway... and into another trap.

---

"Dead end again, arg!" Naruto yelling at a wall as he collapsed to the ground in frustration. This has been the seventh dead end in a row. Even though he could feel the chakra he couldn't tell where it came from.

Naruto sat there scratching he head in frustration thinking on how to find this girl. He as been running though this darn maze for almost an half-hour and he was starting to panic. He knew that the longer he took to finding this girl the more likely the chance someone else would find her, which means that the flow of chakra would end, which means him being lost in the maze, which means that either he finds a new chakra to follow or fail, and if he failed that means...

"NO! I'm not going to fail!" He yelled as he jump back to his feet.

The only hope of not failing was that he still felt the chakra and that he was getting closer was that the chakra he felt was getting stronger. Quickly he turned around heading back where he came from desperate to find his new partner.

---

Naruto just dodged another trap and was hoping down the hall removing some of the needles that did successfully pin him. But that didn't stop him because he knew he was close, very close. The chakra felt like a thick fog compared to a light haze from the beginning. His body was pumping with adrenaline pushing him though the bruises and cuts as he came close to what appears to be a strong light coming from around the bend. In this maze of dimly lit hallways it was the brightest light by far.

"Is this it, did I make it?" Naruto thought as he quickly hobble to the light.

As he turn the bend he was suddenly blinded by a bright light that he had to cover his eyes. It took him a moment for him to adjust to the light before he could see who was in the room. And who he saw was...
1553312211111.title: Naruto's journey

15533122111111.content:
Hinata!

Within the well lit room sat the chubby girl on a large simple metal bench in the center of a grayish marble room with a very large simple metal door behind her. Hinata hasn't noticed Naruto coming around the corner as she had her eyes closed, her hands clamped together concentrating on releasing her chakra.

Naruto just stared at Hinata for a bit, mostly just to catch his breath, as he gradually realizing that he had succeed in finding a girl. Slowly he took a step into the room, echoing in the mostly empty room. Hinata immediately snapped out of her concentration quickly turning to the entrance to the maze.

Hinata heart stopped as she looked at Naruto.

"Na-Na-ruto-o-kun?" Hinata stuttered, then she began to fall to the ground.

"Hinata!"

Quickly Naruto lunged at Hinata catching her before she hit the ground. Grunting as he struggled a bit both because of his weaken state and how much Hinata weighted.

"Hinata, are you alright?" Naruto said looking down at Hinata's surprising lean face given her plump body.

She must've weighted no more then two hundred but it was hard to see through her baggy clothes. But from Naruto could feel she must have had a large backside and a surprisingly large bust given her size.

"She must be exhausted," he thought as he attempted to wake Hinata up, failing to notice the small smile on her face.

---

Iruka watched Naruto's attempts to wake Hinata up, he exhaled in relief. The last several minutes was stressful as he watched Naruto stumble upon this room. Naruto got lost so many times that even Iruka didn't know where Naruto was sometimes.

Iruka slowly got up from his chair, stretched and turn to a door to his left, "time to meet the newly formed couple."

---

As Hinata slowly got up with the help of Naruto the metal door opened grabbing both of their attention. Iruka now stood in the doorway clapping, "Congratulations Naruto and Hinata, now follow me to the waiting room."

The two followed Iruka down a tall and wide concrete hallway, it was a short trip as they came to another large wooden door. Upon opening it Naruto and Hinata saw a large very nice room. Hanging on the ceiling was several modern lamps while the walls was covered with a light blue wallpaper with a white marble floor with another large wooden door at their right. Along the walls was several large love seats, made for a girl and boy can sit together, and already some of them was occupied.

"Naruto, you made it" cried Choji.

Naruto looked at Choji sitting at one of the love seats in the middle. Next to him sat a grumpy looking Ino eating one of Choji's bags of potato chips. Choji giving a thumbs-up and a big smile to Naruto. On Choji's right sat Neji and Tenten just sitting there awkwardly, trying to avoid eye contact with each other. And on the left of Ino was Sasuke and Sakura, Sakura looking very pleased with herself and Sasuke looking stern as if nothing has happened.

"Hey Choji I see you made it, and made a good catch," Naruto said as Ino huffed in irritation. He and Hinata then took a available bench next to Neji and Tenten. Neji turning to Hinata with a judgmental face while Hinata looked down to the floor trying to hid how happy she was.

As the two took their seats Iruka can see how out of place Naruto and Hinata was from the rest of pairs. Sakura and Ino just sitting was over a foot taller than Sasuke and Choji, while Tenten was half-a-foot taller then Neji. Hinata was the only one who was smaller then her male partner. She was also the smallest in weight as both Sakura and Ino took up nearly two-thirds of the couch size love seats while Tenten taking only half. Naruto and Hinata looked so small in the oversized seats as both of then just taking up only half of its length. Even Naruto stood out as he had the more cuts and dirt then all other three boys combined.

Iruka then pulled out his walkie-talkie and put it to his mouth, "Okay that everyone, find the rest of the students, treat them for injuries and sent back to the school." Iruka put the walkie-talkie away and clapping his hands together to get the attention of the couples.

"Congratulations, this is a monumental achievement for all of you and should be proud of yourselves. Now ladies, the partner that found you is the best to resonate with your chakra so it is best that you practice with your partner so that the flow of chakra between you two is second nature," Iruka looking at Ino for a moment catching her eyes, "and gentlemen, I know you guys feel quite proud in 'catching' yourselves a girl, but you must treat your partner with respect. You will need to take care of her needs, inside and outside of battle. There is some things that your partner can't do so it's up to you to take care of those limitations. Now if you all follow me, we can register you in and assign you with new living quarters unless you already made plans." Iruka stated, then walked to the wooden door to his right.

One by one they left their seats and followed Iruka down the well lit hallway to the register building.

---

Tsunade was looking at some mission reports that she just recently received. Although it was not easy to read such papers given her size. She was a giant of a woman, standing just shy of nine feet and weighting well over two tons. Her two mountains of a breast made it hard for her to see anything under her or in front of her as they rode up to her chin. Giving support to her bust her dome of a stomach was only slightly bigger then her breasts jutting out of her with very little sag. Her rear was just as big as her top needing a couch for each cheek just to sit comfortably. Standing next to the enormous Tsunade was Jiraiya, her partner, helping her with the paperwork.

"Ah, here is the papers for new couples, from the academy" Jiraiya said picking up several pieces of paper from his desk.

"Uh-hu," Tsunade said too focus on reading a report, one of many that laid across her bust.

"Well no surprise that Sasuke and Sakura got connected, he is one of best student we had in years and Sakura is one of the biggest girl this year,"

"Uh-hu," Tsunade said again as she moved to another report with some struggle. Jiraiya rolled his eyes at Tsunade response.

"Then their is Choji and Ino, after that Neji and Tenten, and finally..." Jiraiya stopped taking a look at Tsunade to see her reaction.

"Well, who's the last group," Tsunade said looking away from her papers and down to Jiraiya with a frown, her cheeks puffing up in annoyance.

"And last Naruto and Hinata, hmmm." Jiraiya thought.

"Oh, congrats on Naruto connecting with someone, I really wasn't sure if he could, but with Hinata, that an interesting pairing." Tsunade said as her expression changed to worriment.

"Yea, although Hinata is the smallest in her class her fat actually contains three time more chakra then most other girls, I haven't seen someone with this much chakra concentration in many years. Then there's Naruto..." Jiraiya said before becoming quite.

"I'm more concern for Hinata's well-being," Tsunade stated looking down her breast.

"Oh?"

"Yea, when the a generator give chakra to her user chakra also comes back to her, like a circuit. So the one who has the strongest personally of the two tends to influence the other one's personally."

"And Naruto outgoing nature is clearly more dominant then Hinata timid nature." He said while scratching his chin in thought.

"Yes, now normally that's fine, except that Naruto has the, *cough* the you know what, inside him." She said as she looked around the room seeing if anyone else was listening on them.

"Well then, we better keep a close eye on them." Jiraiya said looking out the window seeing the school.
15533122111111.title: Hinata

choices: New day, new teacher, old rivals
155331221111111.content:
Naruto was sitting on a bench outside of the house of Hyuga with his hastily packed shuffle bag. After leaving the school Hinata said that her family would provide them a house upon passing which was great news to Naruto.

Upon arriving at Hinata's home there there stood only three people waiting outside of a large house for Hinata. One was a stern looking man who Naruto thinks might be her father. Next to him stood two large women, an middle age woman standing a bit over eight feet tall and weighting about half-a-ton while the other more younger one stood six-and-a-half and weighting probably over five hundred pounds. Both had an exaggerated hourglass shape, probably something to look forward to in Hinata Naruto thought. He presume they was her mother and sister, but he couldn't tell if the sister was younger or old given how she was bigger then Hinata. Upon looking at their faces he could see that they looked displeased. So now he was sitting outside waiting for Hinata to finish talking to her father, and by the little he could hear it was not pleasant. He didn't know what problem between Hinata and her family, he barely knew Hinata, which was going to change once he starts living with her.

How having time to think it was now dawning on him what this all means to him. Things are going to be very different from now on, no more being a prankster, no more doing things on his own, going on mission, and sharing a house with a girl. Thinking all this made Naruto scared, it was a lot for a fourteenth year old boy to take.

But before Naruto could think about it more Hinata came out of the house with a defeated look on her face.

"Is everything alright Hinata," he asked as he stood up.

"Oh, yea, everything is fine," Hinata jolted and quickly put on a smile. "The place is all set, w-we better go and check it out." She then walked away from the house back to the village while Naruto followed.


It was a short walk from the mansion as the sun was starting to fall behind the trees before Naruto spoke.

"Sooo, what's the deal with your family?"

Hinata froze a little from Naruto's bluntness.

"E-everything is fine, they are j-just a bit serious," she answered hiding her face.

"You're sure? I would think that your family would be happy for graduating." He said was he put both arms behind his head looking to the sky.

"Yea," she sadly said.

"Well if they won't celebrate they we'll have our own party to congrats ourselves for passing," has said joyfully.

This made Hinata smile, this was why she loved Naruto. She didn't want to tell him that her family was very disappointed by Naruto being the one paired with her. Inside the her home she was scolded by her father for getting such a weak genin. Her father was planning not give them a house as punishment until Hinata argued that it would look bad for the house in the public eyes if he wouldn't give a home for his own child, how would he treat his business deals? Her father was shock by such boldness by his meek daughter. She even was surprised but she couldn't stand for her father insulting Naruto. So in the end begrudgingly her father gave her a decently nice house about half way between their estate and the village. And as the two walked closer to the house the better she felt just in the knowledge of her being with Naruto.


The path to the house was a wide cobblestone road leading into the forest. It was good that it was just a short walk to the house for Hinata as she was getting tired from everything that has happen, mostly from her family. The house itself was in a traditional minka style and stood fifteen feet tall with a twelve feet tall twelve feet wide bamboo door. It looked bigger then most homes Naruto as seen for ninjas, in fact it looked too big for them as both of then stood below six feet.

Sliding the door open with surprisingly ease, the two slowly stepped into the large house. Taking their shoes off and entered the living room they was amazed by its size, although it was a simple room that had a large table in the center. With great excitement Naruto bolted thought the rest of the house existed to see what this house had for them. One by one Naruto swiftly open doors to see what was lay inside. Regardless of the house's size he quickly went thought the entire house as it only had a couple of room. One bedroom, a very large kitchen, two bathroom, and a big twenty foot walk-in bathtub, large enough for a very big girl. Hinata took her time exploring the house before her and Naruto's stomach told them it was time for dinner.

The two stood in the large kitchen wondering what to do. Even though the counters and cabinets was normal size, everything else super sized. The dishes, bowls, the pots and pans, even the fridge was almost twice of that Naruto was use to. Also Naruto has never cooked before except for instant ramen. Luckily Hinata knew a little bit of cooking to make something.

"I-I can make something Naruto-kun." Hinata speaking softly.

Naruto turned to her in surprise, "really? That's great, I don't know that much about cooking, but are your ok with cooking for the both of us?"

Hinata smiled, "it's not a problem Naruto-kun. I'll just make something simple."

"Thanks Hinata, I guess I'll go wash up a bit, I'm beginning to smell." He said rubbing the back of his head as he walked toward the room with the bathtub.

Hinata quickly turn away from Naruto hiding her blush as she thought of seeing Naruto's naked body.


Naruto was drying his hair with a white towel as he walked toward the living room. It really dawned on him how big this house was when he went into the bathtub. He felt so small that he thought he was in a small swimming pool with how much water there was. He was in there for an hour before Hinata called him for dinner.

As he approached the living room his stomach growled from the smell of food hovering in the air. Upon entering the room his eyes went wide at the food that was set on the table. On the table was two gigantic bowls of raman, each being about two feet in diameter. Sitting next to the table was a pot so big that Naruto could probably fit himself inside it, he wondered how Hinata could carry such a thing. The ramen bowls was filled with big slices of pork, fish cake, and scallion among other things. Hinata was already sitting down, patiently waited for Naruto. As Naruto was being amazed by the food Hinata as blushing upon seeing Naruto, he was only wearing a tank top and a pair of boxers.

"Wow Hinata this looks delicious," he said excitedly as went to the table sitting down.

Hinata just blushed harder as she looked away from him in embarrassment, "th-thank you Naruto-kun."

They both gave thanks and dug in, Naruto eating his quickly while Hinata was ate hers more slowly but still faster then most people.

"This is delicious!" Naruto exclaimed.

"T-t-thank you," Hinata said quietly.

Naruto was too focus on the delicious food to see Hinata's face becoming more red every passing minute. Her mind was in a state of euphoria, this was the greatest day of her life! Not only did Naruto found her in the maze making them a team, but also living together under the same house, cooking, bathing, and sleeping together like a married couple. She almost fainted as her body shivered at the thought.

As she finished her bowl she saw that Naruto was eating his second bowl of ramen. She began to think about her body. She knew that she was small for her age being only 220 lbs and standing only at 5 foot 10. It's not like she didn't try to grow, both by her and by her family, but she had a faster metabolism them most people so her growth was slow. Even her younger sister Hanabi was more then twice her weight and eight inches taller then her, and she was five years younger then her! But before today she didn't have much of a drive to get bigger, and now being teamed up with Naruto and she didn't want to be small and weak anymore, she need to get bigger for his sake! Determine to grow and not have any leftovers for tonight she went to the large pot and scooped up a large amount of ramen for herself, more hungrier than ever.

They both sat in silence as they ate bowl after bowl of ramen. When Naruto finished he ate three bowls feeling stuffed, while Hinata started with her third. Naruto was about to thank Hinata for a wonderful dinner before he saw that she was still eating. He didn't want to interrupt her as she looked very focus on her food, but also he never saw a girl eat this closely. Naruto remained quite, his face turning red, as he watched Hinata went for her forth serving, then her fifth, then her sixth. He was mesmerized by her as she keep eating with a steady pace.

After some time she finally put down her chopsticks and her bowl after drinking it's broth, her breathing quicken as she rubbed her swollen belly. That's when she saw Naruto staring at her. Immediately her face turned beet red. They was just staring at each other for a minute in awkward silence.

"Um... It's getting a little late," Naruto spoke, his voice a little shaky.

Hinata just nodded and they both got up, quickly cleaning their bowls, and awkwardly walked to the bathrooms.

After several minutes they both came out at the same time both still embarrassed. They was both in their night clothes, Hinata wearing a simple light pink gown that went to her ankles while Naruto was just in a pair of orange boxers. As Hinata almost fainted upon see Naruto's almost naked body, Naruto could clearly see Hinata's curves. Although not as extreme as the other two women that greeted them, he could see she inherited the same body shape. He could also see that her belly was bigger then this morning when he was trying to wake her when she fainted.

After some more awkward silence sitting on their beds, a floral room divider separating the two of them, they both nervously, at the same time, said good night to each other and went to bed.
155331221111111.title: New home

1553312211111111.content:
"Naruto-kun, it's time to wake up," Hinata said softly. Naruto didn't stir as he continued to softly snore.

"Naruto-kun, it's time to wake up," Hinata repeated saying it with more energy. Naruto still didn't move.

"Naruto-kun! Wake up, we're going to be late!" Hinata yelled in a soft tone.

Naruto sprung up from his bed his eyes snapping open. Hinata jumped back in surprise as the two locked eyes with each other. Naruto now sitting up on his bed blushing as he look at Hinata standing at the foot of his bed having forgotten that now lived with a girl, and Hinata blushing as she looked upon Naruto's half naked body.

"I-I-m so s-s-sorry N-Naruto-kun!" Hinata quickly said as her body stiffen. Hastily she scooted backwards out of the room slamming the sliding door in front of her. With Naruto out of her sight she was able to calm herself down enough to form cohesive thought.

"N-Naruto-kun, we need to hurry or we'll be late for our first lesson with our new sensei!"

Realizing what Hinata has said he jumped out of his bed panicking running around the room looking for his clothes and gear.

Now normally Hinata was much more punctual in her morning routine, as in getting up early, but because of yesterday's events and eating dinner till it hurt she had over slept. Lucky for them Naruto was much faster at getting ready then Hinata was but unlucky for them they had to slip breakfast. Quick they both ran out of their house barely having enough time to shut their door upon leaving.

---

Kakashi was looking at down at his watch expressing no emotion as his watch showed 9:05.

"Hey! We're here!" Yelled a blond hair boy running down the path with a dark blue hair girl trying to minimize her body jiggling as she held her arm over her breast not far behind him. Kakashi looked up at the two young ninja as they came right up to him huffing and puffing.

"You're late," Kakashi said sternly, "I should fail the both of you. Being late on a mission can cost you the lives of those around you including your team mate."

Naruto was about to defend himself but Hinata spoke up first.

"Sorry Sensei," she plead as she bowed, "it was my fault that we are late. I took too long on getting ready and..."

Kakashi put up his hand stopping her. "I don't want excuse. Just make sure that you make it on time next time. Now stand in line with the other two."

"Thank you sensei!" They both bowed in thanks and rushed away.

Naruto was surprised by Hinata for taking the blame. He was so used to taking the blame regardless if he deserved it or not. The fact that Hinata stood up for him really meant something, but before he could finish that thought he saw the other two young ninja's that he was supposed to line up next to.

"Sasuke, Sakura!? What are you doing here!?"

The two ninjas stood side by side, Sasuke crossing his arms over his chest and looking at the ground before looking up at Naruto and Sakura who was standing very close to Sasuke. She moved her hands to her wide hips as Naruto and Hinata walked toward them looking sternly at the two.

"We are here for our test stupid," Sasuke said ignoring Naruto existence.

But before Naruto could counter back Kakashi intervened by placing his hand on Naruto's shoulder.

"Save the fighting for the test." He said flatly.

As soon as Naruto and Hinata lined up next to Sakura Kakashi spoke up.

"Now before we begin I'll like to congrats you on your pairing," he said with what looks like smile under his ninja's mask. "I'm Kakashi Hatake and I'll be your future sensei, but here on out things will get hard. And before I train you I'm going to test you and if you don't pass this test you and your teammate will be separated and be sent back to school for another year."

"What?!" Naruto and Sakura yelled as Hinata brought her hands to her mouth in disbelief. Sasuke just looked up to Kakashi now showing some interest in what was currently happening.

"This is the big leagues and I will not tolerate failure."

Naruto began to panic, he came so far and... no this wasn't time lose his cool, he need to be confident and be brave.

"I'll take anything you throw at me, I'm not afraid!" Naruto blurted out. Hearing Naruto's confidence Hinata lost some of her nervousness and began to smile at Naruto.

"Good, let's see if that attitude persist." Kakashi said looking sternly at Naruto.

"Now your test is simple," he stated as he put his hand into one of his pockets, but before he could continue everyone heard a pair of growls. They all turn to look at both Naruto and Hinata as they become embarrassed.

"Sorry Sensei, we didn't have breakfast," said Hinata.

With a sigh Kakashi with his other hand went into one of his chest pouches and pulled out a normal white pill bottle.

"What is that Sensei," asked Naruto.

"This," he started as he opened the bottle and took one out putting it between his finger and thumb showing it to the young ninjas, "is a Hot Calorie Pill, it's a emergency pill that is given to you when your out on missions, just in case food is hard to come by. Each pill contains five hundred calories, so I recommend that you don't take to many." He then took out five more pills and gave two to Naruto and four to Hinata.

"Wow, this amazing, why don't we get them all the time," Naruto said quickly swallowing the two pills.

"Um, Sensei, can I have two more," Hinata asked nervously.

Kakashi looked at her sternly but gave her two more. "It's not good to take too many of them, you'll get temporary fatigue like after you ate a large meal and in a fight that's not good. Also they have very nutritional value, so there are not good at filling you up. They also sometimes cause mood swings in some people, so taking them at any time is discourage."

Hinata had a harder time swallowing the pills then Naruto had but she eventually ate them all. That's when from her belly grow outward she felt a strange sense of tiredness follow by a small feeling of aggression that Hinata quickly shook off.

After putting back the bottle he when into another chest pocket and brought out a small bell, "continuing what I said my partner, Rin Nohara, is hiding in the forest," Kakashi pointed to a small forest to his right," she will be holding just one bell just like this somewhere on her person. Your job is to take it." He finished with a grin. "And once a team got the bell or it become sunset the test is over and whoever's team has the bell pass."

An awkward silence fell upon them as the wind blew through the field.

"That's it?" Naruto questioned.

"Yes, that's it." Kakashi stated flatly. "You can use any tactic you wish to achieve this goal. You have five minutes to prepare."

"Wait a minute," Hinata said feeling a growing fear, "if there is only one bell that mean only one of the teams will pass!"

"Yes, that's correct." Kakashi respond without changing his expression.

Tensions filled the air as the realization downed on them that two of them as guarantee ot fail.

Kakashi then turned toward the forest and walked to it.

"Sensei, where are you going," Sakura questioned looking at him worried.

Kakashi just lifted his hand above his head and waved to them continuing to walking without saying a word. Before long he disappeared into the forest.

A moment of silence presided as the two groups looked at each other either of them wanting to make the first move. Breaking the silence Naruto put his hands behind his head cradling it and closed his eyes, "Ha, it will be fun to beat you Sasuke!"

Sasuke just ignored Naruto as he look in the direction of where Kakashi entered the forest, but Sakura became furious as she stomped her way to Naruto, shaking the ground with ever forceful step she took as her entire body shaking like jello. If it wasn't for her size it would have looked funny as she towered over Naruto her hands on her hips anger painted on her face.

"Oh yea, well all we have to do is sit on you to win!"

"Yea, I can run around you and your fat butt all day!"

"Naruto you stupid knucklehead!" Sakura moved forward so she could ram Naruto with her giant gut but Naruto quickly jumped away.

Sasuke just tuned out the two's arguing as he thought about Kakashi's test. It seem too easy, especially if he had to face Naruto, and wandered if there was any traps waiting for them.

---

Kakashi was lay on a large branch back against the trunk reading one of his favorite books paying very little attention to his new students. Then only real threat to his test was Sasuke and Sakura. With Sasuke's training and Sakura's chakra they was a powerful team. Although there will be some unexpected surprises in the upcoming test, like on real missions. He hadn't expected much from Naruto and Hinata though. Naruto was unfocused and undisciplined and Hinata wasn't very ambitious.

Just then Kakashi felt a wave of chakra coming from the field. Looking over his book he could see the two girls getting ready. It was obvious to see that they need more training in releasing their chakras as it was going in every direction, wasting it and easy to detect. What did get his attention was how both girls was radiating near equal amount of chakra despite their size differences. It was normal for grils to vary in chakra-to-fat ratio, but to this degree was amazing. Now if Naruto had some kind of hidden skill like Hinata has this test would get interesting.

Kakashi was not the only one to notice Hinata's hidden power as Sasuke looked upon Hinata from the corner of his eye while consecrating on connecting to Sakura's chakra. There was a small amount of doubt that he made the right choice in getting Sakura, but he quickly pushed that aside as he had a test to pass.
1553312211111111.title: New day, new teacher, old rivals

155331221112.content:
After an hour of traversing the thick jungle, Iruka lead the boys to a modest looking building. Inside, it didn't look like much, the paint looked older than Naruto's apartment, what looks like a reception desk, as well as a staircase that leads to a basement. The group is split in two, with Naruto, Neji, Choji, Sasuke, and the slacker Shikamaru staying while the others leave for a different building.

Iruka explains, "Down there is your test. This is one of several buildings within the forest, and the four of you will enter here, while the others will enter from the other buildings. Now down there will be a maze, with five points."

He shows them a map of a circular maze that looked majorly complicated, "The Kunoichi are spread apart equally, and the two buildings are here,"

He draws a simple star with a pencil, "And here," He makes a similar mark not too far from the other, "Now then, inside you will have to feel the chakra of the Kunoichi to tell you where to go, and along the way you'll find traps and puzzles. Whether you do good at this or not will either speed up the process to get to a Kunoichi, or slow you down. There are seven obstacles total for you to pass, if you go through more than seven, then you did something wrong and are being slowed down by a wrong answer. Now then, you'll enter the stairwell, and eventually, the main door will open and send you into the maze. Be prepared."

One by one, the boys enter the stairwell, and get to the bottom of a room that looks like a dungeon, with stone walls and floors and a grated gate blocking the way out. Neji inspects the door, "From what I see it looks like this hallway breaks off in five routes, meaning we won't see each other again."

Choji puts away his bag of chips and concentrates, "Come on...Focus..."

Shikamaru meditates on the floor, "How troublesome..."

Neji closes his eyes and crosses his face, "Let me see you..."

Sasuke smirks, "Gimme what I need..."

Naruto just presses his hands together, and prays, "Kami, mystery girl, please send me a sign. Anything! I'm good at games, but I suck at tests, please help me!"

Suddenly, the gate opens, and Sasuke and Neji immediately begin running through, Naruto swears, "Oh Crap!"

He runs next, while Choji and Shikamaru jog behind. One by one, they make it through a different hallway, while Choji hollers, "Good luck, guys!"

155331222212121.content:
It was another day in his normal life. The sun was shining the birds chirping. But most of all, the Kunoichi were hungry and wanting to add some layers to their already fat bodies. ‘Just another day in my normal messed up life.’ Thought the boy. His name was Naruto Uzumaki, the blond haired, blue eyed prankster of Konoha. Wearing his notorious orange tracksuit with blue on the upper shoulder areas, a large white collar, a white swirl on the side of the left arm and red swirl on the back. Completing his attire was a pair of orange pants and blue sandals. Naruto's most prominent trait, however, were the three whisker marks on each cheek.

Currently he was walking down a hall towards his academy class with three other boys from his classroom. Taking a small glance over his shoulder Naruto hoped that the two boys trailing behind him wouldn’t try throwing him to the females in class to be used as bait again. The first one’s most notable feature was the lazy expression on his face. He had fairly long jet black hair tied in a spiky ponytail, narrow brown eyes, and has both ears adorned by small ring shaped earrings. His attire was rather plain consisting of a green lined mesh T-shirt under a short sleeved grey jacket with green edges, adorned on both the sleeves and the back with a circle with a line through it, brown pants, and blue sandals. He was Shikamaru Nara, heir to the Nara clan and the laziest person you were likely to ever find.

Next to him was a boy with spiky, brown hair, swirl marks on his cheeks with a more robust physique than most would expect of an academy student. He was wearing a pair of black shorts, a white shirt with his clan's obligatory kanji for "food" on it. Over that was a short-sleeved, green haori and a long white scarf wrapped around his neck. A pair of hoop earrings, bandages wrapped around his legs and forearms and a dark blue bandana styled in a manner to allow two tufts of hair to poke out from either side completed the look. He was Chōji Akimichi, heir to the Akimichi clan and someone who always seemed to have a bag of BBQ chips to snack on.

The last one was in front of the blond. Having drawn the short straw today Kiba Inuzuka was forced to take point and would be the first one to enter their classroom. Kiba was thought of as being rather wild. His messy brown hair, sharp black eyes with vertical slit-like pupils, pronounced canine teeth, and nails probably didn’t help in removing such impressions. Like the other two, he was also part of a clan, the distinct red fang markings on his cheeks clearly showing his claim as one of the Inuzuka clan.

He was wearing dark grayish pants which reached his calves, a pair of blue ninja sandals and a grey, hooded fur-lined coat, with the hood usually placed on his head. Lounging between Kiba’s coat and fishnet undershirt was Akamaru. A small white furred puppy with dark brown patches on his ears, Akamaru was Kiba’s ninkin or ninja dog. All Inuzuka had a lifelong partner and Akamaru was Kiba’s, as well as his best friend and consent companion.

Finally reaching the door to their classroom Kiba nervously moved to open the door. This had become the normal procedure for entering their classroom. This was due to how as males they could be training to become strong ninjas one day only to find their lives cut short, normally inside the stomach of a fat and hungry kunoichi. In this day and age, a hungry kunoichi was the most terrifying enemy you could come across. Kunoichi’s had the ability to devour other people whole, normally making death very painful for those they ate. This ability however, was only amplified by the hunger most kunoichi experienced throughout their lives. Most girls didn’t develop the ability to eat others till the age of eight but, some rare girls would find themselves going through their first hunger pains as early as four. Males weren’t the only ones on the menu however, as some kunoichi preferred to add more fat to their bodies with each meal then most. Those particular kunoichi often went after other kunoichi. If not for how girls seemed to give birth to large numbers of babies per pregnancy, the hungry kunoichi of the world would surely be the end of humanity.

Kiba however didn’t care about any of that. He only cared about getting into class without being eaten, going through role call and getting the hell out of dodge before lunch time came. So he was not particularly pleased with the scene playing out right before his eyes after he opened the door. Wondering what their friend/distraction was seeing that bothered him so, the others slowly crept over to see for themselves. After which they greatly regretted it.

They watched with looks of horror and disgusting at the scene before them. Just on the other side of the door laid one Ino Yamanaka, who was just finishing her most recent catch. The boys couldn't take their eyes off the fat blond as she slobbered all over herself while loudly gulping and swallowing down the poor soul she had caught. Ino was massive, as was her appetite. Her legs were as thick as tree trunks and her fat thunder thighs jiggled with the slightest movement. Her arms were just thick layers of fat with sausage-sized appendages for fingers. When standing her belly normally would hang down to her knees as well as visibly shake and jiggle when it growled in hunger. Finishing off the physical appearance of this 750 pound blob was her round and chubby face with three chins with a forth one well on the way.

Drool slid down her fat chin before dripping down to the floor. She lapped her tongue around her meals still wiggling calves. Seeing she had an audience Ino made a show of pulling in the rest of her meal. The boys watched with a mix of disgust and fascination as Ino’s flabby form shook and jiggled with every gulp. Her purple vest like blouse with a raised collar barely covered her fattened assets where as her purple skirt did nothing to hide her fat rear end, which was only covered by a large number of bandages. This however also left her enormous belly in full view for any to see. Now was one such time as the platinum blond was currently lounging on top of said stomach, which was obviously full of her current victims/meals. To finish her appearance were a pair of purple and white elbow warmers, which seemed to be barely holding against her flabby forearms and blue ninja sandals. The girls’ green-blue eyes never left her audience as she gave a small flip to the bangs covering the right side of her face and encircled her tongue to the underside of her current meals feet, that footwear already having been removed. As she closed her mouth around the feet a smile could be seen on her chunky face as she gave a hard swallow.

The boys continued to watch on with looks on their faces showing how they felt rather sickened by the sight before them, and yet, they also couldn’t help but fell slightly aroused by the show of dominance from Ino. At least till she loudly belched in their collective faces. “So boys…” began the blond haired blob “… who wants to be next to slid down my throat and into my belly?” she asked already drooling at the idea of another tasty meal squirming inside her massive belly. Her enormous belly rumbled as if agreeing and anticipating its next victim, all the while its current occupants struggled against the inevitable.

Almost half an hour later

Naruto sighed as he sat down in his seat well away from most of the girls in class. It had been close but, the boys had gotten in class without having to sacrifice one of themselves to the gluttonous blond. He shuddered slightly as he could hear the sounds of stomachs churning and digesting their living meals from all around him. He couldn’t help but, wonder what made him such a target for the hungry Kunoichi. Practically every girl in the academy building wanted him in her belly, and during his nearly four years here he had been eaten twice. The first time had been by the pink haired girl named Sakura Haruno, suffice to say any crush Naruto had had on her died pretty quickly after that. The second was from Suzume-sensei, who unlike Sakura, managed to swallow him entirely and left him to digest in her stomach. He was only spared from both attempts due to the intervention of one Hinata Hyuga.

Naruto couldn’t keep the smile from his face as he thought of his only female friend. During his time in the academy she had been going out of her way to ensure his safety and was the only female ninja he trusted to not try and eat him. He was so lost in his thoughts on the lavender eyed girl that he didn’t notice someone had walked right up to him and…

He grunted at feeling something heavy land in his lap. Focusing on the heavy object he saw the very girl he had just been thinking about sitting with her side to him and her head turned towards him. A light blush dusted his cheeks at realizing Hinata was sitting in his lap. Shaking those thoughts from his head he gave the shy girl a small grin and greeted her.

"Good morning, Hinata." Hinata however didn't answer back and simply looked at him with half glazed eyes and an odd smile. "Umm, Hinata. Is everything alright?" he asked growing slightly concerned at her odd expression. His only reply was Hinata wrapping her arms around his neck and resting her head on the crook on his neck.

Now feeling very concerned he pushed her away enough to get a better look at her. Letting his eyes scan her up and down, he tried to find any hint to what might be causing her odd behavior.

First there were her thighs, round and plump, stretching the fabric of her pants. Next he continued upward to her widened hips and expanded butt. A butt that he couldn't help but notice just how soft it was.

Then he came to her chest and plump arms. The large gut that she normally tried to keep hidden under her baggy jacket seemed quite larger than normal. Where it would normally sit comfortable in her lap while being covered by her jacket, it now seemed to have almost engulfed her lap. He made a mental note of that and continued looking her over. Though he felt slightly ashamed of himself for letting his eyes linger on her rather large breasts as they rested atop her stomach. And finally he came to her face; her checks were plump and full with hints of a double chin forming. All this gave her face a rounded childish look, one that Naruto couldn't help but find adorable.

Naruto frowned slightly at finding nothing to help explain Hinata's odd behavior, sides the enlarged belly. He knew though that the size was likely from her catching a quick bite to eat on the way to class.

Seeing the frown on his face, Hinata decided to try and remove it the only way her clouded mind could think of. Tightening the hold her arms currently had around his neck, she leaned closer, fully intending to remove his frown. Her approach caught his attention but, it was too late for him to do anything. Thankfully, or not depending on who you ask, Hinata didn't open her mouth to try and eat him. She did however, pucker up her lips and kissed his cheek.

Hinata pulled back and blinked, cocking her head to the side in a moment of confusion. It didn't stop her for long thou, as she giggled and made another attempt to remove any trace of a frown from his lips. All though embarrassed at the display of affection, Naruto was able to catch a whiff of alcohol coming from Hinata as she kissed his nose. He couldn't help but groan as he realized that Hinata had eaten one of the drunks before they returned home. That explained why Hinata was acting so odd. All the alcohol from her clearly still digesting breakfast had gotten his only female friend drunk.

After the team assignments, Naruto headed towards the hokage tower. The secretary directed him to the office. When he came into the room, he was surprised to see Mizuki bound in chains to the floor, two anbu keeping him in place. The hokage himself was at his desk overlooking both of them.

"Come in. Welcome, Naruto." Sarutobi was a giant of a man. A big bulky hulk, he was a symbol of strength for the whole village. He eagerly awaited the day, Naruto could become his successor.

"What's going on Grandpa? Why's the traitor here?"

"It's simple Naruto. I wanted to teach you the Power Devouring jutsu and I have a perfect target here for you to use it on first."

Mizuki's eyes widened in fear and tried to say something, but his gag reduced it to incoherent muffles.

Sarutobi gets up and approaches Mizuki. He beckons Naruto to come closer.

"Now do what I do." He made a dozen slow hand signs. Naruto followed along as best he could. Sarutobi looked over every sign, wanting him to get it quickly. Once Naruto was good enough at the signs he went over the process.

"After you make the symbols and call out the name, a red glow will go over your hand. Place it on any part of the body you want and it will be turned into a crystal you can eat for power. It's going to feel strange your first time, but the benefits are immediate. You get stonger, bigger, and your chakra capacity grows."

"I'll do fine Grandpa, after all. I'm going to be hokage!"

He made the symbols, and put his hands on Mizuki's head first. Immediately it turned into a smaller blue crystal. The crystallization spread down his body until only it remained. Naruto broke off the head and swallowed it whole.

The changes were immediate, He grew an inch, his biceps got more defined, and his legs got a bit thicker. Along with the outer change came an inner one as a hunger overtook Naruto and he started eating the rest ravenously. He grew much quicker now. His whole body shot up a head, his back started to tear out of his clothes. His arms seemed to be crammed into the sleeves, the biceps straining against the fabric. His chest burst the zipper, forcing it down with its size. Hidden by the zipper's remains, his abs, barely visible before, tightened into a 6 pack.

Below his waist, his thighs pushed his pants to the limit.Visible through the fabric, the pants looked painted on. His calves were halfway out as the surge in size caused them to ride up. Unseen by all, his cock packed on a couple of inches as his ball thickened slightly. His feet no longer fit his sandals as they hung over the front and back.

"Good, now you are a true shinobi.You should head back to the school, your team should still be waiting for you in the room.

155331222221221.content:
It started many years ago. Back during the time of the warring clans, back before hidden villages were even a dream. It was during this time of conflict and death that an event occurred that changed the very world.

A kunoichi did battle with a shinobi. The shinobi was clearly more skilled then his female opponent yet, instead of finishing her and completing his mission, he took his time to toy with her. It was this attitude that caused both his death and the kunoichi to make a world altering discovery. Angered beyond all rational thought at being played with like an incompetent child the kunoichi lunged at her opponent.

The next thing she knew, the shinobi that had caused her such anger was waist deep inside of her. She watched as the legs of her once opponent now meal kicked wildly. Shocked at what she did, she could not stop herself from swallowing him down further. Once the male had been packed away inside of her now giant stomach, she tried to return to her clan. This was of course met with failure as she did not have the physical strength to lug her weighty meal around. After falling asleep, due both to the massive meal she needed to digest and the exhaustion from consuming said meal and trying to move around with it, the women found herself stronger then ever.

She had grown a few inches in height and her muscles were larger, more defined. Quickly relieving herself of her meals remains she made her way back to her clan and began to inform the other kunoichi of what she had done. Soon her method of enemy disposal and strength acquisition was being used by all of her clans kunoichi. As time went on this method was learned by other kunoichi and used by them in turn. By the time hidden villages were founded, the consuming of others and growing stronger was seen as a normal part of being kunoichi.

Slowly, the physical traits started being seen in kunoichi shortly after being exposed to their chakra, giving most late first years and over a more muscled body then their peers. This did not stop the consumption part from being taught, no. It was in fact the first jutsu that kunoichi-in-training were taught.

Now we start our story in Konoha and in its academy. The class containing one Naruto Uzumaki. Will the boy survive to full ninja-hood or will he become nothing but a part of one of his kunoichi classmates?

When do we start?

1553312222212212.content:
It was time for the ninja academy graduation exam. One young boy with spiky blond hair and sky blue eyes sat in his classroom nervously shifting about in his seat. His hands played with the zippers and folds of his orange jumpsuit as he glanced around. The last thing he wanted was to be cornered by one of the muscular kunoichi in-training. In the beginning things weren't so bad. The girls in class were small and not very aggressive. That all changed once they learned how to eat others and add to their mass.

Naruto thought back and couldn't help but, find it ironic that the small girls that so many boys picked on eventually ate those boys and grew big. His eyes glanced over at a young girl who always sat in the back. There wasn't much to say as she seemed rather plain. Short dark indigo hair that was nearly the color of the night sky, combed to give the impression of a swans tail in back with two strands framing her face. Her skin was a creamy white and her white eyes held a hint of lavender in them, giving her eyes a soft and gentle look. Her upper body was covered by a tan jacket, while her legs were clothed in dark blue ninja pants and the blue ninja sandals completed her attire. This was Hinata Hyuga, the shyest and at one time, the smallest girl in the whole academy.

In the beginning one would never think that such a kind and sweet girl would ever eat someone. That thought went out the window shortly after the girl learned how to consume others. Naruto remembered that he had saved a young girl from some older bullies. That girl just so happened to have been Hinata before she learned the jutsu. Those same bullies ganged up on him sometime later. He had tried fighting back but, only got hurt more for it. Then Hinata of all people appeared and started eating the boys. Naruto could still remember the shock he felt at seeing Hinata standing over him, asking if he was alright while her massive stomach thrashed around as she started digesting the panicking bullies. That same girl was now in the top five most muscled girls of his class. This made Naruto think of the three most muscled girls. They where Sakura, Ino and the only bully to have avoided Hinata's stomach, Ami. These three had a three way grudge match going as each one wanted to attract Sasuke Uchiha. Any they were willing to devour the entire class if they had to just to make that dream possible.

He felt someone sit next to him and turned to see Hinata, making Naruto feel both shocked that she had approached him and nervous as to why. "N-naruto, is everything ok?" Asked the larger girl. Naruto gave a nervous smile and told her that he was just a bit nervous. He didn't feel it was right to say that having a potentially hungry muscle girl sitting next to him only made things worse. He had ever right to feel nervous too, for if Hinata decided to make a snack of him then he wouldn't be able to do much to stop her. She surprised him however with how fast she moved as he suddenly found himself sitting in her lap with her strong and muscular arms around him. "Its okay, Naruto. Everyone here is nervous for one reason or another." She said as one of her hands snaked up and started playing with his hair. Naruto blushed as he found himself being hugged close to the girl. The fact that she had placed the side of his head against her chest only made his blush deepen. Oddly as the minutes passed, Naruto found himself starting to relax and just enjoying the feel of her fingers moving through his hair, or listening to her heartbeat. He felt so relaxed and safe that he completely forgot that he was sitting in the lap of a girl that could eat him at any second.

As much as Hinata was enjoying the feeling of Naruto in her lap, or the sensation of running her fingers through his hair, she couldn't help but feel a bit hungry. It was unbelievably tempting to just open her mouth and start cramming her secret crush in. She idly wondered what he might taste like. Her stomach gave a rather needy sounding growl of hunger, making Naruto stiffen in her arms. It took a bit of effort but, she managed to calm him. Though she realized that she never promised that she wouldn't swallow him down.

Pushing the idea of an easy blond boy snack/lunch out of her mind for a moment. Hinata looked around herself, picking out any potential meals she could have before Iruka-sensei arrived for class.

Hinata found it a bit odd that she didn't see Ami in the classroom yet. She wouldn't have minded making a meal of the bully. The fact that Hinata knew her muscles would greatly increase in size and strength with such a protein rich meal was just a bonus for her. She quickly moved on however, as she saw no point in wishing for something that wasn't there. The heiress soon spotted a small gathering of the ever shrinking male population in class. She picked out two boys who were known bullies as she had seen them picking on the very boy she currently had cuddled up to her bosom.

Hinata was truthfully rather upset at how most of the well liked boys had been eaten near the beginning of the academy years. When she had started her academy classes, there had been well over a hundred students with a 3:1 ratio of boys to girls. That was nearly four classrooms worth of students. Over the next four years however, that number had dropped to only her class. Hinata could barely believe that out of so many people starting out only thirty had made it to today and that was only due to an additional batch of students being added to this generation. Of this class nearly a quarter of it was female so, Hinata had no disillusions that the number of current students would be cut in half before the day was over.

The growl of her stomach caught her attention again. Naruto however, didn't stir as Hinata quickly realized that he had drift off to sleep. She stifled a giggle at how cute Naruto's sleeping face was while pressed against her bosom. He was so cute! 'And so easy...' She thought while licking her lips. She was hungry and needed to make a meal choice. Would she take the easy meal and eat her sleeping crush? Or would she prefer some of the no name students?

155331222221222.content:
It had been nearly three years, but Naruto Uzumaki had finally returned from his training journey with Jiraiya. They had been all over, and Naruto had met many interesting people, but he was glad to finally return home to Konoha.

Much had changed since he had left the village, however, and both he and his teacher were in for a surprise when they got back. During the long period of training for Naruto, a new jutsu had been developed by the kunoichi of his village. Over time, most of them had mastered it, and were actively using it on missions. This technique allowed for a female ninja to ingest a target and convert their body into new muscle. Over time, some kunoichi had grown more muscular than any man in the village, with enough muscle to left multiple ton objects without the use of chakra enhancement.

Naruto entered the village gates with the same hyperactive energy he had as a young kid. He sprinted toward a nearby pole, and with the application of chakra to his feet, ran right up it. He stood with his arms spread above him and, with a loud voice, exclaimed

"I missed this place!" He lowered his arms down and placed his hands on his hips and in a quieter voice, continued with, "it hasn't changed a bit."

Oh, how wrong the teenage ninja was in that regard. Much had changed, and he would soon see that with his own eyes.

The master and student pair started towards the hokage's office, running into Kakashi along the way. After giving him the new Icha Icha book, the three continued on, with Naruto well ahead of his teachers. That is when he ran into Sakura, and realized just how wrong he was about things not changing.

The blond knucklehead didn't recognize the girl at all until his eyes fell on the pink hair that framed her emerald eyes. His jaw fell open when he took in all of her. His childhood crush was no longer the petite girl he remembered, now she had more muscle than he had ever seen on anyone, even the strongman at the circus he had convinced his master to take him to.

Sakura looked like she was chiseled out of marble. Her soft, alabaster skin was contrasted by the size of her muscles. Her arms were unreal, around two feet around, and that was while they were relaxed.

"S...Sakura?" Naruto gasped out nervously as he tried to maintain his composure and not freak out like a scared child.

It took some time, but eventually Sakura explained to Naruto what had happened while he was away. How every Kunoichi was now as musclebound as Sakura, and how they could grow bigger by eating other ninja. It is here where they would have been tested once again by Kakashi, but a slight emergency arouse that required what was left of Team 7 to depart.

A spy that had infiltrated the village recently had stolen the specifics for the vore muscle growth technique and was heading back to his hidden village. There was evidence that he had received help from inside Konoha, but Tsunade would deal with that personally. The team was tasked with either capture or termination of said individual before this happened. Either were acceptable outcomes as long as all evidence of the jutsu was kept out of enemy hands.

"Well, Naruto. Looks like I get to show you what it is that this jutsu can really do."

15533122222211.content:
In this we will assume that after a set time of exposer to their chakra girls (normally only Kunoichi) start to develop a form of clones in their womb. What these are, are unstable blanks that hold only half of the genetic material they need to be complete. Because of this girls are able to have children with just about anyone, all they need are some genetics from the one they wish to sire child with. This genetic material is usually gathered through sexual intercourse with either another female or a male.

Until the 'blank babies' as they are called, are exposed to another's genetic material, the girl will remain pregnant. With this pregnancy comes a need for large amounts of food. It is here that a female’s innate talent to consume things larger then themselves comes into play. A Kunoichi with only one ‘blank’ will on average need to consume at least two twelve year old sized meals or one large adult twice a day. As such, the more ‘blanks’ a kunoichi is carrying the more she will need to eat each day to sate their hunger. There are of course oddities and exceptions to these standards. Girls of the ages 10 to 18 tend to have the greatest appetites as they are eating not just for their ‘blank babies’ but, for themselves as well. During these times, girls undergo puberty which seems to increase the hunger the girls go through.

Because of the large sizes some females can reach as well as the number of ‘blanks’ they can hold, some of the hungrier kunoichi will seek to make meals of other females over searching for a number of males to consume. There are laws that keep ‘fertilized blanks’ (blank babies that have gained another person’s genetic material and are forming into real babies) and their mothers’ safe. Though there are some that will sometimes fall through the cracks and be eaten.

When ‘blank babies’ are first formed, girls will have anywhere from one to three ‘blanks’ form. This number however, can increase with time. After a set period of time a Kunoichi may find themselves forming more ‘blanks’, with the average speed being one new ‘blank’ added to the womb every year form this point on. Kunoichi that do not wish to grow anymore ‘blanks’ are recommend to find a “Father” as soon as possible. In ninja society, the “Mother” is the girl who carries the ‘fertile blanks’ where as the “Father” is the one who shared genetic material (DNA) with the mother to fertilize the blanks. ‘Blank Babies’ grow to full size in nine months and require anywhere from three to twelve months to be born after receiving DNA from another person.

So let me make it clear, Kunoichi or Kunoichi-in-training (girls from the last year of the academy) are the only ones who form ‘blank babies’. These same girls soon after start to view other people as a possible food source and shortly after will begin to consume them for sustenance. Males in this society are viewed as A) Food or B) potential “Fathers” for a Kunoichi’s ‘blank babies’.
