15533122222211121.content:
It was Graduation day at the ninja academy of Konoha and every member of the graduating class was looking forward to how this day may play out. Some were talking to friends or indulging in nervous habits, like tapping fingers on the desk or fidgeting in their seats. Others, mostly the girls, were rubbing their pregnant bellies while looking over the class, sizing each person up as a potential meal to feed themselves and their newly formed babies.

At this time one boy was sitting quietly near the back of the class letting his eyes move about the classroom while his mind wondered. This boy with his spiky blond hair, bright blue eyes and “I’m right here so please kill/eat me now!” orange jumpsuit was the one and only Naruto Uzumaki. Idly, he brushed his cheek with a finger, letting the digit trace one of the three whisker marks he had on both cheeks. Just the other night he had been tricked into stealing the ‘Forbidden Scroll of Sealing’ by his traitorous ex-sensei Mizuki. As if being tricked into committing a treasonous crime wasn’t bad enough, Naruto had also learned why he was so hated by the village. He was the container of the dreaded Kyuubi no Kitsune, the very same demon that had attacked and nearly destroyed the leaf village. The demon had only been stopped by their Fourth Hokage sacrificing himself to seal it inside a newborn baby, him. This of course had come just before the traitor had tried to kill him. Thankfully, Iruka-sensei had been there and Naruto managed to beat Mizuki with the Shadow Clone, earning him his sensei’s headband and finally graduating.

Naruto sighed to himself as he mentally prayed to whatever higher being that would listen to be teamed with a kunoichi that wouldn't try to eat him first chance she had. Where most of the village hated or ignored him, the kunoichi, most of all the younger ones, tried to make a meal of him. Once you were swallowed down and sealed up inside the stomach, it was nearly impossible to get free unless the kunoichi in question let you back out. In the two months before graduation exams he had had twelve attempts made on him with the only one to succeed in eating him, being a girl that hadn't even been trying to swallow him.

Naruto was broken from his thoughts as he heard the sound of someone sitting down next to him. Glancing over he saw the only girl who had managed to eat him; The girl in question was of 12 to 13 years of age, with creamy-white skin and midnight-blue/black hair, brushed back to a small tuff much like a swan’s tail and two long bangs framing her face. The baggy tan jacket with white fur tuffs at the ends and a yellow circle on the outside of her jackets arms with a red tear-like flame design inside couldn’t hope to fully cover the massive cream colored stomach she now sported. Her dark blue pants were stretch as far as they could go and only just covered the bottom quarter of her belly, leaving the middle half for all to see as she went about her day. The standard blue ninja sandals as well as white bandages on her right thigh with a kunai case and ninja pouch over her the left side of her bum completed her look. Naruto’s gaze however, was drawn to the kind and gentle Lavender eyes; eyes that for the life of him always made him excited whenever he saw hunger flash through them. Naruto had helped this girl consume a number of people in the last two months and every time he saw it he couldn’t help but, think that she was so hot as she ate and digested people. This girl was Hinata Hyuga.

Hinata was the only girl who didn’t try to eat him. He, in an attempt to get away from a girl that had been trying to eat him, had jumped off of the balcony and by pure luck had ended up landing strait into the yawning mouth of Hinata. To say it was a surprise would be an understatement. Naruto had only realized that he had landed inside a girls stomach after he squirmed around for a few minutes. Hinata however, hadn’t realize who had jumped into her stomach until after the girl he had been running from came down and demanded to know which way he had gone.

That day, Hinata had earned Naruto’s trust. She had not only given the other girl a lie about him running off in some random direction but, she had even thrown him back up. If Hinata had wanted to, she could have simply sat back and enjoyed digesting him with him being unable to do anything but, beg and squirm as he became food for her and her still growing blank babies. Despite letting him out and how kind she was, Naruto had seen the look that would sometimes enter her eyes and knew that she had been very tempted to simply enjoy him. Surprisingly, instead of scaring him off this had only made him respect her more and had since started spending more time around the shy pregnant heiress.

It was around that time that Iruka had forced him to read a few books about girls and subtle cues they gave, something that he was thankful for now. The reason being made clear as Hinata hesitantly snuck her arm around his before sliding closer and resting her head on his shoulder. The whole time Naruto made no move to get away as he had learned that this was a sign of trust where as making his hand rest on her pregnant belly was a show of attraction. Naruto still couldn’t help but blush at knowing Hinata saw him as a potential ‘Father’ for her blank babies, though he did wonder just how many the girl was carrying. She was much too big to be carrying only one but, seemed a bit small to be holding three. Then again, she was bigger than most of the girls who had twins, so it left him rather confused at just how many the shy girl was carrying.

“I h-hope we are on the sa-ame team Nar-ruto-kun.” Naruto smiled at the thought, even more so at the fact that Hinata had initiated the conversation. “So do I. The last thing I want is to end up in some girls stomach just because I showed them the trust we are meant to give our teammates.” Complained the blond as he thought of how dangerous even the simplest missions would be with some hunger obsessed kunoichi as his teammate. Hinata however, gave him a look full of mischief before whispering into his ear, “What makes you think I won’t put you in ‘MY’ belly. You seemed so wonderfully snug inside it last time.” Naruto blushed but, didn’t open his mouth as he was unsure how he might respond to the idea of Hinata gobbling him up. Hinata giggled, before snuggling closer while rubbing her belly, the babies were gently moving around; likely due to her heart beating so fast at being this close to her intended. Hinata could barely wait for the day that her babies became ‘their’ babies.

It started many years ago, during the times of war. Kunoichi and Shinobi were always trying to grow stronger. Many Shinobi rose to fame where as few, if any, Kunoichi were ever remembered. One Kunoichi decided to change that and though her name has been lost in the times or stricken from the records, she is the one who found a way to allow women to grow in strength and power on the field of battle to the point that even some of the Kage of old were hesitant to face her in battle. She found a way to capture her enemy’s inside of her body, done in a manner that would allow her to draw upon their strength of chakra for herself. This woman was only defeated and put down after an intense battle. She had captured four men and three women with her justu and was still able to fight two Kage level ninja and their small force of elite Junín on her own. Though, she has been forgotten, in all but stories, her justu has not. It is now used as the final test for a Kunoichi to truly graduate. So, while Shinobi simple have to pass the academy test to graduate, Kunoichi must find themselves a partner. Someone who they will be within battle and draw strength from when needed. A third is normally added to the group, as a means to insure the Kunoichi can take in her partner into herself safely when her team finds themselves in need of the extra firepower.

Be warned though, as Kunoichi have been known to become addicted to the sensation of their partner being trapped within them. The knowledge that they can do nothing but hope their Kunoichi will see reason and release them after a time can be, intoxicating. This is only one aftereffect from using the justu. A second effect appears when the Kunoichi has kept their partner “captive” for a continual period of time, meaning she doesn’t let them go for days, weeks or even months at a time. The effect in itself is the syncing of the partners chakra to the Kunoichi’s body. This allows the Kunoichi to draw upon her partners’ chakra to slowly but, steadily restore her own chakra reserves, turning their partner into nothing more than a living recharge battery. The third known effect is that Kunoichi’s will sometimes suffer from strong flashes of an increased libido or sex drive/need for sexual satisfying activities.These flashes can happen at any time after using the justu for the first time, whether they hold a captive/partner at the time makes no difference. The justu is thankfully known for acting as an anti-pregnancy justu as well, at least until the time of late-teens or early twenties, at which time they can become very easy to impregnate.

The benefits for the justu when used by Kunoichi include: The ability to use their partners chakra or the chakra of anyone they have captured with this justu, The ability to amplify a Justus’s power by using both Kunoichi and the partners chakra, The ability to use any elemental affinity that their partner has, (as well as on rare occasions use a sub-element by mixing both chakras). The most useful part about this justu is that only the Kunoichi can hear any sounds coming from their wombs, on top of making "any" chakra unusable by their partner or captive(s) when trapped inside the womb; meaning that any captive must now rely upon their physical strength alone to try and escape. It should be noted that the Kunoichi's body seems to draw out more chakra from its captives to strengthen itself, allowing a Kunoichi to carry a large number of people while only having the center of balance and increased size of the obvious pregnant like belly to worry about.

It has also been noted that any attempt to escape or even move around from within the Kunoichi’s womb tends to be felt as greatly pleasurable to said Kunoichi.

With that, the small bound book was closed and returned to its proper spot on the shelves. A young girl around 12 to 13 years of age, with creamy-white skin and midnight-blue/black hair, brushed back to a small tuff much like a swan’s tail and two long bangs framing her face, sat back down in her chair. She was dressed in a baggy tan jacket with white fur tuffs at the ends and a yellow circle on the outside of her jackets arms with a red tear-like flame design. Her pants a dark blue and standard blue ninja sandals as well as white bandages on her right thigh with a kunai case and ninja pouch over her the left side of her bum, completed her look. “I see you figured it out. Well the girl did use the paper seal but, only after she managed to shove every other student of her class into her womb. The irony is… the friend she got the sealing tag from was one of her classmates so she ended up trapped with the rest of them, and without her and her knowledge of the seals design, no one could free them before it was too late.” Hinata shuddered at the idea of being betrayed by a friend like that, to be crammed inside them with so many others, never able to get out. And worst of all, knowing that it was all her fault. The thought of being forced to live such a life scared her, making her hands return to her own belly and rub it in a attempt to comfort herself. “S-so what h-happened to the g-girl?” “The girl became kunoichi but, her arrogance eventually got her killed, as for her classmates… well, they all died not long after. Since they couldn’t get out, the kunoichi became their only means of survival, with her killed, well…” A shrug. Hinata trembled at the idea of Naruto dying just because she wasn’t strong enough to live. The burnet checked the clock, “Well that at least killed five minutes.”
155332222111111211.title: Chakra Sync: part1

choices: On the way home Hinata debates if she should let Naruto out now to explain.
Hinata doesn’t let Naruto out till after hearing the new teams.
1553322221111112111.content:
‘Five minutes!’ Hinata thought just before she sat up strait. She turned to look at the clock only to be cut off by an odd sensation coming from her chakra. Her chakra felt strained in an odd way, like something was trying to alter it but, it was holding its ground. Only for it to suddenly shift. Gasping at the odd sense of vertigo from the sudden shift Hinata couldn’t keep up with what was suddenly happening. Her body felt hot… like molten lead had been forced into her blood but, it didn’t hurt. With the heat came a sense of pleasure, one that had her gasping in ecstasy and moaning loudly. She didn’t notice the odd clenching of her womb as it tried to shirking around her partner. Next thing she knew her arms were around her large belly and squeezing it. She felt herself trying to push Naruto down, not down to the floor but down towards her center, like she was trying to force him deeper into herself. She blocked out the words of the receptionist as she concentrated on the wonderful sensation of Naruto’s chakra flooding through her. There was so much that she felt like she might explode at any moment and yet, she continued to try and force him deeper into herself, not just into her body but, her very soul was calling for him. Craving him. Wanting him closer and closer until you couldn’t tell where Hinata ended and Naruto started. She could feel her skin tingling, humming, with the power just below its surface, it only increased her pleasure.

After what felt like hours of trying to unsuccessfully take Naruto into her very essence Hinata finally started to calm down. Her head was leaning against her large belly, ear pressed against its taunt skin and drool coming from her mouth. Huffing and puffing she tried to get her labored breathing under control, her face a bright red as she came down from whatever wonderful high she had been on, the rush now having turned to exhaustion. She could somehow feel that Naruto was in a similar state and trying to recover.

“Well I see you enjoyed it at least.” Jumping Hinata turned her head towards the receptionist; someone that she had completely forgotten was there. Seeing her being looked over by the women who hadn’t even left her chair was sum what embarrassing after her little episode. But seeing the women was breathing heavier and fondling one of her breast absentmindedly only made it worse. “Three times.” Confused Hinata simply looked at her. *sigh* “You experienced an orgasm three times in a space of five minutes.” Shock was the only thing keeping Hinata from fainting as she continued to listen. “I’m not really surprised truthfully. It’s not every day you experience your first “Chakra Sync” and “Urge” at the same time. The fact that you didn’t take so long to calm down from it is a surprise though.” She saw the questioning in Hinata’s eyes and tried to answer. “The ‘Chakra Sync’ or ‘Bonding’ as many call it, amplifies everything your body experiences during the first Syncing. In this case it amped up your “Urges” for lust and pleasure to a higher level. Now don’t go thinking that the “Urges” are completely bad, I mean it’s not like it’s going to make your jump the bones of the first person you see. Nine times out of ten the “Urges” make a kunoichi seek out pleasure from either themselves or from their partner. The reaction you however had was something only recorded happening in Konoha once. The people at R&D refer to it a “Soul Bond” and it only happens if the kunoichi goes through a session of “Urges” when also experiencing a “Chakra Sync” for the first time. What it means… well we aren’t all that sure ourselves. Just know that neither you nor your new partner are in any danger. Now get out of here and go home, I want to go to bed already.”

With that Hinata quickly grabbed her things and ran out of the center. She only just heard the women say to return to the academy in three days for her team assignment.

Watching the little girl run home the receptionist couldn’t help but wish that she had had a cutie like the Hyuga girl in her class, ‘I would have partnered up with her the moment I learned the justu… or maybe I would have waited till she was so nice and round, a girl is always so much more fun to take in when they already have another inside them.’ She thought. Looking down she gave her belly a small glare before slapping the top. “Why couldn’t you two be that cute when I got you?” Her only reply being the two girls inside her squirming around. The women huffed and pouted cutely. “Fine don’t answer through our chakra link but, I’m going to make you girls regret it by having some hot sex with our third partner once I’m done reporting Naruto’s capture to the Hokage.” She ignored the increased movements of her two female partners as if to protest against her actions. 'I wonder if I could talk her into joining us for a little womb orge during her next Urge session. It would be so cute to feel them having some "fun" together or maybe me and the girls could get a chance inside her womb for a day.' Quickly grabbing her Swan shaped ANBU mask and putting it over her grinning face as she thought about all the fun a female orgy inside the Hyuga heiress could be before vanishing in a cloud of smoke.
1553322221111112111.title: Chakra Sync: part 2

choices: Hinata begins chakra training the next day. Something weird happens.
15533222211111121111.content:
Hinata was walking back home from the registry center after having Naruto officially registered as her partner. Despite the receptionist having embarrassed her with both her subject of choice on top of her having that little episode in front of the woman, she had given Hinata something to think on; even if it was inadvertently.

Hinata needed to decide when to let Naruto out of her womb. As wonderful as it felt for her to keep him all nice and snug inside her body, Hinata was pretty sure that Naruto was growing increasingly bored. And if he grew bored enough with no signs of being let out, it would only serve to make him think of his time inside her as a prisoner of her body. In hindsight, that wasn't all that far from the truth as Hinata could easily go through the rest of her life without ever letting Naruto back out; if she wanted to that is. As tempting as the thought was though, Hinata had dreams that couldn't be fulfilled if she left Naruto trapped in her womb. She couldn't have babies if Naruto was taking up all the room after all. True there were jutsu that she could use to pack Naruto deeper inside if herself, doing so would also cause her wonderfully large womb to deflate in size however. Such a jutsu was normally used by kunoichi that had to go undercover but, still required the added power and chakra their partner provided. The only problem Hinata had outside of losing her wonderfully round belly while the jutsu was in effect, was that Hinata didn't know any such jutsu and it was very hard to find in the ninja library, much less be allowed accesses to it.

Hinata sighed as she realized that these thoughts weren't helping in deciding when to let Naruto out. It would likely be best to 'birth' him before they were assigned their new sensei and teams, this way she could explain things to him and he had a chance to accept the role he had as her partner. There was however, the small but terrifying chance that he would try to run away from her, to try and separate them so she couldn't unbirth him whenever she simply felt like it. The very idea of Naruto rejecting her and trying to break the bonds of partnership they now shared scared Hinata.

Sighing to herself again she looked down towards her belly. As she stared at the cream colored belly she wondered how Naruto would react or what he might say to her. 'Will you give this a chance or will you react poorly and force me to choose between being an effective kunoichi while earning your hate for locking you up inside me, or possible having a small chance of being your friend and letting you get away?' She thought. Her only form of response was the slight feeling of movement from under her skin; the small nondescript bulges as well as the vague shapes of Naruto's body pressing against her uterus walls as he shifted about gently. The joyous feeling of butterflies fluttering about inside her left pleasant shivers running up and down her body. Hinata rubbed her belly while nodding her head as if she was agreeing with someone that no one else could hear. "Your right." She whispered "The only thing I can do is give it my all. And if you choose to try and reject this, then I just have to try my hardest to make you reconsider no matter how long it takes or how many times I fail. All I can do is try and try again until I get it right. Thank you Naruto."

Finishing her pep-talk, Hinata looked up and saw the gates of the Hyuga compound. She sighed once more but, this time from relief as she felt much better, like a weight had been lifted from her shoulders. Making her decision about Naruto, Hinata walked with a sense of purpose. Hinata still needed to practice using her newly enforced chakra as well as using Naruto's chakra, both on its own and in combination with hers. She had some work ahead of her before she felt she could let Naruto out. It would take at least all of tomorrow to get an understanding of how to use the chakras and applying them as well as she did with her normal chakra before this. Hinata hoped Naruto wouldn't mind having to spend two more nights and another full day inside of her. She could see about letting him out before breakfast the day after tomorrow.

'And not a moment sooner.' She thought with a happy smile as she entered the compound and headed for her room. It was late and tomorrow would be a busy day.
15533222211111121111.title: Hinata debates on letting Naruto out of her womb.

choices: Hinata awakens the next day. Will she really birth Naruto?
155332222111111211111.content:
Hinata groaned as she felt the dull throbbing ache in her legs continue to make itself known to her, even as she laid in her bed. She had just returned home after spending all day doing chakra exercises so she could get a feel for her newly enforced chakra and so she could get a handle on Naruto's chakra. She'd like to think that she had made a great deal of progress on using the chakras at her disposal.

Her new chakra acted much like her old chakra but, this enforced chakra clearly had more omf to it. It had a soothing quality, much like swimming in one of the large ponds on a hot summers day. Despite the soothing feel of her new chakra it still carried a great deal more power to it then her old chakra. Comparing the two chakras was akin to comparing a slow moving creek to a fast moving river.

After getting a handle on her own chakra she went to test it. Most didn't realize that when ninja preformed their roof hopping maneuver, younger ones like genin had to unconsciously focus a small sliver of chakra to their legs in order to clear the gaps they jumped. As they grew use to the exercise, their legs would grow stronger and more accustomed to making the jumps without chakra. Using chakra to jump a distance was in fact a good exercise for measuring your chakra usage. If you cleared the jump from one edge to the other then you had a good grasp on measuring the right amount of chakra for each given situation. Using her own chakra, Hinata quickly saw the difference in power her chakra now had compared to before. Using the same amount of chakra as she normally did, now had her over shooting her jumps and quickly adjusted the amount she was using till she was jumping and landing with the same ease she had before taking Naruto into her womb.

With that done she had gone back and started practicing on drawing out and molding Naruto's chakra. She noted how his was much harder to control as it seemed to have a will of its own. To Hinata it felt like trying to catch and gather the wind making her wonder how Naruto had ever managed to use his chakra at all. Still, she finally managed to get it to listen to her nine times out of ten. She had taken her time working with Naruto's chakra, letting the warm feeling it gave off fill her body. If her chakra was cool and soothing, then Naruto's was warm and sunny. She could only imagine that having both chakras flowing through her in harmony would feel like the perfect spring day, both warm and soothing.

Comparing the power behind the chakra however was very different. The only thing Hinata could compare to would be saying that her chakra was a candle, where as Naruto's felt like someone had turned a portion of the forest surrounding the village into a massive bonfire. It made her feel greatly relieved to know that he was her partner and not her enemy. She pitied anyone stupid enough to try and fight such a power and think they'd get away unscathed.

The day had gone by rather quickly for the girl but, she had still managed to practice using Naruto's chakra, which shot her up twice as high as she had originally intended, and had started learning how to pull both of their chakras out at the same time. Still as the day ended she had one last thing to check. When meditating on the chakras inside her, she had felt traces of a third chakra. This one seemed different then hers and Naruto's. It felt darker, bloody, endless; it wasn't that it felt evil but, sure didn't feel like anything she'd ever experienced before... It confused her. So she had the bright idea of trying to reach for it. She had learned that was not so great an idea as her conscious mind grew closer to it. If her chakra burned as bright as a candle to Naruto's forest bonfire, then this chakra blazed like the sun itself.

For a Hyuga, every source of chakra did indeed look like a small flame, burning brightly inside a persons coils. In keeping with flames of fire, small specks would be lost from the main body and float off until it dissipated. Searching Hinata quickly found the smallest of these chakra embers coming off this mysterious third chakra. Not willing to simply leave it alone now that her curiosity had been peeked, Hinata reached out and grasped the tiny ember and pulled it up to the surface.

The explosion of raw power was mind boggling. She had been forced to release a large portion of the chakra from her body as she had the disturbing feeling she would literally explode if she didn't. Even after relinquishing over half of the chakra that tiny ember had given her, Hinata had still fell like she was overflowing with powerful chakra, oozing it from ever pore of her body. Not even bothering to look around herself at the shocked and horrified faces of the people, Hinata pushed a small fraction of the chakra out of her feet and nearly screamed as she shoot into the air. At the peek of her jump she seemed to simply hang there, as if she was able to defy the laws of gravity itself. Her eyes nearly popped out of her head at seeing she had jumped so high that she had to look down in order to see the Hokage monument. She had jumped hight then the tallest thing in the village with only a little bit of chakra.

By the time her mind started to catch up with this achievement she was already dropping down towards the ground at an alarming speed. Not wishing to turn herself and Naruto into a bloody smear on the ground, Hinata frantically pushed all of that amazingly powerful chakra to her legs in an attempt to cushion the fall. She learned right then that having so much power chakra in one spot was not a good idea as it quickly felt like the muscles in her legs were liquidating from the immense amount of power. A moment later she slammed into the ground with enough force to make the surrounding area shake while dust and debris flew up in the air. To the people if felt and sounded like a high powered paper bomb had just gone off.

As the dust started to settle, ANBU surrounded the area, ready to strike anything that came out should it pose any danger to the village. All they got was a small girl lying in a large crater that dominated the street. Suffice to say many ANBU had to resist face palming at the sight of the supposed danger whimpering in pain at the bottom of a crater.

Hinata gave another heavy sigh as she turned her attention back towards her large belly, a smile forming on her lips at the sight of its massive spherical form. Once the pain in her legs had subsided, Hinata taken a quick peek at the damage with her Byakugan and had been shocked to find Naruto's chakra pouring into her system, easing the pain and amazingly accelerating the recovery of her legs. At the rate they were healing, she'd be perfectly fine by tomorrow late morning. Hinata couldn't help but, give a megawatt smile as she caressed her belly lovingly. "Best Partner EVER!!!"

She spent the next hour rubbing her belly, taking comfort in the pressure it placed on her pelvis as she laid on her back for the night. Apparently, laying on her side was a no-no for the night due to her legs but, she couldn't bring herself to really care. She gave her belly a small kiss and whispered a goodnight to Naruto before relaxing and drifting off to sleep.
155332222111111211111.title: Chakra training and a Third Chakra?

choices: Hinata throws off her doubt and strips. She births Naruto.
Hinata hesitates and decides to put the birthing off, for now.
1553322221111112111111.content:
Awakening to the sound of birds chirping outside and the feel of sunlight on her face, Hinata sat up with a big yawn and stretched. Despite the damage her legs took the day before, she felt great. Smiling she slowly eased herself out if bed and gave another stretch, reviling in the feeling of being able to move without any pain. Her bright smile turned towards her belly as she gave it a gentle pat, silently thanking Naruto for taking such good care of her.

Looking to the calendar on her wall, Hinata's happiness dipped slightly as she saw that it was time to make her decision. She could let Naruto out now as proof that she wished to be partners, or she could procrastinate and take the chance of never working up the courage to let him out.

She walked into her private bathroom rather somberly. Looking towards her tub and her eyes immediately settled on the arc in the back that was designed for the sole purpose of making the birthing process of a partner more comfortable. There were even spots on the sides for her to place her feet so her legs wouldn't get in the way.

Part of Hinata wanted to strip off her nightgown and panties and step into the tub. The other however, wanted her to just turn around and ignore the responsibility she had to birth her partner. She could always do it later, right? Hinata was truthfully rather scared to go through with the birthing as it was suppose to be painful the first time. Supposedly this was intentional to remind the Kunoichi of the vow of partnership she had just made. If what she had read, it wasn't all that easily on the partner either.

A kunoichi's womb filled itself with a type of gel-like substance that acted as a cushion to protect those inside the Kunoichi. The gel was very nutritious and could even be used to amplify the healing property's of creams and salves if one knew what they were doing. However the gel would breakdown quickly after being exposed to air. With a partner being inside the womb, their lungs would fill up with this gel and need to be expelled shortly after the umbilical cord detached. If not done fast enough then the partner will suffocate as the birthing process leaves their bodies weak and unresponsive for the first few times.

Staring at the tub, Hinata's eyes slowly trailed back to her wonderfully large belly and she bit her lip in thought. Did she really want to go through with this when she have every right to simply keep Naruto locked up inside of her?
1553322221111112111111.title: The big decision. Partner or Chakra Battery?

15533222211111121111111.content:
Yes.

She had to do this. She had to birth Naruto. As tempting as it was to keep him snuggly tucked away inside of her womb, Hinata knew that she wanted more out of Naruto than just his chakra. She wanted to see him, talk to him, get to know him, have him get to know her, and touch him with more than just the walls of her uterus. And if she didn't do it now, then she probably wouldn't ever find the gumption to do it again. Besides, Hinata always believed she would do anything for Naruto. If she couldn't do something as simple as giving birth to him...then she'd be nothing but a dirty liar.

"It's time to end this," she said as she began to slip off her nightgown, hoping her words would fill her with courage. "It's time to come face to face with Naruto-kun."

Hinata tossed her gown to the floor. In a few short seconds, her panties followed. And then just for kicks, so did her bra. Now completely naked, the Hyuga stepped into the bathtub and laid down with her legs spread out and pressed into the divots. She was stripped. She was in the proper position. All she had to do now...was push.

Unlike giving birth to a baby, the process of birthing a partner called for it to be done naturally. That meant it was prohibited to do anything that could dull the pain. There could be no medicinal jutsus to provide numbness, and painkilling drugs like morphine were a big no-no. Both were known to cause a number of long-term effects on the partner, which could range from stunted chakra reserves, to loss of specific senses, to even outright death in some rare cases. While research was being done to find a way to make giving birth to a partner less strenuous for all parties involved, it was still a long way off. And even so, many traditionalists argued that the pain was an important part to the entire process.

None of that really meant anything to Hinata at the moment though. That was something for women to consider in the future. She was in the present and thus had to do what every woman before her had done as well. According to the literature, which Hinata had practically committed to memory, there was only one real measure a woman could take when it came to dealing with the pain of birthing.

Find something sturdy, and bite down on it.

Hinata brought a thin strip of wood along for that very purpose. It was hard enough to not break under strain, but not so much that it would harm her teeth. She opened her mouth and clenched it in her jaws lightly. With that done, she closed her eyes and took a deep breath, hoping it would steady her nerves and rapidly beating heart. She took one breath. She took two. And then, just for good measure, she took a third.

She hadn't begun yet. She could still turn back. She could walk away right now and put the birth off for a little while longer. An hour or two. Until after lunch. That evening. Before bed. Tomorrow. The day after. A week from now...

No! I said I would do this now, and that's what I'm going to do!

So without another thought, Hinata pushed. In an instant, her entire abdomen trembled and quaked as her muscles reacted involuntarily. It had begun. Her uterus was contracting. Now the only way out of this was to go forward.

And already she could feel the pain erupting throughout her insides! Something too massive for her body to handle in normal circumstances was being pushed through passages too small to hold it. And there was nothing she could do to stop it. Her muscles were now operating on their own accords, thrashing, pushing, pulling, and stretching to make room. And OH KAMI, it hurt so much, like everything in her stomach was being ripped apart violently from inside with reckless abandon.

I shouldn't have done this I shouldn't have done this ISHOULDN'THAVEDONETHIS!

Hinata suddenly flinched and threw her head backwards as a new sensation made itself known. Small, almost electronic pinpricks spiked up in the flesh of her engorged belly and scraped slowly downward, leaving behind small but growing rivulets of searing pain in her stomach. They almost felt like talons clawing away at her womb, and then Hinata realized to her horror that may not have been far from the truth. Naruto was digging into the walls of her uterus with his fingernails, struggling to maintain a grip on whatever he could grasp while his entire world turned into a raging firestorm.

Hinata didn't know if that was normal; she hadn't recalled reading about it. But she couldn't be mad at him for doing it to her. If anything, she was feeling apologetic. It was her fault after all. She was the one who chose to birth him at this very moment. And she was the one who forced him into her womb in the first place.

However, Hinata could not utter or even think of any words of atonement. She could only strain her eyes shut and bite down on the piece of wood in her teeth as the pain intensified. She pushed even more, not knowing if that was even necessary anymore, but persisting anyway, hoping against hope that this would end as quickly as possible. But it had only just begun.

The spikes of pain in Hinata's stomach vanished as Naruto lost his grip on her uterine walls and slipped further down, out of her womb and into her birth canal. The plank of wood in Hinata's teeth cracked as she felt her entire gut slowly and agonizingly swell up to make room for his bulk. Her body pushed him forward without giving her a chance to breathe. She could only moan pitifully and repeatedly through clenched teeth with every convulsion she made as her insides stretched, broke, and tore to their absolute limits and beyond. Tears streamed down Hinata's face. She could only hope things weren't going horribly wrong for either her or Naruto.

Why? Why? Why? WHY DOES THIS HURT SO MUCH?!

The Hyuga's muscles thrashed against Naruto's form violently as they pushed and pulled him further down. And as they did so, things only grew worse for Hinata. More and more of the sensitive flesh on, in, and around her pelvis was flaring up as more shifted and expanded to accommodate the boy's moving body. No longer was biting on the wood enough for her; Hinata was outright slamming the back of her head onto the wall behind her. The pain she felt there was nothing compared to what she could feel creeping up from the sensitive area between her legs. If her teeth hadn't been buried up to their gums in rapidly splintering wood, she would have screamed bloody murder.

And then it happened. A splitting sensation in her groin, of something large bursting out. Naruto was emerging now, greeting the air for the first time in over a day. Hinata wanted more than anything to steal a glance and see him again, but the pain was now at its absolute worst. It was like she was being pummeled, sliced, and stung by a thousand fists, knives, and bees all at once. And worse, her legs were now spreading out even further in preparation for what was about to come.

Preparation. Preparation for what was about to come. Even in her mind, addled with its thoughts of agony, those words reverberated through her head like echoes down a hall of black iron. Yes. It was ending. It was almost over. Hinata may have felt like she was dying...hell, for all she knew, she probably was dying...but she would be damned if she didn't see this through to the end.

Can't give up, can't give up...just a little more...just a little more...

"Mmmrrrrrhhhh!" she half-moaned and half-growled, pushing herself much more lightly but more rhythmically than before. Hinata feared that if she moved too fast, she might very well rip herself in two. Little by little, she flexed the muscles in her abdomen, in her thighs, and within her folds. Little by little, she could feel her body stretch wider. Little by little, the stings, aches, and pains increased in intensity. And little by little, centimeter by centimeter, Naruto was squeezing out. She couldn't tell exactly how much of him was exposed now, but she was definitely past his shoulders. The light at the end of the tunnel was becoming increasingly more visible.

Just a little more...a little more.

Hinata steeled herself. She ignored the splinters scraping into her gums as well as the thundering tremors in the back of her head. Enough was out now, and something in her was demanding she exert more force, and like everything else about this birthing, she wasn't able to stop it. So she focused. She put all of her concentration into her lower regions, where all the pain she felt, greater than anything else in her life, was gathered together. There, she mustered all the strength within her feeble little body...and gave one last final push!

Veins popped up everywhere. In Hinata's temples, around her eyes, in her arms, and down her thighs. A sudden jolt of pain rippled through her whole form, from her groin, to the tips of her toes, and back up to her forehead. Her back arched, her hips pulled backward, her legs splayed further out than they had ever gone before...

...and with a final thrust, something large and weighty flopped ungracefully out of her. Hinata gasped as she felt all the tension within her suddenly snap like a severed wire, the splintering plank of wood in her mouth falling to the floor of her tub with a tiny clatter. The young girl let her whole body go limp as a steady stream of warm...something flowed out of her. She was achy all over, sticky with sweat, her normally prim and proper hair clung to her damp face, and her already blurry vision was flickering as she struggled to remain conscious. But Hinata also felt an immense sense of relief, like a great weight had finally been lifted off of her shoulders.

Naruto was now birthed.

First she pressed her ear to his chest, his heart beat was a bit fast but regular, and his breathing while a bit shallow and ragged seemed regular too. From what she could tell, Naruto seemed fine of course she'd need to take him to a doctor for a more thorough examination, but with that out of the way Hinata leaned back in the tub closed her eyes and fell a sleep.

A couple of hours later Hinata came too to find...

1553322222222221.content:
By using this jutsu a ninja could, temporarily, absorb an ally/friend into themselves to gain certain advantages. These advantages would be dependent upon the gender and traits of the jutsu user, as well as the gender and traits of the person the jutsu is used upon.

An example: A Shinobi (male) uses the jutsu on another male comrade; now the jutsu user has increased chakra reserves or enhanced bone structure with greater muscle density allowing greater strength. In response if a Shinobi absorbs a fellow Kunoichi (female ninja) then they take on other traits such as but, not limited to: greater flexibility, smaller more compact body, or even enhanced chakra control.

This of course means that Kunoichi gain some traits of those they absorb. Kunoichi absorbing Shinobi tend to take on one of two major paths, one increasing muscle mass and density, making the kunoichi more muscular; or the extra mass from their comrade is moved towards filling out their figure without getting in the way of other traits they gain. Kunoichi would find themselves stronger no matter which way their bodies reacted to the change.

Outside of the physical changes; of which could include those stated above as well as anything from: changes of hair or eye color, skin tone and a slew of other things. Mental and emotional changes are possible as well. A change of personality, different temper, and etcetera.

As for the jutsu itself… the user could find their body taking on a melting, oozing gel-like quality. This would allow the user to pull his/her chosen target into themselves through the skin, preferably by pulling them directly into the torso or chest area as this would allow the shortest time between absorbing their friend and the mixing of traits that would follow. Basically, by pulling your friend/partner into your chest, you are pulling them in as close as possible to your chakra center. This allows the changes to happen faster as there is less time being used to pull the target towards the chakra center once inside the user.

It should be noted that most first time users tend to experience a delay in the absorption of their victim. This is due to the fact their bodies must fully adapt to absorbing and integrating another person into themselves. The victim is pulled into the area of the chakra center or the stomach as many would call it. The user is then than left to wait as their body must properly break down their victim to allow proper absorption. All though this process is referred to as digestion, it isn’t really what is happening. The details are a bit complex to get into but, suffice to say, the user merely needs to wait for their body to properly absorb their victim (the process can be measured by much of the stomach bulge has shrunk), and a few moments after the user will experience their first shift into their ‘Empowered’ form.

The jutsu however can only be used on people the user trusts; because of this ninja do not need to worry about enemy ninja absorbing them in order to fight their comrades. On top of this limitation, the user can only absorb one person at any given time and once the jutsu ends it cannot be used again by the same user for a period of time ranging anywhere from 30 minutes to a few hours. There is also the time limit to keep in mind as this justu will end and forcefully separate the user and their ‘victim’ after a undefined amount of time has passed. The time a ninja can sustain their empowered form varies from person to person.

Another thing one may wish to keep in mind is that when used for the very first time, certain traits of the users ‘Empowered’ form will remain even after the separation of the jutsu user and their friend. For example: a Kunoichi absorbs a Shinobi and finds herself with a much more curvaceous body and larger female assets as well as some streaks of her ‘victim’s hair color in her own hair. When the jutsu ends and the male is forcefully separated from her, the Kunoichi will find that she has retained some or even all of her physical changes, though to a much lesser degree, and maybe even some of her mental changes if there were any. Due to this, users are encouraged to think long and hard about whom they want as their first, as they will be carrying traits of that person around for the rest of their lives. It is also to be noted that the ‘Empowered’ form created by absorbing their first tends to be stronger and longer lasting then the ‘Empowered’ forms the user would gain by absorbing another.

Just as a person enters the user to mix traits, so too must the person exit the user when the jutsu ends. 1553322222222222212112212211.content:
Hinata was tired. After a long day of missions and training she wanted nothing more then to eat and then take a nice hot bath before falling on her bed. Her dreams filled with her and Naruto awaited her. Giggling lightly to herself she continued walking mindlessly down the dirt road towards home. Having not been paying attention she didn't notice the object laying out in the middle of the road until she tripped over it.

"Eep!" Tumbling as gracefully as one would expect, Hinata shook her head to try and clear out the cobwebs of her mind. No matter how tired she was, it was no excuse for not paying attention to her surroundings. Looking back at what she had tripped on she saw a small black air tank with a silver nob at the top which was just large enough to hold in her hand. Crawling over to it, she picked it up and examined it more closely.

Picking the air tank up she turned around in her hands, trying to figure out why someone would just leave this out in the middle of the street. It seemed ordinary enough to her, though she did wonder about the odd gauge on the side that currently had its arrow pointing towards empty. Turning it over once more she noticed a small piece of white paper near the nob. "A note? Why would that be there?"

Gripping the note in hand she quickly read it over. "Who so ever breathes into this air tank will deflate into a wearable skin suit that any person may put on over their own skin. Once the air tank is full of the deflated one's air anyone may either breathe his or her air from the tank and assume their body shape, height, and voice, they may wear their skin and take their appearance, or they may do both and become a complete duplicate of the victim."...

'Is this one of Naruto-kun's old pranks?', she wondered.

What happens next?
1553322222222222212112212211.title: Hinata (Pre-skip)

155332222222222222212111.title: Path A

1553322222222222222121111.content:
Naruto only smiled as he rubbed the back of his head. He and Ranko tied the knot shortly after the last shinobi war, having been dating since shortly after graduation the academy together, "Anything for you. I'll follow once I take of today's paperwork with Kushina."

"Alright. I just hope they all take the news well..." Ranko said with a bit of a sigh. With her old friends, one could never be sure what would happen.

"Well... based on your stories that Akane person is the only issue you might have." Naruto said as he handed Ranko a travel pack.

"Yeah... Still, worst case scenario I say good-bye and come back home. Anyway, see you in a couple hours!" Ranko said before she ran through the portal. Naruto simply waved at his wife. Most would find her stories strange but he found them funny even if they were true.
1553322222222222222121111.title: Naruto Uzumaki

15533222222222222221211111.content:
"Whew." Ranko said as she landed in the streets. She did a quick check to make sure none of her gear fell off as well as the bun large bun her hair was wrapped up into.

Reason for the bun was the fact that over the years she had let her hair grow out down to her hips over the years. Whenever she was on a mission, she'd just tie her hair up into a bun. Once she confirmed nothing was out of place she took a moment to find out where she was. Right down the street from the dojo.

"Wow... nothing has changed has it?" Ranko said to herself as she walks towards the gate, "I wonder if everyone still lives here..."

Ranko opened the gate and looked inside. No one was out front. Not surprising since it was in the evening. She walked up to the door and rang the doorbell.

"Coming." A sweet voice responded from inside. A moment later the door opened to reveal Kasumi, "Good ev.... RANMA?!"

"Hey Kasumi. I'm back." Ranko said as the sound of people running filled the home. Sure enough, Akane, Nabiki, and Soun Tendo all slide to a stop a the door. Ranko only laughed nervously as she waved, "Hey everyone..."

15533222222222222221211111.title: Outside the Tendo Dojo

Ranko fidgeted a bit under the stares, "I didn't know if I would ever make it home and had to start my life over. One thing led to another and in the end, he helped me through it all. Soon I found myself in love. Believe me it wasn't a walk in the park for me either at first."

Nabiki wasn't to bothered by it one way or another, but was still as shocked as the rest.

Kasumi seemed to be the only person happy things worked out for Ranko, "Oh my, congratulations! Are there any other surprises you want to share?"

"Yeah, like having a child or being pregnant?" Nabiki said in her usual attitude.

Ranko waited for a minute, tapping her cup before deciding enough was enough, "So... would it be okay to introduce you all to my family? He should be arriving shortly." Ranko also took the time to undo the bun in her hair, letting it fall freely.

"We're going to get to meet them?" Akane asked, being snapped out of her shock.

Ranko nodded with a smile, "I decided that if this all went well, I'd like for you all to meet them. Akane hasn't hit me with a mallet yet and since my father and that old lecher isn't here. "Well he should be here..." Ranko starrted before hearing a knock at the door, "Oh that must be him. I'll let him in." Ranko said as she stood up and rushed to the door. Everyone sat in anticipation as they watched as Ranko returned holding a toddler in her arms with a tall, blonde haired, blue eyed man in tow, "Everyone, this is Naruto Uzumaki, my husband." The man gave a nod and large grin as Ranko turned the toddler in her arms, "And this is Kushina, my daughter."

Everyone got up and walked over to the family. Kushina only stared at the strangers for a moment before bursting into a fit of laughter. The Tendos looked between the toddler and Naruto before Nabiki asked, "So what's with the birthmarks?"

"Ranko explained your home world to us." Kasumi said as she pour Naruto a cup of tea.

"Oh, then that saves a lot of time. Well, we met in the academy when we were kids. At first she would just talk to me after I got in trouble for pulling a prank on one of the teachers." Naruto started.

"Usually a mix of pointers and scolding in one." Ranko chimed in as she rocked her child back and forth gently.

"As the years went on, Ranko realized that my training was lack luster and started teaching me some of the things she knew." Naruto said, putting an arm around Ranko's shoulder. Ranko only smiled and leaned into the hold, resting against her husband's chest, "We got placed on the same team after graduation thanks to the third Hokage."

"Oh? He pulled some strings did he?" Nabiki asked before taking another drink.

"Yeah. The thing is I didn't have many friends growing up. Heck I've been an orphan since I was born. The third must have seen how close we got and teamed us up." Naruto said with a chuckle.

"Naruto man'd up and asked me out shortly after graduation." Ranko added, "I turned him down at first because I wasn't sure about how I felt, but the stubborn fool kept trying and eventually won out in the end."

"Not at first, though it was entertaining to see Naruto act all flustered and embarrassed over the smallest things. 15533222222222222221211111111111.title: The first date.

155332222222222222212111111111111.content:
"He must have done something good then?" Kasumi asked.

"It was pretty normal for a date this time. It was time for a festival so we went together. It was all the people Naruto knew complimenting us that started the feeling. I started to feel nervous after that. Naruto didn't seem to notice and just carried on with the fun. However he did surprise me with this necklace." Ranko said as she used her free hand to hold the necklace with a golden heart pendent up from under her shirt, "I didn't expect this at all since it had been years since I'd gotten an actual gift from anyone."

"Actual gift?" Nabiki asked with an eyebrow raised.

"Well, some people did get me a gift on my birthday, but you could tell there really wasn't any thought put into it. Pity gifts basically." Ranko explained, getting an "Oh" from Nabiki. "Anyway, I was so surprised by the gift and felt bad I didn't have anything for Naruto so I did the only thing I could. I kissed him."

"Best gift she could have gotten me then honestly." Naruto chimed in with his usual grin. At this point Kushina had finished feeding and decided to take a nap. Naruto took her again so Ranko could put her outfit back on properly.

Once dressed Ranko continued, "The rest of the dates basically ended the same way. Naruto respected I wanted to move at a steady pace and not speed through it... Then he was taken on a training journey for two and a half years after some hard events happened."

"My sensei decided to train me while keeping me on the road since a group of people was after me. Keeping me with him was the safest place I could be." Naruto added.

"Sadly it was true. The group after Naruto had already managed to get into the village with little difficulty before. Thankfully he wasn't in town at that moment." Ranko continued, "I'll be honest, those years was when I realized I loved him. Without Naruto around every day felt like a drag and I just wanted the time to fly so he would be back."

"Really? You must have been over joyed when he got back." Akane said.

Ranko only smiled more, "I tackled him to the ground and made out with him right then and there. You tell me if I was happy."

"I know I was!" Naruto added, only to get a playful jab in the side from Ranko before everyone started to laugh.
155332222222222222212111111111111.title: The second date

1553322222222222222121111111111111.content:
"We spent time catching up and going out whenever we both had the time. Which wasn't often given how events played out." Naruto said with a bit of a sigh as he adjusted Kushina so she could rest comfortably.

"If we weren't on missions we were having special training that couldn't be left for later." Ranko added, "But once the war was over and everything settled down, we got married. Three years later I got pregnant with Kushina. That's all the major life events we had."

Nabiki only smiled as she asked, "So how was your first time as a woman Ranko? The honeymoon everything you expected?"

"Nabiki!" Akane yelled, surprised at her sister asking such a question. Nabiki only shrugged in response

"Well... the honeymoon wasn't our first time actually." Ranko said with a slight blush, "The war was declared before it started. Knowing what could happen, I asked Naruto do have sex with me. He was a bit confused at first..."

"Well you came out with it so suddenly. Who wouldn't be?" Naruto said in his own defense when he saw the looks the Tendos had, to which they gave an understanding nod too.

"It wasn't hard to set that mind straight though." Ranko said with a wink before she noticed how dark it was getting, "Hm... we should be heading back." One look at the Tendo's immediately made Ranko regret that sentence before she continued, "We can come back tomorrow. I'm not leaving for good, but Naruto still has a village to run and I have a daughter to care for. Is it alright if we come back tomorrow afternoon?"

"Why of course!" Soun exclaimed, "You are welcome here any time Ranko, along with your family. Things may have changed, but its not any fault of yours."

Ranko smiled sincerely and surprised everyone as she bowed, "Thank you. You have no idea what this means to me."
1553322222222222222121111111111111.title: The marriage

"That went a lot smoother than I could have hoped it would..." Ranko said as she undressed. With Kushina put to bed for the night and a major worry off of her chest, she was preparing for a night with her husband.

Naruto walked into the room with nothing but boxers on, having just come from the bath. "I know. From all the stories you told me I expected that Akane girl to flip out and attack us."

I could take him in but after so long he'd have to leave... Unless..." Sanai smiled as a planned hatched in her head. With that, she picked up Naruto and flew off to her home.
