155332222222222222222111111.content:
- 4 years later -

Naomi yawned as she sat up, stretching her limbs, wings, and tail. Her hair, now down to her hips, was tied into a braid while her slept. She stood up from her bed, completely naked, and walked to her own bathroom. Her large B-cup breasts, an impressive size for the recent thirteen year old girl if she were just human, bounced with every step. Naomi was a succubus however, so her size was relatively normal. Once in the bathroom Naomi stopped in front of the mirror and undid the braid, letting her hair free.

"Four years..." She muttered as she raked her fingers through her hair to ensure it wasn't tangled. She then stepped into the shower and began to clean herself, "Four years since mom adopted me. Since I became a girl and a succubus." Naomi smiled as she rubbed the soap over hear breasts, letting out a slight moan before talking to herself more, "I don't regret it one bit."

Naomi fondled her breasts a bit more before she snapped out of her pleasure, "Oh yeah its my birthday! I can't waste time tonight! Mom promised after all!" Naomi said as she sped up her cleaning. Once clean and out of the shower, she dried and brushed her hair before putting a scrunchy on it at her neck to tie it together. She then split it into a pair of pony tails at the base of her wings. This made flying much easier on her hair. Once done with that she started to get dressed.

Sanai knocked and entered the room as Naomi dressed, "Hey I was just about to wake you Naomi. You ready for...?"
155332222222222222222111111.title: Time skip

155332222222222222222112.content:
A pair of enormous shadows approached the unconscious boy. One leaned down and took a sniff of Naruto before speaking in a feminine voice, "The boy is still alive." The pair were a couple of Azure flame dragons.

"Disgraceful. Abandoning their own young like this. Humans are deplorable creatures at times." A deep male voice said before letting out a growl.

"Tis true. The pour boy... no doubt he is an orphan. We should adopt him." The female dragon responded.

The male dragon hummed in thought for a second before nodding, "Yes. We shall raise him into a fine dragonkin. However... who shall change him?"

"I would be best if I did. As you know the female population is low this generation and he is young enough to where it won't be much of an adjustment." The female dragon said.

This was true... however there was also the concern on how the child would take it. Waking up as a dragonkin was sure to be a shock all its own but a dragonness?
155332222222222222222112.title: Dragon(s)

1553322222222222222221121.content:
The male dragon conceded to his mate, "You are right. The dragonness numbers are too low for us to afford not too."

His mate nodded before bending her head down to grab Naruto. She carefully bit the back of his shirt and lifted him up before she and her mate flew off to their den.

Once back in the safety of the den, the female set Naruto down gently at the back of the cave. Naruto hadn't stirred through out the flight, still asleep. The female dragon was thankful for this. It would make the transformation process much easier on Naruto. She stretched her neck up, flexing it for a moment before moving her head back over Naruto where she spit a transparent blue gel like liquid onto his head, covering it completely. She repeated the process until Naruto's entire body was covered in the gel. Once finished, she licked her mouth clean of the substance, "There. You will be a part of the family soon little one." She smiled as she watched over Naruto. She could already see the scales forming on parts of his body as the gel ate away the clothing as well.
1553322222222222222221121.title: Dragonness

15533222222222222222211211.content:
The female dragon watched over her new charge as the gel did its job. First was the most obvious change. Naruto's manhood shank down to a clitoris as his testicles retracted into his body. His face contorted in discomfort as his testicles moved inside his body, reforming into ovaries. They attached to the newly formed womb, finishing Naruto's change from male to female. The changes seemed to spread from there. The gel itself seemed to keep Naruto in a state of unconsciousness.

Naruto's hips widened as her waist slimmed down. Scales appeared all over her hips and goes up her sides, leaving her stomach bare. The scales also covered her back as a dragon tail grew out of spine. A bit of hair was seen growing at the tip of the tail as well as small spikes. Spines appeared on the tail going all the way up to her neck. All of the changes occurring on Naruto's back causes more discomfort, making her subconsciously roll onto her stomach. Once on her stomach, little numbs could be seen coming out of her shoulder blades. Her wings were forming.

As Naruto's wings grew in, claws formed on the tips of Naruto's fingers, replacing the finger nails completely. Her pinky and third finger had fused together as scales covered it completely. The scales went all the way up to biceps, stopping halfway up. The same type of claws appeared on her toes as her feet started to stretch while her calves shrank. The joints of her ankles moved up as her toe joints bent and locked Naruto to where she would always stand on the balls of her feet. A large claw grew out of the back of her heel as scales completely covered her legs. Her toes fused together until only three remained. By this point her wings had completely finished growing, now lying completely stretched out.

Finally her face changed, becoming smaller and more feminine. Her ears grew longer, pointing at the as scales formed on the outside and edges of the inner ear. Small spikes appeared on the tips of Naruto's ears almost giving the appearance of jewelry. Her hair grew longer, stopping just before her shoulders in length. Scales grew on the back of Naruto's neck, going around to her face over her eyes. Lastly two sets of horns grew out of her skulls from above her ears, going towards the back of her head.

A last few changes occurred to Naruto, though they couldn't be seen. Her tongue grew a bit longer as it forked. Her teeth became razor sharp as glands formed in the back of her throat giving her the gift of natural fire breath. Her chest pushed out a small out, giving Naruto budding breasts.

Naruto was now a dragonness
15533222222222222222211211.title: Path 1

155332222222222222222112111.content:
The female dragon started to lick the gel off of the new dragonness once Naruto's transformation was completed. Naruto, who was now completely naked thanks to the gel, groaned as the dragon's tongue ran across her face, "Hm... huh?" Naruto's eyes opened, revealing pure blue dragon eyes. She looked up at the dragon licking her and was a bit surprised. Surprised... yet not afraid.

The female dragon noticed her child was awake and stopped the grooming, "You're awake sooner then I expected."

Naruto sat up and immediately realized she was different. She looked down at her dragon hand, her feet, the tail, her wings... all of it. She took in every bit of her new appearance. She should have been mad. Angry they changed her but... she wasn't. In fact, she liked it. She could feel the strength in her body, the raw power. She took a deep breath in, only to hiccup a small blue flame. This made her slam her hands over her mouth in surprise. The dragon only chuckled as Naruto slowly took her hands away from her mouth. She turned to the dragon and simply asked, "Why... did you do this to me?"

"My mate and I found you in the woods, abandoned. We took you in and decided to raise you. However dragon law dictates that those adopted must become dragonkin or dragonness. You were then changed by me into a dragonness, for the number of females are low." The dragon explained.

"So... you made me into a girl just to even the numbers?" Naruto asked, feeling used.

"Not exactly. Do not mistake me on my intention dear child. You would have been adopted regardless. However we must ensure the species will survive."The dragon said. Naruto nodded, managing to understand. Maybe this change had made her smarter as well? The dragon continued, "Do not worry. I will teach you everything you will need to know to be a fine dragonness!"

"... Does that mean I can call you "Mom"?" Naruto asked sounding a bit hopeful. Never having a mother before, she may as well make the best of the situation.

The dragon smiled warmly as she nuzzled Naruto, "of course dear. You are our beloved daughter now after all. Now what do we call you?"

"... Naomi. Naomi Azure." The newly named Naomi said as she looked at her scales. Just then the sound of the male dragon could be heard landing by the two. Naomi was about to stand to greet her new father when she felt her mother's tongue run over her again.

"I'm not finished cleaning you dear. He can come to us." The mother said before she continued to lick Naomi clean.

The male dragon walked up to the two, looking between the two before it set down the two dead deer in its mouth. He licked the blood from his mouth for a moment before speaking, "You are adjusting well."

"I'm... still taking it all in... father" Naomi said as she felt her own tail, adding the father part after a pause.

"I've explained the basics. We can explain the rest after she's settled in." The female dragon stated before reaching over to one of the deer and dragging its carcass over. She then pinned it down with her claw while biting down on its hind leg. The dragon tore the leg off, setting it down in front of Naomi, "Eat young one. You must be hungry."
155332222222222222222112111.title: Continue

1553322222222222222221121111.content:
Naomi took the leg in her hands. Something that she should have easily felt the weight of felt light as a feather. The smell of the fresh blood was so clear to her that her stomach rumbled at the prospect of food. She took a bite of the deer leg from where it was torn off, trying to avoid the fur. Chewing the meat, she slowly sped the pace of her chewing up before digging into the meat. Her hunger being so strong she didn't even care about the fur. Wisps of flame escaped Naomi's mouth as she tore into the deer leg, cooking it for her.

The male dragon seemed impressed when he spotted the flames, "Already breathing fire. She is a natural."

Naomi was to engrossed by her meal to listen to the two adults as they talked. The female dragon smiled, "That is not all, she already shows control over her wings and tail also."

Sure enough the tip of Naomi's tail patted the ground repeatedly as she ate. Her wings would twitch on occasion as well. It was clear the dragons had made a fine choice in adopting Naomi. With that the dragons decided to eat as well, digging into the remaining deer meat.

-An hour later-

"Father. Mother." Naomi spoke after some silence. The dragons had left her alone to her thoughts so that she could settle in. The two dragons turned to their child as she spoke, "Thank you for this. It's still... new, but so far I enjoy everything." It wasn't a lie. The strength, the fire breathing, the wings... heck even being a girl felt nice. Also having parents that seemed to show some care was so... nice. Naomi never knew how much better those other kids had it. Still, that being said she couldn't leave the Third Hokage and the others wondering where she was, "There is someone we should tell about this."

"You... have family still?" The mother asked concerned. If this was true then they may have made a terrible mistake.

"No. Not exactly. The village leader would take time to ensure I was alright though, as well as a man and his daughter. I don't feel right leaving them wondering where I am so..." Naomi said as she gripped her hands together nervously.

Both dragons relaxed at knowing they hadn't taken another person's child. The father spoke first as he stood up. His form shifted and changed until a large human male with horns and wings stood in front of Naomi, "I understand. I will fly to the village and speak to this leader for you. If things go well, you may even be given permission to visit these people."

Naomi looked surprised before she stood up. Her feet wobbled a bit at first as she walked to her new father, but her tail kept her balanced. She embraced her father gently with a happy smile on her face, "Thank you father!"

The father smiled as he rubbed Naomi's head, "You are welcome Naomi. I will return shortly." With that Naomi let go of her father and walked over to her mother, who she sat down and nestled in with. The father walked over to the entrance of the cave and opened a chest hidden within the rocks. Taking a robe out, he shut the chest and flew off towards Konoha.
1553322222222222222221121111.title: Naomi accepts the leg

choices: Back with Naomi and her mother
15533222222222222222211211111.content:
After meeting with the third hokage and taking the time to explain what had become of Naomi, the male dragon sat in a chair as Sarutobi puffed on his pipe for a moment. Once he had time to organize his thoughts, Sarutobi spoke, "I must say I'm not happy about these events... However... if Nar-.. Naomi is happier with you then he... she was here, then it will be best if I simply let things progress as they have..."

The male dragon smiled a bit at this, "That is wise. I can see how you became the leader of this village." The dragon stood up, making sure his robe wasn't slacking, "Since you have been so understanding on this matter, I feel comfortable allowing her to visit. Once she has had time to practice with her new abilities, she will be allowed to visit at her leisure unless circumstances prevent it."

"I... appreciate that. Believe it or not I do care deeply for her..." Sarutobi started to say.

"You need not explain." The dragon interrupted, "One man responsible for thousands. It is easy for one for fall from sight. You are only human and cannot be everywhere at once. Take solace in having the wisdom in knowing when to give a charge to one who can care for them instead of holding onto pride." The dragon stopped for for a moment as he stroked his chin, "Hm... perhaps we can work out another arrangement?"

"... What kind of arrangement?" Sarutobi asked cautiously.

"When a dragonkin or dragonness reach a certain age, they are given a test. Should they pass, they are given the ability to become a full dragon. However the numbers for both types of dragon kind are low. Not dangerously low, but low enough for the elders to notice. We are stable, and will most likely recover as we have in the past. However we cannot continue to hope that we will find stray children in need of homes. So... what I propose is a pledge of protection for your village. I will bring this pledge to my elders. In exchange, we would like to hold trials for your young to become of dragon kind." The male dragon stated. He was high ranked in the elders council, which is what gave him the authority to make this proposal.

"... I would need more details on what this would entail." Sarutobi said as he took another puff of his pipe.

"Rest assured we would not force the young to take this trial. It would be voluntary on their part and the parents. The trials would be tests of strengths and of character. Nothing dangerous for them." The dragon stated.

"... I will consider it. I will have an answer for you in the time it takes you to get approval for this proposal." Sarutobi answered.

"Fair enough. Until then, be well master of the hidden leaf village." The male dragon spoke before he left.
15533222222222222222211211111.title: Things go well

155332222222222222222112111111.content:
Meanwhile Naomi was taking the time to master her new body with the instruction of her mother. The first and foremost important task to master for Naomi was her ability to breath fire. After all can't have her accidentally burn things just by sneezing or coughing. "Now flex your throat muscles. You'll feel the glands that give you the gift of fire breathing." Naomi obeyed her mother, flexing the muscles in her neck until she could feel the glands. Once felt, she took a deep breath and exhaled. A large plume of fire came out of Naomi's mouth, disappearing quickly when she stopped. The mother dragon only smiled, "Very good Naomi. A fine first attempt. The glands we have converts chakra into fire and barely uses any at all. There for the biggest restriction is the control and amount of air you exhale."

Naomi nodded and took another breath before trying again. The mother watched as Naomi's breath steadily lasted longer and longer until Naomi could hold the breath for a full six seconds. Rather impressive for a fresh dragonness. Naomi was going to be a remarkable member of dragon kind.
155332222222222222222112111111.title: Back with Naomi and her mother

1553322222222222222221121111111.content:
A couple years passed with Naomi learning all there was to learn about her new home. How to fly properly, a proper fighting technique that incorporated her dragon strength, and knowledge of the world many didn't know about such as nature chakra. She was growing into quite the beauty as well, having a proper diet for a change. For one, her hair was now down to the base of her wings and her body was slim to the point no one would think she could uproot a medium size tree.

Naomi took a deep breath and blew fire into the pile of stones in the den, making sure her mother's eggs were kept at the optimum temperature. Once that was done, Naomi took a quick flight just outside the cave to gather some fruit to eat. Only being gone a couple minutes at the most, she walks back into the cave and sits next to the egg incubator. Her parents were off at some dragon meeting and she was tasked with watching over her future siblings. Not the most exciting thing she's ever done, but considering how protective her mother was of these eggs she knew how important her responsibility was.

Munching on the fruit, she let her mind wander, "Hm.. Maybe I should grow my hair out more. Though it will be hard to fly without it becoming a mess... Oh I should probably visit Old man Hokage soon. It's almost been a month. Though I need to make a bigger vest..." Naomi thought as she looked down at her own chest. She was an early bloomer, already having large A-cup breasts. Soon she'd be at a B-cup and she knew it. "I hope I don't get too big... Flying will be very awkward for a while if I do...

Naomi's thoughts were interrupted as she heard her parents land outside the cave. She hopped to her feet and ran out to greet them, "Mother! Father! Welcome home!"

"Thank you dear." Mother said before giving Naomi a gentle kiss on the cheek, "How are the eggs?"

"Nice and toasty just like you said too keep them." Naomi said cheerfully as her father gave her a quick nuzzle.

"Very good Naomi. Now we have something to tell you. Remember the offer I told you I made to the leader of you old village?" Naomi nodded with a puzzled look on her face, "Well the council has decided to go along with it. In two years a few dragonkin and dragonness will be chosen to represent us and scout potential candidates. You're Mother and I would like to offer you one of those positions."

"Really...?" Naomi asked, seeming rather conflicted.

"You once lived in that village. You would be the best judge of character for the females of that village. Of course you won't be required to stay in the village. You can come home at any time." Father said, causing Naomi to relax, "Of course you don't have to if you don't want too. We just thought you'd appreciate the change to venture out and meet some new people. Have some fun."

"Hm..." Naomi pondered this to herself. It was true that she didn't have many friends since there weren't many dragonkin or dragonness near by. Most were nearly half a day away and she couldn't be gone that long at her age. She wouldn't be far from home so coming straight back once she was done for the day also helped. Plus one other thought she had. Her mother and father took her in and looked after her. It was only right she honored their wishes and looked for others who wished to become of her kind and flourish their numbers, "Alright. I'll do it for you both."

Both of the dragons smiled and nuzzled their daughter with affection before all three went back inside the cave.
1553322222222222222221121111111.title: Years later

15533222222222222222211211111111.content:
"Nuzu, no biting at the neck!" Naomi yelled at one of her younger siblings as the four young dragons played in the clearing in front of the den. While they played, Naomi was preparing for her first trip to Konoha as a judge for new potential dragonkin. She and a number of other dragonkin would be observing trainees in the ninja academy to see if they were worthy as her parents explained to her. Needless to say however this required her to wear clothing, which was a slight problem given her recent growth spurt.

She currently stood a little over five feet tall with a fairly sexy body for her age. Her bust, being roughly around forty inches with C-cup, caused her to have to make a larger vest out of the leather hide she had made over the last couple of months, as well as a new skirt. The skirt had been finished the day before thankfully. Naomi's hips were a decent size thankfully, not being overly large or small along with her butt. Her thighs were a bit thick, but that was just due to her dragon side. Her hair now ended at the base of her tail, but it kept its wild spiky nature. She ground down her horns to where they just long enough to reach the edge of her head

Once she finished sewing up her vest, she stood up and stretched. The one annoying thing of going to Konoha was going to be getting use to clothing again. Still, at least she didn't have to be covered like the humans do. She checked on her siblings again to see them still wrestling before she noticed a pair of shadows pass over head, "Alright every come over here! Mother and Father are back!" The dragon hatchlings all stopped and ran back to the cave, laughing along the way. Soon enough both parent dragons landed in the clearing. The dragon hatchlings immediately ran up to their parents to greet them while Naomi simply walked up to them, "Mother! Father! Welcome back!"

"Thank you dear" Mother dragon responded as they greeted their children, "Any problems while we were away?"

"None." Naomi answered, "I just worked on my clothing while watching my siblings play. I'm ready for my first day tomorrow."

"Well done Naomi." Father dragon said as he walked up and nuzzled her, "Are you worried?"
15533222222222222222211211111111.title: Two years later.

1553322222222222222222222222211.title: Naruto (Beginning Branch)

15533222222222222222222222222111.content:
Naruto groaned as he sat on the edge of a rooftop. Another day of worthless D-rank missions, fighting with Sasuke, and being rejected by Sakura. At least he was free for the rest of the day to goof off. Naruto shifted a bit before he felt something in his back pocket. Fishing the item out, he looked at the Transformation Notebook he had found earlier that day, "Oh yeah this thing. Some kid's poor attempt at a joke. Probably wanted to mess with his friends with a transformation jutsu or something." Naruto said with a chuckle. It would be cool if he could turn people into anything he wanted too. "Heh, maybe I'll write something down just for fun." Naruto said as he pulled a pen out. The only reason he even had the pen was due to a paperwork based mission today. "Now what to write...?" Naruto asked himself quietly before he spotted Sasuke walking by. Naruto immediate scowled before an idea hatched in his mind that caused a grin. He quickly started to scribble down into the notebook.

Sasuke Uchiha will turn into a cute female version of himself named Satsuki Uchiha that lives as a maid to Naruto Uzumaki. This change comes from the Uchiha clan not being a clan of master shinobi, but a clan of all females who are compelled to find a person to serve someone. The spend the years of their early lives learning how to be a proper maid then are allowed to seek a master to serve. To an Uchiha, the highest reward they can receive from their master is the gift of bearing the child of their master and will strive to always please said master in hopes of achieving this goal. Sadly, an illness claimed the lives of all the Uchiha except for Satsuki years ago and while wondering the woods in deep thought she was nearly killed by a training trap. Thankfully Naruto arrived and saved her before anything could happen. Satsuki was grateful for this rescue and after seeing how kind the lonely Naruto could be she pledged her eternal servitude to him and even invited Naruto to her much larger home to live in.

Satsuki is 150.1 cm tall with a BHW measurement of B99 C-cup W58 H91 cm. Her hair goes down to her butt and is always in a braid. She has a slightly perverted nature and always dresses in a maid outfit of various colors with a corset that shows her figure. All of her outfits show the same generous amount of cleavage. Her skits are all short enough to where when she bends over she gives a slight panty shot through her stockings. She always wears heels at three inches minimum of different types. She'll occasionally mix things up with some jewelry or headbands with animal ears and a belt with the matching tail.

Naruto was laughing as he finished writing what he felt was a ridiculous short story of Sasuke becoming his maid. He looked down back and Sasuke and froze as he watched all of the changes he wrote down take place. The first change Naruto saw was a pair of breasts growing out of the now Satsuki's chest as her hips widened and waist pushed in as a corset appeared on her. She shrank in height a bit as her hair grew longer and braided itself as her face softened and changed shape to that of a teenage girl. Her outfit changed almost instantly into her maid uniform. Satsuki blinked in confusion before she smiled, "Time to get groceries for Master Naruto's dinner!" She said cheerfully as she resumed her walk.

Naruto couldn't believe it. The notebook had worked. It made Sasuke into Satsuki. He looked at it as memories of him and Satsuki together filled his mind. They were actually very good friends. More than just masater and servant. This made Naruto smile a bit as he stood up and put the notebook away. He may as well see this day through to the end. If anything he could try changing Satsuki back to Sasuke if this didn't work out.
15533222222222222222222222222111.title: The first page; Satsuki the maid

After an hour of exploring his new memories, Naruto walked into his new home, a two bedroom apartment on the higher end of Konoha that was originally just Satsuki's. As he took off his sandals he could smell the scent of fresh food being cooked along with hearing a wonderful melody from a lovely voice singing in the kitchen. "I'm home!" He announced as he set down his sandals.

The singing stopped and hurried footsteps echoed before Satsuki entered the apartment den, "Good afternoon Master Naruto!" She said with a bow, showing her generous cleavage to her master with a smile, "Dinner will be finished shortly master. I hope you will like it once it is finished!"

Naruto smiled, remembering from his new memories that Satsuki could do virtually anything housework related with ease to the best quality. "Don't worry Satsuki. I know it will be amazing as always!" He says before giving her a hug. Satsuki blushed and quickly returned the hug, reveling in the close contact with her master who she loved. However Naruto always treated her like this, so short of a kiss, Satsuki couldn't be sure of Naruto's feelings.


The two soon were enjoying dinner, having casual conversation about their day. As they did, Naruto began to wonder if he should keep Sasuke as Satsuki. She seemed happy, and he was definitely happy to have her. Thanks to his new memories, he could feel the love for her swelling in his heart. Naruto paused his eating and stared at Satsuki for a moment before deciding too...

info.brief_description: The same Naruto story, Only with any number of interesting twists, from WG to GTS and more
info.description:
Okay, so, it is basically th same Naruto story, only with any number of twists, from weight gain to gender bender. More will be explained inside. Pairings are encouraged but not required, but NaruHina is heavily encouraged. Please add on.

Also, be sure to be very descritive in your writing, keep it logical, don't end the story, antry to avoid killing characters, be sure to try and use good spelling and grammer, d none of the characters are to ever be immobile no matter how much they weigh.

Just follow these rules and I will usually leave your writing alone.
